texts.dragon_invasion_description: Dragons are invading! Team up with your guild and board the Airship to drive them away!
texts.dragon_invasion_alert_popup_body: This character is currently assigned to the Airship. If you send them on a quest, they will be removed from the crew.
texts.dragon_info_body1: Select Characters to board the ship and battle the dragons. Airship Power is the only thing that matters here, and all Boosters help!
texts.dragon_info_body2: Provide gear for the ship's troops to empower the Airship! Each item supplied will be sold at full value!
texts.dragon_info_body3: The Airship will attack dragons during the Assault Phase. Each dragon defeated will grant rewards!
texts.dragon_invasion_crew_select_custom_subti: Characters on the Airship are not available for quests.
texts.dragon_invasion_boosters_select_custom_s: All Boosters grant a bonus to Airship Power.
texts.dragon_invasion_supplies_donation_desc: Supplies given to troops count as a <c1>sale</c1> at full gold value.
texts.dragon_invasion_supplies_donation_tab_de: Each trooper can equip four items. Stronger items will provide more Airship Power.
texts.dragon_invasion_menu_phase_attack_desc: The Airship is currently attacking! You can start preparing Troops for the next Assault Phase!
texts.dragon_invasion_menu_phase_supply_desc: Assemble a Party and supply the Troops to prepare your next assault!
texts.dragon_invasion_menu_phase_supply_fully_: The crew is ready! Sit back and wait for the next Assault Phase!
texts.dragon_invasion_popup_progress_descripti: Accumulate <color=#E4C704>Airship Power</color> to defeat the invading dragons!
texts.quest_event_dragon_preparation_ended: The preparation phase has ended and the ship has taken off.
texts.dragons_defeated_desc: All dragons have been defeated and the city is safe! The Airship will still be sent on patrols to score more points.
texts.dragon_invasion_menu_power_tooltip: The combined Power of Heroes and Troops on the Airship. It is used to damage dragons during the Assault phase.
texts.dragon_invasion_menu_final_wave_desc: It's time for the final Assault Phase! No more contributions can be made!

texts.worker_engineer_desc: Only Roxanne holds the secret of the powerful crossbows and gunpowder weapons. She likes to make things go boom.
texts.worker_wizard_desc: Grimar's infinite wisdom allows the creation of powerful arcane scrolls. He tends to be on the forgetful side.
texts.worker_jeweler_desc: Katarina's expert hands can craft rings and ornate equipment that no else can. She's a bit of a penny pincher.
texts.worker_tailor_desc: Julia is a light armor specialist capable of crafting all sorts of equipment for agile Heroes.
texts.worker_carpenter_desc: Allan handles the crafting of many wooden items, such as staves and bows. He's the best, according to himself.
texts.worker_blacksmith_desc: Wallace specializes in forging all sorts of metal items, from swords to armor. Also forges jokes, but not good ones.
texts.worker_herbalist_desc: Maribel concocts medicine such as magical herbs and potions. She has a druidic degree, so she's the real deal.
texts.worker_master_desc: Theodore's boundless knowledge allows the creation of rare and powerful equipment. He can usually be seen peacefully enjoying his retirement.
texts.worker_priest_desc: Freyja's holy blessings are crucial to many magical items, such as amulets. She runs the temple and orphanage on her own.
texts.worker_academy_desc: Evelyn teaches a wide variety of courses at the Academy. Thanks to her studies, she has learned how to craft Wands and Runestones.
texts.worker_sundragon_desc: Sondra has a gentle nature, for a dragon. His wisdom and calm demeanor makes him very proficient in the art of transmutation.
texts.worker_moondragon_desc: Mundra is the...fiercest of the two dragon siblings. Her affinity with Luna allows her to tap into the hidden power of the moonstones.
texts.worker_elven_desc: Yolanda is the mother of all Familiars. Only those she deems trustworthy receive the honor of caring for her magical eggs.
texts.building_inn_collective_desc: Investing in the Emerald Inn will speed up the healing rate of Heroes.
texts.building_tavern_collective_desc: Investing in the Tavern will increase loot found during quests.
texts.building_champions_collective_desc: Investing in the Training Hall will allow for high level Heroes.
texts.building_townhall_desc: Investing in the Town Hall will allow more players to join the city.
texts.building_townhall_desc_2: Investing in the Town Hall will unlock more guild renown levels.
texts.building_townhall_collective_desc: Investing in the Town Hall will allow more players to join the city.
texts.worker_cook_desc: So long as you keep your dirty fingers away from her kitchen and keep chowing down what she serves, Tutu Mano will love you plenty! But beware the iron chef within...
texts.worker_baker_desc: Kaipo wakes up early every morning to bake delicious pastries and desserts. The bakery smells heavenly at all times, and the secret ingredient is love!
texts.worker_essence_desc: The strong spiritual presence surrounding the Mausoleum gathers essence from beyond the veil. As Zolea spends most of her time lazing about, her actual contribution is unknown.
texts.building_market_collective_desc: Investing in the Town Hall will allow more players to join the city.
texts.no_investment_yet: No one has invested anything yet.
texts.resource_building_desc: Investing in this industry will speed up resource production.
texts.worker_desc: Investing in the worker's installations will improve their maximum level.
texts.story_argon_01_01: ...And that's when I slashed the Troublin with my sword! Pow!
texts.story_argon_01_02: Ho ho! Quite the tale, Argon!
texts.story_argon_01_04: I must say, it's very nice of you to accompany this old man on his morning walk.
texts.story_argon_01_05: Don't mention it! If I am to become a knight someday, I must help people in need!
texts.story_argon_01_06: Just like your father, eh? I'm sure you'll make a fine knight, my boy.
texts.story_argon_01_07: Why, perhaps you could even work as the King's royal guard!
texts.story_argon_01_08: Speak of the devil, there he is at the market! Why not go ask him?
texts.story_argon_01_09: YOUR MAJESTY! I've come to offer you my services as a knight!
texts.story_argon_01_10: W-what's the meaning of this!? Sia, please handle this commoner!
texts.story_argon_01_12: Well, young man? What is it?
texts.story_argon_01_14: I'm knight! I want to become an Argon!
texts.story_argon_01_17: If you're so determined, come see me in the castle's courtyard next week.
texts.story_argon_01_18: Train hard until then! I would not tolerate a slacker among the King's knights...
texts.story_argon_02_01: Argon, what are you doing out here?
texts.story_argon_02_02: Training hard! I've finally got my chance at becoming a knight for the King!
texts.story_argon_02_03: The King? ...Or his mysterious advisor, Sia?
texts.story_argon_02_04: Is that her name? It's beautiful, too!
texts.story_argon_02_06: Gah! No! Only the King matters!
texts.story_argon_02_07: I must become a knight! Nothing else matters!
texts.story_argon_02_08: Right... Here, let me heal your wounds.
texts.story_argon_03_01: Alright! Sia will show up any moment now!
texts.story_argon_03_02: My training has paid off, I'm ready!
texts.story_argon_03_04: Oh! Hi there! You, in the bushes!
texts.story_argon_03_06: Are you here to become a knight too?
texts.story_argon_03_07: Sia will be here soon! There's no need to hide, she's pretty nice!
texts.story_argon_03_13: Young man, who are you talking to?
texts.story_argon_03_14: Ah, Sia! Just a shy passerby! Pay it no mind!
texts.story_argon_03_15: ...I see. Well then, it seems your resolve has not wavered.
texts.story_argon_03_16: Are you ready to risk your life as one of the King's knights?
texts.story_argon_03_17: You bet! I-I mean, of course! I will make my father proud!
texts.story_argon_03_18: Good. For your first assignment, I have an important event coming up...
texts.story_argon_04_03: You've cornered the assassin... and failed to stop her.
texts.story_argon_04_04: Not only that, you're saying you LET HER GO because you think she's a good person!?
texts.story_argon_04_07: You DO realize that this assassin tried to kill our King - the very man you have sworn to protect?
texts.story_argon_04_08: Such an incident endangers much more than your feeble mind can understand.
texts.story_argon_04_09: Ugh... I suppose the King has the final say about the termination of his knights...
texts.story_argon_04_10: ...But don't expect me to speak highly of you. Dismissed.
texts.story_argon_05_02: If it isn't Argon! How are you doing today?
texts.story_argon_05_03: Oh, hi Brohm... Any jobs for me?
texts.story_argon_05_04: Nothing today, sir Knight! What's got you down?
texts.story_argon_05_05: I'm just Argon now. I've... lost my title.
texts.story_argon_05_07: "Whatever happens, you need to stay positive! You'll pull through!"
texts.story_argon_05_08: I'm sure your luck will turn soon enough!
texts.story_argon_05_10: I'll be... hanging around the Town Square until then.
texts.story_argon_06_01: And so, that... "Knight", had your assassin at his mercy...
texts.story_argon_06_02: ...Yet decided to let her go, believing her to be a good person!
texts.story_argon_06_03: A fascinating tale! This new knight appears to be a promising fellow!
texts.story_argon_06_04: With all due respect, my King...
texts.story_argon_06_05: This man failed to stop your assassin, on account of a mere gut feeling.
texts.story_argon_06_06: The hallmark of a <c1>Paladin</c1>, wouldn't you think?
texts.story_argon_06_08: To have your nemesis at your mercy, yet seeing beyond mere strife and conflict...
texts.story_argon_06_09: ...Then letting them go, so certain of their redemption that you are willing to put your title on the line.
texts.story_argon_06_10: A tremendous act of bravery and benevolence!
texts.story_argon_06_11: I... must admit I did not consider this perspective, my King.
texts.story_argon_06_12: But the kingdom has not seen an aspiring Paladin in decades...
texts.story_argon_06_13: Shall I summon the knight council to debate the matter?
texts.story_argon_06_14: Nonsense! I shall handle the formalities myself.
texts.story_argon_06_15: As you wish, my King. I shall prepare an escort immediately.
texts.story_argon_06_16: There is no need. I shall be as discreet as a mouse!
texts.story_argon_07_01: Stand aside, peasants! An average laborer walks among you!
texts.story_argon_07_02: Ah, King Reinhold! It's been a while. Shall I tap open a keg of Ambrosia?
texts.story_argon_07_03: Shhh! I am undercover today! Pay me no mind!
texts.story_argon_07_04: Yes, of course! How silly of me!
texts.story_argon_07_05: You there! Hiding behind the counter!
texts.story_argon_07_06: Ah! Uh, sorry, your Majesty. I'll get out of the way...
texts.story_argon_07_07: Nonsense! A Paladin-to-be is more than worthy of sitting next to my radiant self!
texts.story_argon_07_09: Correct! In my infinite wisdom, I've sensed great potential within you!
texts.story_argon_07_10: Despite your... unusual methods, your heart is true and your sense of justice is... admirable!
texts.story_argon_07_11: The kingdom has thus deemed you fit to undertake the Paladin Trial!
texts.story_argon_07_13: I know all about them! Each is unique and decided by the Paladin itself...
texts.story_argon_07_14: It must be a dangerous task, like slaying a dragon... or destroying a dangerous artifact...
texts.story_argon_07_15: Indeed! Any sufficiently brave and selfless deed done for the sake of the kingdom will do!
texts.story_argon_07_16: I understand! Thank you, your Majesty! You won't regret it!
texts.story_argon_07_17: Of course not, I'm always right!
texts.story_argon_07_18: ...Now then, since I am already undercover...
texts.story_argon_07_19: You there! Old man! Teach me how to play cards!
texts.story_argon_07_20: Cards, eh? Old Theodore only plays with high stakes...
texts.story_argon_08_02: Lilu, I'm going to be a Paladin!
texts.story_argon_08_03: A Paladin! T-that's amazing, Argon! How...?
texts.story_argon_08_04: The King told me to face a trial! That's the only way to truly be worthy of the title of Paladin.
texts.story_argon_08_05: A trial... Do you know what you will do?
texts.story_argon_08_07: Oh no! I have no clue!
texts.story_argon_08_08: It has to be something of epic and glorious proportions...
texts.story_argon_08_09: But Argon, you are glorious! You've defeated monsters far and wide...
texts.story_argon_08_10: Sure, but it has to be something more...
texts.story_argon_08_11: I've heard there are feathered demons at Bleakspire Peak, maybe that would do it....
texts.story_argon_08_12: Well whatever it is, I'm sure you're up for it!
texts.story_argon_08_13: Thanks, Lilu... Even when I was no longer a Knight, you kept believing in me...
texts.story_argon_08_15: Anyway! You'll need help in your quest! I'll prepare a few healing scrolls for you!
texts.story_argon_09_02: All this climbing and no Harpies in sight... I even got ambushed by assassins!
texts.story_argon_09_03: ...They kinda looked like that Ninja girl, didn't they?
texts.story_argon_09_04: Good thing Lilu gave me these healing scrolls, whew!
texts.story_argon_09_05: Guess I'll take a break here.
texts.story_argon_09_09: This must be fate. A bounty even greater than a Harpy!
texts.story_argon_09_10: ...Bring it on. I'll kill you where you stand.
texts.story_argon_10a_02: Wonderful! What manner of foul beast have you slain?
texts.story_argon_10a_07: Woah! Hold on! She's turned over a new leaf!
texts.story_argon_10a_10: My King, surely you wouldn't believe...
texts.story_argon_10a_11: I can vouch for her! Knight's honor!
texts.story_argon_10a_12: Very well! I shall hear her plea!
texts.story_argon_10a_13: Ugh... I feared this would happen.
texts.story_argon_10a_14: Guards! Bring reinforcements and watch her every move!
texts.story_argon_10a_15: Argon, please wait outside while we discuss with this... intruder.
texts.story_argon_10b_01: Ugh... I did not need this headache today.
texts.story_argon_10b_02: Lady Sia! How did it go?
texts.story_argon_10b_03: ...Against all odds, King Reinhold is willing to forgive his own would-be assassin.
texts.story_argon_10b_04: While I am not so trustful, she did share valuable intel on her Azuman order.
texts.story_argon_10b_06: Yes, we'll accept her surrender and apology.
texts.story_argon_10b_07: She is currently under medical care due to starvation, but she should make a full recovery.
texts.story_argon_10b_10: Yes, It is something to vanquish a threat, but to redempt a sworn enemy of the kingdom...
texts.story_argon_10b_11: It appears King Reinhold was right about you, after all.
texts.story_argon_10b_12: Now go and celebrate, Paladin. I'm sure you'll be very busy, very soon!
texts.story_argon_epilogue_02: I really thought I blew it for a moment there...
texts.story_argon_epilogue_03: But dad was right. All I need to do is follow my heart!
texts.story_argon_epilogue_04: Ah... but does that mean you'll be sent away on campaign overseas?
texts.story_argon_epilogue_05: Not yet. Lady Sia hopes I can teach Heroes to become Paladins.
texts.story_argon_epilogue_06: Ah! That's a relief! ...Though I have a hard time imagining you as a teacher.
texts.story_argon_epilogue_07: Won't you be busy with super important Paladin quests?
texts.story_argon_epilogue_08: I'll do my best! The kingdom is counting on me!
texts.story_argon_epilogue_10: Brohm told me he was looking for some more smelting gloves!
texts.story_argon_epilogue_13: Not our Argon, that's for sure.
texts.story_argon_a_02: Please tell us all about it!
texts.story_argon_a_03: I heard some Heroes whisper about it, but no one has ever seen it...
texts.story_argon_a_04: Indeed, the Tower of Titans is a mythical place. Nobody really knows if it truly exists.
texts.story_argon_a_05: Stories say it appears out of thin air, challenging the mightiest Heroes to climb its many floors...
texts.story_argon_a_06: ...Before suddenly disappearing, wiping clean the memories of anyone who may have seen it.
texts.story_argon_a_08: That's strange... where would the legend come from, then?
texts.story_argon_a_09: Right! Some people would need to remember!
texts.story_argon_a_10: It is said that those who overcome the Titan's challenge are deemed worthy by the Tower.
texts.story_argon_a_11: These Heroes return... changed from the experience, and retain their memories.
texts.story_argon_a_12: More accurately, a part of them remains in the Tower, and a part of the Tower remains with them.
texts.story_argon_a_13: ...That will be all for today's story time. Thank you for listening to this old man's tales.
texts.story_argon_a_14: Wow! I wonder if it truly exists?
texts.story_argon_a_15: Yeah! I'd love to explore a dungeon like that!
texts.story_argon_a_16: But one thing seems strange... How does Elder Owen know all this?
texts.story_argon_b_04: Yeah, I'm beat! I feel like I've been questing all night!
texts.story_argon_b_05: Look, your shield is all chipped, too!
texts.story_argon_b_06: Huh? You're right! I could've sworn it was sparkling clean yesterday...
texts.story_argon_b_08: Ahoy! Are any of ye fine landlubbers on the market for some <c1>Juggernaut Greaves</c1>?
texts.story_argon_b_09: No... especially not twenty of them! Where did you get all that!?
texts.story_argon_b_10: Hah! Funny ye ask. I have no clue.
texts.story_argon_b_11: I think I might be lootin' in me sleep. Must be me pirate soul actin' up, arr.
texts.story_argon_b_13: ...Did we all challenge the Tower and had our memories wiped...?
texts.story_argon_b_14: That means we weren't strong enough...
texts.story_argon_b_15: I'll train hard for next time! Just you see!
texts.story_lilu_00_01: Hiya! You must be the merchant Argon keeps talking about!
texts.story_lilu_00_02: I'm Lilu, Master Grimar's apprentice. Nice to meet ya!
texts.story_lilu_00_03: I'm usually busy running errands for my Master, but...
texts.story_lilu_00_04: If you help me out, I'm sure I can find some time for a quest or two!
texts.story_lilu_00_hire_01: Cool! Thanks to your help, I got plenty of free time now!
texts.story_lilu_00_hire_02: As promised, now it's my turn to help you out!
texts.story_lilu_00_hire_03: I'm still a novice at magic, but there's a few healing spells I'd like to try out...
texts.story_lilu_01_01: Well, Pollux? What do you think of this new spell? Perfect, right?
texts.story_lilu_01_02: Yeah, this time we'll ace it for sure!
texts.story_lilu_01_03: Good morning, Lilu. Here for the weekly shipment of Living Roots?
texts.story_lilu_01_05: You sure ordered a lot this week! What's your master doing with all of these?
texts.story_lilu_01_06: To be honest, about half of it is for me. I'm doing some serious studying!
texts.story_lilu_01_08: Healing spells! I've spent all of last week mending cuts and bruises at the Training Hall!
texts.story_lilu_01_09: Right, I'm sure the Heroes are glad to have you around.
texts.story_lilu_02_01: Here you go, Master Grimar. This week's Living Roots.
texts.story_lilu_02_02: Thank you, Lola. Here is today's homework.
texts.story_lilu_02_03: Oh! A magic tome! Is it about healing!?
texts.story_lilu_02_05: This book is way too advanced! It's even got an entire section about curses!
texts.story_lilu_02_09: 35 years ago, on this very day... I...!
texts.story_lilu_02_11: ...I forgot. And who might you be?
texts.story_lilu_02_12: ...I'm Lilu, your apprentice. Or Lola, sometimes...
texts.story_lilu_02_13: Oh well, nevermind. I'll be studying this book. Thanks, Grim.
texts.story_lilu_03_01: ... Add in a pinch of Silver Dust and... done!
texts.story_lilu_03_02: Look at it glow! Not bad, huh Pollux?
texts.story_lilu_03_03: If the Miscreant's Manual to Malediction is correct, this potion should-
texts.story_lilu_03_04: Lola, what is all this ruckus? I'm trying to sleep here!
texts.story_lilu_03_05: Master Grimar! Thanks to your book, I brewed a very advanced potion! It should-
texts.story_lilu_03_07: Well then, give it here! Let's have a taste!
texts.story_lilu_03_10: Lilu! I-mu-mu-must be fr-freed! Le-let me out of this doltish, half-witted mm-mind!
texts.story_lilu_03_14: Not bad, Lola. Now then, back to your chores.
texts.story_lilu_04_01: Something isn't right with Master Grimar...
texts.story_lilu_04_02: His voice, it was as though someone was speaking from within him!
texts.story_lilu_04_03: Maybe we're dealing with a complex transmutation spell?
texts.story_lilu_04_05: Dude, Lilu! Something went wrong at the king's feast!
texts.story_lilu_04_07: Something about an invader in the castle, dude. Pretty spooky!
texts.story_lilu_04_08: An invader...! Oh no, this is Argon's first day as a knight!
texts.story_lilu_04_10: Oh no...! What's going on here!?
texts.story_lilu_04_16: Focus Lilu! Remember the Sage training!
texts.story_lilu_04_18: It's no use... Please... preserve my beautiful corpse...
texts.story_lilu_04_20: Oh no.. could it be... Poison?
texts.story_lilu_04_21: ...Just like my parents...! I won't fail this time! I can't!
texts.story_lilu_04_24: King Reinhold! How do you feel?
texts.story_lilu_04_25: Wait a minute... That cup shielded you from that shuriken! You weren't harmed at all!
texts.story_lilu_04_26: Oh! Is that so? I suppose I may have overreacted a little bit.
texts.story_lilu_04_27: A monarch's death is a dramatic affair, after all.
texts.story_lilu_05_01: Ugh... That was close... sort of.
texts.story_lilu_05_02: If Reinhold truly was poisoned... I don't think I could've saved him.
texts.story_lilu_05_03: I'll need to refocus my efforts. To ensure no one suffers loss like I did...
texts.story_lilu_05_05: Ah, the star of the hour! A knight has been dispatched to deal with the intruder. You may rest easy.
texts.story_lilu_05_07: Thank you for... saving our King, despite the circumstances.
texts.story_lilu_05_08: It was nothing! But if it were to happen again, I'm not sure I could help...
texts.story_lilu_05_09: Miss Sia, do you know about poisons?
texts.story_lilu_05_10: Of course. The aconitum, also known as Wolf's Bane, is a terribly efficient killer.
texts.story_lilu_05_11: But a personal favorite of mine is Ricin. Silent, deadly, and readily available...
texts.story_lilu_05_13: Oh. I can't say I've ever given it much thought.
texts.story_lilu_06_03: Can you believe it? The King was nearly assassinated!
texts.story_lilu_06_05: An assassin came out of nowhere and attacked him with a shuriken!
texts.story_lilu_06_06: And then, I rushed to his help as he was dying on the floor...!
texts.story_lilu_06_08: Oh right. Your condition... I need to get back to it!
texts.story_lilu_06_09: It might be a poison, too...
texts.story_lilu_06_10: Let's see... Grimar is super old...
texts.story_lilu_06_12: Yeah, we should ask around the city!
texts.story_lilu_06_13: Maybe some of the older residents remember what a younger Grimar acted like...
texts.story_lilu_07_02: If it isn't Lilu! How can I help you today?
texts.story_lilu_07_03: I was wondering if you could tell me about Grimar, back when he was young...
texts.story_lilu_07_05: Ho ho ho! Of course, of course.
texts.story_lilu_07_06: Old Grimar has always been a bit of an... eccentric.
texts.story_lilu_07_07: But back when I was a wee lad, I remember him being much sharper. My equal at chess, even.
texts.story_lilu_07_08: After that trip to the Chronos Ruins though... He always felt a bit off, now that I think about it.
texts.story_lilu_07_09: The Chronos Ruins! That's such a dangerous place!
texts.story_lilu_07_10: ...An entire civilization reduced to ruins while researching time magic...
texts.story_lilu_07_11: That place is full of magical anomalies! What would Grimar have to gain by visiting such a place?
texts.story_lilu_07_12: You're right Pollux, it's our only clue. We'll have to go investigate!
texts.story_lilu_07_13: We would need an escort though... Should we ask Argon...?
texts.story_lilu_07_14: No! What if a time vortex suddenly turned him into an old man? Or like Grimar...
texts.story_lilu_07_15: ...I can think of only one other person that could help us...
texts.story_lilu_07_16: It won't be easy Pollux! But we have to try!
texts.story_lilu_07_17: Thanks Theodore! You were a big help!
texts.story_lilu_07_18: No problem, Lilu! See you around!
texts.story_lilu_08_01: Mister Rudo, please! Don't walk away, I need to talk to you!
texts.story_lilu_08_02: Beat it kid, I don't wanna hear it.
texts.story_lilu_08_03: You and your owl can go play elsewhere!
texts.story_lilu_08_04: I know you don't like spellcasters... but I really need your help!
texts.story_lilu_08_05: I need to go deep into the Chronos Ruins, and I can't go alone!
texts.story_lilu_08_06: Why don't you ask that kid Argon, your knight in shiny armor?
texts.story_lilu_08_07: He's... uh, busy with something else at the moment...
texts.story_lilu_08_08: I guess there is no point in asking you then...
texts.story_lilu_08_10: That is truly a shame, hun.
texts.story_lilu_08_11: I heard the Chronos Ruins Cyclops Lord has never been defeated in single combat...
texts.story_lilu_08_12: It would take an exceptional warrior to escort Lilu through these ruins!
texts.story_lilu_08_14: Fine. I'll bite. How much smashing do I get to do?
texts.story_lilu_08_16: You see, I need to find the source of the time flux coming from the various crystals and isolate-
texts.story_lilu_08_18: ...There are monsters and magical crystals to smash.
texts.story_lilu_08_19: Alright, sold. You owe me one, kid.
texts.story_lilu_08_20: Great! Thank you so much, mister Rudo!
texts.story_lilu_08_21: Save it for after our trip, kid. It's no walk in the park.
texts.story_lilu_08_22: I'll be there to heal your wounds if you face too many monsters!
texts.story_lilu_09_01: I'll keep the Cyclops busy! Move on ahead!
texts.story_lilu_09_02: C'mere, fat clops! I got some oats for ya!
texts.story_lilu_09_04: This is it... the Chamber of Time. And according to my research...
texts.story_lilu_09_05: This basin should be connected to a fragmented timeline!
texts.story_lilu_09_06: A parallel universe where Chronos City is still thriving...
texts.story_lilu_09_07: Look, Pollux! If you gaze into the water... you can see something!
texts.story_lilu_09_08: Looks like the people of Chronos are living like normal, somewhere out there...
texts.story_lilu_09_09: Hey... doesn't this guy look like he's waving at us?
texts.story_lilu_09_10: He looks a lot like... Grimar!?
texts.story_lilu_10a_02: Huh? There's something... familiar about this.
texts.story_lilu_10a_03: It's a special draught made with Chronos Water...
texts.story_lilu_10a_04: ...Stabilized and twice-treated with Threads of Fate...?
texts.story_lilu_10a_05: ...and bound into material form with distilled Ectoplasm.
texts.story_lilu_10a_06: With a pinch of Deep Coral, for taste!
texts.story_lilu_10a_07: Spectacular work, Lilu. A master could not be prouder.
texts.story_lilu_10a_08: G-grimar... You're back to normal! It worked!
texts.story_lilu_10a_09: What a peculiar experience... It's like a fog just left my mind...
texts.story_lilu_10a_10: I have a rough idea of how the potion works but... there's something that doesn't make sense.
texts.story_lilu_10a_11: We saw you in the basin! In the fragmented timeline!
texts.story_lilu_10a_12: Ho ho! Is that so? I have a theory on the matter...
texts.story_lilu_10a_13: Pollux, dear. Would you mind fetching old Owen? I believe there is much to explain...
texts.story_lilu_10b_01: Dear me, old friend! That is quite the tale!
texts.story_lilu_10b_02: I'm finding it hard to believe, myself... Grimar is a survivor from Chronos City?
texts.story_lilu_10b_03: When the Time Spell went astray, that entire city was tossed into another timeline.
texts.story_lilu_10b_04: I remember that day like it was yesterday. An entire city, gone in a flash!
texts.story_lilu_10b_05: All we found among the ruins was a lone, wandering child...
texts.story_lilu_10b_06: Grimar, right? It's hard to imagine you both as kids...
texts.story_lilu_10b_07: Ho ho! We became fast friends, didn't we?
texts.story_lilu_10b_08: That we did. I studied to become a wizard and look into this strange event myself.
texts.story_lilu_10b_09: If what Lilu saw is correct, then I believe another Grimar exists.
texts.story_lilu_10b_10: The other Grimar we saw... you still exist in the other timeline!?
texts.story_lilu_10b_11: So it seems. At first, there were no consequences but...
texts.story_lilu_10b_12: As both Grimars grew up, our life experiences and personalities began drifting apart.
texts.story_lilu_10b_13: And the growing magical paradox started taxing your mind...
texts.story_lilu_10b_14: I understand! Drinking a potion from the Chronos Ruins must connect you back to that other timeline!
texts.story_lilu_10b_15: That's my theory. I'm sure the other Grimar appreciates it, too.
texts.story_lilu_10b_16: Jeez... that's a lot to take in. I think I'll need to sleep on it... You coming, Pollux?
texts.story_lilu_10b_17: As for us, old Grim, I believe we have a lot of catching up to do!
texts.story_lilu_10b_18: Speak for yourself, old coot! I've never felt younger!
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_01: Hi Grimar! Here's a new recipe. It should last a bit longer!
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_02: A remarkable improvement! Your parents would be proud.
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_03: ...If only I had studied alchemy a bit earlier...
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_04: I feel the same. If I were in full control of my functions, perhaps...
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_05: ...It's fine. I decided to focus on the future. To become better, and save others from this fate.
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_06: ...I'm sure that's what my parents would've wanted.
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_07: You've grown so much... I can hardly recognize you.
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_09: Oh no! The effect is already wearing off! I'd better-
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_10: Ho ho ho! Just kidding. I have a good feeling about this one.
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_11: Now then, while my head is clear. How about learning some magic?
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_12: The master still has a few tricks!
texts.story_lilu_epilogue_13: Oh! How about Polymorph? I'm looking forward to this!
texts.story_lilu_a_01: Grimar, you didn't tell me you had a second <c1>Collection Book</c1>!
texts.story_lilu_a_02: <c1>Collection Book</c1>...? That does ring a bell...
texts.story_lilu_a_03: Wow! This one's packed with info! <c1>Damocles</c1>... <c1>Amber Citadel</c1>...
texts.story_lilu_a_04: <c1>Grimar's Grand Wand</c1>...? Did you name that one?
texts.story_lilu_a_05: There's so many pages! You must've been quite the collector!
texts.story_lilu_a_07: Sondra... is that you, old friend?
texts.story_lilu_a_08: Wow! Do you guys know each other?
texts.story_lilu_a_09: Indeed. Young Grimar was absolutely enamored with his Collection Book.
texts.story_lilu_a_10: I believe it earned him a prestigious title among his human peers... "Nerd", was it?
texts.story_lilu_a_12: We met during his quest for rare items, and created the <c1>Fusion Cauldron</c1> together.
texts.story_lilu_a_13: He would spend day and night fusing away hundreds of items... and even more during a full moon!
texts.story_lilu_a_14: All these efforts... but his collection is still incomplete!
texts.story_lilu_a_15: I swear I'll cure your condition, Master Grimar! You must finish your life's work!
texts.story_lilu_a_16: Time certainly is cruel to mankind. I wish you luck on your quest, little one.
texts.story_sia_00_01: Well, well, well... What do we have here?
texts.story_sia_00_02: Our city's newest merchant, was it? My name is Sia. It is an absolute pleasure to meet you.
texts.story_sia_00_03: As advisor to our esteemed King, I would like to personally welcome you to his kingdom.
texts.story_sia_00_04: And while I'm here, there's a little something I've been looking for...
texts.story_sia_00_hire_01: Shopkeeper... You've been so useful to me lately.
texts.story_sia_00_hire_02: As a token of our friendship, I offer you my services as a Champion.
texts.story_sia_00_hire_03: I have an eye for valuables that I'm sure you'll find more than useful...
texts.story_sia_01_03: Today, I would like to go shopping!
texts.story_sia_01_05: However, looking at your schedule, it seems you are to meet foreign dignitaries today...
texts.story_sia_01_06: Oh, what a bore! Can't we just send them away?
texts.story_sia_01_07: Remember, my King, though you may be young, you are still King. Your word is law.
texts.story_sia_01_08: ...You're absolutely right! Shopping it is, then! Those dignitaries can wait!
texts.story_sia_01_09: Your decisiveness is admirable. Shall I accompany you?
texts.story_sia_01_10: Of course! I trust no one else with the protection of my graceful self.
texts.story_sia_02_01: ...And so, I have reasons to believe our King's life may be in danger.
texts.story_sia_02_02: I see. Indeed, a few rival kingdoms would benefit from an attempt on the King's life.
texts.story_sia_02_03: I haven't seen any suspicious characters, but I'm sure Naya over at the tavern would know more.
texts.story_sia_02_04: Thank you, Elder. Your wisdom and patriotism is appreciated.
texts.story_sia_02_05: Don't mention it. It is my duty as a resident to ensure our kingdom's prosperity.
texts.story_sia_02_06: Though he may be young and foolish, I'm sure Reinhold will grow into a fine king... given time.
texts.story_sia_02_07: And it is my duty to see him live until then!
texts.story_sia_02_08: Well well, it's not often we see pretty blue blood down here at the tavern!
texts.story_sia_02_09: Cut the act, Naya, you know who I am.
texts.story_sia_02_10: Indeed! Sia Leonel, a gift to our King by the Kern emperor...
texts.story_sia_02_11: To act as an advisor, but also to keep tabs on him, am I right?
texts.story_sia_02_14: Well then, tell me, nosy Naya...
texts.story_sia_02_15: Have you seen any strange faces in your tavern lately?
texts.story_sia_02_16: Oh, we get plenty of strange faces! Tipsy orcs, shopkeepers...
texts.story_sia_02_17: But the strangest of all would be that girl in the corner, over there.
texts.story_sia_02_20: That was an Azuman spy! ...or assassin.
texts.story_sia_02_21: I'll need to be extra vigilant...
texts.story_sia_03_01: We have gathered you here today to celebrate the King's incredible generosity.
texts.story_sia_03_02: In the past months, he has donated several million gold from his own coffers...
texts.story_sia_03_03: ...To several local temples, schools and orphanages.
texts.story_sia_03_04: All are welcome to this feast, so please tell your friends and family.
texts.story_sia_03_06: Tyrant Reinhold, your reign ends now!
texts.story_sia_03_09: Guards! Form a perimeter around the castle! Let none escape!
texts.story_sia_03_12: You! Unwashed buffoon! The King is injured! Seek out a healer at once!
texts.story_sia_03_14: (I had every entry point under maximum surveillance...)
texts.story_sia_04_01: Nosy Naya, I believe you owe me some explanations.
texts.story_sia_04_02: Oh, Mrs. Leonel... I believe YOU owe me explanations.
texts.story_sia_04_04: I've intercepted some VERY interesting letters. Sent by you, I believe.
texts.story_sia_04_07: Let's see here... A Kern seal, addressed directly to the Kern emperor?
texts.story_sia_04_08: My, my. I was dearly hoping for a scandalous love affair, but I suppose treason is fine, too.
texts.story_sia_04_11: "King Reinhold is a complete fool whose presence on the throne benefits you greatly."
texts.story_sia_04_12: "Keeping him alive is sure to damage his kingdom even more so than its ruler's death."
texts.story_sia_04_14: Such unkind words are rather unbecoming of his advisor, I would say!
texts.story_sia_04_15: Nosy... Naya... You'll pay for this!
texts.story_sia_04_16: Someday, perhaps. But for now, I believe it is you who will pay. Handsomely, I suspect.
texts.story_sia_04_18: So small a sin, compared to treason!
texts.story_sia_04_19: If you had planned harm upon our king, on the other hand...
texts.story_sia_04_20: Hmph. Very well. Name your price. And pray that my spy network never outsmarts yours, Naya.
texts.story_sia_05_01: "... In a drastic turn of events, an attempt was made on King Reinhold's life."
texts.story_sia_05_02: "Azuma seems to be behind this attempt. Agent Swan will investigate further."
texts.story_sia_05_04: Oh, merely writing a letter, pay it no mind.
texts.story_sia_05_05: (My report to the Kern emperor, that is...)
texts.story_sia_05_06: Very well! Some foreign dignitaries are awaiting my presence.
texts.story_sia_05_07: They may be a tad... offended by last time's shopping trip.
texts.story_sia_05_08: I would very much enjoy your assistance in defusing this situation!
texts.story_sia_05_09: Of course. I'll be there in a moment, my King.
texts.story_sia_05_10: Letting the Kern emperor know of this assassination attempt may usher forth dire consequences...
texts.story_sia_05_11: I... need more time to think. This kingdom is... not yet ready to face Kern.
texts.story_sia_05_12: For the sake of everyone's safety... I suppose I could omit this detail...
texts.story_sia_05_13: "All is going as planned. Agent Swan has nothing to report this month."
texts.story_sia_06_01: Sia! There is a visitor here for you! Quite the princely fellow, I might add.
texts.story_sia_06_02: ...Princely, my King? Surely it couldn't be...
texts.story_sia_06_05: My King, an urgent matter awaits you at the treasury. I would recommend you see to it immediately.
texts.story_sia_06_06: Oh, did the latest Pure Gold shipment come in? I can't wait!
texts.story_sia_06_07: Ever the fool, this king. Isn't he?
texts.story_sia_06_08: What foul wind brings you to Reinhold's kingdom, alchemist?
texts.story_sia_06_09: Straight to the point as always, Agent Swan.
texts.story_sia_06_10: I am merely on personal leave. With the Kern Emperor's permission of course.
texts.story_sia_06_11: Smelling the flowers, tasting the potions... An alchemist vacation, you could say.
texts.story_sia_06_12: And you would come here, of all places?
texts.story_sia_06_13: This backwards kingdom does appear to have its fair share of skilled alchemists.
texts.story_sia_06_14: ...Though if a swan's loyalty is found to be wavering...
texts.story_sia_06_15: You've made your point, Donovan. You may go enjoy your... vacation.
texts.story_sia_06_16: As you wish, Lady Sia. A pleasure, as always.
texts.story_sia_07_01: Donovan? I hope I'm not interrupting any... spying.
texts.story_sia_07_03: No, not at all! Merely looking around.
texts.story_sia_07_04: There is no need to be so secretive. All are welcome within the Lost City of Gold.
texts.story_sia_07_05: However, do keep in mind that, as per the Kingdom's law, any and all <c1>Pure Gold</c1> found within belongs to King Reinhold.
texts.story_sia_07_06: In exchange, brave adventurers are rewarded for their contributions.
texts.story_sia_07_07: I see. A most... generous ruler.
texts.story_sia_07_08: The <c1>Pure Gold</c1> is then minted into coinage, resulting in a sharp inflation of currency...
texts.story_sia_07_09: Correct. I see you've been intercepting my mail to the Emperor.
texts.story_sia_07_10: I do enjoy being in the know.
texts.story_sia_07_11: Since you're here, make yourself useful and carry some <c1>Pure Gold</c1> back to the castle.
texts.story_sia_07_12: Of course. Anything for my lady.
texts.story_sia_07_13: Try not to break a nail on the way back, dear Donovan.
texts.story_sia_09_01: Dear Donovan. I have a request, if you would.
texts.story_sia_09_03: Go to the Emperor. Tell him Agent Swan is dead. A honorable, tragic death dutifully serving the Empire.
texts.story_sia_09_05: I'm quitting, Donovan. Changing side, if you will.
texts.story_sia_09_06: And you'll be the one to break the news. And support my story, of course.
texts.story_sia_09_07: P-preposterous! This is high treason! I would never...
texts.story_sia_09_08: I believe you will, Donovan. Unless, of course, you'd like the world to learn the recipe of your elixir of immortality?
texts.story_sia_09_09: Ah, is that the extend of your bluff, Sia? I've never told anyone of this recipe. There is no way-
texts.story_sia_09_10: What was it again? Wings of a century-old mayfly... water from the Styx...?
texts.story_sia_09_12: There were so many ingredients... wasn't there also a dash of wine, for the taste?
texts.story_sia_09_13: S-silence! SILENCE! I do not know by which dark powers you've learned of this...
texts.story_sia_09_14: It would seem you've underestimated my spy network.
texts.story_sia_09_15: ...But I will play your little game. This time.
texts.story_sia_a_02: Dear Sia! How can I help you?
texts.story_sia_a_03: Have you, by any chance, been on another of your "capricious" outbursts recently?
texts.story_sia_a_04: N-no! Of course not! I would never!
texts.story_sia_a_05: Strange. Our ledgers indicate that Vault #36 is filled to the brim with <c1>Kunai</c1>.
texts.story_sia_a_06: I don't need to remind his majesty that this is an excessively rare item.
texts.story_sia_a_07: I-I'm sure there is a perfectly logi-
texts.story_sia_a_08: Furthermore, many of the kingdom's rarest antiques have been seen in the hands of common folks.
texts.story_sia_a_10: ...But please refrain from distributing priceless artifacts to fund your mood swings.
texts.story_sia_a_11: Hmph. Very well! From today onwards, I am a changed man!
texts.story_sia_a_12: Thank you for your understanding. I shall take my leave.
texts.story_sia_a_13: My will remains strong! I have no need for material goods!
texts.story_sia_a_14: ...This room could use a few <c1>Regal Blades</c1>, doesn't it?
texts.story_yami_00_02: I require these. Do not let me down.
texts.story_yami_00_hire_02: This is a temporary alliance. Do not mistake it as friendship.
texts.story_yami_01_01: Hee hee hee! What do we have here?
texts.story_yami_01_03: Y'got some bad manners, lady! And weird clothes!
texts.story_yami_01_05: Ah hah! You smell like Azuma, the eastern human kingdom!
texts.story_yami_01_06: What're ya doing all the way over here, lady?
texts.story_yami_01_07: Armed to the teeth and tight lipped... Ya gotta be an assassin, right?
texts.story_yami_01_09: Hee hee! I knew it! Stupid humans, always killing each others!
texts.story_yami_01_10: ...You're right. I traveled here to kill a tyrannical king.
texts.story_yami_01_11: Well! Ya can't be a good assassin if you just tell everybody that! Why'd you tell me?
texts.story_yami_01_12: Because you won't live to tell anybody. Farewell.
texts.story_yami_02_02: A password system that changes daily...
texts.story_yami_02_05: Hi there! You, in the bushes!
texts.story_yami_02_07: Are you here to become a knight too?
texts.story_yami_02_08: Sia will be here soon! There's no need to hide, she's pretty nice!
texts.story_yami_02_14: With Sia here... my task will be difficult.
texts.story_yami_02_15: But it must be done. I cannot fail.
texts.story_yami_02_16: For the Order... and for my sister's sake.
texts.story_yami_03_01: Esteemed people of my kingdom! Thank you for coming to my sumptuous feast!
texts.story_yami_03_02: It is also a perfect opportunity for you all to gaze upon my beautiful self! Do not miss this chance!
texts.story_yami_03_04: Erm, yes. Thank you for this edifying speech, your Majesty.
texts.story_yami_03_05: We have gathered you here today to celebrate the King's incredible generosity.
texts.story_yami_03_06: In the past months, he has donated several million gold from his own coffers...
texts.story_yami_03_07: ...to several local temples, schools and orphanages.
texts.story_yami_03_08: All are welcome to partake, so please tell your friends and family.
texts.story_yami_03_10: (...These are not the actions of a tyrant.)
texts.story_yami_03_11: (...No, the Order wouldn't lie. This must be a trick.)
texts.story_yami_03_12: Tyrant Reinhold, your reign ends now!
texts.story_yami_03_15: Guards! Block off all exits! Capture this woman at once!
texts.story_yami_04_03: (It matters not. I am on my own, now.)
texts.story_yami_04_06: Woah! I'm not here to fight!
texts.story_yami_04_07: I won't fall for your tricks, Reinhold dog!
texts.story_yami_04_10: I saw you at the feast. It even looked like you regretted throwing that shuriken.
texts.story_yami_04_11: The King's not a bad person, you know? He's a bit weird sometimes, but he tries his best!
texts.story_yami_04_12: I'm not sure who paid you to do this, but they can't be good guys...
texts.story_yami_04_13: How about going back to the castle and apologizing? I'm sure Reinhold will-
texts.story_yami_04_15: I have a lot of thinking to do. Don't follow me, if you value your life.
texts.story_yami_04_16: ...She's not a bad person, I'm sure of it.
texts.story_yami_04_17: Now I need to report to Sia...
texts.story_yami_04_18: Oh man, I'm going to get chewed out...
texts.story_yami_05_01: <sprite tint=1 name=Note1>Sunlight in the willows high, radiance of ages past<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>...
texts.story_yami_05_02: <sprite tint=1 name=Note2>Of the Elven glade, we- Eek!
texts.story_yami_05_03: The cold sting you feel is my blade to your neck.
texts.story_yami_05_04: I have questions. If your answers are honest, I may let you live.
texts.story_yami_05_07: The fool you call king... Tell me about him.
texts.story_yami_05_08: K-King Reinhold? He is the ruler of these lands...
texts.story_yami_05_09: Though he is rather eccentric, there is no denying his virtue and generosity.
texts.story_yami_05_10: ...What he lacks in experience, his newest advisor, Sia, more than makes up for it!
texts.story_yami_05_11: Impossible...! Your words reek of cowardice, but they ring true.
texts.story_yami_05_12: This city! Does it host an oracle?
texts.story_yami_05_13: Ah! Yes! The elf, Serene, up on the hill!
texts.story_yami_05_14: Mysterious stranger... May I have the honor of knowing your na- Ow!
texts.story_yami_05_15: A few days earlier, I would not have thought twice about killing you. Do not squander your luck.
texts.story_yami_05_16: Return to your vapid life and forget about everything that has transpired here.
texts.story_yami_05_18: Black-clad maiden... Will we ever meet again, I wonder...?
texts.story_yami_06_01: ...A black wind betrays the Stalker's presence.
texts.story_yami_06_03: She Who Stalks steps as a feather, but a heavy heart is laid bare to the third eye.
texts.story_yami_06_06: A dealer in death comes demanding guidance. What does it offer in return?
texts.story_yami_06_09: <c1>The Azuman Order, once concerned with righting wrongs...</c1>
texts.story_yami_06_10: <c1>...Champions of order, turned slaves to the highest bidder...</c1>
texts.story_yami_06_11: <c1>...For an insurmountable task, a pawn is sacrificed...</c1>
texts.story_yami_06_12: <c1>...In failure or success both, The Order emerges a victor.</c1>
texts.story_yami_06_17: One who stalks the shadows must also make amends with light, given time.
texts.story_yami_07_01: ...I'll need to gather my things and leave as soon as possible.
texts.story_yami_07_03: Innkeeper. I've paid extra for your silence.
texts.story_yami_07_04: No need to worry, we don't pry here at the Emerald Inn!
texts.story_yami_07_05: That being said, we have some mean-looking visitors who seemed to be looking for you.
texts.story_yami_07_07: They didn't leave a name. Real shady folks. Friends of yours?
texts.story_yami_07_08: Not anymore. Tell them I'm dead. I may as well be.
texts.story_yami_07_09: Leaving in a rush, eh? I figured you might. I prepared some supplies for you.
texts.story_yami_07_10: ...Thank you innkeeper. But I won't need them where I'm going.
texts.story_yami_08_02: Yeah, I saw a ninja-looking girl matching your description. She looked to be in a rush.
texts.story_yami_08_03: Excellent. We've finally tracked down our assassin.
texts.story_yami_08_05: You sure about that? I don't think that's necessary.
texts.story_yami_08_07: A solo expedition to Bleakspire Peaks is suicide. That girl wasn't packing any supplies, either.
texts.story_yami_08_08: There's no way she doesn't know that. Even Rudo's not stupid enough to go there alone.
texts.story_yami_08_09: Is that so? Thank you Gorza, I'll take it into consideration.
texts.story_yami_08_10: I suppose this problem solves itself, but...
texts.story_yami_08_11: ...It leaves a bitter aftertaste. What are you thinking, assassin?
texts.story_yami_09_01: This must be fate. A bounty even greater than a Harpy!
texts.story_yami_09_02: ...Bring it on. I'll kill you where you stand.
texts.story_yami_09_03: You say that, but you don't sound very convinced...
texts.story_yami_09_04: ...You're right. I don't care about anything anymore.
texts.story_yami_09_05: If you truly want me dead, then leave me to die here.
texts.story_yami_09_06: I would never leave someone to die! I'll take you back to King Reinhold!
texts.story_yami_09_07: I know he'll understand! I'll carry you back if I have to!
texts.story_yami_09_10: Hold on, you're all skin and bones! When did you last eat?
texts.story_yami_09_12: Have some snacks on the way back, it's going to be a bumpy ride!
texts.story_yami_10_01: Guards! Bring reinforcements and watch her every move!
texts.story_yami_10_02: Argon, please wait outside while we discuss with this... intruder.
texts.story_yami_10_05: Hmph, that's right. I was hired to assassinate a tyrant.
texts.story_yami_10_06: Or so I thought. It seems he is merely a well-meaning buffoon.
texts.story_yami_10_08: What does your people have against our King?
texts.story_yami_10_09: My order strikes only in the name of justice...
texts.story_yami_10_10: But it seems that was a lie. And with my failure, I will be hunted, as well.
texts.story_yami_10_11: I... apologize. I will submit to righteous... punishment...
texts.story_yami_10_15: Guards! Summon our best physicians at her bedside!
texts.story_yami_10_16: Treat her with respect fitting for a royal guest.
texts.story_yami_epilogue_01: Uff... Uff... Reaching you is... quite the climb...
texts.story_yami_epilogue_03: Why not take up residence inside the city? You've been pardoned.
texts.story_yami_epilogue_04: My clan most likely believes me dead. I would rather keep it as such.
texts.story_yami_epilogue_05: I understand. I'll see that you are supplied regularly.
texts.story_yami_epilogue_06: Now then, as for your next task...
texts.story_yami_epilogue_08: That's correct. As you know, his Majesty draw much ire from envious eyes.
texts.story_yami_epilogue_09: Consult this document for more information on your targets.
texts.story_yami_epilogue_11: It pains me to say it, but I believe you.
texts.story_yami_epilogue_12: I should be heading back. Though I'm not looking forward to the trip...
texts.story_rudo_00_01: Hey, you. Fetch me the manager of this store, will ya?
texts.story_rudo_00_02: ...YOU'RE the owner? A tiny fella like you?
texts.story_rudo_00_03: Gwah hah hah! Not bad, not bad at all.
texts.story_rudo_00_04: Well then, shopkeeper... I'm Rudo. Show me what you got.
texts.story_rudo_00_hire_01: Hey kid. Heard you were running a little questing business on the side.
texts.story_rudo_00_hire_02: Things are too quiet around here. How about sending me somewhere I can let loose?
texts.story_rudo_00_hire_03: ...Skip the paperwork. Just point me towards something you need crushed.
texts.story_rudo_01_01: Brrr... I'm not dressed for this cold! Why are we here again?
texts.story_rudo_01_02: The gems here have some wonderful properties! Grimar told me-
texts.story_rudo_01_03: Wait, Lilu! Look! There's a man fighting a Yeti over there!
texts.story_rudo_01_04: A man!? He's as big as a mountain!
texts.story_rudo_01_07: Impressive battle, sir! You were awesome!
texts.story_rudo_01_09: Mister... you're wounded! Let me heal you!
texts.story_rudo_01_12: I'm fine. It'll heal on its own.
texts.story_rudo_01_13: Kids shouldn't be hanging out in a place like this. Go home.
texts.story_rudo_01_14: Wow, that guy really hates magic, huh?
texts.story_rudo_01_15: No. What I saw in his eyes... It was fear.
texts.story_rudo_02_02: Bah! Then I'll make it simple for your codger ears to understand!
texts.story_rudo_02_03: The wizard in this city is a raving lunatic and should be kicked out, for everyone's safety.
texts.story_rudo_02_05: Just yesterday, he told me to keep an eye on Timotheus...
texts.story_rudo_02_06: ...Claiming that "Tim" was delusional, confused, and should be kept under supervision.
texts.story_rudo_02_09: Despite his... "condition", Timotheus Grimar is an integral part of this city.
texts.story_rudo_02_10: He is as helpful as he is harmless. I see no cause for alarm.
texts.story_rudo_02_11: What's this about kicking out Master Grimar!?
texts.story_rudo_02_13: No! Master Grimar is a powerful wizard, but he would never hurt anyone!
texts.story_rudo_02_14: Gah! Fine! But if this town blows up, don't say I didn't warn you.
texts.story_rudo_02_16: I'd better keep an eye on him...
texts.story_rudo_03_01: Excuse me... What are you grumbling about?
texts.story_rudo_03_02: Blast it. Why are there so many blasted spellcasters in this city...
texts.story_rudo_03_04: Don't get all friendly with me, wizard.
texts.story_rudo_03_05: I am a priestess of the Goddess, my powers differ from that of a wizard.
texts.story_rudo_03_06: As part of my oath, I have sworn to a life of healing and protection.
texts.story_rudo_03_07: I'm not buying it. You Spark-Borns are all the same.
texts.story_rudo_03_09: Hmph. Forget I said anything. I'm out of here.
texts.story_rudo_03_12: Do you remember my lessons about the Spark?
texts.story_rudo_03_13: Of course! Only people born with the Spark can control and weave magic spells.
texts.story_rudo_03_14: This phenomenon is generally unknown to the general public, though.
texts.story_rudo_03_15: That's correct! As expected of my brightest student!
texts.story_rudo_03_16: Though this begs the question... How does he know about it...?
texts.story_rudo_04_01: Yo ho ho! Captain Polonia really hit it big this time!
texts.story_rudo_04_02: An entire royal tomb, ready for ye ol' plunderin'!
texts.story_rudo_04_03: Keep it down, sailor girl. I'm busy.
texts.story_rudo_04_04: Or it would be... if there weren't a barnacled berserker SMASHIN' ALL THE BOOTY TO PIECES!
texts.story_rudo_04_05: What in Davy Jones' name is yer problem, matey? That stuff's worth tons o' doubloons!
texts.story_rudo_04_09: I'm smashing it all to dust to save someone else the trouble.
texts.story_rudo_04_10: If this city is too foolish to see the problem, then I'll take care of it myself!
texts.story_rudo_04_11: Oy, matey. That staff be looking REAL valuable. Yer not gonna...
texts.story_rudo_04_14: By the Kraken! Don't just snap it over yer knee!
texts.story_rudo_04_15: ...Though it be lookin' like the staff did the breakin'. Not even a scratch on it!
texts.story_rudo_04_17: Fine. But this staff's tougher than it looks.
texts.story_rudo_04_18: And for some reason, I can't drop it. Like it's... glued to my hand.
texts.story_rudo_04_19: I be no ship surgeon, but seems like ye got yerself proper cursed, matey.
texts.story_rudo_04_20: ...Ye might wanna get that checked out.
texts.story_rudo_04_21: Of course it's cursed magic. It's ALWAYS cursed magic.
texts.story_rudo_04_22: Fine. I'm out of here. Break the rest for me.
texts.story_rudo_04_24: ...More like break n' enter, cause this pirate be plunderin' tonight! Yo ho ho!
texts.story_rudo_05_01: What do you mean, y'can't break it!?
texts.story_rudo_05_02: I meant just that my violent friend; I can't break this relic.
texts.story_rudo_05_03: What use is an adamantine hammer if it can't break this puny staff!
texts.story_rudo_05_04: Well it certainly isn't that puny... That looks like pure Celesteel to me.
texts.story_rudo_05_05: In any case, there is something more at work here, probably magic...
texts.story_rudo_05_08: Seems to me like you already knew this! Why not go to someone learned in such things instead of me?
texts.story_rudo_05_09: You can't trust mages... Not one bit. My clan knows this.
texts.story_rudo_05_10: Well I don't think you have a choice here, son.
texts.story_rudo_05_11: Beside, how could you not trust sweet Lilu to begin with? She's adorable!
texts.story_rudo_05_12: She a mage ain't she? Means she's just like the rest.
texts.story_rudo_05_14: Well, she's probably the only one who can help, if you want to get rid of this staff at some point.
texts.story_rudo_a_03: Hey Juniper. And Maylee! What's up?
texts.story_rudo_a_04: Me and Maylee were talking about her future prince charming...
texts.story_rudo_a_06: ...And we were wondering... how did YOU meet yours?
texts.story_rudo_a_07: That big, dumb oaf Rudo? Hah!
texts.story_rudo_a_08: He may not look like it, but that man really knows how to talk to a lady.
texts.story_rudo_a_09: Let's see... it went a bit like this...
texts.story_rudo_a_11: So... Rudo. Have you ever considered settling down?
texts.story_rudo_a_12: Mind your business, Naya. I ain't got time for that.
texts.story_rudo_a_13: Love strikes when you least expect it! Who knows, the woman of your dreams could walk in at any time...
texts.story_rudo_a_14: Bah! I won't settle for a woman who can't wrestle me to the ground.
texts.story_rudo_a_15: Is that a challenge, big guy?
texts.story_rudo_a_17: Gorza, please put the chair down-
texts.story_rudo_a_18: How about this, meathead? You want some more?
texts.story_rudo_a_21: ...And we got married the week after. Bloodiest wedding I've ever seen.
texts.story_rudo_a_24: ...M-maybe we should go ask someone else.
texts.story_polonia_00_02: Heard ye were running a business on me turf, all sneaky like.
texts.story_polonia_00_03: Tough luck, swabbie. Cap'n Polonia has ears everywhere!
texts.story_polonia_00_04: Cough up a tribute for yer cap'n, or I'll have ye walk the plank!
texts.story_polonia_00_hire_02: As of today, I, Captain Polonia, promote ye to first mate!
texts.story_polonia_00_hire_03: I'll be counting on ye to sniff out lucrative plundering opportunities for yer Cap'n.
texts.story_polonia_01_02: Have ye ever dreamt of daring tales of swashbucklin' and piracy on the high seas?
texts.story_polonia_01_03: I, Cap'n Polonia Del Monte, be recruiting a crew for me ship!
texts.story_polonia_01_04: As granddaughter of the legendary pirate Baross Del Monte, I can promise ye booty and adventure!
texts.story_polonia_01_06: Aye. Ye interested? A fine stud like ye would be welcome.
texts.story_polonia_01_08: Er-hem, not really! I'm Argon, knight-in-training!
texts.story_polonia_01_09: Piracy is illegal so... please surrender and come peacefully!
texts.story_polonia_01_10: Shiver me timbers! A blasted knight...
texts.story_polonia_01_11: Err, ye see, I'm a legal pirate, like that... Robin Hood landlubber.
texts.story_polonia_01_12: ...I steal from the rich and give to the poor!
texts.story_polonia_01_13: Oh! That does sound rather noble. Fair enough, carry on!
texts.story_polonia_01_16: Arr, life on the high seas be tough.
texts.story_polonia_02_02: It be useless. I be a failure as a pirate captain, let alone bearing the Del Monte name...
texts.story_polonia_02_03: This Baross Del Monte... your grandfather, was it?
texts.story_polonia_02_04: Aye! A legend among legends! The modern times be tough for us pirates...
texts.story_polonia_02_05: All the merchant ships these days carry fancy magical detection tools to easily avoid us sea dogs.
texts.story_polonia_02_06: But not Baross! Magic or not, he struck undetected from the fog!
texts.story_polonia_02_07: Robbed them blind of all their valuables, leaving only his echoing laughter as his calling card...
texts.story_polonia_02_08: Even after every other pirates had retired, he continued to terrorize the seas for decades!
texts.story_polonia_02_09: That's quite a legacy to live up to!
texts.story_polonia_02_10: Aye! And after each voyage, he would always find time to visit his granddaughter and regale her with tales of adventure...
texts.story_polonia_02_11: "Raise the black flag! Fire the cannons! All men starside, ready to plunder!"
texts.story_polonia_02_13: ...Argh! Blast it all! I'm just a landlubber with a fancy costume, trying too hard to talk like a pirate.
texts.story_polonia_02_14: What's a pirate without a ship, anyway!?
texts.story_polonia_02_15: No ship, huh? Maybe you should start there.
texts.story_polonia_02_17: A captain without a ship won't be pulling a crew anytime soon!
texts.story_polonia_02_18: But if a ship is what you need, I think I know the right man for the job.
texts.story_polonia_02_20: I mean, by the Jolly Roger, thank ye, tavern lady! Cap'n Polonia owes ye one!
texts.story_polonia_02_21: Oh believe me, I'm counting on it.
texts.story_polonia_03_01: You want me to build an entire ship!?
texts.story_polonia_03_03: You bet! This will be my masterpiece! Let me see those plans.
texts.story_polonia_03_04: Hmm... they are quite elaborate. What are these scribbles?
texts.story_polonia_03_06: Ah, well that explains a few things. Still, these are more than enough.
texts.story_polonia_03_07: Yo ho ho! It'll be the greatest ship these seas have seen since Baross and Bonaventura!
texts.story_polonia_03_08: There is the matter of funding, though. Are you sure you can afford this?
texts.story_polonia_03_09: Aye, dubloons won't be a problem. Craft the ship, I'll bring yer booty.
texts.story_polonia_04_01: Arr, these Yetis be loaded with loot! I'll be paying for me ship in no time!
texts.story_polonia_04_02: Alright, dude, I'm here. So what do I do?
texts.story_polonia_04_03: That's Cap'n Polonia for ye, swabbie!
texts.story_polonia_04_04: Sure thing, captain dude. What do you want me to do?
texts.story_polonia_04_05: Ye brought yer cart. Ye carry the booty while I rob these Yetis blind.
texts.story_polonia_04_06: Wow, captain dude, you steal from these beautiful, furred creatures?
texts.story_polonia_04_07: Aye. For some reason, they be carrying tons of valuables like Warhammers and Compound Bows.
texts.story_polonia_04_08: What about the pelts, captain dude? Can I have them?
texts.story_polonia_04_09: Know yer place, swabbie! Pirates plunder, they don't kill!
texts.story_polonia_04_11: Not at all. If ye leave yer victims alive, they gather up more loot ye can plunder later. Basic economics!
texts.story_polonia_04_12: Now keep up if ye want yer share, swabbie!
texts.story_polonia_05_01: Behold, my life's work and masterpiece!
texts.story_polonia_05_02: It... it be beautiful. Ye brought a tear to this old salt's eye.
texts.story_polonia_05_03: Isn't it? I had to cut in a few places, namely your strange insistence for cannons atop the crow's nest...
texts.story_polonia_05_04: But I think it turned out more than fine, don't you think?
texts.story_polonia_05_05: That it did, matey. Here's yer dubloon, ye earned it.
texts.story_polonia_05_06: I certainly did! One last thing though. While I may be a master carpenter, cloth and fabric are beyond me.
texts.story_polonia_05_07: ...And without a sail, your ship won't be leaving port anytime soon!
texts.story_polonia_05_08: Ye've done yer Cap'n proud already, matey. I have a sail right here.
texts.story_polonia_05_09: Wow! Now that's a work of art! Magical, too! Where did you get that?
texts.story_polonia_05_10: A heirloom from me grandpappy Baross. The very sail once atop his ship - the Bonaventura!
texts.story_polonia_05_11: I see! A remarkable finishing touch to this vessel!
texts.story_polonia_05_12: Well then, Captain Polonia, the Splendid Allan is yours!
texts.story_polonia_05_13: Ye named her the Splendid Allan? Hold on...
texts.story_polonia_05_14: That figurehead... it's ye!? And butt naked, too!
texts.story_polonia_05_15: Hah hah! I can think of no finer figurehead for such a perfect ship!
texts.story_polonia_06_01: My King, I bring dire news.
texts.story_polonia_06_02: Oh no! Has the Lost City of Gold run out of gold!?
texts.story_polonia_06_04: However, I fear a meddlesome pirate has been plundering your personal merchant fleet.
texts.story_polonia_06_05: ...The theft is estimated to be upwards of 100 trillion gold.
texts.story_polonia_06_06: By the Goddess! What of my fleet's state-of-the-art magical pirate detection?
texts.story_polonia_06_07: Utterly inefficient, it seems. Much like the great Baross himself, this ship eludes even our best magic...
texts.story_polonia_06_08: ...Plundering your gold before slipping away into the sea.
texts.story_polonia_06_09: Absolutely barbaric! What of the crew?
texts.story_polonia_06_10: Spared, my King. So long as they offer no resistance.
texts.story_polonia_06_11: Gold is a small price to pay then. I shall eat peasant meals until my fortune is restored!
texts.story_polonia_07_01: Yo ho ho! Captain Polonia be ashore! Rounds be on me!
texts.story_polonia_07_02: Polonia! Or should I say... Captain Polonia! I take it your "business" is going well?
texts.story_polonia_07_03: Ye bet yer landlubber bottoms it be! These seas be ripe for plunderin'!
texts.story_polonia_07_04: Wherever me ship goes, me grandpappy's sails catch the wind like nothing I ever seen!
texts.story_polonia_07_05: I'm sure Baross would be proud. How do you intend to spend these... ill-gotten goods?
texts.story_polonia_07_06: Like any good pirate. Buried it here and there with me crew.
texts.story_polonia_07_08: Aye, that's how pirates be. Keep some for ye cold winter months, like them squirrel landlubbers.
texts.story_polonia_07_10: Gave it to the pretty temple lady.
texts.story_polonia_07_11: An orphanage donation? I did not take you for the charitable type.
texts.story_polonia_07_13: Ah, never mind. So what can I get you, Captain?
texts.story_polonia_07_14: Me favorite; Old Salt's Brew! And to any landlubber who think they can hold it down...
texts.story_polonia_07_15: Next round's on me! The Baross family is back at sea! Yo ho ho!
texts.story_polonia_a_01: Ahoy, pretty lady. Yer a healer, aren't ye?
texts.story_polonia_a_02: Ah, yes! I am Freyja, priestess of this tem-
texts.story_polonia_a_05: I asked ye to chop me leg off!
texts.story_polonia_a_06: Goodness gracious, no! Why would anyone ever want this?
texts.story_polonia_a_07: I be a pirate! What kind of pirate cap'n doesn't have a blasted peg leg!?
texts.story_polonia_a_08: Just chop me leg off and stitch it up with yer fancy magic!
texts.story_polonia_a_09: Absolutely not. I've sworn an oath to the Goddess never to harm a human being.
texts.story_polonia_a_10: Argh, useless landlubbers! Fine! But ye won't be gettin' any of me dubloons!
texts.story_polonia_b_05: I said- wait, yer ok with this?
texts.story_polonia_b_06: Yeah, sure. Just hold your leg out like this. This old axe should do the trick.
texts.story_polonia_b_08: It won't be pretty, but you're a tough girl, aren't you?
texts.story_polonia_b_09: Just make sure to apply a good tourniquet. Wouldn't want you bleeding out, now.
texts.story_polonia_b_11: I- me ship's sailing soon! I-I gotta go catch it! See ya, matey!
texts.story_donovan_00_02: You're quite the economic force around these parts. I've heard a great deal about you.
texts.story_donovan_00_03: Ah, but how rude of me! I am Donovan, Imperial Alchemist of Kern.
texts.story_donovan_00_04: I believe this is the beginning of a great partnership, wouldn't you agree?
texts.story_donovan_00_hire_01: Ah, excellent timing! My vacation was growing dull.
texts.story_donovan_00_hire_02: Your Heroes will be glad to have me at their side, I'm sure of it.
texts.story_donovan_00_hire_03: I have a knack for bringing out the best in everything, be they ingredients or warriors.
texts.story_donovan_00_hire_04: My skills and knowledge are at your service, esteemed shopkeeper.
texts.story_donovan_01_01: Welcome to the Maribel Medicine Emporium! How can I help you?
texts.story_donovan_01_02: Lady Maribel, was it? I would like to personally commend your latest creation.
texts.story_donovan_01_03: As the inventor of the Potion of Renewal, your modified blueprint is nothing short of genius!
texts.story_donovan_01_04: The simple addition of a dash of Mistpeak Bloom is a terrific improvement!
texts.story_donovan_01_05: Wait a minute... you mean you're THE Donovan? No way!
texts.story_donovan_01_06: The Potion of Renewal blueprint was invented roughly 700 years ago...
texts.story_donovan_01_07: Even as an elf, you don't look a day over 150!
texts.story_donovan_01_08: You are too kind, Lady Maribel.
texts.story_donovan_01_09: Let's just say that not all of my blueprints are commercially available...
texts.story_donovan_01_10: But I'm certain a master alchemist such as yourself would have no trouble learning them.
texts.story_donovan_01_11: Now then, shall I take a look at some of that Mistpeak Bloom?
texts.story_donovan_02_01: Fascinating... Even the common apples around these parts are of excellent quality.
texts.story_donovan_02_02: How could this be, I wonder...?
texts.story_donovan_02_03: If someone could explain it, it would be Juniper!
texts.story_donovan_02_04: Oh, sorry! I didn't mean to intrude in your conversation with that... tree.
texts.story_donovan_02_05: Ah, a young lady in a broad brimmed hat and her loyal owl...
texts.story_donovan_02_06: You must be Miss Lilu, no doubt.
texts.story_donovan_02_07: That's right! And you, Sir Donovan, obviously need no introduction!
texts.story_donovan_02_08: I've heard much about the prized young pupil of this city. The pleasure is all mine.
texts.story_donovan_02_09: Now then, Miss Lilu. You were saying...?
texts.story_donovan_02_10: Oh yes! Juniper is always talking about how much the land around the city is teeming with life...
texts.story_donovan_02_11: It's part of the reason she enjoys gardening here so much, she says.
texts.story_donovan_02_12: In any case, I was on my way to the Aurora Caves. Nice meeting you, Sir Donovan!
texts.story_donovan_02_14: Hmm... Perhaps this young lady is onto something...
texts.story_donovan_02_15: Kern... depleted? Everything seems much more vibrant in this kingdom.
texts.story_donovan_02_16: I should pay a visit to this gardener. If ingredients are more potent here...
texts.story_donovan_02_17: ...Then it is something I must exploit.
texts.story_donovan_03_01: You called for me, Miss Sia?
texts.story_donovan_03_02: Ah, Lilu. Thank you for coming on such short notice.
texts.story_donovan_03_03: ...I believe you've already acquainted yourself with Donovan?
texts.story_donovan_03_04: Oh, yes! He's a legend among alchemists! I'm so glad I got to meet him!
texts.story_donovan_03_05: Approach that man with extreme caution.
texts.story_donovan_03_06: H-huh!? But he's such a gentleman! Very knowledgeable, too...
texts.story_donovan_03_07: Appearances can be deceiving. Behind his youthful facade lies a cunning, millennia old mastermind.
texts.story_donovan_03_08: Millennia!? That's unheard of, even for elves! Do you think...
texts.story_donovan_03_09: Yes. Some believe he may have discovered a sort of elixir of immortality.
texts.story_donovan_03_10: Wow! I wouldn't mind adding that recipe to my grimoire!
texts.story_donovan_03_11: As would many rulers. I suspect he may have the Kern emperor dancing to his tune.
texts.story_donovan_03_13: But thanks! I'll be careful around him!
texts.story_donovan_03_15: As for me, I'll make sure to keep him away from our... impressionable king.
texts.story_donovan_03_16: Yeah... that's probably for the best.
texts.story_donovan_a_01: Hey, potion dude. You got a sec'?
texts.story_donovan_a_03: To whom do I owe this... pleasure?
texts.story_donovan_a_05: Heard you could fix up a cool elixir of immortality, dude. Can I get a bottle?
texts.story_donovan_a_06: ...I have no idea where you've caught wind of this rumor.
texts.story_donovan_a_07: Even if it were true, you can be certain I would not be giving away something so valuable.
texts.story_donovan_a_08: I'll give you ten gold for it.
texts.story_donovan_a_09: Absolutely NOT. Wars have been fought over this recipe! Emperors all over the world beg for a mere taste!
texts.story_donovan_a_10: You drive a hard bargain, dude. Fifteen gold, final offer.
texts.story_donovan_a_11: Has the smell of leather addled your brain, vagrant? I would not part with this recipe for all the gold in the world!
texts.story_donovan_a_12: I must be off. Please never speak to me again.
texts.story_donovan_a_14: ...Guess I'll have to find another treat for those sheep.
texts.story_hemma_00_02: From what we gathered, you are the one to talk to when we need something done around these parts...
texts.story_hemma_00_03: Do not ask too many questions, and we can make it worth your while.
texts.story_hemma_00_hire_02: You will not be disappointed with us.
texts.story_hemma_00_hire_03: Our powers, combined with sturdy companions, are formidable.
texts.story_hemma_00_hire_04: The results will speak for themselves, we are sure of it.
texts.story_hemma_01_01: ...And so the Troublin fell, but not before landing some blows on my companions.
texts.story_hemma_01_02: Please see to it that they are healed.
texts.story_hemma_01_03: But of course. I will tend to their wounds posthaste.
texts.story_hemma_01_04: Hi! I heard there was a new spellcaster in town.
texts.story_hemma_01_05: I'm Lilu! Pleased to make your acquaintance!
texts.story_hemma_01_06: You are correct, young Lilu. Our name is Hemma.
texts.story_hemma_01_08: ...Yes. Necromancy takes a toll on its practitioners...
texts.story_hemma_01_09: A part of you stays across the Veil, while other things cross the threshold...
texts.story_hemma_01_10: These powers... changed us. For the best, of course.
texts.story_hemma_01_11: Necromancy, you say!? Isn't that... dangerous?
texts.story_hemma_01_12: Incredibly so. But we are not satisfied with simple tricks anymore.
texts.story_hemma_01_13: Now, if you'll excuse us, we need to be elsewhere. Farewell.
texts.story_hemma_01_14: A necromancer... That is some pretty dark magic, Pollux! But it's the first time I can see a practitioner for real!
texts.story_hemma_01_15: She didn't seem so bad... Did she?
texts.story_hemma_02_02: I'm not sure what to make of all this...
texts.story_hemma_02_03: You are right to worry. Necromancy is a dangerous art that would consume lesser beings...
texts.story_hemma_02_04: But we are not lesser in any way.
texts.story_hemma_02_05: What about the adventurers that go with you? Do you not drain them to empower your spells?
texts.story_hemma_02_06: Only with their consent. The effects are not permanent.
texts.story_hemma_02_07: And we do pay them handsomely for their services.
texts.story_hemma_02_08: I suppose you are doing some good after all...
texts.story_hemma_02_09: Very well. I suppose you can be a sanctioned Champion of our city.
texts.story_hemma_02_10: We did not need your approval... but we thank you.
texts.story_hemma_02_11: So what brought you here to our city?
texts.story_hemma_02_13: We simply seek knowledge and power.
texts.story_hemma_02_14: There is... a task we must do.
texts.story_hemma_02_16: And it will stay this way. Farewell.
texts.story_hemma_02_18: There is much sadness in those eyes...
texts.story_hemma_03_01: ...Unripe Living Roots, and an extra chunky Spooky Ectoplasm. Anything else?
texts.story_hemma_03_02: That will be all. We shall visit the shopkeeper for the rest.
texts.story_hemma_03_05: Ah, yes. A pair of Grim Talons, please.
texts.story_hemma_03_07: Pay it no mind. A mere passenger, if you will.
texts.story_hemma_03_10: You may keep the change. Farewell.
texts.story_hemma_03_11: ...Thanks for the tip... and the nightmares.
texts.story_hemma_04_01: Don't worry, Hemma. I'm here! I brought Freyja!
texts.story_hemma_04_02: Hemma, was it? Please relax. Let the exorcism flow through you...
texts.story_hemma_04_03: We don't recall asking for your assistance.
texts.story_hemma_04_04: <c4>Beat it, kids. I ain't going anywhere.</c4>
texts.story_hemma_04_05: Aaaah! It's taking over! Quick, Freyja!
texts.story_hemma_04_06: I... can't! Something's blocking my prayers...
texts.story_hemma_04_08: Are you... willingly hosting this malevolent spirit!?
texts.story_hemma_04_09: He has gone a bit mad over time, I admit.
texts.story_hemma_04_10: <c4>I'm the victim here! Let me out!</c4>
texts.story_hemma_04_11: Ugh. More rude than malevolent, I can assure you.
texts.story_hemma_04_12: This matter does not concern you. Please do not get involved, Freyja.
texts.story_hemma_04_13: Those necromancers... always toying with powers they don't understand!
texts.story_hemma_04_14: It's OK Freyja! I'm sure she knows what she's doing!
texts.story_hemma_05_01: <c4>Looks like the cat's out of the bag again. Ready to leave town?</c4>
texts.story_hemma_05_02: YOU did this. If you could keep quiet, things would be a lot easier.
texts.story_hemma_05_03: Regardless, we're not leaving yet. This town shows promise.
texts.story_hemma_05_04: <c4>Fine. How about letting me out for once?</c4>
texts.story_hemma_05_05: A-absolutely not. You're hard enough to keep under control as it is.
texts.story_hemma_05_07: I'm doing this for your sake, Claud.
texts.story_hemma_06_03: I knew it! Hemma's just a fake name! You're the monster, Fairlyn!
texts.story_hemma_06_04: Oh my. What a devious little trickster we have here.
texts.story_hemma_06_05: It's true. It seems you've done your homework.
texts.story_hemma_06_06: Perhaps you've also heard of Ariel the Mad? Or Astrid the Fallen?
texts.story_hemma_06_07: ...I read about them... but they vanished decades ago! They can't be...
texts.story_hemma_06_08: All us, of course. Unfortunately we face much persecution, and names must be discarded...
texts.story_hemma_06_09: You're a monster! You must be stopped!
texts.story_hemma_06_10: And how do you intend to do that? "Hemma" is innocent. Who would believe this wild tale of yours?
texts.story_hemma_06_11: Unless, of course, you intend to stop me by yourself...
texts.story_hemma_07_02: I'm keeping an eye on you. You and your suspicious monologues...
texts.story_hemma_07_03: Ah, yes. Meet Claud, our husband. He's seen better days.
texts.story_hemma_07_06: A terrible necromantic accident. A foolish mistake left him on the brink of death.
texts.story_hemma_07_07: Given our sins on this earth, the afterlife is a terrifying prospect for us necromancers...
texts.story_hemma_07_08: Unable to save his body, we did the best we could... and saved his soul.
texts.story_hemma_07_09: A Soul Splice? This spell requires years of research to prepare an appropriate vessel...
texts.story_hemma_07_10: Indeed. Given the circumstances, we improvised.
texts.story_hemma_07_11: Improvised? You don't mean... you bound Claud's soul to yourself!?
texts.story_hemma_07_12: A body can't support two souls! It would cause-
texts.story_hemma_07_13: Mind-shattering pain. Insanity. Worse than you can possibly imagine.
texts.story_hemma_07_15: It is simple, little Lilu. Failure... is not an option.
texts.story_hemma_08_01: Too powerful to exorcise... maybe the soul could be bound to something else...?
texts.story_hemma_08_02: You're awfully cooperative. Have you developed an interest in necromancy?
texts.story_hemma_08_03: No! I hate you and everything you've done!
texts.story_hemma_08_04: ...The way I see it, if that Claud guy breaks free, it'll be big trouble for everyone here.
texts.story_hemma_08_05: I'm helping you fix this mess, and nothing more!
texts.story_hemma_08_06: A noble sentiment. But how could a mere child be of any help?
texts.story_hemma_08_07: Preparing a proper vessel would require decades of research and materials...
texts.story_hemma_08_08: That will not be an issue. Behold.
texts.story_hemma_08_09: ...! How did you get all this...? Even Black Diamonds!
texts.story_hemma_08_10: These past decades were not wasted. Our time runs short.
