texts.story_hemma_08_11: What is left is a proper location to conduct the ritual. We fear such a place may not exist.
texts.story_hemma_08_12: Right. The soul needs a spiritual attachment to the area, or the binding will fail.
texts.story_hemma_08_13: <c4>Or you could just let good ol' Claud Favius run free! He'll make lots of friends!</c4>
texts.story_hemma_09_02: It's an awful place. No sane person should ever come here.
texts.story_hemma_09_03: But most importantly, according to my research...
texts.story_hemma_09_04: ...A mad king from the Favius family used to rule here, centuries ago.
texts.story_hemma_09_05: Maybe Claud is a distant relative? Hopefully he didn't have anything to do with that kingdom's ruin...
texts.story_hemma_09_06: ...We can feel it. We are connected to this place. This is it.
texts.story_hemma_09_07: We owe you a great debt, Lilu. But now you must leave us be.
texts.story_hemma_10_01: A dark, haunted and secluded place, brimming with necromantic energy...
texts.story_hemma_10_02: How long have we searched for such a place?
texts.story_hemma_10_03: Now to find a suitable vessel...
texts.story_hemma_10_04: There is no need to speak. We know exactly what you wish.
texts.story_hemma_10_06: ...The armor of the mad king himself, forever bound to this place.
texts.story_hemma_10_10: I had forgotten this feeling of solitude...
texts.story_hemma_10_11: I've suffered an eternity to save you, dear. Because I know you would've done exactly the same.
texts.story_hemma_10_12: Brave adventurers will surely come. Fight them, and through carnage, heal your tortured existence.
texts.story_hemma_10_14: Farewell, beloved. But only in death shall we truly part.
texts.story_hemma_epilogue_01: <c4>FOOOLS!!! YOU DARE TREAD UPON MY LANDS?</c4>
texts.story_hemma_epilogue_04: Lady Sia! Rudo! We must retreat!
texts.story_hemma_epilogue_05: Never! I'm not giving him an inch!
texts.story_hemma_epilogue_07: Bah! I'll be back, you big tin can! You hear me?
texts.story_hemma_epilogue_08: <c4>COME BACK WHEN YOU CAN PUT UP A FIGHT!</c4>
texts.story_hemma_epilogue_09: <c4>TELL YOUR GREATEST HEROES THAT THE TYRANT KING AWAITS!</c4>
texts.story_hemma_a_03: Living Roots are potent reagants for many magics related to youth and lifespan.
texts.story_hemma_a_04: Might you be a fellow alchemist? A quest for longevity, perhaps?
texts.story_hemma_a_05: ...You would ask a lady her age? How... unbecoming.
texts.story_hemma_a_06: We are no alchemist. Blood sacrifices are much more efficient.
texts.story_hemma_a_07: Ah, necromancy! A respectable, but misunderstood field.
texts.story_hemma_a_08: As for our age... we stopped counting quite a while ago.
texts.story_hemma_a_09: I can definitely relate. Decades just seem to fly by after the first few centuries!
texts.story_hemma_a_10: It gets lonely among all these mayflies, doesn't it?
texts.story_hemma_a_11: Lonely, we are not. You would do well not to pry in a Necromancer's business.
texts.story_hemma_a_12: Of course. I would not wish to intrude. Farewell!
texts.story_hemma_a_13: Strange necromancer... Have we met before?
texts.story_ashley_00_01: Oi, I'm new in town. You know a good place for a Samurai to crash?
texts.story_ashley_00_03: Name's uh... Ashley. Yeah. That's my name.
texts.story_ashley_00_04: Since I'm here, I might as well grab something, yeah?
texts.story_ashley_00_hire_01: Think I'll be sticking around for a bit longer. It's getting a bit boring, though.
texts.story_ashley_00_hire_02: How about sending me on a quest, boss? The toughest one you got.
texts.story_ashley_00_hire_03: Send me out to die, and I'll come back stronger.
texts.story_ashley_00_hire_04: Heh. That sounded pretty cool, yeah?
texts.story_ashley_01_01: A real Samurai...! I can't wait!
texts.story_ashley_01_08: Uh... aren't Samurai usually more like, orderly and stuff?
texts.story_ashley_01_09: Huh? Yeah, the guys back home were pretty stuffy about it.
texts.story_ashley_01_10: I'm free now. Just a Ronin. A Samurai without a lord.
texts.story_ashley_01_12: I had a quest planned with Lilu at the Haunted Castle but...
texts.story_ashley_01_13: Something came up at the Training Hall! Can you fill in for me?
texts.story_ashley_01_14: Sure. But you owe me, knight boy.
texts.story_ashley_02_02: Yes, that's right! Pleased to meet you!
texts.story_ashley_02_05: We still haven't made preparations! Potions, rations, and-
texts.story_ashley_02_06: Whatever, we don't need any of that.
texts.story_ashley_02_07: We live or we die. No in-between.
texts.story_ashley_03_01: Is that all you monsters got? BRING IT!
texts.story_ashley_03_02: Ashley! Please slow down! My healing can't keep up!
texts.story_ashley_03_05: Are you kidding!? You almost died!
texts.story_ashley_03_06: It's no wonder you lost your arm if you keep acting like this!
texts.story_ashley_03_09: Hmph. I'm not using anesthetics for this healing.
texts.story_ashley_03_10: This is your own fault. Brace up.
texts.story_ashley_03_11: Haha... hah... I can take it...
texts.story_ashley_a_01: Oi. What's with all these tiny monsters around here?
texts.story_ashley_a_02: These would be my dear familiars. Welcome.
texts.story_ashley_a_03: Worthy Champions can come and adopt one as a faithful companion.
texts.story_ashley_a_04: Oh. Pets, yeah? I get it.
texts.story_ashley_a_05: Alright. You, green guy. I'll call you <c1>Tricky</c1>. Come with me.
texts.story_ashley_a_09: I'll call you <c1>Sparrow</c1>. You can come too.
texts.story_bjorn_00_01: Would you look at that! An entire shop sprouted while I was gone!
texts.story_bjorn_00_02: It looks like you've made good friends with Brom and Gorza, too! That makes me glad!
texts.story_bjorn_00_03: What d'you think, Bamham? Tusky, right?
texts.story_bjorn_00_04: I think Bamham likes you, city dweller. Guess we'll stay for some shopping!
texts.story_bjorn_00_hire_01: Har har! Consider us hired, then!
texts.story_bjorn_00_hire_02: If you need help going through the wilds or charting an unknown place...
texts.story_bjorn_00_hire_03: You can count on the Tusked Two! Flash Quests will be done in a Flash! Har har!
texts.story_bjorn_01_04: What's with the long face, Gorza?
texts.story_bjorn_01_06: That's the Ranger's life! The great outdoors, far away from home.
texts.story_bjorn_01_07: Pfft. It wouldn't hurt to stop by more often.
texts.story_bjorn_01_08: I wish I could, but the Cinderlake Volcano tends to keep a man busy!
texts.story_bjorn_01_09: The Volcano? I thought you said you were investigating Bleakspire Peaks...
texts.story_bjorn_01_11: I guess I got it mixed up! Har har!
texts.story_bjorn_01_12: Anyway, I brought souvenirs for you two! Come take a look!
texts.story_bjorn_01_13: Oh! I hope there's a Crushy Plushie!
texts.story_bjorn_02_01: Thanks for the warm welcome, everyone! It's good to be back!
texts.story_bjorn_02_02: We are relieved to see you return safely. After you'd been gone for months, we feared the worst...
texts.story_bjorn_02_03: Sorry, sorry! That's just how the Ranger's life tends to be! Har har!
texts.story_bjorn_02_04: Knowing you, you must already be thinking about your next expedition!
texts.story_bjorn_02_05: Har har! You got me! We've leaving tomorrow at dawn, even!
texts.story_bjorn_02_06: Never change, Bjorn. I'll be sure to watch over Brohm and Gorza while you're gone.
texts.story_bjorn_02_07: ...If it's on the way, would you mind gathering a few Glow Shrooms for me?
texts.story_bjorn_02_08: Of course not! It's no trouble at all!
texts.story_bjorn_02_09: Oh... my back's been acting up lately. If you could find some Icy Pearls...?
texts.story_bjorn_02_10: It's barely a detour. I'll be on the lookout , Elder.
texts.story_bjorn_02_11: Oh! Bjorn! I'd like some Rustwyrm Scales for my next experiment, if you're able!
texts.story_bjorn_02_13: Whew...! Guess we'd better pack extra bags, Bamham!
texts.story_bjorn_03_01: Hmm... You smell what I'm smelling, Bamham?
texts.story_bjorn_03_02: That's right, metal. Littering, most likely. C'mon Bam, find and fetch it!
texts.story_bjorn_03_03: Good boy, let me see here...
texts.story_bjorn_03_04: Huh. That's a strange device. I don't think it was left behind by accident...
texts.story_bjorn_03_05: Bet you that if I pull that crank here a bit...
texts.story_bjorn_03_06: Hmm... yes, exactly as I suspected.
texts.story_bjorn_03_07: ...It breaks. I guess we didn't learn that much, did we? Har har!
texts.story_bjorn_03_08: But I think we've got our lead. We've been looking around for months, and this thing wasn't there last time.
texts.story_bjorn_03_09: Better head back and ask a pro. You know I'm no good with technology!
texts.story_bjorn_04_01: What a strange piece! I've never seen anything like it.
texts.story_bjorn_04_02: It seems to combine both magic and science to act as some sort of... beacon? Radar?
texts.story_bjorn_04_03: You said it was broken when you found it?
texts.story_bjorn_04_04: Yeah. What a stroke of bad luck, right? Har har!
texts.story_bjorn_04_05: That's a shame. I can't really say more other than this: it definitely sends out some kind of information.
texts.story_bjorn_04_06: Tell you what, if you give me a minute, I can make you a device to help you find more of these... "Magic Beacons".
texts.story_bjorn_04_07: Great! You ready to head back out there, Bamham?
texts.story_bjorn_04_08: We don't know what these things are... but it can't be good.
texts.story_bjorn_04_09: It's our job to find out who's behind this!
texts.story_bjorn_04_10: Good luck! And... be careful when handling mysterious technology!
texts.story_bjorn_a_01: Hey kids, you mind watching over Bamham for a bit?
texts.story_bjorn_a_02: That nasty boar? Not a chance. Keep him with you.
texts.story_bjorn_a_03: No offense dad, but he's kind of... crazy?
texts.story_bjorn_a_04: Aw, don't say that! He's cute as a button!
texts.story_bjorn_a_05: Dad, he goes on a murderous rampage whenever you set him down.
texts.story_bjorn_a_06: That time was an accident. He just got a lil' bit too excited.
texts.story_bjorn_a_07: What about all the other times?
texts.story_bjorn_a_08: Those were... also accidents. Baby Bamham wouldn't hurt a fly!
texts.story_bjorn_a_09: He would, and he'd definitely enjoy it too.
texts.story_bjorn_a_10: Look, dad, you're better off carrying that thing with you when you're in town.
texts.story_bjorn_a_12: Alright, alright. I get it. It's ok Bamham, I love you.
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_01: Hi! Are you the shopkeeper here?
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_02: This entire shop is yours? Wow!
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_03: Oh, sorry! I'm Aang, the Avatar!
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_04: Me and my friends were riding on my sky bison, but I think we took a wrong turn somewhere...
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_05: ...Hey, those things look interesting! How much for them?
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_hire_01: We'll be staying here for some time. My bison Appa needs to rest...
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_hire_02: But the nice man over at the Emerald Inn told me we could stay for free if we helped you out!
texts.story_atlab_aang_00_hire_03: I'm looking forward to it! I'm sure Sokka will help too, if you can find him!
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_02: So... I guess it's time for farewells...
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_03: Hey, cheer up! We can come back anytime!
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_04: You're right! Do you remember the way, Sokka?
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_06: A-anyway! We've got super important Avatar business to get back to!
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_09: You like it here, don't you? All right, fine.
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_10: Shopkeeper, would you mind keeping an eye on Momo for a while?
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_11: I'll come back for you later, Momo. Promise!
texts.story_atlab_aang_farewell_12: Let's go, Sokka. Thanks for everything, Shopkeeper!
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_01: Sorry kid, I didn't get all that. Mind repeating your story from the start?
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_04: Me and my friends were traveling on my sky bison...
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_05: While flying, we must've taken a wrong turn, because we ended up here!
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_06: That huge ox outside? That thing flies?
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_07: Yes! His name is Appa. He's very friendly!
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_08: Looks pretty exhausted, too. You guys are being chased by someone, right?
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_10: Hey, don't worry about it. I won't let anyone under my roof come to harm. Oscar's promise.
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_11: Tell you what, how would you guys like to stay here for free?
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_13: Well for starters, it doesn't look like that weird money of yours will be worth anything here.
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_14: I can't just let a bunch of kids sleep out in the streets now, can I?
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_16: You look pretty capable, how about you go help my shopkeeper buddy in exchange?
texts.story_atlab_aang_01_17: Sure thing! Thank you so much!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_01: Hey, Lilu! Come meet my new buddy here!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_02: Hi! I've never seen tattoos like yours before...
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_03: I'm Aang! I've never seen a hat like yours, either!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_04: C'mon Aang, show her your trick!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_06: H-how did you do that? I didn't sense any magic!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_07: Airbending! I can also bend earth and water!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_08: Incredible! Hang on, let me take notes...
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_09: Could it be Chi? I've never seen anyone do this before...
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_10: That's right! But not anyone can do it, you need to be born with the ability and learn to master it!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_11: You said you could bend air, earth and water... what about fire?
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_12: Ah... I... I haven't mastered firebending yet...
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_13: ...I've had problems finding a firebending master to teach me.
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_14: Is that so? I know some fire magic!
texts.story_atlab_aang_02_15: It's not quite the same, but you might like to see how it works!
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_01: Aang, my boy. How are you liking the city life?
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_02: Elder Owen! It's great! Thank you for your hospitality.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_03: It is nothing. But tell me, my boy, where are your parents?
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_04: Ah... I don't... have parents anymore.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_05: My family... all of the Air Nomads were killed by the Fire Nation.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_07: Dear me! My condolences, poor child....
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_08: ...If you have nowhere to return to, how about settling here with your friends?
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_09: I'm certain the city would be overjoyed to have you stay. You're quite popular already!
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_10: Thank you for the generous offer, Elder... but I can't accept.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_11: As we speak, Fire Lord Ozai is already planning his next move.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_12: When Sozin's Comet lights the sky again, the Fire Nation will conquer my world...
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_13: ...The Earth Kingdom... the Water Tribes... They will suffer the same fate as the Air Nomads.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_14: As the Avatar, I'm the only one who can stop him! ...but I'm not ready.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_15: What a terrible burden for a child to bear...
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_16: No matter what, know that you have our city's full support.
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_17: Thank you, Elder. You have all done so much for us already!
texts.story_atlab_aang_03_18: We'll be sure to pay you all a visit when this is all over!
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_02: Who are you? How do you know me?
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_03: The Avatar's presence shines like a beacon to the Third Eye.
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_05: You, who is many, yet not quite whole...
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_06: A fierce battle with the Lord of Fire awaits.
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_07: Fire Lord Ozai... You know about him?
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_08: Under the Comet's gaze, land will be torn asunder, and the fields will be burned to ashes!
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_09: I know that! But what should I do?
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_10: The flow of fate cannot be broken.
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_12: ...But the brave can pull at the strings, and lead it astray.
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_13: An unlikely ally and a fragile alliance may be the key.
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_14: Thanks, fortune teller... I'll think about it.
texts.story_atlab_aang_04_16: Be brave, Avatar. Stay true to yourself, and you shall overcome.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_00_01: Wow, Aang wasn't kidding! This shop is loaded!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_00_03: Shopkeeper, I can tell you and I are going to be great friends.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_00_04: If you give me a good price for these, of course.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_00_hire_02: As the new member of the team, you'll need to cut us some great deals!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_00_hire_03: Ah, I guess I can go gather materials for you every now and then.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_00_hire_04: But I need to keep an eye on Aang, alright?
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_03: Ugh. He does that all the time!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_05: Oh, hey. If you want bending tricks, you're looking for Aang.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_06: Oh, no. I don't know much about magic. Or bending.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_07: Judging from your gear, you looked to be a fearsome warrior.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_09: W-well you'd be right! I'm Sokka, the Great Warrior of Team Avatar!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_10: I knew it! You must have some incredible tales to tell!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_11: You bet! For example, during the siege of Agna Qel'a...
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_12: And that's how my girlfriend, at the time, became the moon.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_14: Yeah. But then, the Fire Nation fleet...
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_15: ...and bang! I knocked out that giant owl guy in the library.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_16: Wow! Wasn't that owl a powerful spirit?
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_17: That's right! But Team Avatar is always victorious with Sokka around!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_19: Oh, he left about an hour ago.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_01_20: Dang! I completely lost track of time. Sorry Argon, gotta run!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_02: Hey, Wallace. Thanks for letting me use your tools!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_03: No problem! I didn't expect you to be such a craftsman at your age!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_04: When you're the only non-bender in the group, you gotta pick up all sorts of skills.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_05: It's not every day I get to use great tools like these...
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_06: Maintenance will be done in a flash!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_07: That sword you're sharpening... where did you get that?
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_08: That's my Space Sword! Forged it myself!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_10: It must be... out of this world!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_11: You bet! There's no other sword like it!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_12: Ahoy! Sorry to interrupt, but any of ye fine lads care to help fix me ship?
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_13: She be right moody today. Hit some weird iron balls and got herself beached...
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_14: Sounds like a boatload of trouble!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_15: Hey, no problem, I'm Water Tribe! I’ll see what I can do. Sorry Wallace, I gotta go!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_02_16: I'll repair the rest of your gear in the meantime. Good luck!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_01: There, that should get you to port safely, at least.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_02: That's a proper fix. All solid-like!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_03: ....Your rudder's held together with driftwood and pieces of my shirt.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_04: I wouldn't say "solid-like". More like, Sokka fix.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_05: Yo ho ho! How come a landlubber like ye be fixin' ships, then?
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_06: Water Tribe life is all about boats and fishing. I was sailing before I could walk.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_07: Just recently, I even came up with plans for a waterbending-powered submarine!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_08: Yer speakin' all landlubby. What be that?
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_09: It's... uh, a metal ship that goes underwater.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_10: Sounds to me like yer sending sea dogs to Davy Jones' Locker in a fancy box.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_11: Did I just hear, "highly dangerous, untested prototype"?
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_13: I like your style. Come with me, new guy.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_14: Yo ho ho, back to sea! Anchors aweigh, before the bounty hunters get here!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_03_15: Arr, better dodge the floaty iron balls this time.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_01: Fascinating! Not gonna lie, your blueprint's a bit shoddy...
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_02: ...But with a bit of elbow grease, I think that submarine can work!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_04: Though keep in mind it's designed to be operated by Waterbenders.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_05: Details, details. We'll figure something out.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_06: Just think! With this, we could explore the Sunken Temple!
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_07: Oh, and it doesn't hold a lot of air, so keep the trips short.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_09: Don't lean on that large iron ball.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_11: My prototype sea bomb. Don't touch it. Very explody.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_13: Well anyway, let me know how the prototype goes.
texts.story_atlab_sokka_04_14: If it works... we have a use for them in the future.
texts.story_leather_00_01: Hey dude. I woke up with a weird idea this morning.
texts.story_leather_00_02: I think it's time for me to become a Champion, dude.
texts.story_leather_00_03: That's what the leather told me, dude.
texts.story_leather_alt_00_01: Hey dude, I'm back to the Champion business.
texts.story_leather_00_hire_02: ...so how does this quest thing work?
texts.story_leather_farewell_01: Hey dude. I think I'm done being a Champion.
texts.story_leather_farewell_02: It's a lot more responsibilities than I thought, dude. I barely have time for my leather!
texts.story_leather_farewell_03: Maybe I'll try again next year, dude. See you in town!
texts.story_leather_01_02: No problem, Tamas! That's a lot of leather!
texts.story_leather_01_03: Got a big haul today. Mind your step, though.
texts.story_leather_01_04: Yeah... it's bumpy around here... Woah!
texts.story_leather_01_07: Bumped my head a bit, dude. I think I'm fine.
texts.story_leather_01_08: ...I just got a flash of genius, dude.
texts.story_leather_01_09: Gotta go, dude. This is big.
texts.story_leather_01_11: ...But what do I do with all this scattered leather...?
texts.story_leather_02_01: ...and that's how I hit my head, dude. Got a small bump here.
texts.story_leather_02_02: This one listens, but assist it can not.
texts.story_leather_02_03: The flows of ether divine and reveal, but they do not heal.
texts.story_leather_02_04: It's still magic, right? C'mon dude, just touch it with your magic hands.
texts.story_leather_02_08: You sure that worked, dude? I'm still feeling a bit dizzy.
texts.story_leather_02_09: ...Apologies. A new vision arose that requires meditation.
texts.story_leather_02_10: Seek the Goddess' Favored for your... wounds. This one must depart at once.
texts.story_leather_02_11: Aight dude. Guess I'll just walk it off, feeling pretty strong lately.
texts.story_leather_03_01: So there's a new, uh, Champion in town.
texts.story_leather_03_02: Yo ho ho! Me hopes he's a stud!
texts.story_leather_03_04: Blasted barnacles! Are ye kiddin' me?
texts.story_leather_03_06: Decided to give this Champion business a shot, dude. Doesn't look too hard.
texts.story_leather_03_07: Um... Tamas, why don't you tell us what you do?
texts.story_leather_03_08: I give monsters a whack, dude. I can also sniff out leather items for miles.
texts.story_leather_03_09: Hoy! Stealin' stuff is ME shtick! Find yer own!
texts.story_leather_03_10: It's not stealing, dude. People just leave them all over the place.
texts.story_leather_03_11: Things are about to get pretty interesting around here!
texts.story_leather_04_01: My King, I have a most unusual report.
texts.story_leather_04_02: I am all ears, as always! Go right on!
texts.story_leather_04_03: Heroes and caravans report that roads are safer than ever.
texts.story_leather_04_04: Monsters make themselves scarce, and even appear too afraid to attack anyone.
texts.story_leather_04_06: However, we cannot think of any reason behind this strange behavior.
texts.story_leather_04_07: Equally strange is a sudden crash in the market for Leather goods...
texts.story_leather_04_08: A coincidence, I am sure! Let us feast and celebrate these good news!
texts.story_king_00_01: Exalted shopkeeper, I have a most humble request to make.
texts.story_king_00_02: Take me to the dungeons, so that I may witness their majesty with my own eyes!
texts.story_king_00_03: My lands have gone unsurveyed for too long. I shall handle this matter personally!
texts.story_king_00_04: ...But before we go, these splendid items happen to have caught my attention!
texts.story_king_alt_00_01: Shopkeeper! Your favorite Champion has returned!
texts.story_king_alt_00_02: Mere castle walls cannot hold a king whose heart yearns for adventure!
texts.story_king_alt_00_03: Let us be off! To the dungeons!
texts.story_king_00_hire_01: That takes care of the paperwork!
texts.story_king_00_hire_02: Let us be off! To the dungeons!
texts.story_king_farewell_02: Ah... It would seem my duties have caught up to me!
texts.story_king_farewell_03: "Piled up", I would rather say. Dignitaries are waiting.
texts.story_king_01_01: The king's court is now open! Petitioners, step forth!
texts.story_king_01_03: What can Reinhold's kingdom do for its subjects, large... bear-man?
texts.story_king_01_04: I think you should ban all magic and kick out the spellcasters.
texts.story_king_01_06: We shall... take your proposition into consideration! Next!
texts.story_king_01_07: Hiii! I think we should make every day into PIÑATA DAY!
texts.story_king_01_08: What a splendid idea! In fact, we could-
texts.story_king_01_10: ...spend much time debating the matter! Thank you for coming!
texts.story_king_02_01: Pardon me, is this seat taken?
texts.story_king_02_02: Come to poison my day off, Donovan?
texts.story_king_02_03: You wound me, Sia. I am merely getting in touch with a fellow Imperial citizen.
texts.story_king_02_04: How is our foolish King doing these days?
texts.story_king_02_05: Your spying must be getting rusty, Dononvan. Reinhold is far from the fool you believe him to be.
texts.story_king_02_06: Though he smiles, he sacrifices much for his people.
texts.story_king_02_07: Something the Emperor... OUR Emperor, could learn from.
texts.story_king_02_08: My role so far has been to keep him from ruining himself in the name of his people.
texts.story_king_02_10: He is a fool with a heart of gold, yes. But underestimate him at your own peril.
texts.story_king_03_01: Whew! This pile of reports isn't getting any smaller, is it?
texts.story_king_03_02: It appears we should brace for another all-nighter.
texts.story_king_03_03: Thank you for assisting me through this, dear Sia!
texts.story_king_03_04: It is nothing, my King. Now then, onto the next report...
texts.story_king_03_05: The farmers from Southburg have come short on their taxes, citing a poor harvest.
texts.story_king_03_06: I believe this is the second time, now...
texts.story_king_03_07: Send some of my court wizards to investigate. Perhaps some blight curses their lands.
texts.story_king_03_09: And forgive their taxes again. It's what my father would've wanted!
texts.story_king_03_10: Very well. I do believe King Keinan would've done the same.
texts.story_king_03_11: The crown he's left behind is heavy indeed...
texts.story_king_03_12: What does the next report say?
texts.story_king_03_13: This report speaks of border tensions with the neighboring Empire...
texts.story_king_04_04: P-please announce your presence if you are to sneak up behind me!
texts.story_king_04_05: Ah, that ninja's attack weighs heavily upon your mind, does it not?
texts.story_king_04_06: Of course! I lived but by a hair's breath!
texts.story_king_04_08: That... will not be necessary. But please do not step so lightly in the future!
texts.story_king_04_10: Ah, it is good to be home... Huh?
texts.story_king_04_12: Our apologies. It seems we were off the mark.
texts.story_king_04_13: Shadow Translocation can be somewhat inaccurate, at times.
texts.story_king_04_14: P-please refrain from performing SHADOW TELEPORTATION within my throne room!
texts.story_king_04_16: Yes! Please show this... ghastly visitor to the exit.
texts.story_king_04_17: Very well. I shall ensure the castle is properly warded against such intrusions in the future.
texts.story_king_04_18: This is quite the amusing Waypoint we've found. We shall return.
texts.bin_fabric_desc: A handy basket to keep your personal reserve of fabric.
texts.bin_gems_desc: A container to hold your personal reserve of jewels.
texts.bin_herbs_desc: A handy rack to keep your personal reserve of herbs.
texts.bin_iron_desc: A container to hold your personal reserve of iron.
texts.bin_iwood_desc: A rack to keep your personal reserve of ironwood.
texts.bin_leather_desc: A crate to contain your personal reserve of leather.
texts.bin_mana_desc: A portable well to contain your personal reserve of ether.
texts.bin_essence_desc: A strange device attuned to otherwordly spirits. Attracts and binds them in place for use in material goods.
texts.bin_oils_desc: A no-spill pot to contain your personal reserve of oils.
texts.bin_steel_desc: A convenient cart to hold your personal reserve of steel.
texts.bin_wood_desc: A container to hold your personal reserve of wood.
texts.bin_hoard_desc: An awe-inspiring bin imbued with draconic powers. Can hold all types of resources!
texts.chest_desc: Stores all the items in your shop. Upgrade it for even more space.
texts.counter_desc: A surface upon which deals are made and gold crosses palms.
texts.vertrack_desc: A display stand that shows off several large weapons.
texts.mannequin_desc: A simple wooden rack to display clothes or armor.
texts.shelves_desc: A sturdy shelf that comfortably fits many small items.
texts.table_desc: A flat surface that can accommodate many different item types.
texts.decoration_floor_desc: Flooring once found in a seasonal pack.
texts.decoration_wall_desc: Wallpaper once found in a seasonal pack.
texts.decoration_outdoor_desc: Outdoor decoration once found in a seasonal pack.
texts.decoration_indoor_desc: Shop decoration once found in a seasonal pack.
texts.decoration_floordeco_desc: Carpet once found in a seasonal pack.
texts.decoration_walldeco_desc: Wall decoration once found in a seasonal pack.
texts.decoration_beams_desc: Shop frame once found in a seasonal pack
texts.pet_family_desc: Pet once found in a previous pack!
texts.customization_itemhead_desc: Shopkeeper hat once found in a seasonal pack!
texts.customization_itembody_desc: Shopkeeper clothing accessory part of a seasonal pack!
texts.customization_itemfeet_desc: Shopkeeper footgear once found in a seasonal pack!
texts.customization_itempants_desc: Shopkeeper legwear once found in a seasonal pack!
texts.customization_itemweapon_desc: Shopkeeper accessory once found in a seasonal pack!
texts.customization_itemhands_desc: Shopkeeper glove accessory once found in a seasonal pack!
texts.customization_itemface_desc: Shopkeeper face accessory once found in a seasonal pack!
texts.pet_custom_desc: Pet accessory once found in a seasonal pack!
texts.cutscene4_01: Ah, our new merchant! I've been expecting you!
texts.cutscene4_02: I am <c1>Owen</c1>, the elder. Let me take you to your new shop.
texts.cutscene4_03: There's a lot to do to get it back in working order!
texts.tutorial_counter1_02: Hmm... no one has been here for a while...
texts.tutorial_counter2_01: Let's see what's under all this dust.
texts.tutorial_rack1_01: This rack could use a good dusting, too.
texts.tutorial_rack2_01: Splendid. Now we only need something to craft a weapon with...
texts.tutorial_rack2_02: Oh! It looks like your shop caught the eye of the city's blacksmith!
texts.tutorial_rack3_01: Good morning everyone! You're the new merchant aren't ya?
texts.tutorial_rack3_02: Here's a little welcome gift from me, hot off the forge!
texts.tutorial_rack4_01: Go on, give it a shot!
texts.tutorial_rack5_01: Splendid. I'll let you handle the rest, Wallace.
texts.tutorial_bin1_01: This here's the <c1>Iron Bin</c1>. Give it a good dusting!
texts.tutorial_slots1_01: I be tha miner 'round here. I'll be sending ye <c1>iron</c1> from time to time.
texts.tutorial_slots1_02: How about ye try craftin' somethin' else with that <c1>iron</c1>?
texts.tutorial_slots3_01: That piece of armor went straight to the <c1>storage</c1>!
texts.tutorial_slots3_02: Seems like it won't fit on the <c1>vertical rack</c1>...
texts.tutorial_slots3_03: A <c1>mannequin</c1> should do the trick. Try it out!
texts.tutorial_sell1_01: Look over there, your first customer!
texts.tutorial_sell1_02: I betcha they wanna buy the sword you just crafted!
texts.tutorial_levelup1_01: Good job! You're starting to look like a real Shop Titan!
texts.tutorial_levelup1_02: Try crafting and selling to <c1>reach level 2</c1>. I'll be watching from here!
texts.tutorial_levelup1_03: Here's a couple of items to get you started.
texts.tutorial_tailor1_01: Another satisfied customer! A high merchant level will unlock many things.
texts.tutorial_tailor1_02: That being said, we can only craft metal items...
texts.tutorial_tailor1_03: Say, is that Julia over there?
texts.tutorial_tailor2_01: Good choice, shopkeeper. You won't regret it.
texts.tutorial_tailor2_02: Julia! Great timing! Mind helping out our new shopkeeper for a bit?
texts.tutorial_tailor2_03: Of course, it would be my pleasure. Are you leaving us, Wallace?
texts.tutorial_tailor2_04: Sorry kids. I can't leave the forge unattended too long!
texts.tutorial_tailor2_05: It has a bit of a... temper! Hah hah!
texts.tutorial_leatherbin1_01: Now then, where were we? Oh! Where's your <c1>Leather Bin</c1>?
texts.tutorial_leatherbin1_02: Without any <c1>Leather</c1> resources, I won't be able to sew anything...
texts.tutorial_leatherbin1_03: I'm sure the <c1>Tanner</c1> won't mind if we borrow one of his.
texts.tutorial_leatherbin2_01: Lovely. Remember to thank him later!
texts.tutorial_craftslot1_01: Now then, let me show you what I can do!
texts.tutorial_craftslot2_01: What is this, shopkeeper, only one <c1>crafting slot</c1>? That simply won't do!
texts.tutorial_craftslot2_02: Allow me to assist you. <c1>Crafting slots</c1> are the lifeblood of any merchant!
texts.tutorial_craftslot3_01: Well then, make use of your newly acquired <c1>crafting slot</c1>!
texts.tutorial_leave1_01: Well then! It looks like everything is in order. I believe you'll be able to handle it from here.
texts.tutorial_leave1_02: Keep an eye out for <c1>special tasks</c1> to accomplish, they can be quite rewarding.
texts.tutorial_leave2_01: I'll be going back to my workshop now. Come over for a chat anytime!
texts.tutorial_adventurers1_01: Some powerful items will require <c1>special components</c1> found only during <c1>quests</c1>.
texts.tutorial_adventurers1_02: You would need an adventuring team of brave <c1>Heroes</c1> for this though...
texts.story_argon_00_01: Good day, shopkeeper! I'm Argon, Knight-in-training!
texts.story_argon_00_02: I'm patrolling the city to help people in need. Is there something I can assist with?
texts.story_argon_00_03: <c1>Dungeon components</c1>? Of course! You can count on me!
texts.story_argon_00_04: All I need is a teammate to get started. Let me show you to the <c1>Training Hall</c1>!
texts.tutorial_hire_adventurers1_01: Welcome to the <c1>Training Hall</c1>! There's all kinds of <c1>Heroes</c1> looking for work here!
texts.tutorial_hire_adventurers1_02: How about a <c1>Thief</c1>? They're free to hire!
texts.tutorial_open_chest1_01: Shopkeeper! We found a <c1>Chest</c1> during our quest!
texts.tutorial_open_chest1_02: I heard that they contain amazing treasure, but you need a <c1>magic key</c1> to open them...
texts.tutorial_open_chest1_03: Do you think some <c1>Gems</c1> would work? Let's try it!
texts.tutorial_open_chest2_01: Pretty heavy, huh? Here, use some of my <c1>Gems</c1>.
texts.tutorial_open_chest3_02: Those blueprints are <c1>super valuable</c1>, but you can only find them in chests.
texts.tutorial_open_chest3_03: If you don't have the Gems, <c1>dungeon bosses</c1> sometimes carry keys, too.
texts.tutorial_open_chest3_04: Well then, here's a few keys! Send me out on a <c1>quest</c1> to find more chests!
texts.tutorial_equip1_01: I saw Argon and you open that chest just now. Impressive haul!
texts.tutorial_equip1_02: Why don't you try to equip that <c1>legendary item</c1> you just found?
texts.tutorial_equip1_03: It is the duty of a Merchant to properly equip their <c1>Heroes</c1>!
texts.tutorial_equip2_01: Perfect fit! Good luck on your next quest!
texts.tutorial_equip3_01: Hold on a moment, that boy Argon looked pretty <c1>tired</c1> after that quest.
texts.tutorial_equip3_02: Can't blame him, questing is hard work! Why not help him out with the <c1>Stamina Drink</c1> you found?
texts.tutorial_craft_elvenwood1_01: Now that you have the required <c1>Elven Wood</c1>, we can craft that <c1>powerful robe</c1>!
texts.tutorial_upgradefurniture1_02: Now that you've built up some experience, it'd be a good idea to <c1>upgrade your furniture</c1>!
texts.tutorial_upgradefurniture2_01: You can also ask other fellow players for <c1>help</c1> to speed things up!
texts.tutorial_upgradefurniture3_01: Great! A high <c1>Max Energy</c1> is the key to making good deals!
texts.tutorial_upgradefurniture3_02: I took care of helping ya this time, but in the future you'll need buddies to do it.
texts.tutorial_upgradefurniture3_03: How about joining a <c1>Guild</c1>? Teaming up with <c1>other players</c1> is full of benefits!
texts.tutorial_join_city1_01: Investing together, helping each other or just being surrounded by friends... There's no reason not to join a guild!
texts.tutorial_join_city1_02: If you ever change your mind, you can always leave later. So don't worry too much about it!
texts.tutorial_join_city2_01: It looks like you already have a guild of friends waiting for you!
texts.tutorial_join_city3_02: But remember that you're joining up with <c1>real players</c1>, so be nice to them! Teamwork makes the dream work!
texts.tutorial_deco1_01: Oh my. Shopkeeper, your shop is looking a bit... basic, isn't it? Where are your <c1>decorations</c1>?
texts.tutorial_deco1_02: Some green would positively liven up the room. Please rectify this!
texts.tutorial_deco2_01: That's better. I'm sure your customers will appreciate it, too!
texts.tutorial_trade1_01: Ah, shopkeeper! Did you hear the news? The <c1>Market</c1> is finally open!
texts.tutorial_trade2_01: Welcome to the <c1>Market</c1>! Here, you can trade with merchants <c1>all over the world</c1>!
texts.tutorial_trade2_02: Who knows, you may find an incredible deal!
texts.tutorial_expand1_01: Shopkeeper! It's looking a bit cramped in here!
texts.tutorial_expand1_02: High time for a <c1>Shop Expansion</c1>! What do you think?
texts.tutorial_expand2_01: It's expensive, but hey! Think of all that space for racks and bins!
texts.tutorial_exceptional_craft1_01: Remarkable, isn't it? If you would allow me to work on it further, I could make it greater still.
texts.tutorial_exceptional_craft2_01: <c1>High quality items</c1> are much more powerful and valuable. Keep an eye out for them!
texts.tutorial_table1_01: That item won't fit the racks you have right now.
texts.tutorial_table1_02: Let's see if we can't fix that!
texts.tutorial_table2_01: There we go. A <c1>table</c1> can fit just about anything Vertical Racks and Mannequins can't.
texts.tutorial_shelf1_01: It looks like this item is <c1>too small</c1> for your current racks.
texts.tutorial_shelf1_02: No worries, I know exactly what you need!
texts.tutorial_shelf2_01: There. Small items like this look better on a <c1>shelf</c1>!
texts.tutorial_jackslot1_01: Ah, you've earned yourself a <c1>Fortune Ticket</c1>, did you not? Let me show you how to use it.
texts.tutorial_jackslot2_01: Here we are! Give it a spin!
texts.tutorial_jackslot3_01: How lucky! Make sure to visit the store for a prize to buy!
texts.tutorial_jackslot3_02: <c1>Daily tasks</c1> will reward you with more <c1>Fortune Tickets</c1>. Keep an eye out for them!
texts.tutorial_surcharge1_01: Hello again, shopkeeper. Have you ever tried <c1>Haggling</c1> with customers?
texts.tutorial_surcharge2_01: A savvy merchant can make a nice profit that way. Show me your skills!
texts.tutorial_discount1_01: Tiring, isn't it? You can also choose to <c1>discount</c1> an item to regain some <c1>Energy</c1>.
texts.tutorial_discount2_01: Try giving this lucky customer a <c1>discount</c1>.
texts.tutorial_bp_unlock1_01: Ah! Most advanced blueprints will require some research before they're useable.
texts.tutorial_bp_unlock1_02: This can be done with the help of <c1>Research Scrolls</c1>!
texts.tutorial_bp_unlock1_03: Here, I brought a few for you. Try <c1>researching</c1> it.
texts.tutorial_bp_unlock2_01: You should keep the other <c1>Research Scrolls</c1>, they will come in handy!
texts.tutorial_explain_counter_desc: The most important part of any shop!
texts.tutorial_explain_racks_desc: Display wares for customers to buy. Presentation is key!
texts.tutorial_explain_bin_desc: Store resources in your shop for later use. A vital component for all items!
texts.tutorial_link1_02: I see you've wasted no time expanding!
texts.tutorial_link1_03: If you want to safekeep all that progress, you should <c1>connect your account</c1>!
texts.tutorial_link2_01: By connecting to your platform, you'll never lose your account, no matter what!
texts.tutorial_link2_02: It's as simple as it gets, and it pays to have a backup plan!
texts.tutorial_press_platform: Tap the <c1>Connect</c1> button to connnect to your platform!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_goldcity1: Hard-working bourgeois! It is I, King Reinhold!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_goldcity2: A <c1>special offer</c1>? Not this time, I'm afraid. But I do bring exciting news!
The mythical <c1>Lost City of Gold</c1> has appeared once more!
This fabled dungeon overflows with wealth! A golden opportunity for savvy socialites such as I!
Thus, you and your guild simply MUST plunder its riches. Your King demands it!
Bring me the <c1>Pure Gold</c1> found within, and you will be duly rewarded! I am a generous monarch, after all.
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_titantowe: Have you heard? A huge tower appeared out of nowhere!
They call it the <c1>Tower of Titans</c1>... We gotta explore it!
Imagine what might await us at the top... Isn't it exciting?
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_dragon1_0: A-ahoy! Lootkeeper! It be terrible! Dragons be invading!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_dragon2_0: Scaly beasts probably be looking for the King's vaults...
I'd be joining them if the King didn't hire me to fight them, har har!
Roxanne jury-rigged me ship for sky sailin'. Yer in charge of gearing up me crew!
We be taking off soon. Time for some privateerin'!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_king1_01: Roll out the red carpet, for King Reinhold has come!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_king2_01: I am known as a most generous ruler, but today I must ask for a similar, infinite kindness from yourself.
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_king2_02: You see, I have woken up this morning with a terrible sickness...
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_king2_03: ...One which requires me to collect! Acquire! Amass! I must have it all!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_king2_04: Make my armory burst at the seams with incredible crafts, and you will earn yourself my <c1>Royal Favor</c1>!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_king2_05: With this Favor, you can help yourself with some of my most precious <c1>Antiques</c1>!
texts.tutorial_introduce_quest_event_king2_06: Now go and craft away! My survival depends on it!
texts.tutorial_basement_intro1_02: Yer shop's lookin' mighty crowded. Y'need help with that?
texts.tutorial_basement_intro1_03: If ye still got tha dusty old basement in tha back, I'll dig that up for ye.
texts.tutorial_basement_intro2_01: Now ye can dump yer bins and racks down there and keep 'em working!
texts.tutorial_basement_intro2_02: But don't forget; <c1>it won't let ye own more racks and bins</c1>. Just puts them outta the way.
texts.tutorial_basement_intro2_03: Them be rules from tha shopkeeper association. Ye got more space to decorate, though.
texts.tutorial_basement_intro3_01: This here oughtha do it. If ye want more diggin' done, I'm yer dwarf.
texts.loginevent_lunar_01: How fare your Lunar Year festivities, shopkeeper? Opened any <c1>Red Envelopes</c1>?
texts.loginevent_lunar_02: I've received some nice pocket money from mine; 60 trillion gold pieces!
texts.loginevent_lunar_03: What's this? You've not received any? Preposterous!
texts.loginevent_lunar_04: Very well! You may have some from my personal <c1>Gem</c1> treasury.
texts.loginevent_lunar_05: Simply log in every day to receive these most generous gifts!
texts.tutorial_enchanting1_01: Ah, shopkeeper. I see you've found a... <c1>Runestone</c1>, was it?
texts.tutorial_enchanting1_02: These can be used to craft powerful <c1>enchantments</c1>. Allow me to show you.
texts.tutorial_enchanting2_01: Splendid, splendid. You've got yourself a mighty <c1>Elemental Rune</c1> there.
texts.tutorial_enchanting2_02: What was the next step again...? Oh yes, enchanting it onto an item!
texts.tutorial_enchanting3_01: Wonderful. Enchanted items are much more powerful and valuable.
texts.tutorial_enchanting3_02: I heard that Elements can empower Heroes in special ways... but I forgot the rest.
texts.tutorial_enchanting3_03: Oh well. Have fun enchanting now. Here are a few Runestones to get you started.
texts.tutorial_enchantingA1_01: Shopkeeper! Is that a... <c1>Runestone</c1> you're holding?
texts.tutorial_enchantingA1_02: Then my prayers were answered! With it, you can craft powerful <c1>enchantments</c1>!
texts.tutorial_enchantingA1_03: With the Goddess' blessing, I shall show you.
texts.tutorial_enchantingA2_01: Very good! What a lively <c1>Spirit Rune</c1>! It's just roaring to go!
texts.tutorial_enchantingA2_02: Let's not leave it waiting. Here, try enchanting it on this ring.
texts.tutorial_enchantingA3_01: Good! Enchanted items are much more powerful and valuable.
texts.tutorial_enchantingA3_02: Items with Spirits also grant <c1>special skills</c1> to Heroes, though I don't know the details...
texts.tutorial_enchantingA3_03: I bought a few more <c1>Runestones</c1>. I believe the Goddess would like you to have them.
texts.tutorial_enchantingA3_04: Blessings upon you and your work, shopkeeper. Goodbye!
texts.tutorial_collection_book_sub2_01: I found something really cool I wanted to show you!
texts.tutorial_collection_book_sub2_03: Oh... then I can't give you this <c1>cool book I found</c1>...
texts.tutorial_collection_book_sub2_04: No problem though! You only need to <c1>craft a blueprint over and over</c1> to upgrade and master it!
texts.tutorial_collection_book_sub2_05: I'll come back when you're done! Good luck!
texts.tutorial_collection_book2_01: I found something really cool in Grimar's attic!
texts.tutorial_collection_book2_02: Some kind of magic tome about collecting items... You want it, don't you?
texts.tutorial_collection_book2_03: I thought so! Here you go!
texts.tutorial_collection_book3_01: It's a magical <c1>Collection Book</c1>! Come on, open it!
texts.tutorial_collection_book4_01: From what I could gather... a new page appears whenever you <c1>master a blueprint</c1>.
texts.tutorial_collection_book4_02: Once a page appears, you can donate copies of that item to add it to the book's collection!
texts.tutorial_collection_book4_03: ...It seems the book will accept up to <c1>one copy</c1> of each item's quality, from <c1>Normal</c1> to <c1>Legendary</c1>!
texts.tutorial_collection_book4_04: I brought you an item so we can try!
texts.tutorial_collection_book5_01: Now your collection is one step closer to complete!
texts.tutorial_collection_book5_02: If you keep at it, there's probably some cool rewards waiting for you! It's a magical book, after all!
texts.tutorial_dust_counter: Tap the <c1>counter</c1> to dust it off.
texts.tutorial_dust_rack: Tap the <c1>rack</c1> to dust it off.
texts.tutorial_wait_crafting: Wait for the timer, then tap on the card.
texts.tutorial_dust_bin: Tap the <c1>bin</c1> to remove the dust.
texts.tutorial_press_sell_bubble: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to the customer.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_hero: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Argon.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_dragon_invasion: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Polonia.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_blacksmith: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Wallace the Blacksmith.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_tailor: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Julia the Tailor.
texts.tutorial_press_hire_board_back: Tap on the <c1>back</c1> button to return to the city.
texts.tutorial_speedup_quest: Quests can take a while... <c1>Rush</c1> it to help us out!
texts.tutorial_press_rack: Tap on the <c1>rack</c1> to see more options.
texts.tutorial_show_furniture_slot_types: These are the types of items that can be placed on the rack.
texts.tutorial_press_open_chest: Tap on the <c1>Magic Unlock</c1> button. This one's on me!
texts.tutorial_press_unlock_blueprint: Tap the <c1>Confirm</c1> button to unlock the Blueprint.
texts.tutorial_speedup_craft: Tap on the <c1>craft bubble</c1> to rush it.
texts.tutorial_ascension1_01: Well look at that! You've found yourself some <c1>Ascension Shards</c1>!
texts.tutorial_ascension1_02: They're just about the coolest thing around! Aside from me, of course!
texts.tutorial_ascension1_03: Here, let me show you how to use one!
texts.tutorial_ascension2_01: Here you go! That Short Sword blueprint's looking mighty efficient now!
texts.tutorial_ascension2_02: <c1>Ascension Shards</c1> allow you to upgrade your favorite blueprints even more than usual.
texts.tutorial_ascension2_03: That upgrade was on me, but you should try it on your favorite blueprint, too!
texts.tutorial_ascension2_04: I'm looking forward to seeing what you come up with!
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_engineer: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to the Engineer.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_scholar: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to the Scholar.
texts.press_bubble_moondragon: Tap the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Mundra.
texts.press_bubble_moondragon_click: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Mundra.
texts.craft_idle_reminder_01: Your workers are idle. Why not <c1>craft</c1> something?
texts.sell_idle_reminder_01: That <c1>customer</c1> has been waiting at the counter for a while... It's rude to keep them waiting!
texts.inventory_idle_reminder_01: It looks like your inventory is full! If you're running out of space, you can try <c1>dismantling</c1> items.
texts.tutorial_goal_level_2: Craft and sell items to reach <c1>Level 2</c1>
texts.objective_questsend_party: Send a party of 3 to the Howling Woods
texts.objective_questreachfloor: Clear floor {0} of the Howling Woods
texts.equip_adventure_count: Equip a Hero with 3 total pieces of gear.
texts.visitor_thought_counterbusy_03: There's a line at the counter...
texts.visitor_thought_nopathtocounter_02: I can't make it to the counter!
texts.visitor_thought_itemclassmismatch_02: I don't know how to use that
texts.visitor_thought_petinteraction_aprilfool: Wish I had a pet, dude.
texts.dialog_blacksmith_greetings: Welcome to the smithy. Don't mind the heat!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_greetings_02: Nice day for some smithing, eh?
texts.dialog_blacksmith_underupgrade: Sorry, no visitors allowed during renovations. City regulations!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_underupgrade_02: If I tore down that wall, I could fit another anvil...
texts.dialog_blacksmith_afterupgrade: The bellows are back working full blast! Let's craft something!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_afterupgrade_02: I'm done hammering up the place. You should see my new anvil!
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_00_01: Shopkeeper! Your guild's looking a bit sleepy, doesn't it?
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_00_02: It will be difficult to grow as a shopkeeper with so many inactive guildmates...
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_00_03: It might be a good idea to look for a new one! Don't worry, <c1> you won't lose your investments!</c1>.
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_01_01: Shopkeeper! How is your guild holding up?
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_01_02: If its members have become inactive, it might be time to find a new one!
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_01_03: No need to worry about your investments, <c1>they follow you from guild to guild!</c1>
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_02_01: Shopkeeper! How is your guild's activity these days?
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_02_02: A <c1>full, active guild</c1> is the key to success and swift progress!
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_02_03: If you feel your guild is too slow, you can always look into joining another one!
texts.visit_blacksmith_reminder_02_04: No need to worry about your investments, <c1>they'll follow you if you change guild!</c1>
texts.visit_blacksmith_quality_00_01: Look at this craft, shopkeeper. It's so pretty, it makes me want to give it a name!
texts.visit_blacksmith_quality_00_02: But then my kids would get jealous! Hah hah hah!
texts.visit_blacksmith_quality_christmas_00_01: Happy holidays, shopkeeper! Celebrating all alone?
texts.visit_blacksmith_quality_christmas_00_02: If you don't have any family visiting, you can come over and celebrate at the Wallace household!
texts.visit_blacksmith_bulk_00_01: My hammer's on fire today! And so is my forge! Hah hah!
texts.visit_blacksmith_bulk_00_02: Look at all the items I made! Go ahead, you can have some!
texts.visit_blacksmith_bulk_christmas_00_01: Happy holidays, shopkeeper! Celebrating all alone?
texts.visit_blacksmith_bulk_christmas_00_02: If you don't have any family visiting, you can come over and celebrate at the Wallace household!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat: Allan's a good boy. He's got a bright future ahead of him!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_02: Think Durhan is grumpy? I'd say he's pretty merry by dwarven standards! Hah!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_03: I remember forging Argon's first sword like it was yesterday. That kid just kept breaking his toys!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_04: Used to spend nights hammering away here at the forge, but I'm a family man now. No regrets!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_05: If you can get my old man Theodore out of retirement, you wouldn't regret it. That guy can forge anything!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_06: Brohm's an upstanding guy, but he's a bit awkward around people. Give him a chance!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_07: Gorza breaks several axes per day... Just how hard does she swing those things?
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_08: Why is iron always so mad? Because it has a low boiling point! Hah hah!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_09: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_10: A joke about construction? ...It has a long buildup!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_11: I'm a big fan of the shovel. I'd say it was a groundbreaking invention.
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_12: I would avoid sushi if I were you. It's a little fishy.
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_13: A high defense can help reduce damage taken during quests. Fighters will need tons of it!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_chat_14: How's your pet doing, shopkeeper? Ours is doing great!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_bounty_slay: You could say I have an axe to grind!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_bounty_quest: Keep your composure while collecting these components!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_bounty_surcharge: I leave you in charge of this surcharge!
texts.dialog_blacksmith_bounty_discount: I would never dare discount your haggling skills!
texts.thanks_blacksmith_00_01: I'm heading back to the smithy, keep up the good work!
texts.thanks_blacksmith_christmas_00_01: Here's a little gift for you. Don't forget my offer!
texts.dialog_carpenter_greetings: Carpenter Allan; the best there is.
texts.dialog_carpenter_unhiredgreetings: If you're looking for the best, you've come to the right place.
texts.dialog_carpenter_unhiredgreetings_02: I, Allan, can craft just about anything made of wood. Bows, staves, shields, you name it.
texts.dialog_carpenter_hirequestion: So, what are you waiting for?
texts.dialog_carpenter_underupgrade: Thanks for stopping by, but I'm a bit busy with renovations at the moment.
texts.dialog_carpenter_underupgrade_02: Part B goes into slot C...? Why is the manual in Swedish!?
texts.dialog_carpenter_afterupgrade: I'm done renovating my workshop. Pretty good huh? Carpenter quality!
texts.visit_carpenter_quality_00_01: You need to see this. Get ready though, it's THAT good. Even for me.
texts.visit_carpenter_quality_christmas_00_01: Shopkeeper! I brought the Christmas gift you've no doubt been waiting for!
texts.visit_carpenter_quality_christmas_00_02: Can't wait to open it huh?
texts.visit_carpenter_quality_christmas_00_03: I understand! You can do it right away! I won't tell anyone.
texts.visit_carpenter_bulk_00_01: I got a bunch of fine crafts here for you. All certified Allan quality, of course.
texts.visit_carpenter_bulk_christmas_00_01: Shopkeeper! I brought the Christmas gift you've no doubt been waiting for!
texts.visit_carpenter_bulk_christmas_00_02: Can't wait to open it huh?
texts.visit_carpenter_bulk_christmas_00_03: I understand! You can do it right away! I won't tell anyone.
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat: Wallace has always been like a second father to me.
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_02: I've been picking up fletching lately... What, you don't sell arrows in your shop?
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_03: Living Roots keep munching through Juniper's garden fences... Should I make them out of Ironwood...?
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_04: I learned how to make magical Staves on my own. Wands though? They're something else.
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_05: Looking for Keys? Dungeon bosses sometimes carry them. Heard they show up at the Fortune Zone, too.
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_06: Monster critical hits go right through armor! Fighters really hate that!
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_07: The old Master doesn't specialize in any item type, but even I need his help to craft high-end equipment.
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_08: Us workers need space to improve. Make sure to invest in our buildings so we can grow!
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_09: I sometimes work blindfolded. When you're this talented, handicaps are a way to keep things interesting.
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_10: Evelyn's hair looks like ripe Elvenwood, ready to be sculpted! ...Don't tell her I said that.
texts.dialog_carpenter_chat_11: I built a place for Maylee to call home. Not using iron was a challenge, but nothing's impossible for me!
texts.dialog_carpenter_bounty_craft: Hah! You think you can do better than me? Prove it!
texts.dialog_carpenter_bounty_slay: This bounty is only for the truest of Heroes.
texts.dialog_carpenter_bounty_quest: This bounty is only for the truest of Heroes.
texts.dialog_carpenter_bounty_surcharge: An item is only worth what a customer will pay for it!
texts.dialog_carpenter_bounty_discount: An item is only worth what a customer will pay for it!
texts.thanks_carpenter_00_01: Of course. None can resist my craftsmanship!
texts.thanks_carpenter_christmas_00_01: Perfect, right? No need to thank me!
texts.dialog_iron_greetings: Make it fast, I got a mine tha dig.
texts.dialog_iron_investgold: Aye, fine coinage. Fer humans that is.
texts.dialog_iron_investgems: By me beard, Merchant, yer loaded!
texts.dialog_iron_investgems_02: That be a gem worth keepin'.
texts.dialog_iron_underupgrade: I'm digging. If yer not here tha help, scram!
texts.dialog_iron_underupgrade_02: Dinna wanna dig too deep this time...
texts.dialog_iron_underupgrade_03: To yer picks lads, we're diggin' DEEP!
texts.dialog_iron_afterupgrade: Still clearin' out tha rubble, but tha mine's back in order.
texts.dialog_iron_afterupgrade_02: Gettin' pretty hot down thar. Wonder how much deeper we can go...
texts.visit_iron_00_01: I got a buncha iron here. Struck a good vein in me mine. Ye buyin'?
texts.visit_iron_christmas_00_01: Bah, Christmas! Elves this, elves that. Never any mention of tha dwarves.
texts.visit_iron_christmas_00_02: Take me Iron. And remember; a dwarf gave it to ye!
texts.dialog_iron_chat: Dinna underestimate tha Yeti snowballs. Rascals put rocks in 'em.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_02: Dragons been restless lately... Cannae be good...
texts.dialog_iron_chat_03: This candle keeps track of time down thar. Dwarves see in tha dark just fine.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_04: Make sure tha upgrade yer iron bin. If it be full, yer wastin' me iron.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_05: Thar be a dwarven fortress not far from here. Dug too deep they did... Overrun by tha fiends now.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_06: That Wallace's got an anvil fer a brain! He should hammer his own head fer a change!
texts.dialog_iron_chat_07: Used tha work fer a princess with me six mates. Heavy sleeper, she was.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_09: Tha mine's tha birthplace of art, me daddy used to say.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_10: Ye humans be too tall fer armor. All that iron, wasted!
texts.dialog_iron_chat_11: Dinna let the short legs fool ye, dwarves be natural sprinters.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_12: Only tha Knights wear armor right. Real walkin' fortresses.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_13: Seein' a Lord brings a tear to me eye... Now that's real armor wearin'.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_14: Where's a dwarf supposed tha get somethin' to eat 'round here? I'm hungry like a werewolf!
texts.dialog_iron_chat_15: Argh! An elf living on me mine! Who's in charge of this city!?
texts.dialog_iron_chat_16: Iron is like poison to tha fairy folks. Gotta be a sorry life.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_17: That pirate lass be makin' fun of me accent, I bet.
texts.dialog_iron_chat_18: Gah! Now we got tha dragons as neighbors. Crazy town fer a crazy world.
texts.dialog_iron_bounty_craft: Yer resources be gatherin' dust. Put 'em tha good use.
texts.dialog_iron_bounty_slay: Thar be monsters stirrin' about. Cannae be good...
texts.dialog_iron_bounty_quest: Thar be monsters stirrin' about. Cannae be good...
texts.dialog_iron_bounty_surcharge: Blasted Heroes... Nay respect fer iron. Teach 'em a lesson fer me.
texts.dialog_iron_bounty_discount: Yer stuff's too expensive! Learn tha strike a deal fer a change.
texts.thanks_iron_christmas_00_01: Blasted Santa's elves... I'd like to see them getting their own Iron fer a change.
texts.dialog_wood_greetings: You're looking thin, shopkeeper. Are you eating right?
texts.dialog_wood_greetings_03: You called for strength? I am here.
texts.dialog_wood_investgold: Adding weight to my trip? Bring it on!
texts.dialog_wood_investgems: Flexing your wallet, shopkeeper? I respect that.
texts.dialog_wood_underupgrade: Can't talk right now. Doing reps.
texts.dialog_wood_underupgrade_02: You caught me during my training, shopkeeper. Come back later!
texts.dialog_wood_afterupgrade: Look at those gains... Those trees don't stand a chance.
texts.dialog_wood_afterupgrade_02: How much do you think I can bench now? I bet I can pull off 400 kilos.
texts.dialog_wood_afterupgrade_03: Training's done for today. Look at this bulk!
texts.visit_wood_christmas_00_01: Happy holidays, shopkeeper. It's a bit cold in here, isn't it?
texts.visit_wood_christmas_00_02: I'm doing my round through the city to make sure everyone has enough firewood.
texts.visit_wood_00_01: Hey, shopkeeper! Allan ordered too much today, think you can take these off my hands?
texts.visit_wood_01_01: Shopkeeper! Carrying all this wood around makes for a good workout...
texts.visit_wood_01_02: ...But gold would make for much better weight! How about we trade?
texts.dialog_wood_chat: I know Ismael's only an elf, but he should start working out. A stiff breeze could snap him in half!
texts.dialog_wood_chat_02: Squats and oats, shopkeeper. Squats and oats!
texts.dialog_wood_chat_03: Brohm's getting out of shape. All this time spent smelting... not enough lifting!
texts.dialog_wood_chat_05: Remember to stay active! All that time spent locked inside your shop isn't good for you.
texts.dialog_wood_chat_06: Good form is key when lifting anything, even stuff around your shop. Use your legs, not your back!
texts.dialog_wood_chat_07: That Argon kid doesn't talk about it, but he pulls off some serious training when no one's looking.
texts.dialog_wood_chat_08: Familiars? Bah! If you need help to fight, you shouldn't be fighting!
texts.dialog_wood_chat_09: Where's that dumb oaf Rudo? He promised he'd be here by six.
texts.dialog_wood_chat_10: Why hire anything other than Barbarians? Yelling and bleeding makes for a good fight.
texts.dialog_wood_chat_11: A good Barbarian can bench-press 800 pounds. A good Chieftain can bench-press that, plus the Barbarian.
texts.dialog_wood_chat_12: I got Orcish literature class tonight at the Academy. You comin'?
texts.dialog_wood_chat_13: Bah! Spellblades! Weapons or magic... Pick a side!
texts.dialog_wood_chat_14: Mundra, was it? Good gal. I like her guts.
texts.dialog_wood_chat_15: Dad said he'd be coming home soon. I'm not looking forward to it.
texts.dialog_wood_bounty_craft: Regular training is important to keep your skill sharp.
texts.dialog_wood_bounty_slay: You're looking a bit thin, but you should be able to handle this.
texts.dialog_wood_bounty_quest: It's time to prove your worth as a warrior, shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_wood_bounty_surcharge: You've got a way with words, don't you?
texts.dialog_wood_bounty_discount: You've got a way with words, don't you?
texts.dialog_tailor_greetings_02: Are you here for a modification, or a custom piece?
texts.dialog_tailor_unhiredgreetings: You are the new shopkeeper, correct? It is an honor to finally make your acquaintance.
texts.dialog_tailor_hirequestion: My skills are at your disposal.
texts.dialog_tailor_underupgrade: Ah, terrible timing! My workshop is in shambles...
texts.dialog_tailor_afterupgrade: My humble workshop has a fresh coat of paint. Let me show you around!
texts.visit_tailor_quality_00_01: Shopkeeper, I'd like to share one of my finest works with you.
texts.visit_tailor_quality_00_02: You are one with eyes for quality, are you not?
texts.visit_tailor_bulk_00_01: Ah, shopkeeper! I brought a bundle of clothes with mismatched measurements.
texts.visit_tailor_bulk_00_02: They're of no use to me, but I'm sure you could find a buyer.
texts.visit_tailor_quality_christmas_00_01: This cold weather is just perfect for knitting by the fireplace, isn't it?
texts.visit_tailor_quality_christmas_00_02: Here, I even made something for you. Merry Christmas!
texts.visit_tailor_bulk_christmas_00_01: This cold weather is just perfect for knitting by the fireplace, isn't it?
texts.visit_tailor_bulk_christmas_00_02: Here, I even made something for you. Merry Christmas!
texts.thanks_tailor_christmas_00_01: Happy Holidays, and happy New Year, too!
texts.dialog_tailor_chat: Our King is by far my biggest customer. I don't think he ever wears the same outfit twice!
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_02: I also style hair, if it ever strikes your fancy. Evelyn's is my greatest work!
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_03: Ease of movement, weight, protection... Light armor design is challenging indeed.
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_04: Ismael is a remarkable gentleman. If all elves are like that, I certainly wouldn't mind visiting their lands someday.
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_05: There's no feeling quite like caressing satin, wouldn't you agree?
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_06: Light armor isn't as protective as heavy armor, but Rogues can keep up thanks to Evasion.
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_07: Cloaks are simple enough to make. I heard elves can make them like no others, though.
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_08: All Heroes have a chance to land a powerful critical hit. Musketeers and Monks really excel in that regard.
texts.dialog_tailor_chat_09: Yolanda's knitting is unrivaled. That's a thousand year old grandma for you!
texts.dialog_tailor_bounty_craft: I've stumbled upon a creative block. Care to provide inspiration?
texts.dialog_tailor_bounty_slay: I need a Hero! One that is fast, and fresh from the fight...
texts.dialog_tailor_bounty_quest: Your Heroes are renowned among these parts. May I ask for their help?
texts.dialog_tailor_bounty_surcharge: It's been so long since I taught you about haggling... Show me how much you've improved!
texts.dialog_tailor_bounty_discount: It's been so long since I taught you about haggling... Show me how much you've improved!
texts.dialog_leather_greetings_02: Hey, I'm Tamas, the leather guy.
texts.dialog_leather_investgems_02: Dude, where did you get all that?
texts.dialog_leather_investgems_03: Dude, I'm like, a billionaire now.
texts.dialog_leather_underupgrade: Not right now, dude. I'm improving my workshop.
texts.dialog_leather_underupgrade_02: I'm drafting up the new floor plans, dude. How does it look?
texts.dialog_leather_afterupgrade: All done, dude. Smell that fresh, leathery scent.
texts.dialog_leather_afterupgrade_02: How do you like the new decor, dude?
texts.dialog_leather_chat: Dude, we gotta do something about Gorza's woodcutting. Save the trees, man.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_02: Ismael is like, a really weird dude. But I like him.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_03: Jog's mustache is pretty cool, dude. You think we can become mustache buddies?
texts.dialog_leather_chat_04: I wish I could live with the Yetis, dude. I could stroke their fur all day.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_05: Sometimes I go to the Aurora Caves to find a big icicle. Maybe someday I'll be the next Yeti king.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_06: The Emerald Inn is the best place for a bite. I always order double when I go there.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_07: Leather quality control is serious business, dude. You'll only get the best from me.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_09: 'Sup homie, got my stuff? Oh sorry dude, I thought you were someone else.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_10: Ismael's sheep keep munching on my lawn, dude. I don't even need to mow it!
texts.dialog_leather_chat_11: Dude, don't tell anyone, but I think I'm a sheep whisperer. They keep coming over!
texts.dialog_leather_chat_12: I went to Serene for some fortune telling but she just told me to leave. She's rude, dude.
texts.dialog_leather_chat_13: Woah dude, we got dragons in town! Double dragons!
texts.dialog_leather_bounty_craft: Now it's my turn to ask for a delivery, dude.
texts.dialog_leather_bounty_slay: There's some weird monsters out there, dude... Are you gonna use that pelt?
texts.dialog_leather_bounty_quest: I know a place with some fresh stuff, dude.
texts.dialog_leather_bounty_surcharge: It's a dog eat dog world out there, dude.
texts.dialog_leather_bounty_discount: Why not cut your buddies a deal, dude?
texts.visit_leather_00_01: 'Sup homie, I got your stuff. You ordered an extra batch of leather right?
texts.visit_leather_01_01: Hey dude, I'm trying out door-to-door sales. Need some leather?
texts.visit_leather_christmas_00_02: Is your shop ready for Santa? Make sure to have cookies and milk ready.
texts.visit_leather_aprilfools_00_01: You've got some weird customers, dude.
texts.visit_leather_aprilfools_00_02: They're all saying "dude" all the time. That's just weird, dude.
texts.visit_leather_aprilfools_01_01: Hey dude, there's a party in here! What's the occasion?
texts.visit_leather_backup_00_01: Hey dude, you got the stuff?
texts.visit_leather_al_00_01: These clothes are a bit too wild for me, dude.
texts.visit_leather_al_00_02: Wizards really wear these? Weirdos, man.
texts.visit_leather_am_00_01: The leather on this is something else, dude.
texts.visit_leather_am_00_02: I could wear it all day. I might just do it.
texts.visit_leather_bl_00_01: These boots... Look at that subtle leathering. The tasteful thickness.
texts.visit_leather_bl_00_02: Dude, it even has a watermark. That's good stuff.
texts.visit_leather_gl_00_01: I can tell you used my leather for this, dude. It's top notch.
texts.visit_leather_hl_00_01: Cool hat, dude. Can I have it?
texts.visit_leather_hm_00_01: I like this smell on this, dude. I'll take it.
texts.visit_leather_xc_00_01: I feel like a villain wearing this, dude. I'm totally buying it.
texts.thanks_leather_01_01: Thanks, dude. Don't forget to tip.
texts.thanks_leather_christmas_00_01: I hope I get a Prototype Gatling from Santa, dude.
texts.thanks_leather_aprilfools_00_01: Thanks, dude. Watch your back, though. I don't trust these dudes.
texts.thanks_leather_aprilfools_01_01: Thanks dude. Make sure not to confuse me with these weirdos.
texts.additional_sale_leather_00_01: Woah dude, what's that? Smells almost as good as leather!
texts.dialog_herbalist_greetings: Welcome to the Maribel Medicine Emporium.
texts.dialog_herbalist_greetings_02: Hi! Are you looking for something in particular?
texts.dialog_herbalist_greetings_03: Hello again shopkeeper. I'm ready for your next order!
texts.dialog_herbalist_unhiredgreetings: Ah, a new merchant! Do you need medical supplies?
texts.dialog_herbalist_unhiredgreetings_02: As the Herbalist, I handle the creation of powerful tonics and magical herbs.
texts.dialog_herbalist_underupgrade_02: Sorry this is taking so long. Regulations around herb sales are no laughing matter...
texts.dialog_herbalist_afterupgrade: The Maribel Medicine Emporium is open for business.
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat: Don't eat any mushrooms you find laying around. Amateur mycology is dangerous!
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_02: She may not look like much, but Juniper's knowledge of plants surpasses even mine.
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_03: Even now, preparing Living Roots still grosses me out. I'm not alone, right?
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_04: Remember that stamina drinks are not a substitute for a good night's sleep.
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_05: My potions have no artificial ingredients. All natural flavors, and gluten free!
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_06: Have you seen Lilu around? Her order just came in.
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_07: Druids really know their way around herbs, don't they? Think I have what it takes to become one?
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_08: I'd like to talk to an Archdruid someday. Their knowledge of herbalism is unparalleled.
texts.dialog_herbalist_chat_09: I could use some more fairy dust... Do you think it's rude to ask Maylee?
texts.dialog_herbalist_bounty_craft: Never stop crafting. Keep your skill sharp!
texts.dialog_herbalist_bounty_slay: The dungeons have grown more dangerous than usual lately. Can you investigate?
texts.dialog_herbalist_bounty_quest: The season is a bit early, but I'm pondering about the freshness of these ingredients...
texts.dialog_herbalist_bounty_surcharge: The Medicine Emporium is having a special event. Can you include some flyers with your sales?
texts.dialog_herbalist_bounty_discount: The Medicine Emporium is having a special event. Can you include some flyers with your sales?
texts.visit_herbalist_quality_00_01: Shopkeeper, I've got a special deal for you today.
texts.visit_herbalist_quality_00_02: Our finest product in stock, available for a limited time only!
texts.visit_herbalist_quality_christmas_00_01: Merry Christmas, shopkeeper! I have a gift for you!
texts.visit_herbalist_bulk_00_01: The Maribel Medicine Emporium is running a sale this week!
texts.visit_herbalist_bulk_00_02: Cheap items by the pound. Interested?
texts.visit_herbalist_bulk_christmas_00_01: Merry Christmas, shopkeeper! I have a gift for you!
texts.thanks_herbalist_christmas_00_01: Did you like it? Happy Holidays!
texts.dialog_herbs_greetings_02: Welcome to the Garden! We've got fun and games!
texts.dialog_herbs_greetings_03: It's almost time for the harvest! SO excited!
texts.dialog_herbs_investgems_02: For me? REALLY!? You're the best!
texts.dialog_herbs_underupgrade: Knee deep in the dirt! Gotta earn that green thumb!
texts.dialog_herbs_underupgrade_02: Sorry! I can't do business while I'm covered in mulch!
texts.dialog_herbs_afterupgrade: Look! Look! We got crocuses now! And tulips!
texts.dialog_herbs_afterupgrade_02: Garden's looking like a jungle now! I like it!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat: You ever noticed how it never rains around here? SO weird!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_02: Get in touch with nature; garden barefoot!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_03: Tamas keeps asking me to grow his weird plants! Like, no!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_04: Have you ever seen Gorza cut trees? It's like, "chop, crash!" One swing! Totally crazy!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_05: I've always wanted to see one of those Mushgoon up close... but they look so mean!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_06: Make sure to build a fence around your Living Root garden. They can TOTALLY crawl out of it!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_07: Grimar leaves great tips for Herb deliveries! The trip is totally worth it!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_08: Have you ever seen a Miniboss? They're super sneaky! And MEAN!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_09: NINJAS! So cool! If I were a shopkeeper, I would hire a HUNDRED NINJAS!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_10: Sensei are cooler than Ninjas... But I've never seen one! Wait, that's the point, right?
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_11: Maylee finally decided to move in! And she brought jewels!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_12: Iron is SUPER TOXIC to fairies like Maylee! Be careful around her!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_13: A weird dragon guy came and complimented my flowers! COOL!
texts.dialog_herbs_chat_14: GRANDMA CANDIES! Make sure to pay Yolanda a visit!
texts.dialog_herbs_bounty_craft: Oh! Oh! I have a request! I filled the form and everything!
texts.dialog_herbs_bounty_slay: My playground's been INVADED! Can you do something about it? Pleaaaase?
texts.dialog_herbs_bounty_quest: There's a whole bunch of components just lying around! We gotta grab them! QUICK!
texts.dialog_herbs_bounty_surcharge: It's time to make MONEY! LOADSAMONEY!
texts.dialog_herbs_bounty_discount: Discounting is all about STRATEGY! That's what Theodore always says!
texts.visit_herbs_00_02: Maybe TOO nice. My plants are growing totally OUT OF CONTROL!
texts.visit_herbs_00_03: Now I got too many herbs! I'm selling 'em - SUPER cheap!
texts.visit_herbs_christmas_00_02: I love saying that! That's why I'm going door-to-door and telling EVERYONE!
texts.visit_herbs_christmas_00_03: And here's your Christmas gift... Herbs! I wrapped it myself!
texts.thanks_herbs_christmas_00_01: Alright! Katarina is next! See ya!
texts.dialog_fabric_greetings: Ah, shopkeeper! Did my enthralling song lure you here?
texts.dialog_fabric_greetings_02: A remarkable entrance, shopkeeper. Very dramatic!
texts.dialog_fabric_investgold_02: Hah! You cannot bribe an artist!
texts.dialog_fabric_investgems: A mere balm for my saccharine soul. Wealth is an obstacle to art!
texts.dialog_fabric_underupgrade: My apologies, I am currently overseeing the preparation of our new silk farm. Please return later.
texts.dialog_fabric_afterupgrade: Behold, my new installations. Aren't they dreamy?
