texts.dialog_fabric_chat: My elven homegrove has always been filled with songs and dances. I miss it, sometimes.
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_02: Ah, to return to the Aurora Caves one day! Such a breathtaking sight...
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_03: The sheep I have here are a special elven breed. Picky eaters, but feel that wool!
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_04: Care for a bit of poetry?
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_05: -and lo! the stars' enticing tinkle, betwixt sun and moon...
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_06: The people here can be a bit... uncultured at times. I feel like only Julia understands me. And you, of course.
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_07: Wallace's jokes are awful! Revolting! An insult to art! How does he come up with all that?
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_08: My sheep have taken a disturbing fondness with Tamas. This cannot continue!
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_09: Ah, mysterious black-clad maiden! When will you return to sweep me off my feet?
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_10: Elusive woman, stalking the darkness... Driven by rage, stranger to kindness...
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_11: Spellblades wield arms and magic with equal grace. A Hero class for the distinguished shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_12: Only the best among Spellblades can dream of becoming a Spellknight.
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_13: Fair Serene's bloodline is far beyond your average elf. Even mine, I must admit.
texts.dialog_fabric_chat_14: Avatars of sun and moon have come to settle in our town. This town truly is blessed, Tamas aside.
texts.dialog_fabric_bounty_craft: Go, shopkeeper. Show them the meaning of art!
texts.dialog_fabric_bounty_slay: Camaraderie, adventure, and steel on steel... The stuff of legend! Don't you agree?
texts.dialog_fabric_bounty_quest: Marvelous treasures abound just outside the city gate. I would like some, if you don't mind.
texts.dialog_fabric_bounty_surcharge: You've a reputation for having a silver tongue. Can you live up to it?
texts.dialog_fabric_bounty_discount: You've a reputation for having a silver tongue. Can you live up to it?
texts.visit_fabric_00_01: Salutations, shopkeeper! I, Ismael, have risked life and limb to provide you with these!
texts.visit_fabric_christmas_00_01: Ah, Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>...
texts.visit_fabric_christmas_00_02: Human songs are primitive, but I must admit I am enthralled by their charm.
texts.visit_fabric_christmas_00_03: You may have this resplendent Fabric, as a gift. I am in a festive mood!
texts.thanks_fabric_00_01: A thousand thanks would not be enough! Farewell!
texts.thanks_fabric_christmas_00_01: Fare thee well, shopkeeper. And Happy Holidays!
texts.dialog_steel_greetings_02: Hey, I didn't hear you come in.
texts.dialog_steel_investgems: For me? Ah, I got dust in my eyes...
texts.dialog_steel_underupgrade: Ah, sorry, the foundry's closed. I hope it's not too much of an inconvenience.
texts.dialog_steel_underupgrade_02: Could you step outside for a bit? It's a bit unsafe in here.
texts.dialog_steel_afterupgrade: The smelter is back in order.
texts.dialog_steel_afterupgrade_02: Come in, come in! I just had the Smelter's ceilings raised!
texts.dialog_steel_chat: I run the foundry on my own. It's a lot of work, but I get distracted with people around.
texts.dialog_steel_chat_02: That ninja girl came here the other day. Taciturn sort, isn't she?
texts.dialog_steel_chat_03: What's Argon up to lately? Doing hero work?
texts.dialog_steel_chat_04: Have you been using those Power Booster? It can really make a difference against bosses.
texts.dialog_steel_chat_05: This Smelter was not built with orcs in mind. I keep bumping my head on the ceiling...
texts.dialog_steel_chat_06: Those little Thief Heroes sure can wield a dagger, huh?
texts.dialog_steel_chat_07: Tricksters are something else! That's one Hero I wouldn't want to mess with!
texts.dialog_steel_chat_08: Um... is that large Rudo fellow still around? Whew! What a scary-looking guy!
texts.dialog_steel_chat_09: At night, I can see Serene through my window, gazing at the stars... Does that poor girl ever sleep?
texts.dialog_steel_chat_10: Did you hear? My dad's coming to visit! I'm looking forward to it!
texts.dialog_steel_bounty_craft: The city is counting on you!
texts.dialog_steel_bounty_slay: You're not afraid of a monster or two, right?
texts.dialog_steel_bounty_quest: Make sure to bring bags to carry it all!
texts.dialog_steel_bounty_surcharge: There's no shame in a little profit, is there?
texts.dialog_steel_bounty_discount: If you have a heart of gold, this bounty is for you!
texts.visit_steel_00_01: Hi there! You've been so hard at work lately, I thought you might need some extra Steel!
texts.visit_steel_christmas_00_01: Brrr! Cold weather huh? I should've put on a few layers!
texts.visit_steel_christmas_00_02: Still, I really wanted to give you these.
texts.thanks_steel_00_01: Keep up the good work. The city is counting on you!
texts.thanks_steel_christmas_00_01: I'll be getting back to the warmth of the smelter. Happy Holidays!
texts.dialog_ironwood_greetings: Can this wait? I'm on break.
texts.dialog_ironwood_investgold: Tch, gotta bring out the ledger...
texts.dialog_ironwood_investgold_02: Yes, thank you. Is that all?
texts.dialog_ironwood_underupgrade: Gotta work overtime to improve the sawmill... What a bother.
texts.dialog_ironwood_afterupgrade: Whew, I'm all done here. Time for a nap...
texts.dialog_ironwood_afterupgrade_02: The sawmill is operational again. Maybe I should hire more underlings...
texts.dialog_ironwood_chat: I wish Gorza could slow down a bit. Hard to keep up with her frantic woodcutting.
texts.dialog_ironwood_chat_02: Are you still serving customers on your own? You should learn to delegate.
texts.dialog_ironwood_chat_03: The eight hour work day is oppression enforced by the bourgeoisie. Tamas got that right.
texts.dialog_ironwood_chat_04: Serene's building's just a bunch of rocks, isn't it? Where does she sleep?
texts.dialog_ironwood_bounty_craft: It's time to seize the means of production.
texts.dialog_ironwood_bounty_slay: It's an act of self-defense if the monster attacks first. Remember that.
texts.dialog_ironwood_bounty_surcharge: The customer is king, but even royalty can be misled.
texts.dialog_ironwood_bounty_discount: The customer is king, but even royalty can be misled.
texts.visit_ironwood_00_01: Look, I'm stuck carrying this stuff all the way across town and I really can't be bothered.
texts.visit_ironwood_00_02: If you buy it off me, you save me the hassle. Deal?
texts.visit_ironwood_christmas_00_01: A holiday of kinship and generosity...
texts.visit_ironwood_christmas_00_02: A good time to reflect upon the ethics of our businesses, hmm?
texts.visit_ironwood_christmas_00_03: Wouldn't want a visit from a ghost of Christmas past now, do we?
texts.thanks_ironwood_00_01: Good. I can catch a nap on the way back.
texts.thanks_ironwood_christmas_00_01: That one's on me. Have a good, enlightening holiday.
texts.dialog_oils_greetings: Don't just stand there, come on in!
texts.dialog_oils_greetings_02: Would you care for some tea?
texts.dialog_oils_underupgrade: Oh no no no! Someone spilt an oil jar!
texts.dialog_oils_afterupgrade: I had Allan do some improvements to the Oil Press. What do you think?
texts.dialog_oils_chat: Have you seen Wallace's children? They're absolutely adorable! Why, even Durhan doesn't mind babysitting them!
texts.dialog_oils_chat_02: Oh don't let our big Brohm intimidate you, he's a gentle giant! His sister Gorza on the other hand...
texts.dialog_oils_chat_03: Have you heard of Familiars? I've heard people train cute pets to fight alongside them!
texts.dialog_oils_chat_04: You'd have to be a fool to duel a Samurai! Their first hit always strikes true!
texts.dialog_oils_chat_05: My oil has therapeutic properties, too. Would you care to try it?
texts.dialog_oils_chat_06: Back in my Kernish homeland, the strongest men would bathe in oil and... Oh my! I'm babbling again!
texts.dialog_oils_chat_07: I've been told that Rudo is an expert armor user... There's just nothing that fits the poor boy!
texts.dialog_oils_chat_08: Sondra has extensive knowledge in all sorts of exquisite teas. A perfect gentleman, too!
texts.dialog_oils_bounty_craft: I can't find these anywhere on the market... Can you provide a supply?
texts.dialog_oils_bounty_slay: I'd like to see your strongest Heroes in action!
texts.dialog_oils_bounty_quest: On a nice day like this... you should be outside gathering components!
texts.dialog_oils_bounty_surcharge: Haggling is an art, dear. One you are not unfamiliar with, I've heard!
texts.dialog_oils_bounty_discount: Haggling is an art, dear. One you are not unfamiliar with, I've heard!
texts.visit_oils_00_01: Dear, I'm in a bind. One of my clients canceled a huge Oil order out of the blue!
texts.visit_oils_00_02: Now I don't have enough storage to keep it. Would you like to buy it?
texts.visit_oils_christmas_00_01: Santa's little elf is hard at work, I see!
texts.visit_oils_christmas_00_02: Make sure to take a break now and then. It's Christmas for everyone!
texts.thanks_oils_christmas_00_01: Happy Holidays, and remember to write to your family!
texts.dialog_priest_greetings: Welcome to the Goddess' humble temple.
texts.dialog_priest_greetings_02: Let us bow our heads in prayer.
texts.dialog_priest_unhiredgreetings: Welcome to the holy temple, shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_priest_unhiredgreetings_02: I am but a humble servant of the Goddess, but Her blessing can impart great power upon amulets.
texts.dialog_priest_unhiredgreetings_03: She has also granted me the ability to infuse the spirits of this world into magic runes...
texts.dialog_priest_hirequestion: Will you accept the Goddess in your heart?
texts.dialog_priest_investgold: Blessings of the Goddess upon you, shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_priest_investgold_02: Remember that church donations are exempt from taxes!
texts.dialog_priest_investgold_05: A most generous tithe. Thank you.
texts.dialog_priest_investgems_02: Such benevolence... the Goddess thanks you, shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_priest_underupgrade_02: Perhaps we can afford stained glass windows now...
texts.dialog_priest_afterupgrade: The temple's doors are once again open to all. You are welcome, shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_priest_afterupgrade_02: The Goddess' light surrounds the temple once more.
texts.dialog_priest_chat: Will you be attending mass later today?
texts.dialog_priest_chat_02: Each of my amulets has been blessed by the Goddess... Treat them with care.
texts.dialog_priest_chat_03: Wallace made some toys for the orphans again today. Goddess bless his heart!
texts.dialog_priest_chat_04: I wish Brohm would come out of his shell more often...
texts.dialog_priest_chat_05: Guns are terrifying tools of war... I don't think the Goddess would approve their use...
texts.dialog_priest_chat_06: Clerics have sworn an oath not to wield swords... Maces are fair game, though!
texts.dialog_priest_chat_07: I've taught Lilu some healing magic. She is beyond gifted.
texts.dialog_priest_chat_08: Runestones can sometimes be found during quests, but only Evelyn the Scholar knows how to craft them.
texts.dialog_priest_chat_09: The spirits of this world can be enchanted onto items to grant them wonderful properties.
texts.dialog_priest_chat_10: Serene's rather... unique, isn't she? She must be so lonely...
texts.dialog_priest_chat_11: The Sun God's Tomb has powerful guardians to deter graverobbers.
texts.dialog_priest_bounty_craft: I would like to learn from a professional. May I watch?
texts.dialog_priest_bounty_slay: When the wilderness threatens the faithful, a crusade is in order...
texts.dialog_priest_bounty_quest: With faith in your heart, the Goddess may guide you to salvation.
texts.dialog_priest_bounty_surcharge: To take from the rich and give to the poor is a noble endeavor.
texts.dialog_priest_bounty_discount: A touch of generosity could make this world a better place.
texts.visit_priest_bulk_00_01: Noble shopkeeper... I am amassing donations for the temple.
texts.visit_priest_bulk_00_02: Would you be so kind as to contribute? Donors receive complimentary items!
texts.visit_priest_quality_00_01: Kind merchant! Last night, I've had a... vision.
texts.visit_priest_quality_00_02: The Goddess herself guided my hands into creating an item of great power!
texts.visit_priest_quality_00_03: I believe She would like you to have it. Will you take it?
texts.visit_priest_quality_christmas_00_01: ...During this holy night, it is important to reflect upon the people we hold most dear.
texts.visit_priest_quality_christmas_00_02: I crafted this under the starlight. Will you take it?
texts.visit_priest_bulk_christmas_00_01: ...During this holy night, it is important to reflect upon the people we hold most dear.
texts.visit_priest_bulk_christmas_00_02: I crafted this under the starlight. Will you take it?
texts.thanks_priest_christmas_00_01: I will pray for you to the Goddess. For good health and continued fortune
texts.dialog_master_unhiredgreetings: Ah, shopkeeper. I figured I'd see you around eventually.
texts.dialog_master_unhiredgreetings_02: I am known as the Master around these parts. My boundless knowledge allows the creation of rare and powerful equipment!
texts.dialog_master_hirequestion: So, are you bringing this old man out of retirement?
texts.dialog_master_underupgrade: I'm dusting off my old tools as we speak. Why not come back later?
texts.dialog_master_afterupgrade: Good timing, I was just done renovating around here.
texts.dialog_master_chat: I used to be the smith here, a long time ago. My son Wallace is in charge now.
texts.dialog_master_chat_02: Do you enjoy board games? We can try Oligopoly if you have an hour to spare. Or three.
texts.dialog_master_chat_03: Fancy a game of chess? I can show you the ropes.
texts.dialog_master_chat_04: That Engineer makes for a noisy neighbor, doesn't she? Nice girl, though.
texts.dialog_master_chat_05: Tougher monsters sometimes stalk the dungeons... Minibosses, I believe they're called.
texts.dialog_master_chat_06: Kids these days and their fancy "Auto Chess"... What's wrong with regular chess?
texts.dialog_master_chat_07: Have you tried enchanting items? I heard it's all the rage with kids these days.
texts.dialog_master_chat_08: Those magic chests sometimes contain rare and powerful Elemental Blueprints. I'd love to get my hands on one of those!
texts.dialog_master_bounty_craft: Surprise crafting contest! Are you up to the challenge?
texts.dialog_master_bounty_slay: Too easy for you? Try it with a blindfold on!
texts.dialog_master_bounty_quest: Back in my days, I knew a secret gathering spot in that area. Why don't you check it out?
texts.dialog_master_bounty_surcharge: Haggling is a duel of will and wits. Do you have what it takes?
texts.dialog_master_bounty_discount: Haggling is a duel of will and wits. Do you have what it takes?
texts.visit_master_quality_00_01: Hail, shopkeeper. I got an outstanding piece for you today. Special discount, too.
texts.visit_master_bulk_00_01: Hey kid, listen to this. I got into a crafting competition with Wallace the other day...
texts.visit_master_bulk_00_02: I won, of course. But now I got all of these items lying around. How about you take them?
texts.visit_master_quality_christmas_00_02: I'm not the real Santa Claus, but I still brought you a present!
texts.visit_master_bulk_christmas_00_02: I'm not the real Santa Claus, but I still brought you a present!
texts.thanks_master_christmas_00_01: I promise I won't tell Santa about all that surcharging you've been doing.
texts.dialog_wizard_greetings_02: Have you perchance seen Lola around?
texts.dialog_wizard_unhiredgreetings: There are some who call me... Tim.
texts.dialog_wizard_unhiredgreetings_02: As Wizard of the highest order, I can create spells and elements of immense power.
texts.dialog_wizard_unhiredgreetings_03: ...Or was it scrolls? Grimoires? I should probably write this down... Regardless!
texts.dialog_wizard_investgold: Ah, thank you. How much was it again?
texts.dialog_wizard_investgold_02: I don't have any change... Oh, are you investing?
texts.dialog_wizard_investgems: Splendid rocks you have there... Gems you say?
texts.dialog_wizard_underupgrade: I'm looking for a rare book for my magical library... Something about a fellowship. Do you have it?
texts.dialog_wizard_afterupgrade: I feel more powerful today... Did I do anything last night?
texts.dialog_wizard_afterupgrade_02: Everything feels different around here... What happened last night?
texts.dialog_wizard_chat: Have you seen my staff anywhere?
texts.dialog_wizard_chat_02: That boy Arthur came here with an important request earlier... Or was it Argon?
texts.dialog_wizard_chat_03: I am Timotheus Grimar, grand wizard and enchanter. I know much that is hidden.
texts.dialog_wizard_chat_04: There's another tower in the city? Has another Wizard moved in?
texts.dialog_wizard_chat_06: I once enchanted items with elements, a long time ago. Am I imagining things?
texts.dialog_wizard_chat_07: I've lost my diary somewhere... Have you seen it? It's a nice shade of blue.
texts.dialog_wizard_chat_08: Ah, Runestones. I think I recall finding some in those fancy chests...
texts.dialog_wizard_bounty_craft: Hmm... These should be useful... I think.
texts.dialog_wizard_bounty_slay: There is a dangerous monster around these parts...
texts.dialog_wizard_bounty_quest: I can't quite recall their name, but they looked a bit like... this?
texts.dialog_wizard_bounty_surcharge: I trust you are one who knows how to handle gold?
texts.dialog_wizard_bounty_discount: I trust you are one who knows how to handle gold?
texts.visit_wizard_quality_00_01: Kind librarian, I'd like this exceptional item preserved as soon as possible.
texts.visit_wizard_quality_00_02: Hold on a moment, this isn't the library! ...How much were you offering again?
texts.visit_wizard_quality_christmas_00_01: A strange old man living at the North Pole... Crafting toys for good children...
texts.visit_wizard_quality_christmas_00_02: Fellow wizard, perhaps? Mysterious... Mysterious indeed...
texts.visit_wizard_quality_christmas_00_03: Oh, hello there shopkeeper. It seems that my wandering has brought me here.
texts.visit_wizard_quality_christmas_00_04: A Christmas present? I suppose you could have this.
texts.visit_wizard_bulk_00_01: Freyja, I've brought you the item you asked for... Wait a minute, where am I?
texts.visit_wizard_bulk_christmas_00_01: A strange old man living at the North Pole... Crafting toys for good children...
texts.visit_wizard_bulk_christmas_00_02: Fellow wizard, perhaps? Mysterious... Mysterious indeed...
texts.visit_wizard_bulk_christmas_00_03: Oh, hello there shopkeeper. It seems that my wandering has brought me here.
texts.visit_wizard_bulk_christmas_00_04: A Christmas present? I suppose you could have this.
texts.thanks_wizard_00_01: Thank you. Now, to find my house...
texts.thanks_wizard_christmas_00_01: Perhaps I could contact this strange man. How do the children do it...?
texts.dialog_jeweler_greetings_02: Time is money, shopkeeper. Let's not waste it.
texts.dialog_jeweler_unhiredgreetings: What do we have here? This glitter in your eyes... A taste for luxury, style and all things expensive...
texts.dialog_jeweler_unhiredgreetings_02: For a person of your caliber, only the most expensive rings will do.
texts.dialog_jeweler_hirequestion: You will find my price more than fair.
texts.dialog_jeweler_investgold: All pieces accounted for, thank you.
texts.dialog_jeweler_investgold_02: I do love the glitter of gold.
texts.dialog_jeweler_investgems: You had my interest, now you have my attention.
texts.dialog_jeweler_investgems_02: You know how to sweet talk a jeweler.
texts.dialog_jeweler_investgems_03: Azure diamonds, round cut, 25 carats... Where did you find such beauties, shopkeeper?
texts.dialog_jeweler_underupgrade: I'm... improving security around here. Traps and such. All perfectly legal.
texts.dialog_jeweler_afterupgrade: We're open again. Don't touch anything expensive, it's probably trapped.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat: Don't bother accepting Theodore's invitation to play chess. He will destroy you, as he did everyone else here.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_02: Gemstones are particularly receptive to magical enchantments. Seems to me like magic has good taste.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_03: Not everyone can attune themselves to magical rings and amulets. It's rather taxing on the mind and body.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_04: That ninja girl... I'd better not catch her snooping around my inventory.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_05: I don't trust Durhan. All that unsupervised mining... I'm sure he keeps the best finds for himself.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_06: You have no idea what it's like living next to that... Engineer. Explosions, day and night!
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_07: Wealthy customers won't bother visiting a tiny shack. Expand your shop to sell those expensive items.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_08: King Reinhold himself might visit your shop, sometime. You couldn't ask for a better customer.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_09: That fairy girl settled... in my backyard. Goddess help me.
texts.dialog_jeweler_chat_10: Moonstones, huh? I certainly wish I could get my hands on some of those.
texts.dialog_jeweler_bounty_craft: I'm expecting an important market shift soon. This bounty is mutually beneficial.
texts.dialog_jeweler_bounty_slay: I'm expecting a jewel shipment soon. Ensure the roads are safe.
texts.dialog_jeweler_bounty_quest: My business could use a little scarcity around these components.
texts.dialog_jeweler_bounty_surcharge: Supply and demand are two sides of a very valuable coin.
texts.dialog_jeweler_bounty_discount: Discount is not part of my vocabulary. Consider it professional curiosity.
texts.visit_jeweler_quality_00_01: Shopkeeper, you need to see this. When I got my hands on THAT piece...
texts.visit_jeweler_quality_00_02: I simply knew you'd be interested. Am I right?
texts.visit_jeweler_quality_christmas_00_01: Tch. "Season of giving"... what a farce.
texts.visit_jeweler_quality_christmas_00_02: Still, you've been a reliable business partner so far.
texts.visit_jeweler_quality_christmas_00_03: I suppose you could have this... for free. But keep it between us.
texts.visit_jeweler_bulk_00_01: Glittering gold, trinkets, baubles... I got a handful of them that aren't selling.
texts.visit_jeweler_bulk_00_02: You're not a bad merchant. Perhaps you can succeed where I have failed?
texts.visit_jeweler_bulk_christmas_00_01: Tch. "Season of giving"... what a farce.
texts.visit_jeweler_bulk_christmas_00_02: Still, you've been a reliable business partner so far.
texts.visit_jeweler_bulk_christmas_00_03: I suppose you could have this... for free. But keep it between us.
texts.thanks_jeweler_00_01: It's a deal then. I'll be counting the coins.
texts.thanks_jeweler_christmas_00_01: I'll be expecting a thank you gift with my name on it.
texts.dialog_champions_greetings_02: Shopkeeper! Do you bring daring tales of mercantilism?
texts.dialog_champions_investgems: Wow! Thanks for believing in me!
texts.dialog_champions_underupgrade: 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 100 squats, 10km run! Heroes need to be in top shape!
texts.dialog_champions_afterupgrade: Whew, I think we learned some new tricks thanks to you, shopkeeper!
texts.dialog_champions_afterupgrade_02: We came up with some new training drills. The Training Hall is back in business!
texts.dialog_champions_chat: How's business? Have any glorious quests in need of Heroes?
texts.dialog_champions_chat_02: I volunteer to train aspiring Heroes here. There is much to learn by teaching!
texts.dialog_champions_chat_03: Fighters are the toughest Heroes around. They tend to draw enemy attacks away from others, too.
texts.dialog_champions_chat_04: Rogues don't look like much, but they're adept at dodging attacks and landing powerful critical hits.
texts.dialog_champions_chat_05: Spellcasters are frail, but no other Heroes can match their attack power.
texts.dialog_champions_chat_06: Heroes all have their own style, even within the same class. There's no guessing what skills they'll learn.
texts.dialog_champions_chat_07: Some Hero skills seem rarer than others... Those learned later in their career are better than usual, I bet.
texts.dialog_champions_chat_08: Try equipping your spellcasters with Spell items. It's the secret behind their offensive power!
texts.dialog_champions_chat_09: If a quest seems too difficult, try using boosters! Even Champions need a hand sometimes.
texts.dialog_champions_chat_10: The path to becoming a true hero is long and arduous, but I won't give up!
texts.dialog_champions_chat_11: A Living Roots crawled through the window the other day! It gave us quite a fright!
texts.dialog_champions_chat_12: Keep an eye out for Champion Coins! They might allow you to meet some new people!
texts.dialog_champions_chat_13: There's a rumor among the Heroes about a... Titan Soul. They say it can unlock the true potential within anyone!
texts.dialog_champions_bounty_craft: The Heroes could use a few of these!
texts.dialog_champions_bounty_slay: Some novice Heroes are ready for their first sortie. Can you guide them around?
texts.dialog_champions_bounty_quest: I'm ready for a quest! How about these components?
texts.dialog_champions_bounty_surcharge: You got this, shopkeeper! I believe in you!
texts.dialog_champions_bounty_discount: Heroes can use a little discount every now and then!
texts.dialog_townhall_greetings: Ah, young one. Stay awhile and listen.
texts.dialog_townhall_greetings_02: Eh? What was that? My hearing isn't getting any better...
texts.dialog_townhall_underupgrade: Ah, shopkeeper. The city is laying down foundations for new some shops!
texts.dialog_townhall_afterupgrade: We've expanded the shopping district. You can now invite new merchants to the city, if you'd like.
texts.dialog_townhall_afterupgrade_02: The Town Hall is buzzing with activity once again!
texts.dialog_townhall_chat: Heroes need to train some before they can use stronger equipment. Safety first!
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_02: To see you out and about, investing and making friends... You make this old man proud.
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_03: There's a mysterious ninja prowling around town... Is she a friend of yours?
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_04: How's your Guild doing? Make sure to invest in the city every now and then.
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_05: Your investments will follow you if you decide to join a new guild, so don't worry too much about it.
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_06: Have you been collecting those strange golden coins? Champions seem to like them.
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_07: Mighty Sorcerers won't deign to work with just anybody, but their attack power is legendary.
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_08: You've heard of Warlocks haven't you? They terrify even Sorcerers... But such power comes at a cost.
texts.dialog_townhall_chat_09: This city certainly seems more lively with our new Restaurant and Bakery!
texts.dialog_townhall_bounty_craft: Care to listen to an old man's request?
texts.dialog_townhall_bounty_slay: These monsters are giving honest townsfolk a hard time. Can you take care of it?
texts.dialog_townhall_bounty_quest: Oh my, how did this get here? I am no good with technology....
texts.dialog_townhall_bounty_surcharge: Such is the art of mercantilism...
texts.dialog_townhall_bounty_discount: Back in my days, a Squire Sword cost a mere 1 gold!
texts.churn_00_02: Since you've been working so hard lately, the townsfolk pitched together to buy you a gift.
texts.churn_00_03: Don't be shy now, open it!
texts.dialog_tavern_greetings: Your favorite seat's right over there, hun.
texts.dialog_tavern_greetings_02: So what's the word on the street?
texts.dialog_tavern_greetings_03: What can I get you, shopkeeper?
texts.dialog_tavern_greetings_05: Your favorite stew's on the menu today!
texts.dialog_tavern_greetings_06: Ah, shopkeeper! I'll be with you in a second!
texts.dialog_tavern_greetings_07: One Mushgoon soup, coming right up!
texts.dialog_tavern_investgems_02: I expected no less from you.
texts.dialog_tavern_underupgrade: We're remodeling, so the inside is a bit of a mess right now.
texts.dialog_tavern_underupgrade_02: We're serving outside today, the tavern is undergoing some repairs.
texts.dialog_tavern_afterupgrade: Come on in, we've got a new menu!
texts.dialog_tavern_chat: I heard upgrading your racks gives you more energy. Is that true?
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_02: The Yetis of the Aurora Caves are kind of cute aren't they?
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_03: Gorza used to be a mighty warrior, you know? She wouldn't admit it, but I think she prefers her peaceful woodcutter life.
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_04: The Aurora Caves are a popular dating spot around these parts. They look absolutely stunning at night!
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_05: With proper funding, I can organize expeditions to chart the dungeons. It should make your quests more efficient!
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_06: Things can get pretty rowdy when Gorza drinks here. Thankfully her brother is much more down to earth.
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_07: You can send an incomplete party on a quest if you want. They'll take longer, though.
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_08: Have you met my sister Maya? She's in charge of the Fortune Zone.
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_09: Those Monks are a weird bunch, aren't they? No weapons, no armor, all punching!
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_10: You won't believe this but... I saw a Grandmaster the other day! I can't imagine what trials a Monk has to go through...
texts.dialog_tavern_chat_11: I dont know how Yolanda does it, but she manages to raise monsters while keeping up with her knitting.
texts.dialog_tavern_bounty_craft: I overheard an interesting bit of info at the tavern. You should capitalize on it!
texts.dialog_tavern_bounty_slay: There's a few uglies out there that are better gone than about, don't you agree?
texts.dialog_tavern_bounty_quest: I just got a tip about an especially bountiful area in this region...
texts.dialog_tavern_bounty_surcharge: A wink and a smile is all it takes.
texts.visit_tavern_00_01: Hi! Surprised to see me? Took a short break to pay you a visit.
texts.visit_tavern_00_02: But most importantly, I got a little something for you...
texts.visit_tavern_01_01: Hi, hun. Did you miss me?
texts.visit_tavern_01_02: Got you something special today. Tipsy patrons leave the weirdest tips, don't they?
texts.visit_tavern_christmas_00_01: I do love the holiday season! The snow, the decorations...
texts.visit_tavern_christmas_00_02: ...And a tavern bustling with patrons eager to tip, of course!
texts.visit_tavern_christmas_00_03: I suppose you could have some. It is Christmas after all!
texts.thanks_tavern_01_01: Best if we didn't let anyone hear about this transaction. It'll be our little secret!
texts.thanks_tavern_christmas_00_01: Happy Holidays, and happy New Year!
texts.dialog_inn_greetings: Business has been peaking lately with all those Heroes about.
texts.dialog_inn_investgold: The Emerald Inn appreciates your patronage!
texts.dialog_inn_investgold_02: You leave the best tips, shopkeeper. Hah hah hah!
texts.dialog_inn_investgold_03: *Mwah* Perfect! Just like my family recipe!
texts.dialog_inn_investgems: Hah hah hah! Haven't seen one of those in ages!
texts.dialog_inn_investgems_02: Ahhh... reminds me of my old adventuring days!
texts.dialog_inn_underupgrade: Better consult Sia about the wallpapers this time...
texts.dialog_inn_underupgrade_02: Mark my words, the King himself will want to stay here once we're done!
texts.dialog_inn_afterupgrade: Inn's open for business again. Perhaps next time we can afford a Jacuzzi! Hah hah!
texts.dialog_inn_afterupgrade_02: New rooms, new beds. Welcome to the new Emerald Inn!
texts.dialog_inn_chat: Whichever Yeti finds the biggest icicle becomes their leader. An odd bunch to be sure!
texts.dialog_inn_chat_02: That mysterious floating island... No one has ever been there, as far as I can tell.
texts.dialog_inn_chat_03: There's been a shadowy figure staying at my inn lately. Didn't quite catch her name though.
texts.dialog_inn_chat_04: The key to attracting customers is having a big shop! And displaying tons of items on racks!
texts.dialog_inn_chat_05: Those Champions are in a league of their own. They don't even need equipment!
texts.dialog_inn_chat_06: I can hear Ismael singing while he works, right across the street. He's not half bad.
texts.dialog_inn_chat_07: I used to be a Barbarian back in the days, you know? I'd wager I still have my old axe stored somewhere...
texts.dialog_inn_chat_08: That fairy Maylee has an impressive coin collection. Like a carefully organized dragon's hoard!
texts.dialog_inn_chat_09: Chronos Ruins? Heard from my nana that it used to be the capital of a great empire... then poof! Vanished overnight!
texts.dialog_inn_chat_10: Everyone's been in uproar about a Lost City of Gold lately. Have you ever heard of it?
texts.dialog_inn_chat_11: Tutu Mano's restaurant offers fierce competition! I hope you'll give our inn a chance!
texts.dialog_inn_bounty_craft: I loved these back during my adventuring days. How about crafting a few for old times' sake?
texts.dialog_inn_bounty_slay: I put a big bet that you could handle it. Don't back out on me!
texts.dialog_inn_bounty_quest: The Inn is a bit packed with Heroes at the moment. Can you do me a favor and organize a few expeditions?
texts.dialog_inn_bounty_surcharge: I have a few patrons with more coin than sense. How about I send them your way?
texts.dialog_inn_bounty_discount: You offer my patrons a discount, and I send them your way! How's that deal sound?
texts.visit_inn_00_01: Shopkeeper, old pal! I found some of my old adventuring supplies.
texts.visit_inn_00_02: It's no use to me now, though. How about a gift for your Heroes?
texts.visit_inn_christmas_00_01: Ah, finally some peace and quiet!
texts.visit_inn_christmas_00_02: It's pretty busy down at the Emerald Inn during the holidays, let me tell you!
texts.visit_inn_christmas_00_03: Figured I'd come over for a little breather and a chat, if you don't mind.
texts.visit_inn_christmas_00_04: Oh, and you can have this, too.
texts.thanks_inn_00_01: Pleasure doing business with you, as always.
texts.thanks_inn_01_01: Thanks. Come over to the Emerald Inn again, sometime. Our doors are always open for you!
texts.thanks_inn_02_01: Thanks! I'll be heading back to the Inn now. See you there!
texts.thanks_inn_christmas_00_01: I'll be heading back now. Merry Christmas!
texts.dialog_mana_greetings: The Merchant arrives... as foretold by prophecy.
texts.dialog_mana_greetings_02: The Merchant's presence is a welcome omen.
texts.dialog_mana_investgold: ...Welcome the open hand, and pay back in turn.
texts.dialog_mana_underupgrade: ...The leylines are currently being channeled. Please return later.
texts.dialog_mana_underupgrade_02: I foresee... an improved Ether Well in the near future...
texts.dialog_mana_afterupgrade: The flow of Ether has returned. Use it well.
texts.dialog_mana_afterupgrade_02: Ether now flows unimpeded towards the Merchant's abode.
texts.dialog_mana_chat: To see beyond the veil... is a boon and curse both.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_02: The Enchanter... Powerful magic surrounds him, yet not entirely his own.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_03: He Who Digs tempts fate with every strike of the pickaxe... The leylines below must not be tampered with.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_04: Fate has much in store for the Young Knight. His resolve will be tested.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_05: She Who Stalks... When one is driven by revenge, care must be taken to not lose oneself.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_06: ...The Ether Well is not open to tourists.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_07: Turn to the sky and ask the stars for guidance... else shift your gaze inward and seek wisdom within.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_08: I am but a herald for fate's will... A beacon amidst the tumultuous torrent of what may.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_09: Let not the prophecies cloud your mind. Fate's hand will see you to your destination.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_10: An empire toying with the threads of time itself... Pride to ashes, hubris to ruins.
texts.dialog_mana_chat_11: The Lost City of Gold... An ephemeral paradox at the twilight of worlds.
texts.dialog_mana_bounty_craft: Abundant wealth awaits... should the Merchant grasp this opportunity.
texts.dialog_mana_bounty_slay: A tyrant's fall is foretold. With fate at your side, proceed with caution still.
texts.dialog_mana_bounty_quest: Troves of natural wonders lie yonder, awaiting one with brave heart and deft hands.
texts.dialog_mana_bounty_surcharge: Untold potential rests within the mundane, aptly appraised by the trained eye.
texts.dialog_mana_bounty_discount: Fate shall see the open hand rewarded in due time.
texts.visit_mana_christmas_00_01: The spirit of giving looms ever nearer, warming the hearts of men and elves alike.
texts.visit_mana_christmas_00_02: I am thus compelled, if the Merchant allows.
texts.visit_mana_00_01: Fate has led me here, to a Merchant in need...
texts.visit_mana_01_01: The Ether stirs, seeking shelter among your bins. Do you accept?
texts.thanks_mana_christmas_00_01: I foresee the year's turn, bearing wealth and opportunity for the Merchant.
texts.thanks_mana_00_01: The threads of fate remain whole.
texts.thanks_mana_01_01: The future remains uncertain, but we shall meet again... This I know.
texts.dialog_gems_greetings: It's the trader! Hi!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.dialog_gems_investgold_02: Wow! So many coins!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_investgems: Gems are my favorite!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1> How did you know?
texts.dialog_gems_underupgrade: Busy busy busy! Come back later!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_afterupgrade: I've got so many jewels now!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1> Here, have some!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_chat: "Yo, what's up"!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>Tamas taught me this human greeting!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_chat_02: Humans have such fascinating settlements! Bustling with activity!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.dialog_gems_chat_03: Humans always greet each other and ask how they are doing, yet always answer the same thing... Why?
texts.dialog_gems_chat_04: Is that the sea? It goes on forever!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_chat_05: Using shiny coins to trade for objects... Does everyone in the city play this game?<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_chat_06: There's a silly guy prancing about with a golden crown!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>Isn't he funny?<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_chat_07: I saw humans wearing iron clothes! How do they do it!?
texts.dialog_gems_chat_08: Do humans also celebrate Trick Tuesday...? What about Fun Friday?
texts.dialog_gems_chat_09: Isn't it tiring, walking around everywhere?<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_chat_10: Playing king sounds fun! When is it my turn?<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.dialog_gems_bounty_craft: Wow!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1> I've always wanted to see one of these up close!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.dialog_gems_bounty_quest: My fairy senses are tingling! There are some resources hidden nearby!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.dialog_gems_bounty_surcharge: Is this how you get human currency?<sprite tint=1 name=Note2> You make it look easy!
texts.dialog_gems_bounty_discount: Playing merchant sounds fun! Teach me all about it!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.visit_gems_00_01: Hello hello!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2> I brought you some jewels!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.visit_gems_00_02: ...But Katarina told me to always trade them for coins. Do you have any?<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.visit_gems_01_01: Human trader! I heard Juniper brings you regular herb deliveries...
texts.visit_gems_01_02: Me too!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1> Buy my jewels!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.visit_gems_christmas_00_01: Hi shopkeeper! Happy birthday!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.visit_gems_christmas_00_02: What, Christmas? It's a party, right? What's the difference?
texts.visit_gems_christmas_00_03: I thought so! Here's your birthday present!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.thanks_gems_00_01: Thanks! Trading is fun!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.thanks_gems_01_01: You had all these coins!? You should share more often!<sprite tint=1 name=Note2>
texts.thanks_gems_christmas_00_01: Woohoo! I can't wait for my birthday!<sprite tint=1 name=Note1>
texts.trial_engineer_01: Shopkeeper! I've been looking for you!
texts.trial_engineer_02: I'm feeling generous today, so I'm offering my services for free for a time.
texts.trial_engineer_03: In other words, you can craft <c1>Guns</c1> and <c1>Crossbows</c1>!
texts.trial_engineer_04: I'll even tinker with your items, so you'll benefit from a <c1>significant Break Chance reduction</c1> too.
texts.trial_engineer_05: No need to thank me, I do it all in the name of science!
texts.dialog_engineer_unhiredgreetings_02: The power of <c1>Guns</c1> and <c1>Crossbows</c1> is within your reach!
texts.dialog_engineer_unhiredgreetings_03: And you can't forget my tinkering, making those items <c1>break less</c1>!
texts.dialog_engineer_hirequestion: You can't say no to science!
texts.dialog_engineer_underupgrade: I'm tinkering around the lab right now. Don't touch anything funny-looking.
texts.dialog_engineer_afterupgrade: Lab's back in order. Fireproof, this time.
texts.dialog_engineer_chat: ...One pinch of sulfur and... Kaboom! Works every time.
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_02: You here to file a noise complaint?
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_03: The only difference between messing around and doing science is writing it down.
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_04: So how's my tinkering? Whenever an item doesn't break, it's probably thanks to me!
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_05: "Kaboom" or "Kabam"? I'm more of a "Kabam" girl, myself.
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_06: The Academy, huh? Bunch of nerds! You learn by doing, not reading!
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_07: A gun... that fires guns...? Genius!
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_08: My guns are 35% safe! You won't find better odds anywhere else!
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_09: Got too much ammo lying around? Try out the Prototype Gatling!
texts.dialog_engineer_chat_10: A flying island? 10 billion percent scientifically impossible. Trust me, I tried.
texts.dialog_engineer_bounty_craft: I've thought of potential improvements for this blueprint. Can you try it out?
texts.dialog_engineer_bounty_slay: It's high time for some field testing! I know a great spot with plenty of live targets...
texts.dialog_engineer_bounty_quest: It's high time for some field testing! I know a great spot with plenty of live targets...
texts.dialog_engineer_bounty_surcharge: Go right ahead, shopkeeper. I'll be taking notes.
texts.dialog_engineer_bounty_discount: Don't discount any guns though, my babies are worth full price!
texts.visit_engineer_quality_00_01: Feast your eyes on THIS weapon, shopkeeper! Brimming with potential!
texts.visit_engineer_quality_00_02: I'd say it's ready for some field testing, don't you think?
texts.visit_engineer_bulk_00_01: Hey, I got a bunch of prototypes cluttering up my lab. You want them?
texts.visit_engineer_bulk_christmas_00_02: What, holidays? Science doesn't take days off.
texts.visit_engineer_bulk_christmas_00_03: Argh fine, you can have it for free!
texts.visit_engineer_quality_christmas_00_02: What, holidays? Science doesn't take days off.
texts.visit_engineer_quality_christmas_00_03: Argh fine, you can have it for free!
texts.thanks_engineer_00_01: Well then, back to the drawing board!
texts.thanks_engineer_christmas_00_01: Happy holidays and all that. Back to the lab!
texts.trial_academy_01: Good day, shopkeeper! I have good news!
texts.trial_academy_02: The Academy is offering free services to shopkeepers for a limited time...
texts.trial_academy_03: That means you'll be able to craft <c1>Wands</c1>, and even <c1>Runestones</c1>!
texts.trial_academy_04: You will also benefit from my <c1>multicraft chance with all enchantments</c1>! Isn't it great?
texts.trial_academy_05: I'm looking forward to working together!
texts.dialog_academy_greetings: Yes? Please raise your hand before speaking.
texts.dialog_academy_greetings_02: Please take a seat, the bell has already rung.
texts.dialog_academy_unhiredgreetings_02: With my advanced lessons, you will benefit from <c1>bonus experience</c1>.
texts.dialog_academy_unhiredgreetings_03: And, you could craft <c1>powerful Wands</c1>, or <c1>Runestones</c1> for enchantments!
texts.dialog_academy_unhiredgreetings_04: Are you ready to take enchanting to the next level?
texts.dialog_academy_investgold: Don't count on this to raise your marks!
texts.dialog_academy_investgold_02: Oh! Let me get my abacus!
texts.dialog_academy_investgold_03: An investment in education is an investment in the future!
texts.dialog_academy_underupgrade: Class is already in session. Please return later!
texts.dialog_academy_afterupgrade: School break is over! Did you enjoy your vacation?
texts.dialog_academy_chat: My hair doesn't look like Elvenwood... does it?
texts.dialog_academy_chat_02: I teach many courses here at the Academy. Conjuration, runecrafting... even poetry!
texts.dialog_academy_chat_03: This Lilu... She attends every single class without fail. Even extracurriculars!
texts.dialog_academy_chat_04: Have you ever considered teaching economics at the academy? You seem to be an expert on the subject.
texts.dialog_academy_chat_05: Wands can be a capricious lot. They won't work for a wizard they don't like!
texts.dialog_academy_chat_06: As braggart as he may be, Allan's grades certainly aren't anything to write home about.
texts.dialog_academy_chat_07: Grimar's lessons are something else! Though he can be a bit unreliable, at times...
texts.dialog_academy_chat_08: I'm working on a few theses at the moment. My 12th PhD is right around the corner!
texts.dialog_academy_chat_09: I wrote a book about curses, the "Miscreant's Manual to Maledictions". Perhaps you've heard of it?
texts.dialog_academy_chat_10: The Academy offers a joint tuition program with the Training Hall. Heroes need to be smart, too!
texts.dialog_academy_chat_11: Enchanting items is sure to make them more valuable. Much stronger, too!
texts.dialog_academy_chat_12: Fairies never venture outside of their forests... Why did Maylee leave hers?
texts.dialog_academy_chat_13: Grandma Yolanda, was it? She must be very powerful to create life with magic.
texts.dialog_academy_bounty_craft: Here is today's exam. It should be no problem if you studied the course.
texts.dialog_academy_bounty_slay: I'm organizing a few field trips with my class. Could I ask for an escort?
texts.dialog_academy_bounty_quest: This is something I absolutely must study in its natural habitat!
texts.dialog_academy_bounty_surcharge: I'm looking for an expert in customer interactions for the sake of peer reviewing.
texts.dialog_academy_bounty_discount: I've got an interesting microeconomics theory I'd like put to the test...
texts.visit_academy_00_01: Good day, shopkeeper. I've come to collect your overdue homework...
texts.visit_academy_00_02: Just kidding! Here, I have a few items for you!
texts.visit_academy_01_01: Shopkeeper, I'm just done studying this outstanding item.
texts.visit_academy_01_02: The Academy has no use for it anymore, would you like to buy it?
texts.visit_academy_christmas_00_01: Happy holidays, shopkeeper! Are you enjoying your school break?
texts.visit_academy_christmas_00_02: I brought gifts for my favorite students. Here's yours!
texts.thanks_academy_00_01: Thanks! And don't forget to do your homework!
texts.thanks_academy_01_01: Thank you, on behalf of the Academy.
texts.thanks_academy_christmas_00_01: It's flu season, so remember to wash your hands regularly!
texts.dialog_sundragon_greetings: My dragon senses are tingling... Is that gold coins I hear?
texts.dialog_sundragon_greetings_02: The Sol Tower welcomes any child of man.
texts.dialog_sundragon_greetings_04: Speak. The Sun Dragon is listening.
texts.dialog_sundragon_investgold: Gold coins, is it? That will do!
texts.dialog_sundragon_investgems_02: I'm on a very strict diet, but thank you!
texts.dialog_sundragon_underupgrade: My apologies, the Sol Tower is currently gathering sunlight.
texts.dialog_sundragon_afterupgrade: The Sol Tower has undergone some changes, as all things should.
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat: Sunbathing is simply the best, isn't it?
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_02: I feel great Feng shui emanating from the town square. Could it be your shop?
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_03: I must commend Julia for these fine clothes. Dragon physiology isn't easy to tailor for.
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_05: Gold this, money that... Human life would be easier if you just slept on your hoard instead of spending it!
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_06: Mundra barely understands fusion to begin with, but her wild experimentation has led to some stunning discoveries.
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_07: Mundra's blessing is as powerful as the full moon itself. It's not easy, but you should try getting on her good side.
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_08: I'm not certain where Mundra's distaste for bosses came from, but it's strong enough to seep into the equipment she crafts!
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_09: Though she doesn't act like it, Mundra is the eldest sibling. Only by a few thousand years, though.
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_10: How do you like the Synthesis Vessel? There aren't too many like it in the world.
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_11: A magical book that records information based on the items it receives... It sounds nice, doesn't it?
texts.dialog_sundragon_chat_12: Red dragons and their ilk are savage beasts driven by greed. The prosperity of this city may catch their attention...
texts.dialog_sundragon_bounty_craft: I could use some fine items for the Synthesis Vessel...
texts.dialog_sundragon_bounty_slay: A great unbalance plagues this ecosystem...
texts.dialog_sundragon_bounty_quest: Child of man, your greatest trial awaits.
texts.visit_sundragon_bulk_00_01: Greetings, child of man. What do you think of this assortment of items?
texts.visit_sundragon_bulk_00_02: I believe they hold great Fusion potential!
texts.visit_sundragon_bulk_christmas_00_02: Nevertheless, I wished to bring you these! And a merry... what was it again?
texts.thanks_sundragon_christmas_00_01: Ah, Christmas! I am not yet used to these human customs...
texts.dialog_moondragon_greetings: Who dares rouse me from my slumber?
texts.dialog_moondragon_greetings_04: You walk into my domain. Mind your step.
texts.dialog_moondragon_investgems: Into the hoard it goes. Might have a taste later.
texts.dialog_moondragon_investgems_02: These certainly have a nice shine to them.
texts.dialog_moondragon_underupgrade: The Luna Tower is gathering lunar energy right now. No visitors allowed.
texts.dialog_moondragon_afterupgrade: Wipe your feet, I just cleaned up around here.
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat: Have you considered bothering my dumb brother instead?
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat_02: Moonstruck by my presence, are you? I get that a lot.
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat_03: The night belongs to the moon dragons. Remember that.
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat_04: Your scales are looking a bit drab. Have you tried eating gems?
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat_05: The moon offers power you can only dream of. Just... don't ask me about basic fusion.
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat_06: Sondra is always stuck in his old ways. True progress is made by trying, and SOMETIMES writing it down.
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat_08: I model my crafts around the most beautiful things in the world. My claws will touch nothing less.
texts.dialog_moondragon_chat_09: I have nothing in common with those giant, flying lizard-brains you call dragons. Us astral dragons are so much more.
texts.dialog_moondragon_bounty_slay: I don't like these guys. Teach them a lesson.
texts.dialog_moondragon_bounty_quest: Give the dungeon boss a good beating while you're there.
texts.dialog_moondragon_bounty_surcharge: I call this one the Mundra tax.
texts.dialog_moondragon_bounty_discount: This is more of Sondra's style.
texts.visit_moondragon_00_02: I've some extra items right here. I'm expecting tribute in exchange.
texts.visit_moondragon_christmas_00_02: I've some extra items right- huh? Holy night?
texts.visit_moondragon_christmas_00_03: I like the sound of that. You can have these for free!
texts.dialog_elven_greetings_02: Close the door behind you. The little ones might sneak out.
texts.dialog_elven_greetings_03: Come on in, shopkeeper. Are you eating well?
texts.dialog_elven_underupgrade: Ah, I'm sorry. I have my hands full with all these Familiars running about at the moment.
texts.dialog_elven_afterupgrade: Welcome back! The Familiars have a much bigger playground now.
texts.dialog_elven_chat: Are you taking good care of my babies?
texts.dialog_elven_chat_03: Monster is such a pejorative term. They're creatures, just like us.
texts.dialog_elven_chat_04: Donovan is such a petulant child. He should enjoy life, for a change.
texts.dialog_elven_chat_05: This place can be a bit noisy at times. Familiars can be quite energetic.
texts.dialog_elven_chat_06: Heroes are only allowed Familiars for home ownership. I only trust Champions to see them safely through quests.
texts.dialog_elven_chat_07: Familiar eggs will only hatch when handled by someone they can trust. Their instinct is quite something.
texts.dialog_elven_chat_08: Troublins are such little troublemakers. Never take your eyes off them.
texts.dialog_elven_chat_09: I don't play favorites with my Familiars. Except the Yeti.
texts.dialog_elven_bounty_craft: Grandma Yolanda has a request for you.
texts.dialog_elven_bounty_slay: The big ones aren't cute. You know what that means.
texts.dialog_elven_bounty_quest: Grandma Yolanda has a request for you.
texts.dialog_elven_bounty_discount: Grandma Yolanda has a request for you.
texts.visit_elven_quality_00_01: This one came out quite nicely. I'm sure you will make good use of it.
texts.visit_elven_quality_christmas_00_01: Happy holidays, shopkeeper. Have a little something from a doting Grandma!
texts.visit_elven_bulk_00_01: I'm afraid I have too much on my hands currently. Can you take these?
texts.visit_elven_bulk_christmas_00_01: Happy holidays, shopkeeper. Have a little something from a doting Grandma!
texts.thanks_elven_00_01: I trust you'll take good care of them.
texts.dialog_essence_investgold: Counting all this... will take forever. I'll trust you.
texts.dialog_essence_investgold_02: Oh... that's a lot of money.
texts.dialog_essence_investgems: These will look great... on my grave...
texts.dialog_essence_underupgrade: It may not look like it... but I'm very busy. Please... come back later.
texts.dialog_essence_afterupgrade: A breath of fresh air... for the Mausoleum. I forgot what that felt like.
texts.dialog_essence_chat_02: I forgot what my previous life... was like.
texts.dialog_essence_chat_03: I dont remember ever seeing... a young Owen...
texts.dialog_essence_chat_04: Sometimes I take a stroll... and peek into people's houses.
texts.dialog_essence_chat_05: What's the point... of doors? Why not... float through walls?
texts.dialog_essence_chat_06: I overslept... and missed the trip to the afterlife. I hope... you don't mind me hanging around.
texts.dialog_essence_chat_07: That necromancer lady... keeps staring at me. Gives me the creeps...
texts.dialog_essence_chat_08: Ghost stories... are pretty scary. Please be careful.
texts.dialog_essence_chat_09: That gentleman... Donovan. He tried to kiss my hand, but...
texts.dialog_essence_chat_10: Can you believe... ghosts have to pay rent?
texts.dialog_essence_bounty_craft: It's a shame... I won't be able to use it...
texts.dialog_essence_bounty_surcharge: Don't overdo it... or I'll haunt you...
texts.dialog_essence_bounty_discount: It's ok to sleep... on the job.
texts.visit_essence_00_01: ...Huh? I fell asleep... and the winds pushed me here.
texts.visit_essence_christmas_00_01: I'm the ghost... of Christmas past.
texts.visit_essence_christmas_00_02: Ah... I'm practicing... the play for the Christmas party.
texts.visit_essence_christmas_00_03: I dont know why... I got that role.
texts.thanks_essence_00_01: Thanks... I hope the wind picks up...
texts.thanks_essence_01_01: Thanks... I'll go haunt... some other place.
texts.dialog_cook_greetings_02: Make self at home. Dinner will be served soon.
texts.dialog_cook_unhiredgreetings: I am Tutu Mano, owner of restaurant. Best in town, and overseas!
texts.dialog_cook_unhiredgreetings_02: With special deal, I can make meals for you.
texts.dialog_cook_hirequestion: You would like food delivered to shop?
texts.dialog_cook_underupgrade: Kitchen is closed for now. Please accept apologies.
texts.dialog_cook_afterupgrade: Kitchen renovated. Knives are sharp. Watch table manners.
texts.dialog_cook_chat: Sailed with Kaipo from very far away. This is a good town.
texts.dialog_cook_chat_02: Kaipo is my grandson. Very skilled. Learned from the best!
texts.dialog_cook_chat_03: Sunken Temple is dangerous place, but very, very good ingredients.
texts.dialog_cook_chat_04: Polonia is strange girl. Not smart, but excellent sailor.
texts.dialog_cook_chat_05: How is Super Spicy Curry? I have different recipe for weaklings, also.
texts.dialog_cook_chat_06: Rudo visits today? Must order extra ingredients...
texts.dialog_cook_chat_07: You have complaint? I will hear. But knife is sharp.
texts.dialog_cook_chat_08: Elder Owen is skin and bones. No good for his age.
texts.dialog_cook_bounty_slay: Intruder in dungeon or kitchen, there is little difference.
texts.dialog_cook_bounty_surcharge: Know value of goods. It is duty of shopkeeper.
texts.visit_cook_quality_00_01: This is special meal, made with extra love.
texts.visit_cook_bulk_00_01: You are hungry, child? I bring food. Lots of food.
texts.visit_cook_quality_christmas_00_01: This is special holiday meal for you. Lots of love in it.
texts.visit_cook_bulk_christmas_00_01: I am grandmother, you are child. It is tradition to bring food for Holidays.
texts.visit_cook_bulk_christmas_00_02: Share with customers, if you are kind shopkeeper.
texts.thanks_cook_christmas_00_01: Holidays are a good time for eating. I will return.
texts.dialog_baker_greetings_02: I've got some fresh muffins coming out of the oven soon!
texts.dialog_baker_greetings_03: Hello! Bet this delicious Halo-Halo lured you in!
texts.dialog_baker_unhiredgreetings_02: My offer still stands! We could fill those shelves with <c1>Tasty Treats</c1> no customer could resist!
texts.dialog_baker_unhiredgreetings_03: I'd wager that <c1>fancy King</c1> would <c1>buy more items</c1>, too!
texts.dialog_baker_hirequestion: How's that for a sweet partnership?
texts.dialog_baker_investgold_03: The future is dessert. You, {brother}, agree!
texts.dialog_baker_underupgrade: Sorry, {brother}! The Bonbon Bakery is closed for today!
texts.dialog_baker_afterupgrade: My ovens are fired up! The Bakery is back in business!
texts.dialog_baker_chat: My grandfather is a Merman. Could you tell?
texts.dialog_baker_chat_02: Tutu Mano is my grandma! She looks a bit scary, but don't let it get to you.
texts.dialog_baker_chat_03: Grandma's still learning the local language, so please be patient with her!
texts.dialog_baker_chat_04: This town sure is lively! My hometown feels very relaxed compared to this!
texts.dialog_baker_chat_05: Macarons, cakes, pies, cookies... There's never a dull moment with desserts.
texts.dialog_baker_chat_06: Desserts are good and all, but a good diet is important, too.
texts.dialog_baker_chat_07: Seeing Maylee devour all those desserts, you'd think fairies are powered by sugar...
texts.dialog_baker_chat_08: Sister Freyja is a regular customer of mine. She's stealthy about it, though!
texts.dialog_baker_bounty_craft: I can think of no better shopkeeper to ask, {brother}.
texts.dialog_baker_bounty_slay: Ready to get your hands dirty?
texts.dialog_baker_bounty_quest: I've got just the quest for you!
texts.dialog_baker_bounty_surcharge: A little cream on top never hurts!
texts.visit_baker_quality_00_01: I got something special today. I definitely outdid myself on this one!
texts.visit_baker_bulk_00_01: Aloha, {brother}! May I interest you in a delicious treat?
texts.visit_baker_quality_christmas_00_01: A-ack! It's cold out there! Whew!
texts.visit_baker_quality_christmas_00_02: Mind if I warm up here for a bit? Here's something in exchange!
texts.visit_baker_bulk_christmas_00_02: What's a holiday without a mountain of treats to celebrate?
texts.thanks_baker_00_01: I knew you would appreciate it, {brother}.
texts.visit_elder_00_01: Ah, shopkeeper. Stay a while, and listen.
texts.visit_elder_01_01: Good day, shopkeeper. Would you care to listen to an old man's story?
texts.visit_elder_02_01: It is a beautiful day, isn't it? How fares business today?
texts.thanks_elder_00_01: Oh my, how time flies! I must be going. Thank you for humoring this old man.
texts.thanks_elder_01_01: And that's how Gorza made it to- Oh! It seems I've lost track of time.
texts.thanks_elder_01_02: That was a nice little chat. See you soon, I hope.
texts.gift_00_01: Would you look at that! A nice little gift... but your name's not on it!
texts.gift_00_02: Which of your guildmates should receive it? It's OK to play favorites!
texts.gift_01_01: I have a lonely gift here, seeking a recipient...
texts.gift_01_02: You can't open it yourself though. You'll need to send it to a guildmate!
texts.gift_02_01: There's nothing quite like the act of giving, is there?
texts.gift_02_02: A spark of joy from a simple act of kindness... What goes around comes around!
texts.gift_02_03: ...Though Katarina generally disagrees with that last point.
texts.gift_03_01: You seem to be one with many friends, shopkeeper!
texts.gift_03_02: How about sending over a gift to foster that friendship further?
texts.dialog_king_bounty_craft: My kingdom absolutely needs more of these wonderful items!
texts.dialog_king_bounty_upgrade: I shall grace your shop with my presence shortly. Ensure my exceptional standards are met!
texts.dialog_king_bounty_rushitem: Waiting around is for plebeians! Your King demands immediate action!
texts.dialog_king_bounty_rushupgrade: It is a delight to witness cooperation among my subjects!
texts.dialog_king_bounty_chest: Untold riches within arm's reach! What are you waiting for?
texts.visit_king_00_01: Ah...! It is refreshing to walk amongst the common folks, sometimes.
texts.visit_king_00_02: I shall buy this as a souvenir. Name a price, you shall have it.
texts.visit_king_01_01: Shopkeeper, I simply MUST have this item. At any cost!
texts.visit_king_02_02: I shall grace it with a purchase. Keep the change.
texts.visit_king_03_01: I, glorious king of these lands, am a renowned trendsetter!
texts.visit_king_03_02: I thus proclaim this item worthy of my attention... and my money!
texts.visit_king_04_01: The fine craftsmanship of this item has caught my eye!
texts.visit_king_04_02: Sell it to me, and I shall have my men shower you with gold.
texts.visit_king_05_01: I've found something absolutely stunning! An equal match for my splendor!
texts.visit_king_05_02: I can't be bothered counting my gold. Take whatever you wish!
texts.visit_king_06_01: My spies have informed me of the existence of an exceptional item... in this very shop!
texts.visit_king_06_02: Such a powerful item must not fall in hands of common folks. I must have it!
texts.visit_king_07_01: Noble shopkeeper, you are one of my most loyal servants, are you not?
texts.visit_king_07_02: ...Then please don't tell Sia about this purchase. What is the price of your silence?
texts.visit_king_08_01: Sia has been teaching me about "budgeting" lately. A truly fascinating concept!
texts.visit_king_08_02: I believe this would match my "budget"... How much was it again?
texts.visit_king_ah_00_01: This is a remarkable piece! I shall have my servants carry it back!
texts.visit_king_al_00_01: These delicate clothes are fit for a king! As luck would have it, I happen to be king!
texts.visit_king_am_00_01: These are certified Julia quality, I can tell at a glance! I shall take them all!
texts.visit_king_bh_00_01: These plated boots intrigue me. A bag is unnecessary, I shall wear them home!
texts.visit_king_bl_00_01: What supple leather! I will take them to a loving home!
texts.visit_king_gh_00_01: My interest is piqued! Wrap these up for me, right this instant!
texts.visit_king_gl_00_01: I cannot afford to dawdle! Wrap up these lavish mittens as soon as possible!
texts.visit_king_hh_00_01: Wallace has truly outdone himself! I simply must have these helmets!
texts.visit_king_hl_00_01: These hats befit my status as glorious king. It is only natural that I must acquire them.
texts.visit_king_hm_00_01: Hats are ever in vogue. No expense is too great!
texts.visit_king_uh_00_01: What fragrance! These herbs are doubtless grown from exceptional stock!
texts.visit_king_up_00_01: My mind is set! I shall take your entire stock of potions!
texts.visit_king_us_00_01: These scrolls no doubt hold lore valuable beyond compare! The royal library must have them!
texts.visit_king_wa_00_01: This is the last thing on my royal grocery list! A handful of axes!
texts.visit_king_wb_00_01: Valiant shopkeeper, I must request your most expensive bows. Do not let me down!
texts.visit_king_wc_00_01: I shall take these crossbows. Send the bill over to the castle's treasury!
texts.visit_king_wd_00_01: Sia is well overdue for a sumptuous gift! Though I must admit her tastes are unusual...
texts.visit_king_wg_00_02: ...How would you rate this weapon's effectiveness against ninjas?
texts.visit_king_wm_00_02: Strange as these maces may be, I'll take them to go!
texts.visit_king_wp_00_01: The rabble I call guards could use some shinier sticks!
texts.visit_king_ws_00_01: These are no doubt swords of legend, fitting for a king such as I!
texts.visit_king_wt_00_01: I must have these staves! I care not about the price!
texts.visit_king_ww_00_01: Wonderful craftsmanship on these wands! I shall make them mine!
texts.visit_king_ww_00_02: ...Wand license? Whatever are you talking about?
texts.visit_king_xa_00_01: These magical amulets resonate with my kingly spirit! I shall take them!
texts.visit_king_xc_00_01: I wish to drape myself in the finest silks. What have you for me, fine shopkeeper?
texts.visit_king_xf_00_01: What wonderful creatures! I hereby invite you all to tour my castle!
texts.visit_king_xr_00_01: These appear worthy of adorning my fingers. A great honor, it goes without saying!
texts.visit_king_xs_00_01: These shields are brimming with valor! Gathering dust in a shop is too dark a fate for them!
texts.visit_king_backup_00_01: It is I! If you intend to make me wait, perish the thought!
texts.thanks_king_00_01: Splendid! I am honored to have such reliable subjects.
texts.thanks_king_02_01: Deal! Don't go spending it all in one place, now.
texts.additional_sale_king_00_02: But hold on... what is this delicious smell!?
texts.additional_sale_king_01_01: Splendid! I am honored to have such reliable subjects.
texts.additional_sale_king_01_02: ...But it wouldn't do for me to walk away on an empty stomach!
texts.visit_argon_backup_00_01: Shopkeeper! I am in need of a few items! Can you provide?
texts.visit_argon_ws_00_01: Shopkeeper! I have a favor to ask!
texts.visit_argon_ws_00_02: I need a few backup swords for training. Strong ones! And heroic-looking, if you can!
texts.visit_argon_xs_00_02: The Training Hall is in need of a few shields for rookie Heroes. Can you provide?
texts.visit_argon_xs_halloween_00_01: Woah! What's with all these customers?
texts.visit_argon_xs_halloween_00_02: Shopkeeper! If you're ever having zombie troubles... you know who to call!
texts.visit_argon_wa_00_01: Hello again, shopkeeper! How are you doing?
texts.visit_argon_wa_00_02: Naya sent me on a glorious quest; seek out mighty weapons to decorate the tavern with!
texts.visit_argon_wa_00_03: As a knight in training, I must help people in need! Can you help me in turn?
texts.visit_argon_wa_halloween_00_01: You've gathered yourself a strange clientele, shopkeeper!
texts.visit_argon_wa_halloween_00_02: These guys seem oddly obsessed with...  brains. Are you really ok with that?
texts.visit_argon_ah_00_01: Shopkeeper! Do you have a moment?
texts.visit_argon_ah_00_02: I'm dressing up some training dummies for special training! Do you have any spare armor?
texts.visit_argon_bh_00_01: Good day, shopkeeper! I'm planning an expedition to the Whispering Bog with some rookies.
texts.visit_argon_bh_00_02: We'll need a few clean pair of boots to trudge through that mess!
texts.visit_argon_hh_00_02: I'd like to donate a few helmets to the orphans at the temple. Kids love playing hero!
texts.visit_argon_hh_00_03: It's also educative! And uh, safer than the axes from last time...
texts.visit_argon_hh_halloween_00_02: I'd like a few helmets please. There's no better protection against zombies!
texts.visit_argon_gh_00_01: Noble shopkeeper! I am on a glorious errand for Brohm!
texts.visit_argon_gh_00_02: He'd like some padded smelting gloves. Extra large, too!
texts.thanks_argon_00_01: I knew I could count on you! Thank you!
texts.thanks_argon_01_01: Thank you, shopkeeper! Evil beware, Argon is coming!
texts.thanks_argon_02_01: Ah ha! Quake in your boots, evildoers! Argon is coming!
texts.additional_sale_argon_00_01: Oh! I skipped lunch today! Can I have this?
texts.additional_sale_argon_01_01: Shopkeeper! Have you picked up cooking, too?
texts.visit_lilu_backup_00_01: It's me again! I need a few items today, let me check my shopping list...
texts.visit_lilu_wt_00_02: I'm not sure how, but Master Grimar broke another staff...
texts.visit_lilu_wt_00_03: Think you can make him a new one? Or several? Make them sturdy!
texts.visit_lilu_wt_halloween_00_01: S-shopkeeper... Why are there zombies everywhere!?
texts.visit_lilu_wt_halloween_00_02: Quick, hand me a staff! Several!
texts.visit_lilu_ww_00_01: Shopkeeper, I have an important order.
texts.visit_lilu_ww_00_02: Do you have any wands? My staff is a bit too unwieldy for potion brewing...
texts.visit_lilu_al_00_01: Shopkeeper, I'm planning an excursion to the Barren Wasteland.
texts.visit_lilu_al_00_02: My usual wear is a bit stuffy for that hot weather though. Do you have something lighter?
texts.visit_lilu_hl_00_01: Okay, hear me out, I have an odd request!
texts.visit_lilu_hl_00_02: My owl Pollux likes hiding in my hat, but I also need to, you know, WEAR it.
texts.visit_lilu_hl_00_03: Can you sell us a couple of hats for his sake?
texts.visit_lilu_uh_00_01: Shopkeeper! I need help with homework!
texts.visit_lilu_uh_00_02: I'm practicing a new potion recipe but I'm short a few ingredients...
texts.visit_lilu_uh_halloween_00_02: ...Not good enough, huh? You're a tough one, shopkeeper!
texts.visit_lilu_us_00_01: Hi! Do you have a moment?
texts.visit_lilu_us_00_02: I need to add a few spells to my repertoire, but Grimar has been sleeping all day...
texts.visit_lilu_us_halloween_00_02: Still no candies, huh? A few spells will do, then!
texts.thanks_lilu_02_01: Five star service! I'll be sure to leave a review!
texts.additional_sale_lilu_00_01: Oh, I gotta try this, too!
texts.additional_sale_lilu_01_01: Hang on! I need this, too!
texts.visit_sia_backup_00_01: Ah, shopkeeper. There's a little something I've been looking for...
texts.visit_sia_wd_00_01: Greetings, shopkeeper. It is good to see you again.
texts.visit_sia_wd_00_02: I need a few... tools, for the good of the kingdom. Don't worry, it's all perfectly innocent!
texts.visit_sia_wd_halloween_00_02: Shopkeeper, I trust that you are aware of the sanitary implications?
texts.visit_sia_wc_00_01: Sweetheart, I'm looking for something to get rid of "pests".
texts.visit_sia_wc_00_02: Preferably in a silent and clean fashion. I trust you have what I need?
texts.visit_sia_wg_00_01: Dear shopkeeper, has my delivery arrived yet?
texts.visit_sia_wg_00_02: ...I would like it wrapped in nondescript packaging, if possible.
texts.visit_sia_bl_00_01: Sweetheart, I'm in a bit of a predicament...
texts.visit_sia_bl_00_02: My shoes are, simply put, completely out of style! I trust you to remedy this, dear shopkeeper.
texts.visit_sia_bl_halloween_00_01: Good evening, shopkeeper. I would like the usual, please.
texts.visit_sia_bl_halloween_00_02: ...Preferably something that has not been handled by zombies.
texts.visit_sia_xa_00_01: Hello again, sweetheart. I'd like to add a little "je ne sais quoi" to my apparel.
texts.visit_sia_xr_00_01: Hello again, sweetheart. I'd like to add a little "je ne sais quoi" to my apparel.
texts.visit_sia_xr_halloween_00_01: This imperishable night... It really wears you down, doesn't it?
texts.visit_sia_xr_halloween_00_02: Perhaps it is time for a vacation back to Kern...
texts.thanks_sia_00_01: Well, aren't you the reliable sort. I hope to see you again very soon...
texts.thanks_sia_02_01: Oh, it's absolutely gorgeous! You have quite the eye for fashion.
texts.additional_sale_sia_01_01: Ah, I suppose I shall let myself be tempted, as well.
texts.visit_yami_backup_00_01: Take this list. I need everything on it, right now.
texts.visit_yami_wd_00_02: File off the serial numbers, for your own sake.
texts.visit_yami_wb_00_01: I've taken on a big contract. Range and discretion will be critical.
texts.visit_yami_wb_halloween_00_02: The dead should know their place.
texts.visit_yami_hm_00_01: I need a disguise. Something practical.
texts.visit_yami_bl_00_01: Keep your voice down. Act normal and bring me several pairs of shoes.
texts.visit_yami_bl_00_02: I'll need to disguise my footprints.
texts.visit_yami_bl_halloween_00_02: The night's embrace is a great ally.
texts.visit_yami_uh_00_01: I must acquire the following supplies with utmost secrecy. Do not fail me.
texts.visit_yami_up_00_01: I must acquire the following supplies with utmost secrecy. Do not fail me.
texts.visit_yami_up_halloween_00_01: ...Trick or treat? Don't waste my time.
texts.thanks_yami_00_01: You will forget this transaction happened. Understand? Good.
texts.thanks_yami_02_01: Good. Don't get involved any further.
texts.additional_sale_yami_00_01: I also require rations. What do you have?
texts.additional_sale_yami_01_01: I must make myself scarce. Make this transaction quick.
texts.visit_rudo_backup_00_01: Hey kiddo, ya still open? I need something.
texts.visit_rudo_wm_00_01: Hey kiddo. It's a good day to bash some skulls, don't ya think?
texts.visit_rudo_wm_00_02: Lemme see some maces, clubs, bludgeons... HEAVY stuff.
texts.visit_rudo_wm_halloween_00_02: What, am I too old for trick-or-treating?
texts.visit_rudo_wp_00_01: Hey, y'got any toothpicks? Don't shirk the quality, I want something sturdy.
texts.visit_rudo_wa_00_01: Shake a leg, shopkeeper. Fetch me the biggest axes you got.
texts.visit_rudo_wa_halloween_00_02: Hey, you're not gonna serve these guys before me, are ya?
texts.visit_rudo_wa_01_02: I'm looking for a gift for my Gorza... Something strong and elegant.
texts.visit_rudo_hh_00_01: Hey kid, you ever headbutt your enemies into submission?
texts.visit_rudo_hh_00_02: I do. And I'll need more helmets to keep at it.
texts.visit_rudo_bh_00_01: Fear is a powerful weapon. When I walk, enemies scatter in panic.
texts.visit_rudo_bh_00_02: The secret is a loud, heavy footstep... And the reputation to go with it! Gwah hah hah!
texts.visit_rudo_xa_00_01: Hmph. Ya don't got any armor my size, don't ya?
texts.visit_rudo_xa_00_02: Fine. Get me one of those tiny charms. I need protection against magic.
texts.visit_rudo_xa_halloween_00_01: ...The air outside is cursed. There's some stinkin' magic at work.
texts.visit_rudo_xa_halloween_00_02: Hurry up and get me some talismans!
texts.visit_rudo_up_00_01: Look alive, shopkeeper. I need a drink. The strongest you got!
texts.thanks_rudo_02_01: Kinda small, don't you think? Ah well, here's your coin.
texts.thanks_rudo_03_01: Great. Send me on a quest soon. I'm itching for a fight!
texts.additional_sale_rudo_00_01: I'm hungry enough to eat a horse. Y'got anything for me?
texts.additional_sale_rudo_01_01: Oh, Gorza wants me to grab this, too.
texts.visit_polonia_backup_00_01: To yer post, swabbie. Yer captain be needing somethin'.
texts.visit_polonia_ws_00_01: Lootkeeper, me crew needs some new cutlasses.
texts.visit_polonia_ws_00_02: The sea's salty breeze be a cruel mistress to iron...
texts.visit_polonia_ws_halloween_00_01: There be struggling corpses about. Ye ok with this, lootkeeper?
texts.visit_polonia_ws_halloween_00_02: I'd like to keep me pretty brains to meself, aye.
texts.visit_polonia_wg_00_01: Ahoy, lootkeeper. Heard ye got some new cannons in stock.
texts.visit_polonia_wg_00_02: Show me what ye got, and I might just let you live! Har har!
texts.visit_polonia_wg_halloween_00_01: Arrr, there be doomed sea dogs invading the land!
texts.visit_polonia_wg_halloween_00_02: There be only one cure for these nasty biters. Ye got what I need?
texts.visit_polonia_wt_00_01: Arr matey, I'll be needing some of yer fancy staves.
texts.visit_polonia_wt_00_02: Aye, pirates can't use staves. But I do what I want because pirates be free!
texts.visit_polonia_am_00_01: To yer post, matey. I'll be needing some new armor.
texts.visit_polonia_am_00_02: Me measurements? Hah! In yer dreams, scallywag!
texts.visit_polonia_gl_00_01: Me trigger finger be itching, matey. Show me yer best gloves ye got in stock.
texts.visit_polonia_xa_00_01: Sea dogs be a superstitious bunch, lootkeeper. This Cap'n's no exception!
texts.visit_polonia_xa_00_02: Fetch me some good luck charms to keep the crew's minds at ease.
texts.visit_polonia_xa_halloween_00_01: Aye, lootkeeper. Them landlubbers in yer shop aren't looking too good.
texts.visit_polonia_xa_halloween_00_02: Yer crew got a bad case of scurvy, me thinks.
texts.thanks_polonia_00_01: Good work, matey. Here's ye doubloons.
texts.thanks_polonia_01_01: Yo ho ho! Ye'll be an old salt in no time.
texts.thanks_polonia_02_01: I'll have the ship sing a shanty in yer name.
texts.thanks_polonia_03_01: Hmmm.... where could I bury this...
texts.additional_sale_polonia_00_01: To yer post, matey! Yer captain be needin' grub, too!
texts.additional_sale_polonia_01_01: Me thinks this could help against scurvy. I'll take it.
texts.visit_donovan_backup_00_01: Esteemed shopkeeper, I am in need of your fine crafts.
texts.visit_donovan_wd_00_01: Esteemed shopkeeper, I am an elf of great renown... and success breeds envy.
texts.visit_donovan_wd_00_02: As I am without my personal guards, my own safety is a concern.
texts.visit_donovan_wd_00_03: Please remedy this. My life is in your capable hands.
texts.visit_donovan_wd_halloween_00_01: Practicing necromancy out in the open, shopkeeper?
texts.visit_donovan_ww_00_01: Esteemed shopkeeper, do you have any wands in stock?
texts.visit_donovan_ww_00_02: It appears my own are... inadequate for the sake of handling local ingredients.
texts.visit_donovan_ww_00_03: Alchemy requires utmost precision. I will leave nothing to chance.
texts.visit_donovan_al_00_01: I would appreciate a new outfit, shopkeeper. Something befitting my rank, of course.
texts.visit_donovan_al_00_02: Comfort, style and ease of movement are a must!
texts.visit_donovan_al_00_03: Do not mind the cost. The Emperor scoffs at no expense.
texts.visit_donovan_uh_00_01: I find myself lacking a crucial ingredient in a most dire moment...
texts.visit_donovan_uh_00_02: Please make haste. My experiment is rather time sensitive.
