texts.visit_donovan_uh_halloween_00_01: Whatever it is that ails your patrons, I'd rather not contract myself.
texts.visit_donovan_uh_halloween_00_02: Please make haste, I would like to take my leave as soon as possible.
texts.visit_donovan_up_00_01: I am in the mood to sample this Kingdom's alchemical potential.
texts.visit_donovan_up_00_02: Show me your best, shopkeeper. Your reputation is on the line.
texts.visit_donovan_up_halloween_00_01: I do wonder what got into those customer of yours, shopkeeper.
texts.visit_donovan_up_halloween_00_02: Since I'm here, perhaps I should take a sample...?
texts.visit_donovan_xr_00_01: It seems that my accessories are not very fashionable in this... remote kingdom.
texts.visit_donovan_xr_00_02: I entrust you with supplying me the latest trend, esteemed shopkeeper.
texts.thanks_donovan_02_01: The Emperor will see that you are duly rewarded.
texts.thanks_donovan_04_01: Best service I've had in decades. Quite literally.
texts.additional_sale_donovan_00_01: I find myself in a rush. May I have this wrapped up as well?
texts.additional_sale_donovan_01_01: This looks to rival the Empire's cuisine. I would like to sample it.
texts.visit_hemma_backup_00_01: We do enjoy your craftsmanship, shopkeeper. What do you have in stock?
texts.visit_hemma_wt_00_01: We do not enjoy telling you this... But sometimes we lose control over the undead we create.
texts.visit_hemma_wt_00_02: And nothing works quite as well in those situations as a bludgeoning implement.
texts.visit_hemma_wt_halloween_00_01: Impressive work with those zombies, shopkeeper...
texts.visit_hemma_wt_halloween_00_02: What do you mean, you did not create them?
texts.visit_hemma_ww_00_01: Wands are not our favorite focus... but they do have their uses in various rituals.
texts.visit_hemma_ww_00_02: Do you have anything worth our time in stock?
texts.visit_hemma_al_00_01: The powers we wield are dangerous, shopkeeper.
texts.visit_hemma_al_00_02: Our last ritual did not go as planned, and the threads we usually wear did not quite make it.
texts.visit_hemma_al_00_03: Anything else in stock for us?
texts.visit_hemma_uh_00_02: We are in need of fine incense to burn under the moonlight. Could you provide?
texts.visit_hemma_uh_halloween_00_01: So really, to upkeep your undead patrons, you would only need...
texts.visit_hemma_uh_halloween_00_02: ...What do you mean, do you not want them to stay undead?
texts.visit_hemma_us_00_01: We find ourselves in desperate need of magical renewal, shopkeeper.
texts.visit_hemma_us_00_02: Something potent, it goes without saying.
texts.visit_hemma_us_halloween_00_01: The necromantic energy permeating this place...
texts.visit_hemma_us_halloween_00_02: We have been drawn to it. Interesting business strategy, we must admit.
texts.visit_hemma_xa_00_01: 'Tis not unusual for us to dabble with powerful spirits. Sometimes too powerful.
texts.visit_hemma_xa_00_02: In these times, we are always glad we did not skimp on a good talisman.
texts.thanks_hemma_01_01: Consider us satisfied customers. Thank you, shopkeeper.
texts.thanks_hemma_02_01: This will do nicely. Our thanks.
texts.additional_sale_hemma_00_01: Before we leave, could we bother you with an additional request?
texts.additional_sale_hemma_01_01: We could not afford to part with this delicious treat. May we?
texts.visit_ashley_backup_00_01: Hey boss, I'm here for my order.
texts.visit_ashley_ws_00_01: This is... the sword of legends...!
texts.visit_ashley_ws_00_02: Nah, just messing with ya. I'll take it, though.
texts.visit_ashley_ws_01_01: Hey boss, I'll take my usual order of swords.
texts.visit_ashley_ws_01_02: Gotta say, stuff back home didn't break as often.
texts.visit_ashley_ws_02_01: Not too many Katanas around here, huh? Can't blame you, though.
texts.visit_ashley_ws_02_02: I could hook you up with this Masamune guy someday, if you want.
texts.visit_ashley_ws_halloween_00_01: What's with all the Jiangshi about? They're looking pretty limber.
texts.visit_ashley_ws_halloween_00_02: Oh well, not my problem. Got any swords?
texts.visit_ashley_wp_00_02: Not sure why the Ashigaru like it so much. Guess I'll find out.
texts.visit_ashley_wb_00_01: I'm falling behind on my bow training.
texts.visit_ashley_wb_00_02: Ah... I'll just buy these and do it tomorrow.
texts.visit_ashley_wg_00_01: Heard matchlocks were all the rage lately.
texts.visit_ashley_wg_00_02: What do you got for me, boss?
texts.visit_ashley_ah_00_01: Boss, I'm looking for some armor to blend in better around here.
texts.visit_ashley_ah_00_02: It better not cost an arm though. Only got one to give.
texts.visit_ashley_hh_00_01: Think I'll take this one. Looking nice and sturdy.
texts.visit_ashley_hh_00_02: Can't skimp on head protection, yeah?
texts.visit_ashley_hh_halloween_00_01: Hey boss. Is this helmet for sale?
texts.visit_ashley_hh_halloween_00_02: ... What's with these customers? Are you having Youkai problems?
texts.visit_ashley_gh_00_01: Ah, been looking all over for a gauntlet like this.
texts.visit_ashley_gh_00_02: Only need one, though. How about a discount?
texts.thanks_ashley_01_01: Ah, yeah! That's what I'm talking about!
texts.thanks_ashley_02_01: Nice piece. I'll take it off you.
texts.thanks_ashley_03_01: Good trade. You won't see me complaining.
texts.additional_sale_ashley_00_01: Oi, something smells good in here. Don't leave me hangin'!
texts.additional_sale_ashley_01_01: My Samurai senses are tingling. Didja think you could hide snacks from me?
texts.visit_bjorn_backup_00_01: We're here! Do you have our order?
texts.visit_bjorn_wa_00_01: Hmm... Gorza said she needed some new axes. What do you have in stock, city dweller?
texts.visit_bjorn_wb_00_01: City dweller, any bows in stock rated for big game hunting?
texts.visit_bjorn_wb_00_02: I'm talking Manticores, not sewer rats! Har har!
texts.visit_bjorn_wb_halloween_00_02: Come on, Bamham! We've got an ecological disaster on our hands!
texts.visit_bjorn_wg_00_01: Guns... I don't get this newfangled technology. You can't even recover the bullets!
texts.visit_bjorn_wg_00_02: It'd be easier if Bamham didn't keep eating the gunpowder!
texts.visit_bjorn_am_00_01: Haven't had a change of clothes in a week! Got anything my size, city dweller?
texts.visit_bjorn_am_00_02: ...I think I'm better off burning these...
texts.visit_bjorn_al_00_01: These are some Tusky pajamas! I'll take some!
texts.visit_bjorn_al_halloween_00_02: Har har! Maybe they don't bother me 'cuz I'm green?
texts.visit_bjorn_xa_00_01: City Dweller, we'd like a bundle of amulets. Tingly, noisy ones.
texts.visit_bjorn_xa_00_02: It keeps bears away! Har har!
texts.visit_bjorn_xc_00_01: We're headed on a secret mission to the Bleakspire Peaks... and it's cold up there!
texts.visit_bjorn_xc_00_02: I'll need big cloaks for me, and small ones for the 'ham!
texts.visit_bjorn_bl_00_02: A ranger lives and dies by his boots. Do you have anything that lives up to these standards?
texts.visit_bjorn_fm_00_01: I'm picking up lunch for me and my son. Pack it tight, Brohm's a big eater!
texts.thanks_bjorn_01_01: Come on, Bamham! The trail calls!
texts.thanks_bjorn_02_01: Thanks, city dweller! See you around!
texts.thanks_bjorn_03_01: Har har! Tusky service! Say thanks, Bamham!
texts.additional_sale_bjorn_00_01: Thanks! I think Bamham would like a snack, too.
texts.additional_sale_bjorn_01_01: Oh no...! Bamham smelled something delicious!
texts.additional_sale_bjorn_01_02: Can we have it? For everyone's safety?
texts.visit_atlab_aang_backup_00_01: Hi shopkeeper! I've come for my order!
texts.visit_atlab_aang_wt_00_01: I'm interested in those staves... What kind of things can they do?
texts.visit_atlab_aang_wt_00_02: Magic, huh? It's worth a shot!
texts.visit_atlab_aang_al_00_01: Shopkeeper! Do you have any robes?
texts.visit_atlab_aang_al_00_02: Yes! That one! ...Do you have it a few sizes smaller?
texts.visit_atlab_aang_hl_00_01: You say these are wizard hats?
texts.visit_atlab_aang_hl_00_02: I don’t know what wizards are, but I sure do love their hats!
texts.visit_atlab_aang_uh_00_01: Hi! Do you have any flowers? ...for Katara...
texts.visit_atlab_aang_uh_01_01: These herbs... I'd like to buy a treat for Appa!
texts.visit_atlab_aang_uh_01_02: They look kinda weird... but I'm sure he wouldn't eat it if it wasn't safe.
texts.visit_atlab_aang_us_00_01: Are these scrolls for sale? They look pretty interesting!
texts.visit_atlab_aang_us_00_02: Wait... I can't read this language!
texts.visit_atlab_aang_xa_00_01: These nice amulets remind me of Gyatso...
texts.thanks_atlab_aang_00_01: I don't think my money is worth anything here... I hope these Champion Coins will do!
texts.thanks_atlab_aang_01_01: Sokka's gonna be really excited to see these!
texts.thanks_atlab_aang_02_01: Thanks! I'll share with my friends, too!
texts.additional_sale_atlab_aang_00_01: I saw something interesting over there. Is it local cuisine?
texts.additional_sale_atlab_aang_01_01: Oh! Can I get a snack for Appa?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_backup_00_01: Hey hey, I'm back. Do you have my stuff?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wa_00_01: Hgn..! Do people really fight with these? That's heavy!
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wa_00_02: Just how strong are these Heroes?!
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_ws_00_02: Not as good as my Space Sword, but I'll take it.
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wd_00_01: Nice daggers you got there. Do you have any machetes?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wd_00_02: A bit flashy, but I guess that'll do.
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wm_00_01: Can these fancy bludgeons hold a candle to my trusty club?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wp_00_01: That's an impressive inventory of metal spears...
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wp_00_02: You're not supplying the Fire Nation, are you?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wb_01_01: I'm usually more of a boomerang guy but...
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wb_01_02: ...Now's my chance to try one of these!
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wt_00_01: These staves look a bit like Aang's, don't they?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wt_00_02: I'm not a bender, but I’ve still got some smooth moves!
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_ww_00_01: Ok, I'm stumped. How do you even fight with these tiny sticks?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_ww_00_02: ...Wait! Don't say anything! I'll figure it out myself!
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wc_00_01: Hey shopkeeper! You have crossbows in stock?
texts.visit_atlab_sokka_wc_00_02: There’s so many to choose from… I can’t decide!
texts.thanks_atlab_sokka_01_01: Can't wait to see Aang's face when I show him these!
texts.thanks_atlab_sokka_03_01: My tribe would love to see these!
texts.additional_sale_atlab_sokka_00_01: Woah, that looks GOOD! Can I have it?
texts.tutorial_dust_counter_click: Click the <c1>counter</c1> to dust it off.
texts.tutorial_dust_rack_click: Click the <c1>rack</c1> to dust it off.
texts.tutorial_wait_crafting_click: Wait for the timer, then click on the card.
texts.tutorial_dust_bin_click: Click the <c1>bin</c1> to remove the dust.
texts.tutorial_press_sell_bubble_click: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to the customer.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_hero_click: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Argon.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_dragon_invasion_cl: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Polonia.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_blacksmith_click: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Wallace the Blacksmith.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_tailor_click: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to Julia the Tailor.
texts.tutorial_press_hire_board_back_click: Click on the <c1>back</c1> button to return to the city.
texts.tutorial_press_rack_click: Click on the <c1>rack</c1> to see more options.
texts.tutorial_press_open_chest_click: Click on the <c1>Magic Unlock</c1> button. This one's on me!
texts.tutorial_press_unlock_blueprint_click: Click the <c1>Confirm</c1> button to unlock the Blueprint.
texts.tutorial_speedup_craft_click: Click on the <c1>craft bubble</c1> to rush it.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_engineer_click: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to the Engineer.
texts.tutorial_press_bubble_scholar_click: Click the <c1>bubble</c1> to talk to the Scholar.
texts.tutorial_firstpet_intro_01: Shopkeeper! Help me out, will you?
texts.tutorial_firstpet_intro_02: I've got two stray animals here without a place to call home...
texts.tutorial_firstpet_intro_03: Would you mind taking care of one for me?
texts.tutorial_firstpet_popup_01: Look at these cute little fellas! How can you say no to that?
texts.tutorial_firstpet_cat_01: Don't worry about that dog, I'll take good care of this little fella!
texts.tutorial_firstpet_cat_02: As for your cat, make sure to give it tons of love... and don't forget to feed it!
texts.tutorial_firstpet_cat_03: I'm sure it'll get along just fine with your customers, too!
texts.tutorial_firstpet_dog_01: Don't worry about that cat, the Wallace household could use a fuzzy furball!
texts.tutorial_firstpet_dog_02: As for your dog, make sure to give it tons of love... and don't forget to feed it!
texts.tutorial_firstpet_dog_03: I'm sure it'll get along just fine with your customers, too!
texts.loginevent_anniversary_01: Prosperous shopkeeper, your King is here!
texts.loginevent_anniversary_02: Hold on to your seat, for I bring exciting news...
texts.loginevent_anniversary_03: <c1>Shop Titans</c1> is now officially 4 years old! Incredible!
texts.loginevent_anniversary_04: Yes, yes, we're breaking the fourth wall here, but this is a momentous occasion!
texts.loginevent_anniversary_05: To celebrate, your most generous King will be distributing gifts to all shopkeepers over the following days!
texts.loginevent_anniversary_06: Indeed, my generosity knows no bounds! No need to thank me!
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item: I've been dreaming about some <c1>{0}</c1> for weeks! I need them!
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_02: My <c1>{0}</c1> collection is a bit lacking currently... Remedy this as soon as possible!
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_04: Can you imagine a world without <c1>{0}</c1>? I shudder at the thought!
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_05: I, King Reinhold, hereby declare <c1>{0}</c1> to be the cool item of the hour!
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_06: I refuse to be seen without some <c1>{0}</c1>! My status demands it!
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_07: I've been thinking of making <c1>{0}</c1> the kingdom's heraldry. What do you think?
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_08: Whatever you were crafting until now is passé! It's all about <c1>{0}</c1> now!
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_09: Who has ever heard of a king without <c1>{0}</c1>?
texts.dialog_king_event_hot_item_10: Your resplendent king requires equally resplendent <c1>{0}</c1>!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_ws: There is nary a weapon nobler than the <c1>Sword</c1>! All too fitting for a splendid king!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wa: <c1>Axes</c1>! The tools of the hard working class! I am a man of the people and I will prove it!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wd: Quantity or quality? I choose both! Millions of <c1>Daggers</c1>, on the double!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wm: Complaints have reached my ear that there were too many <c1>Maces</c1> around. They are unsubstantiated!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wp: Today's fortune calls for <c1>Spears</c1>! I would be a fool to ignore it!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wb: To aim true and let loose a deft shot... <c1>Bows</c1> are grace given form!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wt: Let's see how good this Allan truly is. <c1>Staves</c1>! More than I can count!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_ww: <c1>Wands</c1> bear great power, and great power means great responsibility. A perfect match for I!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wc: <c1>Crossbows</c1>? <c1>Crossbows</c1> sound good. Work your magic, shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_king_event_type_wg: My kingdom is avant-garde. Mighty <c1>Guns</c1> must be mine!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_uh: My royal pantry is miserly! <c1>Medicinal Herbs</c1> shall act as impromptu spices!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_up: <c1>Potions</c1>, tonics, elixirs... One can never have enough, least of all I!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_us: I wish to learn magic! Shower me with <c1>Spells</c1>, and I promise they will NOT be used responsibly!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_ah: I've got a fever... and the only cure is <c1>Heavy Armor</c1>!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_am: I cannot have enough of Julia's masterpieces! More <c1>Light Armor</c1>, please!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_al: Pompous <c1>Clothes</c1> suit me just fine! Regale me with your finest fabrics!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_hh: Wonderful <c1>Helmets</c1> ill fit a man wearing a crown, but that is a sacrifice men of my stature must make.
texts.dialog_king_event_type_hm: What dashing <c1>Rogue Hats</c1>! My wardrobe is in dire need of some garnishing!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_hl: I may not have a wizard's power, but there is nothing money can't buy! Bring me <c1>Magician Hats</c1>!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_gh: To rule with an iron fist... would wearing <c1>Gauntlets</c1> be too literal?
texts.dialog_king_event_type_gl: These delicate hands must be protected at all costs! My life depends on these <c1>Gloves</c1>!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_bh: I shall walk a hundred miles if I must, but the finest <c1>Boots</c1> must be mine!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_bl: My favorite pair of <c1>Shoes</c1> is all worn out! I require several hundred more!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xs: There is no better canvas than <c1>Shields</c1> to display one's heraldry!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xc: Who has ever heard of <c1>Cloaks</c1>? I have not!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xc_02: <c1>Cloaks</c1> are urgently needed! My radiant self must soon travel incognito!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xr: Sia is long overdue for a lavish gift! I require a thousand <c1>Rings</c1> as soon as humanly possible.
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xa: Your King requires bling! Only the most extravagant <c1>Amulets</c1> will do!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xu: I long for <c1>Runestones</c1>! ...What are they used for again?
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xm: <c1>Moonstones</c1>... So mysterious and beautiful... I want troves of them right this instant!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_xf: This kingdom requires a tide of <c1>Familiars</c1> for the enjoyment of all, but most of all I!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_fm: A feast is in order! Assemble all cooks to prepare countless <c1>Meals</c1>!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_fd: The world's, nay, the universe's <c1>Desserts</c1> must be mine! My sweet tooth cannot be satiated!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_spirits: My kingly spirit is afire with desire! Desire for the greatest <c1>Spirits</c1> money can buy!
texts.dialog_king_event_type_elements: It's elementary, my dear shopkeeper. <c1>Elements</c1> I demand, and <c1>Elements</c1> I shall receive!
texts.dialog_king_event_category_enchantments: The all-powerful <c1>Enchantments</c1>... They do exist! I have many bathrobes in need of enchanting!
texts.dialog_king_event_category_w: <c1>Weapons</c1> are what truly matter! I care not about the type!
texts.dialog_king_event_category_armors: I wish for my army to be clad in resplendent <c1>Armor</c1>! Right this instant!
texts.dialog_king_event_category_x: <c1>Accessories</c1> make the man, my father used to say. I happen to be a very rich man.
texts.dialog_king_event_category_stones: All experts agree; riches lie within these magical <c1>Stones</c1>! Craft as many as you can!
texts.dialog_king_event_next_reward: Look at this! <c1>{0}</c1>! Isn't it beautiful?
texts.dialog_king_event_next_reward_02: What's up next? <c1>{0}</c1>!? I may be too generous!
texts.dialog_king_event_next_reward_03: A bounty of <c1>{0}</c1> awaits the brave shopkeepers who answer my requests!
texts.dialog_king_event_next_reward_04: <c1>{0}</c1> straight from the kingdom's coffers... but promise not to tell anyone!
texts.dialog_king_event_next_reward_05: <c1>{0}</c1>, huh? Don't go spend it all in one place!
texts.dialog_king_event_generic: ...There's no scary ninja around, is there?
texts.dialog_king_event_generic_02: When will the Lost City of Gold appear again, I wonder...?
texts.dialog_king_event_generic_03: ...Who put that Tower of Titans there? Is it paying property taxes?
texts.dialog_king_event_generic_04: Welcome to my caprices! Answer them and be justly rewarded!
texts.dialog_king_event_generic_05: Sia was NOT in favor of this escapade. I'm sure she will come around.
texts.dialog_king_event_generic_06: Fine weather, isn't it? It's always sunny in Reinhold's kingdom!
texts.dialog_king_event_generic_07: I've had a horrible dream... where all my rewards were claimed twice! Caprice be cursed, I've never felt so robbed!
texts.tutorial_press_bin_select: Tap on the <c1>Bin</c1> to select it
texts.tutorial_press_basement_store: Tap on the <c1>Store in Basement</c1> button
texts.tutorial_press_bin_select_click: Click on the <c1>Bin</c1> to select it
texts.tutorial_press_basement_store_click: Click on the <c1>Send to Basement</c1> button
texts.dialog_sundragon_unhiredgreetings_02: I am Sondra, dragon artisan from the far east. It would be my pleasure to share my craft with you.
texts.dialog_sundragon_unhiredgreetings_03: My expertise resides in transmutation. Your kind sometimes call it <c1>Fusion</c1>.
texts.dialog_sundragon_hirequestion: Would you like to begin your journey toward mastering this fine art?
texts.dialog_moondragon_unhiredgreetings: Fusion is an elegant craft, but it requires a lunar power source.
texts.dialog_moondragon_unhiredgreetings_02: I can harness the essence of Luna and craft it into <c1>Moonstones</c1>.
texts.dialog_moondragon_unhiredgreetings_03: I also craft some special equipment with <c1>Anti-Boss</c1> properties that your Heroes might be able to wear.
texts.dialog_moondragon_unhiredgreetings_04: With me around, and the appropriate offerings, you can unleash the true power of <c1>Fusion</c1>.
texts.dialog_elven_unhiredgreetings: Glad to see you again, shopkeeper.
texts.dialog_elven_unhiredgreetings_02: I am Yolanda, the Summoner. Mother of the cute Familiars.
texts.dialog_elven_unhiredgreetings_03: For a responsible shopkeeper, I can summon <c1>Familiar</c1> eggs to be adopted by Champions.
texts.dialog_elven_unhiredgreetings_04: ...I also knit some fancy <c1>Cloaks</c1> during evenings.
texts.dialog_elven_hirequestion: Would you like to become a home for my cute Familiars?
texts.tutorial_fusion1_01: I believe you are ready to learn the art of <c1>Fusion</c1>, child of man.
texts.tutorial_fusion2_01: First, you must select a few items worthy of a fusion.
texts.tutorial_fusion3_01: In order to power the Synthesis Vessel, lunar energy in the form of <c1>Moonstones</c1> is also required.
texts.tutorial_fusion4_01: A fine fusion. You are worthy of the Synthesis Vessel's power!
texts.tutorial_fusion4_02: Such skillful fusion may attract the <c1>Moon Dragon's</c1> attention. I wish you luck, child of man.
texts.offer_superiorpack_king_02: It seems you are one with taste for only the finest things in life...
texts.offer_superiorpack_king_03: ...So much, in fact, that you've bought just about every luxury there is to own!
texts.offer_superiorpack_king_04: I suppose a little extra for such a refined individual wouldn't hurt...
texts.offer_superiorpack_king_05: Keep it a secret though! A secret between two resplendant aristocrats!
texts.offer_superiorpack_king_06: I would expect you of all people to recognize a savvy deal such as this!
texts.offer_superiorpack_king_07: You may take time to consider it, but it is a very brief opportunity!
texts.tutorial_throwback_pack2_01: While searching high and low into old ledgers, I've stumbled upon something of note...
texts.tutorial_throwback_pack2_02: ...All the past offers from the city folks! A treasure trove of nostalgia!
texts.tutorial_throwback_pack2_03: If you feel like you've missed out on some of them, now's your chance!
texts.tutorial_throwback_pack3_01: Splendid choice! I would've chosen that one, too!
texts.tutorial_throwback_pack4_01: Careful consideration is not one of my virtues, but it is respectable nonetheless!
texts.dialog_essence_chat_11: Remember to pay respect... to the dead...
texts.dialog_essence_chat_12: I can't hold anything material... Cleaning is... difficult.
texts.shortsword_desc: Strong, lightweight weapon that can be found in any warrior's arsenal.
texts.grottosword_desc: Have you watered your sword recently?
texts.zweihander_desc: A long, long sword for strong hearts and brave deeds.
texts.cutlass_desc: All you need now is an eye patch and a pegleg.
texts.herosword_desc: Wherever it came from, it's destined to save the world someday.
texts.candysword_desc: Could've been a few tiers higher if a certain someone didn't take a bite out of it.
texts.katana_desc: Folded over a thousand times. Can cut through Knights with ease.
texts.fallsword_desc: Its unique design is inspired from one of Howling Woods' many native tree species.
texts.officesword_desc: Decidedly not the sturdiest of makes, but its reach is undeniably precise.
texts.scimitar_desc: This masterpiece is practically begging to be enchanted.
texts.cyclopssword_desc: This heavy stone sword does not cut very well, but it leaves wounds that time cannot heal.
texts.celesteelblade_desc: Angels have kept this special metal a secret for centuries. Then some Prometheus guy had to leak it.
texts.ruinssword_desc: A feeling of unease hangs in the air...
texts.goldsword_desc: Enhanced with jagged shards of Chronos Crystal to ensure a bad time upon whoever is struck.
texts.newyearsword_desc: Once every millennia, this crystal inexplicably turns very malleable. It's a blacksmith's only opportunity to craft masterpieces like this!
texts.falchion_desc: These masterfully crafted blades are found only among the Kern emperor's elite bodyguards.
texts.poloniacutlass_desc: An intricately forged sidearm that is said to have been owned by Baross Del Monte himself.
texts.canesword_desc: A true gentleman knows when to keep his blade away.
texts.cleaver_desc: How do you even lift that thing?
texts.templesword_desc: Strike with the force of a crashing wave.
texts.dragonsword_desc: Only friends of dragons can wield this blade without risk of draconic retribution.
texts.lunarsword_desc: The blade of a just Emperor of ancient times, said to be as fierce and cunning as a tiger.
texts.moonsword_desc: Got into a big fight with Amaterasu, causing the night and day to be forever split apart.
texts.t12sword_desc: They who pull it out of the stone shall become king. Since you crafted that one, it doesn't count.
texts.shoprsword_desc: As old as the Titans themselves... which is 3 years old? Does that even make sense?
texts.goldsword2_desc: This is one thick blade you don't want to mess with.
texts.musketeersword_desc: Swift and sure, this sword is meant for skilled and dignified hands.
texts.pumpkinsword_desc: A pumpkin effigy, twisted by mockery...!
texts.t13sword_desc: There's a djinn in there you'll need to befriend first. It's got a hot temperament.
texts.spacesword_desc: Requires a single nuclear AA battery, which is included. Lasts five whole minutes!
texts.doublebitted_desc: Two blades are better than one.
texts.exploreraxe_desc: Go where no man has dared explore - with this trusty axe at your side!
texts.grottoaxe_desc: Terribly efficient, but has a tendency to cauterize the wounds it causes.
texts.epicaxe_desc: If only recycling was always this easy!
texts.battleaxe_desc: Dwarves always keep one tucked under their pillow.
texts.birdaxe_desc: Who's doing the reaping around here?
texts.starteraxe_desc: Boasts a perfect grip for seasoned adventurer!
texts.snowaxe_desc: Magically forged without any heat whatsoever. Particularly disliked by the fey and their ilk.
texts.pyramidaxe_desc: Cut straight to the point with this fine jade axe of dwarven make.
texts.lunaraxe_desc: Take a heavyhanded approach to commerce and slash those prices!
texts.castleaxe_desc: Justice is defined by the hands that claim it.
texts.cincoaxe2020_desc: Vibrant and colorful. Slightly disturbing as it swings towards you.
texts.crescentaxe_desc: Usher forth a swift end to the denizens of the night.
texts.templeaxe_desc: The irony is not lost on the wielder of this fierce, primal weapon.
texts.goldaxe_desc: The best way to cut your losses.
texts.coupleaxe_desc: Can split just about anything... aside from two enamored, beefy berserkers.
texts.manticoreaxe_desc: The spikes on this fierce weapon sometimes spring and act on their own, reaching for prey.
texts.beeaxe_desc: Mercilessly sticky. May summon nearby bears to the wielder.
texts.fallaxe_desc: A ruthless axe that once belonged to a legendary barbarian, said to be the terror of all Mushgoons. Constant maintenance is required if you don't want stray spores to stick!
texts.aegiraxe_desc: Giants beware, for Jötunnbane has returned.
texts.t12axe_desc: Dynasties and legions fall before the unstoppable rampage of this legendary axe.
texts.chessaxe_desc: This terrible, cursed axe is said to be incapable of defeating anyone in combat. Instead, its dreadful power is to command others to battle in its stead.
texts.dinoaxe_desc: This is going to make a fine mess.
texts.t13axe_desc: Carved from moonstone. Mysteriously, its material does not seem to match our own moon.
texts.firecrabaxe_desc: Not even warfare is safe from carcinazation.
texts.platinumaxe_desc: Automatically awarded to worthy dwarves once they get all the achievements.
texts.kitchenknife_desc: Necessity is the mother of invention.
texts.forestdagger_desc: An ice pick made of ice picked to pick at ice.
texts.kunai_desc: A strange multi-purpose tool from a foreign land. Forging it requires a technique known by few.
texts.butterflyknife_desc: Lodges itself effortlessly in the back of unsuspecting allies.
texts.kris_desc: Ceremonial weapon worn by royalty and priests.
texts.yamidagger_desc: The serial number is filed off...
texts.dirk_desc: A ruthlessly efficient last resort owned by guards of the royal court.
texts.lunardagger_desc: Soars to your target with a soft breeze...
texts.guttingknife_desc: Really knows its way around guts.
texts.beachdagger_desc: Doubles as a treat on hot summer days, but it's on a short timer.
texts.junimaydagger_desc: This gardening tool has seen a lot of use, but hasn't lost its edge.
texts.trolltooth_desc: Nine out of ten dentists recommend brushing it twice a day.
texts.ruinsdagger_desc: Whichever beast it came from, it might want it back! Be careful!
texts.golddagger_desc: Looks just about ready to meet its daily blood sacrifice quota!
texts.sultandagger_desc: To be kept under your pillow for 1001 nights of good sleep.
texts.katar_desc: Don't let the embellishments fool you; it packs quite a punch.
texts.templedagger_desc: Thrice desecrated under a moonless night.
texts.siadagger_desc: Deep within enemy territory, a sharp blade is your only ally.
texts.stpatrickdagger_desc: Keep it tucked away in your sleeve for maximum critical hit potential.
texts.heartseeker_desc: Be advised: don't run with it unsheathed!
texts.peakdagger_desc: The final embrace of a gentle caress.
texts.halloweendagger_desc: Typically used as ammunition for the Nightwing Caster, but can also double as a vicious dagger.
texts.atlab_kyoshifan_desc: A unique weapon wielded exclusively by the Kyoshi Warriors. Sharper than it looks!
texts.wiccandagger_desc: Deep within the Witchwoods, mysterious rituals abound... This dagger may have seen its share!
texts.t12dagger_desc: How fortunate all these people are. If only it could all be yours instead...
texts.mushroomdagger_desc: Who's hungry for a knuckle sandwich?
texts.golddagger2_desc: The blade consists of an impressive and ornate alloy of obsidian and gold. An unlikely combination, but it paid off!
texts.lunardagger2_desc: In a court shadowed with intrigue, much can hide behind a polite smile and an elegant accessory.
texts.t13dagger_desc: Adorned with stained glass from fell cathedrals, this dagger is a potent catalyst in many dark rituals.
texts.campingdagger_desc: It slices, dices, cuts and tears. And let's not forget the special Corkscrew Finisher.
texts.harpydagger_desc: The blade is just as soft and flexible as you would expect a feather. Somehow, it hardens just before a strike.
texts.spikedclub_desc: Speak softly... and carry a big stick.
texts.forestmace_desc: Speak softly... and carry a big cursed stick from a giant man-eating tree.
texts.libertymace_desc: Shine boldly with the light of liberty.
texts.summermace_desc: Don't let the playful colors fool you: this is not a toy.
texts.newyearmace_desc: Has a chance to shatter into confettis upon hitting. Appropriate armament for the first morning of the New Year!
texts.ancienthammer_desc: The barbarians of the north are good at maiming, not naming.
texts.troblinmace_desc: Another of Barkback's marvelous inventions. The spikes mean more damage, and the vines add a serving of greens.
texts.arcademace_desc: Missing a few more buttons to enter that one cheat code.
texts.powderkeg_desc: This is what happens when Roxanne gets her hands on a mace blueprint.
texts.candyhammer_desc: When a regular mint doesn't get the message across...
texts.smithhammer_desc: Create and destroy with equal ease.
texts.freedommace_desc: That's the only thing you can see after it hits you.
texts.goldhammer_desc: Pay someone to carry this for you.
texts.mundrahammer_desc: Bosses of any dungeon start sweating nervously at the mere mention of this hammer's name.
texts.peakhammer_desc: Requires roughly 7 years of uninterrupted sunlight to reach its maximum potential.
texts.naturehammer_desc: Hits with the weight of the whole world.
texts.atlab_mace_desc: A tough club made of bone, crafted by Sokka himself.
texts.t12mace_desc: Thor called. He wants his hammer back.
texts.eastermace_desc: Oh no! It's got sharp edges now!
texts.t13mace_desc: In times of old, creatures as tall as mountains protected land and sea. Their duty lives on through this sacred hammer.
texts.musicmace_desc: It may have Air affinity, but this ain't no air guitar.
texts.platinummace_desc: After the Smash Hit comes the Platinum single.
texts.woodspear_desc: Simple weapon used by warriors for thousands of years.
texts.bladedspear_desc: What if we stuck a sword to a pole? Genius!
texts.pitchfork_desc: The #1 tool to row hay, poke monster bums, and getting those darn kids off your lawn!
texts.ranseur_desc: Long thrusting weapon used by the royal guard.
texts.easterspear_desc: Quite literally, the carrot on a stick. Horses (and fairies, allegedly) love it.
texts.pike_desc: Three pokeys bits means triple damage right?
texts.heavenlyhalberd_desc: Reach to the sky and strike with the wrath of the heavens.
texts.desertspear_desc: Magically enchanted for throwing and underwater breathing. These abilities are unfortunately mutually exclusive.
texts.celticspear_desc: Also known as the "spear of mortal pain". Your imagination can fill the gaps.
texts.yetispear_desc: Yetis are adept ice craftsmen. The Twicicle Javelin is one of their simplest design, suitable even for novices to make.
texts.africanspear_desc: Designed to be used in melee or hurled. Hurts on the way in, and on the way out, too.
texts.championlance_desc: A winner of countless jousts. Whoever bears it has a strong legacy to live up to!
texts.fallspear_desc: A crimson sun sets over a season of plenty.
texts.wyvernglaive_desc: The dragon head just... constantly shrieks. Nonstop.
texts.sylvanspear_desc: Allan prefers working wood, but the bones of a fantastic beast make for a unique challenge.
texts.templespear_desc: Apparently poked a really important guy a long time ago.
texts.thanksgivingspear_desc: Laughed off only by fools who have never been pecked to near-death by griffins.
texts.feyspear_desc: A boon from the Queen of the Fairies. Does it come with a price? Most certainly.
texts.circusspear_desc: Apparently created as a joke by Borovitz. The knights didn't think it was funny when it claimed victory upon victory.
texts.christmasspear_desc: Wielded by Santa Claus during the First Christmas to defeat Ouroboros the Sun Eater. This part of the story is kept secret to the general public.
texts.t12spear_desc: Higher powers rarely hide their disappointment.
texts.airshipspear_desc: When thrown, the propeller activates to grant it extra range. It's fueled by water somehow, so it's super eco-friendly!
texts.beachspear_desc: The strap can be let loose to unleash its shield mode. Putting it back in spear form is a pain, though.
texts.goldspear2_desc: Given to the sacred Teotl guardians.
texts.t13spear_desc: Once a pleasant silver hue, this Bardiche has been permanently seared by the terrible flames it exudes.
texts.riftspear_desc: A single strike is akin to be swept away by a merciless sea.
texts.inuitspear_desc: Fish fear it. Men want it.
texts.shortbow_desc: Rickety weapon made from a strong branch and a fine string.
texts.forestbow_desc: Shots fired from this bow completely ignore adverse wind conditions.
texts.hunterbow_desc: Remember, the pointy end should point out.
texts.siabow_desc: An elegant bow designed by Sia herself. Possesses remarkable power while remaining easy to use.
texts.strikerbow_desc: Strike your target with furious precision.
texts.halloweenbow_desc: A terribly cursed bow made useable through multiple blessings. There is no telling how long they will hold.
texts.wingedbow_desc: Watch your arrows slice through the air like birds of prey.
texts.desertbow_desc: With a name like that, it has to be strong, right?
texts.compositebow_desc: An undeniably deadly work of art.
texts.westernbow_desc: Local hunting laws favor bows? Boy, do we have the weapon for you!
texts.yumi_desc: Its asymmetrical design takes some time to get used to, but there is no denying its craftsmanship.
texts.valentinebow_desc: Wage love AND war with this cupidly effective, dual-purpose bow.
texts.mundrabow_desc: Its draw weight is meant for beefy dragons. Dexterity builds; look elsewhere!
texts.bramblebane_desc: Be a literal thorn in your enemy's side!
texts.fallbow_desc: The wind takes from the trees, leaving only torpor for the coming winter.
texts.twinstrand_desc: Two for the price of one.
texts.stormrend_desc: Hear me, thunder! Cry out, lightning!
texts.goldbow_desc: Mostly used for ceremonial purpose. Gold does not bend very well.
texts.cincobow_desc: Let the candies hit the floor. Let the candies hit the floor.
texts.newyearbow_desc: Shoot for the stars, aim for the moon. Beware of unprotected atmospheric reentry.
texts.frogbow_desc: Despite its mundane appearance, it is anything but bog standard.
texts.t12bow_desc: An immensely powerful bow stolen from the gods, long ago. They probably forgot about it by now, but you probably shouldn't show it off.
texts.arcadebow_desc: At the cost of a mere quarter per shot, the world itself becomes your pinball machine.
texts.thanksgivingbow_desc: This particularly ornate bow most likely belonged to a hunter of great renown.
texts.t13bow_desc: It longs for freedom. Inadequate users may find themselves suddenly disarmed one morning.
texts.blossombow_desc: Carved from a branch taken from the oldest cherry tree in the world. There's laws against this now.
texts.riftbow_desc: Where this bow sings, the land splits asunder.
texts.woodbranch_desc: Roughly carved from a branch with a minor magical aura.
texts.cane_desc: A good walking stick is tough to come by!
texts.oakstaff_desc: Imbued with the essence of the elder wood.
texts.lilustaff_desc: An intricate staff carved in the shape of Lilu's owl, Pollux. Please don't swing it too hard.
texts.goldstaff_desc: The mundane, polished and gilded to a fault.
texts.bo_desc: For the sorcerer who doesn't mind getting up close and personal.
texts.scepter_desc: Powerful staff primarily used as a statement piece.
texts.swampstaff_desc: Something ancient rests within this amber. Something powerful enough to strengthen a wizard's spells...
texts.wiccanstaff_desc: It's common practice for wicce to enchant their broom to act as a backup staff.
texts.wizardstaff_desc: Overwhelming elemental power is now within your grasp.
texts.leafstaff_desc: Time whitens hair without ripening reason.
texts.celestialrod_desc: Said to unleash hidden potential when the stars align.
texts.mundrastaff_desc: Decidedly too gaudy in hands other than Mundra's.
texts.fallstaff_desc: A few floors had to be cut out to meet unusual architectural needs.
texts.imperialaquila_desc: A prestigious staff wielded by imperial warmages.
texts.ruinsstaff_desc: Eternal as it may seem, this staff will break like any other. A lesson in humility.
texts.musicstaff_desc: Was almost named the "Staff Staff" but was deemed too ridiculous.
texts.transcendance_desc: Every chime reminds you that the best weapon is your mind.
texts.castlestaff_desc: Slowly but surely, the ocean reclaims what is hers.
texts.lemonstaff_desc: If life gives you lemons... use them to channel your spells.
texts.conflux_desc: Do you hear the horn's call?
texts.christmasstaff_desc: Please refrain from using it during the remaining eleven months of the year.
texts.penumbra_desc: On the cusp of light and darkness, a perpetual dawn.
texts.yetistaff_desc: Some say a seldom seen queen of ice rules over the Yetis. This staff may hold dominion over them!
texts.valentinestaff_desc: My heart's been captured! Wasn't there something about cards?
texts.t12staff_desc: The darkest of pacts is required to wield this fell scepter. You can only ask yourself, are you truly in charge here?
texts.goldstaff2_desc: This resplendent feathered staff was once exclusive to the masters of ancient ceremonies.
texts.hemmadonstaff_desc: Blissful sleep eternal... wonderful, is it not?
texts.anubisstaff_desc: To wield this staff is to wield wicked curses with perfect ease.
texts.t13staff_desc: The cloud formation shifts with the wielder's mood. Beware the cumulus!
texts.riftstaff_desc: Requires a mage skilled in telekinesis, as the staff weighs several thousand pounds.
texts.collectionstaff_desc: The scepter extorts a cost from its user, steadily draining their memories and adding them to its own... until there is nothing left.
texts.baton_desc: The core is made of quality materials, but it's no phoenix feather!
texts.twirled_desc: The Elvenwood's properties remain as intact as its shape.
texts.backscratcher_desc: Makes for a good backscratcher, too.
texts.steelrod_desc: Don't cast lightning spells with this one.
texts.christmaswand_desc: You get fresh breath! And you get fresh breath!
texts.sylvan_desc: Conduct the magical symphony of nature.
texts.fallwand2_desc: Light the night and purify the rest in one convenient package! The streamers are a bit stiff, though.
texts.rubyrod_desc: Mirror, mirror on the wall, who’s the fairest wand of them all?
texts.liluwand_desc: Try saying that five times real fast.
texts.goldwand_desc: Everything you touch will turn to gold. Figuratively. Believe in yourself!
texts.fallwand_desc: The herald of change between seasons.
texts.moonwand_desc: The celestial dance needs someone to orchestrate it.
texts.dragoneye_desc: Avert your gaze, lest you attract unwanted attention.
texts.lcogwand_desc: Experts say this may be an ancient, forgotten variant of the Wand of Midas.
texts.sailorwand_desc: Proper activation of its latent powers requires a lengthy transformation sequence.
texts.t12wand_desc: From one of its many mouths, the Herald sang the song which would end life as we know it.
texts.chesswand_desc: The bane of knights, bishops and towers all over the world.
texts.maplewand_desc: This mystical fork possesses the power to roast any meat placed upon it, so long as a heat source is provided.
texts.t13wand_desc: Magical quartz superheated to just below safe levels. Turns even novice fire spells into infernoes, so read the safety manual.
texts.gothitawand_desc: Nothing quite like a lamp to knock someone's lights out. The ribbon is just extra.
texts.flintlockpistol_desc: Prone to misfire. Feeling lucky, punk?
texts.huntingrifle_desc: Blast anything within five hundred yards.
texts.wintergun_desc: It's all fun and games until someone loses an eye.
texts.doublebarrel_desc: Walnut stock, cobalt blue steel, and a hair trigger. That's right. Shop smart.
texts.fruitgun_desc: Ring ring ring ring ring ring ring...
texts.arcadegun_desc: It seems like it may have ghostbusting properties, but the manual has been lost ages ago.
texts.kenora_desc: It's a gaudy kind of yee haw.
texts.gatling_desc: It costs 400,000 gold to fire this weapon for twelve seconds.
texts.dragonator_desc: Nothing quite like the smell of sulfur in the morning.
texts.hermes_desc: This one only delivers bad news.
texts.lunargun_desc: This ain't this gun's first rodeo.
texts.goldgun_desc: Contains a single, highly lethal golden bullet.
texts.doggun_desc: Can be tossed to distract a dog, wolf or even werewolf opponent. Only once, though.
texts.t12gun_desc: This thing can scuttle ships. Mind the recoil.
texts.westerngun_desc: Betcha can't shoot this here bottle two miles away.
texts.christmasgun_desc: What could this mysterious gift be?
texts.t13gun_desc: So precise is this gun that its owner will inevitably grow careless and make a fatal slip.
texts.lightcrossbow_desc: For the archer on the go.
texts.handcrossbow_desc: Now in a fun, travel size format!
texts.heavycrossbow_desc: Say hello to my little friend.
texts.thanksgivingcrossbow_desc: The rate of fire is great, but the sound is the real selling point.
texts.huntercrossbow_desc: Even the smallest prick spells certain doom.
texts.scorpion_desc: Built tough, for BIG game hunting.
texts.troblincrossbow_desc: The greatest Troublin inventors teamed up to create this technological marvel, combining both the innacuracy of a slingshot and the unwieldiness of a crossbow.
texts.chukonu_desc: Features a revolutionary automated reload mechanism to allow for uninhibited dual-wield action.
texts.dragoncrossbow_desc: Can only fire patented dragon bolts, which dragons obviously sell at a premium.
texts.batcrossbow_desc: Can also fire bat bombs and bat boomerangs.
texts.wyrmthrower_desc: Who really knows what lurks in the dark, endless fathoms?
texts.goldcrossbow_desc: Boasts a particularly low fire rate, but given the cost of the ammunition... it's better that way!
texts.titancrossbow_desc: Actually fires concentrated soul energy supplied by the user, so the string is really just for show.
texts.t12crossbow_desc: Banned in most heavens and astral planes.
texts.airshipcrossbow_desc: A faithful recreation of Polonia's grandfather favorite sidearm. While he favored guns, gunpowder has a tendency to get wet on the high seas!
texts.t13crossbow_desc: By any other name would aim as true.
texts.dreamcrossbow_desc: The bolts are laced with a soporific agent, but it's more of a gimmick given how deadly they are.
texts.grass_desc: Believe it or not, this herb is illegal in some places.
texts.antidote_desc: Defeat any poison with overwhelming freshness.
texts.powder_desc: Shimmering dust used in most potion recipes.
texts.christmasflower_desc: Carry the spirit of Christmas with you everywhere, even during the off-season.
texts.healingsalve_desc: Miraculously mend any wound right before your eyes.
texts.thanksgivingherb_desc: Wait until you meet its brother, the overnight oats.
texts.vampireherb_desc: Keeps disease and bloodsuckers at bay, but consider brushing your teeth after use.
texts.silverthistle_desc: Rare Elven herb with limitless alchemical potential.
texts.harvest_desc: Stay healthy with this... sizeable serving of vegetables.
texts.thanksgivingherb2_desc: Substantially tougher than your average sweet corn, but the best medicine is rarely the easiest.
texts.bouquet_desc: Various flowers and freshly cut herbs. The signature bouquet of the Maribel Medicine Emporium.
texts.mushroomherb_desc: Super convenient to grow on the go! Handling it is... another matter entirely.
texts.mandragoraroot_desc: Terribly grumpy and uncooperative early in the morning.
texts.valentineherb_desc: Try as you might, so long as love still exists in the world, this flower will remain beautiful.
texts.ruinsherb_desc: Grows at the peak of snowy mountains and only blooms once per decade. How it hasn't gone extinct is a mystery.
texts.yggdrasilbranch_desc: The Tree of Life binds all things together.
texts.goldenclover_desc: Very rarely found within fields of solid gold shamrocks.
texts.goldherb_desc: Substitutes snake oil for gold flakes for the same effect, but triple the cost!
texts.wyrmblood_desc: Brace yourself, this may sting a little...
texts.couplebouquet_desc: Carved out of the strongest wood for the strongest love there is.
texts.eldritchtendrils_desc: Do not let it sit on your night table.
texts.peakherbs_desc: Even in the most secluded, harshest places... life finds a way.
texts.circusherb_desc: Shame upon ye, o fool! Falling for such a classical farce!
texts.candyherb_desc: Make your cheat day truly count for something.
texts.t12herb_desc: Donovan claims it isn't the real deal, but maybe he's just jealous.
texts.blossomherb_desc: Strictly non-alcoholic to maintain our PG rating.
texts.goldherb2_desc: The golden liquid contained within serves to grow the plant. Its healing properties are beyond compare, but oh so difficult to grow!
texts.fruitherb_desc: Often rebrands itself between potion or herbal medicine depending on which is currently more favored by trade tariffs.
texts.t13herb_desc: Requires antimatter to grow, so a controlled portal to the void is needed.
texts.musicherb_desc: You... you didn't eat any of this, did you?
texts.dreamherb_desc: He is rarely credited as such, but the Sandman is the original inventor of the Pocket Sand attack.
texts.tea_desc: You feel a great burden has been lifted from your shoulders.
texts.smallhealthpotion_desc: The taste is awful, but it will certainly work.
texts.smallmanapotion_desc: Made with sugar, spice and everything nice.
texts.scienceexperiment_desc: A blind taste test is part of the science, too.
texts.victorianpotion_desc: Also lifts a great burden from your shoulder, but in style!
texts.shoprpotion_desc: They started selling those at the Tower of Titans gift shop. It just ain't what it used to be.
texts.poloniapotion_desc: Contains the daily recommended intake of vitamin C.
texts.largehealthpotion_desc: Just when you thought you were out, this potion pulls you back in.
texts.cincopotion_desc: Best Before: Approximately 5 minutes from now.
texts.nayapotion_desc: This one's just for you, hun.
texts.vialofrenewal_desc: Grants the immediate benefits of a full night's rest. Also cures hangovers.
texts.pyramidpotion_desc: Distilled joy and happiness in liquid form... the number one Monday cure!
texts.epicpotion_desc: We were told it absolutely does not contain a meaningful quantity of toxic waste.
texts.purplebomb_desc: It has a very strong aftertaste... wait, what is the wick for?
texts.soulfireextract_desc: A dose of raw passion. Jolts you back on your feet, no matter what.
texts.lemonpotion_desc: The shining spark of summertime, bottled for rainy days.
texts.carpenterpotion_desc: Proud and unyielding. Just like its inventor, really.
texts.cincopotion2_desc: The bottle's small for a reason. Don't overdo it.
texts.goldpotion_desc: Whatever ails you will be gone in a flash, leaving only a hole in your wallet.
texts.starextract_desc: Warning! Do not store more than three (3) bottles together; risks of singularity.
texts.yetipotion_desc: A single sip chills you down to your very soul. Cures burns like nothing else.
texts.volcanopotion_desc: The purest of waters, untainted by the material plane. Has surprising healing qualities, given its simplicity.
texts.mundrapotion_desc: Mundra's original recipe uses Gems, but Jewels make for a reasonable substitute.
texts.beachpotion_desc: Rock a great tan in perfect safety with this new, Sondra-approved formula!
texts.maplepotion_desc: A relic worshipped by Canayans. Drinking from its sacred syrup is a coming-of-age ceremony among their kind.
texts.t13potion_desc: The preserved blood of a renowned Vermilion Guard traitor, which he set aside for his own resurrection. We're just gonna drink it.
texts.arcadepotion_desc: Health, Mana and Stamina potions suitable for any hero. Which color is which? Well...
texts.officepotion_desc: A fresh pot of fancy black coffee. Provides resistance to Mondays and Sleep spells.
texts.scrolloffire_desc: Not to be used on dry days. Only you can prevent forest fires.
texts.forestscroll_desc: All the benefits of a Mintyleaf Herb without the aftertaste!
texts.scrollofthunder_desc: Weightless ethereal armor for nerds who can't wear the real deal.
texts.scrollofprotection_desc: The answer to any problem, so long as it's outdoors.
texts.songofvalor_desc: Magically inspire your allies to do heroic deeds with these sick rap beats.
texts.scrollofice_desc: The one stop to all your summoning needs.
texts.swampscroll_desc: A top favorite among the monsters living under your bed.
texts.tomeofknowledge_desc: A magical encyclopedia with many more pages than physically possible. The table of content alone takes 300!
texts.scrollofinvisibility_desc: A wizard's deepest secrets (and some spells!) are inscribed within.
texts.christmascroll_desc: Your name is on the nice list!
texts.scrolloflevitation_desc: The world, the earth and their sons and daughters.
texts.fireworksscroll_desc: It isn't exactly magical, but it sure feels like it!
texts.unicornscroll_desc: A favorite bedtime story among Yetis. Adept spellcasters may notice spells intricately weaved into the (somewhat childish) prose.
texts.tarot_desc: 10 swords is a good sign, right?
texts.vipscroll_desc: Fortune favors the bold...and the bearer of this gilded parchment.
texts.grimoireaeternum_desc: Starting from the end gets you back to the beginning, but not the other way around...
texts.goldscroll_desc: Ancient destructive spells carved into stone and inlaid with gold. Can also be used as a shield in a pinch.
texts.celestialscroll_desc: Meticulously charted since the dawn of magic itself.
texts.priestbook_desc: The Goddess would like to have a word.
texts.batscroll_desc: What a horrible night to have a curse.
texts.celticscroll_desc: Strong emphasis on shapeshifting spells. What's with the crows?
texts.freedomscroll_desc: A high quality replica. The original is archived away in a secret vault, so that it can never be stolen.
texts.lunarscroll_desc: The Emperor hereby declares that tigers are cute and fluffy. That is all.
texts.allknowledge_desc: This massive tome is said to contain knowledge on literally everything to ever exist. [Citation needed]
texts.t12scroll_desc: A mythological beast, said to absorb the knowledge of all that it ate, is bound within this book. It's hunger has not abated even after millenia.
texts.anubisscroll_desc: No doubt contains long lost arcane arts... but you'll need the linguistics to match!
texts.newyearscroll_desc: One of these stars seems to be missing from the sky...
texts.valentinescroll_desc: Love is the strongest magic there is, after all.
texts.goldscroll2_desc: A catalyst of pure gold makes for impressive results.
texts.t13scroll_desc: Guarantee void if seal is broken.
texts.riftscroll_desc: Outward calm betrays the chaos within.
texts.platinumscroll_desc: A map of secret underground kingdoms carved in platinum. Beautiful and indestructible, it could lead to ruins bearing unimaginable wealth!
texts.cuirass_desc: Protects against blunt weapons, piercing bolts and mean jokes.
texts.ringmail_desc: They liked it, so they put a few rings on it.
texts.chainmail_desc: Tough armor designed to withstand the harshest blows.
texts.winterarmor_desc: Always cold to the touch... but not to you.
texts.centurionarmor_desc: Shredded abs are a sight for all to see. Or so the Emperor says.
texts.pumpkinheavyarmor_desc: A healthy dose of spikes makes everything cooler.
texts.beeheavyarmor_desc: You feel a sudden urge to protect the queen at any cost.
texts.ronindo_desc: The unmistakable outfit of a Samurai.
texts.atlab_heavyarmor_desc: The iconic uniform of the Kyoshi Warriors, who have sworn to protect Kyoshi Island.
texts.generalplate_desc: They say that the clothes do not make the man, but a general's armor is an important exception.
texts.oktoberfestplate_desc: The distinctive armor of an elite mercenary.
texts.christmasheavyarmor_desc: Ho ho ho! Are you ready to defend the North Pole, kids?
texts.lunararmor_desc: The armor of the legendary Flying General, reputed for his martial feats and short temper.
texts.berserkerarmor_desc: Keeps you relatively safe while frothing about on the battlefield.
texts.castleheavyarmor_desc: The natural order of things must be maintained. At all costs.
texts.freedomplate_desc: The whole kingdom stands behind you!
texts.juggernaut_desc: Yeah, nothing is getting past that.
texts.templearmor_desc: Easily enforce your personal space with searing heat.
texts.goldplate_desc: If you're flaunting all that wealth... might as well make it useful!
texts.atlab_fireplate_desc: The distinctive uniform of a Fire Nation soldier.
texts.t12heavyarmor_desc: The Vermilion Guard are a secret order dedicated with protecting hidden Phoenix nesting grounds.
texts.fallheavyarmor_desc: The design implies its original wearer may have been much, much bigger than you are.
texts.darkknightheavyarmor_desc: This hulking, clanking piece of armor is 100% possessed. Are you willing to risk it?
texts.cyclopsheavyarmor_desc: The vines attached to this armor are centuries old, yet the armor itself appears brand new...
texts.t13heavyarmor_desc: Accursed fire burns throughout this armor, consuming any remaining compassion its wearer might have.
texts.riftheavyarmor_desc: Fiery passion and burning rage... channel and unleash them!
texts.shoprheavyarmor_desc: May or may not be made from all the armor that weren't sold in your shop.
texts.ironcap_desc: Will keep you safe sixty percent of the time, every time.
texts.horned_desc: Can also be used as a weapon!
texts.vikinghelm_desc: Strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.
texts.knighthelm_desc: Sure, it provides little to no visibility, but at least you'll look good!
texts.swamphelm_desc: An advanced, no-rust design borrowed from the merfolks.
texts.couplehelmet_desc: Like a furious beast, love so fierce cannot be contained.
texts.atlab_firehelm_desc: You won't see a Fire Nation soldier without one!
texts.shoprhelm_desc: Gems, braid, wings; it has everything!
texts.kabuto_desc: Tighten the string of the Kabuto after winning the war.
texts.dinohelm_desc: Over 35,000 newtons of pressure! Without the actual muscles... perhaps closer to 0.
texts.gladiatorhelm_desc: Are you not entertained? Is this not why you are here?
texts.beachhelm_desc: The sand castle teaches us that all which man creates will crumble to dust, in time. In the meantime, here's a neat bucket to wear!
texts.generalheaume_desc: The tuft separates the chief from the chaff.
texts.ruinshelm_desc: When the Goddess calls, the righteous answer.
texts.lunarhelmet_desc: Unmatched in strength (and style!) across the three kingdoms.
texts.berserkerhelm_desc: All warriors know to use their heads in the heat of battle. Berserkers are not very good at metaphors.
texts.centurionhelmet_desc: Its ingenious design efficiently cleans low ceilings as you come and go.
texts.thanksgivinghelmet_desc: Assert dominance over all sorts of fat birds.
texts.goldhelmet_desc: It won't protect you from impulsive buying.
texts.celestialhelm_desc: Honestly, far more practical than a halo.
texts.doghelm_desc: Its bark is worse than its bite.
texts.valentinehelm_desc: Even Cupids need to stay safe while on the job.
texts.t12helm_desc: Through devotion towards the Phoenixes they serve, Vermilion Guards are said to shrug off even the most terrible wounds.
texts.chesshelm_desc: Poor visibility will slow your movement to a crawl, but it makes you look real important.
texts.pumpkinhelm_desc: Lord over all the pumpkin patches. Beware ye veggie thieves!
texts.t13helm_desc: To don this helm is to seal one's fate. All will be consumed by its overwhelming hatred.
texts.blossomhelm_desc: The supreme commander of the army requires headgear befitting his rank.
texts.platinumhelm_desc: Gives you an extra foot of stature. And a few dozen pounds of weight.
texts.ironbracers_desc: Basic, protective gear for the warrior on a budget.
texts.lightgauntlets_desc: Feels like you're wearing nothing at all.
texts.demigauntlets_desc: Keeps your digits free to perform rude gestures.
texts.pumpkingauntlets_desc: Candies seem to disappear within its vicinity...
texts.knightgauntlets_desc: Slightly less expensive than Day Gauntlets.
texts.christmasgauntlets_desc: Not to be underestimated. They pack a literal, if jingly, punch.
texts.cincogauntlets_desc: Yep, it's got five fingers alright.
texts.paladingauntlets_desc: Holy light in the palm of your hands.
texts.fruitgauntlets_desc: It's got that dauntless potpourri energy.
texts.desertgauntlets_desc: Also known as the Day Gauntlets.
texts.oktoberfestgauntlets_desc: Deftly handles a pike, arquebuse or a day's wage.
texts.kote_desc: Uphold the eight virtues. Through battle, and unto death.
texts.berserkergauntlets_desc: Adds some spice to your backhanded compliments.
texts.goldgauntlets_desc: Make half of your problems go away with a snap of the fingers.
texts.juggernautgauntlets_desc: Keep your friends close and your enemies closer. Much closer.
texts.wintergauntlets_desc: Will keep your drink ice cold, whether you like it or not.
texts.naturegauntlets_desc: The soft touch of a mother, encased in basalt.
texts.fallgauntlets_desc: Science said it wasn't possible to make gauntlets out of leather, iron and herbs. Science was wrong.
texts.aegirgauntlets_desc: They bear a special affinity for axes and oars.
texts.t12gauntlets_desc: With a hand on sword and heart, Vermilion Guards swear their allegiance anew with each sunrise.
texts.mushroomgauntlets_desc: If it's to be a fist fight, best come prepared!
texts.goldgauntlets2_desc: Look how it's smiling. Lil' guy's definitely happy to be there!
texts.darkknightgauntlets_desc: Wearing these gauntlets, to rule with an iron fist is no longer a figure of speech.
texts.t13gauntlets_desc: Animated by a will of their own, they will refuse to hold anything but tools of war.
texts.shinguards_desc: Provides immunity against toddlers and small dogs.
texts.longboots_desc: You wouldn't want an arrow in the knee, would you?
texts.grieveboots_desc: Keeps your shins protected from pint-sized foes.
texts.heroboots_desc: Very protective, but will prevent you from running from boss battles.
texts.heavyboots_desc: The sound from these boots leave enemies shaking in their... boots.
texts.circusboots_desc: Their aggro potential is next to none, but...
texts.knightboots_desc: You'll get a kick out of these.
texts.swampboots_desc: Sear your footprints onto any surface! Be the easiest Hero to track in the entire kingdom!
texts.lunargreaves_desc: Boots worn by the legendary Flying General, said to be constantly on the lookout for a decent challenge.
texts.paladinboots_desc: Divine comfort while doing holy work.
texts.dogboots_desc: The claws may need occasional clipping if not worn regularly.
texts.firecrabboots_desc: They're here to kick ash and chew bubblegum. And they're all out of gum.
texts.haidate_desc: The honorable Samurai never turns back. The only way forward is through.
texts.bfheavyboots_desc: In another game, it would probably increase your lightning resistance.
texts.generalgreaves_desc: Make your arrival known with these super-heavy, extra-noisy boots.
texts.berserkerboots_desc: Adds a satisfying crunch when you step on people's toes.
texts.goldboots_desc: Cute little booties weighing approximately 25 lbs. Each.
texts.juggernautboots_desc: Could be classified as blunt weapons of their own.
texts.bunnyboots_desc: The bunny motifs didn't vibe with the warrior crowd, but its spirit still protects the wearer.
texts.cincoboots_desc: Yep, it's got five toes... we already made that joke, didn't we?
texts.freedomboots_desc: They feel quite liberating to take off after a long day of questing.
texts.christmasboots_desc: Santa employs an elite guard of elves to protect him from anyone that would try to ruin Christmas.
texts.t12boots_desc: Vermilion Guards are expected to stand guard for days without rest, so their boots are naturally quite comfortable.
texts.volcanoboots_desc: On a righteous Paladin's pilgrimage, these boots grant their wearer's absolute tirelessness.
texts.fruitboots_desc: Enhanced with the power of a dragon... fruit! (Pesticide free!)
texts.goldboots2_desc: CRITICAL DESIGN FLAW WARNING! The feathers are really itchy!
texts.t13boots_desc: Tread upon a barren wasteland of your own making.
texts.shoprboots_desc: Great for adventure, not so much standing behind the counter of your very successful shop.
texts.leatherarmor_desc: Lightweight armor favored by those who prefer mobility in battle.
texts.padded_desc: Padded jacket used by duelists and archers.
texts.studded_desc: Basic leather armor enhanced with dense, metal rivets.
texts.doublet_desc: Nothing says "I'm important, look at me!" like a fancy doublet.
texts.mundraarmor_desc: A lighter version of Mundra's armor designed for humans of... flimsier constitution.
texts.airshiparmor_desc: Today, you are a mere swabbie, but there is not a single sky pirate out there without grand dreams...
texts.savagearmor_desc: You are the apex predator now.
texts.desertmediumarmor_desc: Sacred armor worn by elven rangers guarding the most secret retreats.
texts.pumpkinarmor_desc: You're never too old for Halloween.
texts.ninjagarb_desc: Always remember the #1 ninja rule: lone ninjas are way more dangerous!
texts.windrunnerarmor_desc: Become one with the wind; dedicate your soul to the chase.
texts.atlab_armor_desc: A traditional Water Tribe outfit, modified for warmer weather.
texts.dragonarmor_desc: Offers splendid defense at the cost of an overinflated sense of self-worth.
texts.smithapron_desc: The crafting is sometimes immediately followed by field testing.
texts.captainarmor_desc: Billows dramatically when a worthy wearer helms a mighty vessel.
texts.lunarmedarmor_desc: Will let you glide effortlessly to the ground, no matter the height.
texts.jackalopearmor_desc: The Cult of the Everdusk has a special affinity for demonic creatures, especially imps.
texts.goldroguearmor_desc: Unnecessarily ornate. Just how you like it.
texts.troblinarmor_desc: Once worn by the smartest Troublin Chieftain, Barkback. So smart, in fact, that he figured out that wearing armor would keep him alive longer. Has a tendency for getting munched on by horses and the likes.
texts.t12mediumarmor_desc: So efficient was the Dawn Thief that people believe it may have been an entire organization.
texts.volcanomedarmor_desc: With the sun now in his hands, what left is there for a Dawn Thief to do...?
texts.cincomedarmor_desc: Calling it a poncho is rather bold, but it's a fashion statement.
texts.westernarmor_desc: It's high noon somewhere in the world.
texts.t13mediumarmor_desc: Nothing but the most dangerous beasts are marked as quarry for the Wildhunt.
texts.dreammediumarmor_desc: These garments are as comfortable as they are dangerous. You might just fall asleep right there!
texts.boarmediumarmor_desc: The belts and buckles are a big hit among main characters.
texts.robe_desc: For the adventurer who enjoys the finer things in life.
texts.disciplerobe_desc: Simple garment created to honor the gods.
texts.exploreroutfit_desc: Has a convenient assortment of pockets and pouches for the seasoned adventurer.
texts.tailorarmor_desc: Must be the masterpiece Julia is always talking about.
texts.witchrobe_desc: Ribbits can be heard from one of these pockets...
texts.wizardrobe_desc: How did you come across this again?
texts.desertlightarmor_desc: Tenders of the holy fire don these magical clothes during sacred rites.
texts.scholartunic_desc: An easy way to look way smarter than you actually are.
texts.midnightapparel_desc: Live your dream of being the prettiest mage at the ball.
texts.atlab_robe_desc: A simple robe worn by Air Nomad monks. Required some refitting by Julia to make it fit adults.
texts.shamanvestment_desc: Each shaman wears a unique design tailored from bits and pieces of the local fauna.
texts.goldvestments_desc: It's tough to be a god.
texts.vampirerobe_desc: Setting aside the fact that they're unnatural monsters, vampires sure know how to dress.
texts.astravestimenta_desc: Embraced by the cosmos and shouldering the weight of the world.
texts.easterarmor2020_desc: With proper armor, you don't need a comeback plan.
texts.arabiantunic_desc: Handles scorching heat and freezing cold in style.
texts.majesticraiments_desc: Repels projectiles, deflects incoming attacks and even keeps itself sparkling clean!
texts.djinnrobes_desc: These robes offer powerful protections. Just don't say "I wish" out loud ever again.
texts.moonrobes_desc: A proper attire to welcome the bountiful harvest moon.
texts.lunarrobe_desc: Finally, an emperor that wears clothes!
texts.t12robe_desc: Worn only by the highest members of the clergy, held to the highest standards by the divine and the common folk alike.
texts.goldrobe2_desc: Tonight, you'll be the prettiest Hero at the ball.
texts.volcanorobe_desc: Old enough to have seen a dinosaur or two, no doubt.
texts.hemmadonrobe_desc: There's something uncomfortable about wearing this one, but it's not physical. Necromancers don't seem to mind.
texts.unicornrobe_desc: Cold in the summer and warm in the winter. The pockets act like mini-fridges, too.
texts.t13robe_desc: The infinite power of the cosmos really isn't something any wizard should have access to.
texts.officerobe_desc: Perfect for the hustling wizard. Also enhances Towerpoint presentation.
texts.gothitarobe_desc: An army of servants is required to put this on.
texts.forestroguehat_desc: You can't beat this airflow. Your scalp will thank you!
texts.hat_desc: It's just a hat. Nothing special here. Move along.
texts.tricorn_desc: It's making a comeback in the fashion world.
texts.hood_desc: You've gone incognito! Feel free to browse privately.
texts.christmasroguehat_desc: A facet of elven fashion that Ismael does not approve.
texts.anubisroguehat_desc: You still play second fiddle to the gods, though.
texts.piratehat_desc: The unauthorized reproduction or distribution of copyrighted work is illegal.
texts.valentinehat_desc: A perfect fit for date (or raid!) night.
texts.nightcowl_desc: A night cowl for the night owl.
texts.pyramidroguehat_desc: Laugh away the harsh conditions of any climate.
texts.farmerhood_desc: Put it on for harvest season! Whether it be veggies... or souls.
texts.windrunnerhat_desc: It's superior aerodynamism increases speed by roughly 1%.
texts.atlab_spiritmask_desc: A mask worn by a mysterious and unexpected ally who freed Aang from the Pohuai Stronghold.
texts.musketeerroguehat_desc: The dashing swashbuckler need not look any further; this hat has no equal!
texts.dragonhat_desc: See the world through the eyes of the wise, beware the mirror that reflects a lust for more.
texts.castleroguehat_desc: The mere sight of a Storm Dragon scale is a terrible omen to coastal cities and fishing villages.
texts.oktoberhat_desc: Amplifies war cries as if in a large mountain range. Not recommended for stealth missions.
texts.captainhat_desc: Nothing says "I'm the captain" like this hat.
texts.indiadayhat_desc: Knowledge abounds when originating from all around.
texts.jackalopehat_desc: In lieu of horns, a cowl can be used to signify rank in evil cults.
texts.peakroguehat_desc: Awarded to the highest member of the Everdusk Cult. It allows command over demons, if you dare summon one...
texts.cincoroguehat_desc: The stealth factor isn't its strong suit, but you can be the life of any party!
texts.goldroguehat_desc: The design is based off old blueprints found in ancient ruins.
texts.catroguehat_desc: Sleek, muffled design. Integrated night vision. If only that bell didn't jingle...
texts.t12roguehat_desc: The iconic mask of the Dawn Thief. Rarely seen without its smug, signature smile.
texts.easterroguehat_desc: Can be removed dramatically at the right moment to interrupt a wedding, or reveal a blood relation with a main character.
texts.airshiproguehat_desc: Aye aye Cap'n! Smellin' a dragon, five miles starboard!
texts.fallroguehat_desc: A most devious trickster certainly hides underneath.
texts.t13roguehat_desc: Haunted by the spirit of a great predator, the skull urges the wearer to hunt forevermore.
texts.inuitroguehat_desc: Sunlight reflected on snow is actually pretty harsh! Hence, the invention of these stylish, if unusual, "sunglasses".
texts.leathercone_desc: For the budding mage... or the class dunce.
texts.laurels_desc: Don't rest on them, they're pretty fragile.
texts.startertiara_desc: Standard apparel from the Academy; each student is expected to craft their own!
texts.circlet_desc: Bolsters concentration, despite being quite uncomfortable.
texts.wizardcone_desc: Tall and tacky, just the way wizards like it.
texts.swamphat_desc: Any way the wind blows doesn't really matter to this hat.
texts.witchhat_desc: Broad brimmed to hide a malevolent smile.
texts.frogmagehat_desc: Much like water flows right off the cap, the cap slips right off your head, too.
texts.midnighthat_desc: Do you think love can bloom, even on a battlefield?
texts.summonerhat_desc: The Summoner Hat excels at one thing above all else; showing everyone who's the boss.
texts.chessmagehat_desc: Bestows great power and speed, but take care not to overextend yourself.
texts.shamanhat_desc: The spirits speak. Will you answer?
texts.goldhat_desc: Blessed with tail feathers from Quetzalcoatl itself.
texts.astralhat_desc: Imparts its wearer with mystic knowledge plucked from the very stars.
texts.schoolhat2020_desc: Many arcane incantations were added to this hat to protect from harm and bad grades.
texts.tiara_desc: The stone shimmers when in the presence of powerful magic.
texts.bathat_desc: You really shouldn't try to fly with this.
texts.djinnhat_desc: The central jewel sometimes shimmers with malice.
texts.victorianmagehat_desc: No, it will not produce a bunny.
texts.snowmagehat_desc: Keeps your head nice and frosty, even under intense sunlight sun. Mostly uncomfortable for anyone other than the Ice Queen.
texts.t12magehat_desc: For one who speaks the will of the gods, a very fancy hat is required.
texts.volcanomagehat_desc: Only an Avatar of the Phoenix, wearing the Phoenix Crest, may incant the Phoenix Litany and maintain the cycle of eternal life.
texts.blossommagehat_desc: The taller the hat, the more powerful the man.
texts.goldhat2_desc: Reserved for the top honcho of priests for the most important of ceremonies.
texts.lunarmagehat_desc: Much power resides within these showy hairpins. The wig is free, but non-negotiable.
texts.t13magehat_desc: To gaze into the eye too long is to invite madness. Thankfully, the crystals are very jingly and super distracting.
texts.riftmagehat_desc: Has a direct hotline with the heavens.
texts.beachmagehat_desc: Show off your status as a landed elite! Underwater real estate is certain to blow up in the near future!
texts.gothitamagehat_desc: Consumes a modicum of the wearer's magic power to remain in place, defying gravity
texts.bracers_desc: Protective guard used primarily in archery.
texts.thiefgloves_desc: The five finger discount now made easy.
texts.grottogloves_desc: Generates vicious static if you rub your hands like a villain.
texts.patchworkgloves_desc: They're comfy and easy to wear.
texts.lunargloves_desc: Can only be fastened with magic, so Sparkless Heroes will need to ask their mom for help.
texts.vambraces_desc: A must for any serious duelist.
texts.eastergloves2020_desc: A most delicate touch... Perfect for egg hunting!
texts.savagegloves_desc: Claw your way to the top of the food chain.
texts.desertgloves_desc: Considered a weapon in most kingdoms!
texts.ninjagloves_desc: Lightly padded to safely handle poisoned shurikens.
texts.catgloves_desc: Adept at climbing, and adds a little kick to your punch.
texts.gothitagloves_desc: There is something magically mysterious about fingerless gloves.
texts.windrunnergloves_desc: Made for climbing, swimming, riding and tree swinging.
texts.dragongloves_desc: Naturally adroit at handling gold coins and all sorts of precious currency.
texts.oktobergloves_desc: Specially enchanted to never let go of a mug, even in the midst of battle!
texts.captaingloves_desc: These stay warm and dry even after weeks at sea.
texts.vipgloves_desc: Perfect for twirling a coin ominously!
texts.goldgloves_desc: The bling don't go well with stealth. But it looks real good.
texts.jackalopegloves_desc: There's no getting the scent of sulfur out of these.
texts.halloweengloves_desc: There is no more comfortable handwear when flipping through pages and pages of fan mail. Vampires have been getting a lot of it ever since that one book came out.
texts.t12gloves_desc: Worn during his final ultimate heist. The Dawn Thief plucked the second sun from the sky as easily as one would a flower.
texts.volcanogloves_desc: To the truly deft, wind can be pocketed as easily as gold.
texts.cincogloves_desc: Finger snapping is paramount, so these gloves were made fingerless.
texts.musketeergloves_desc: Slapping someone with one of those generates a lot of aggro!
texts.campinggloves_desc: There's really no excuse for getting lost now.
texts.leatherboots_desc: Protects you from glass and stray nails.
texts.forestshoes_desc: There are those who take the beaten path, and there are those who create it.
texts.softshoes_desc: Feels like you're walking on a cloud!
texts.romansandals_desc: All roads lead to Rome. All that remains is to walk there.
texts.thiefshoes_desc: So quiet you could leave a party early without anyone noticing.
texts.flowersandals_desc: Adds spring to your steps. Pun intended.
texts.elvenshoes_desc: Said to make you walk a few inches off the ground.
texts.blossomshoes_desc: Delicate footing is required to not disturb the gifts of the cherry tree.
texts.arabianshoes_desc: These fine enchanted shoes can endure the scalding heat of sun-scorched sands.
texts.inuitshoes_desc: Their tiny size makes it likely you'll just sink in the snow, but the city doesn't see a lot of snow anyway.
texts.ninjatabi_desc: The legendary stealth of a ninja begins with a sneaky stride.
texts.batshoes_desc: Step into the twilight and experience a world of sensations!
texts.windrunnerboots_desc: Peculiar boots meant for long distance travel. Immune to the wear and tear of the road.
texts.ruinsshoes_desc: Stride so wide, you may as well be flying.
texts.harpyshoes_desc: Harpies are notoriously poor runners, but marketing insisted on capitalizing on the Harpy's popularity.
texts.dragonshoes_desc: Actually made of very convincing synthetic materials to combat dragon poaching.
texts.castleshoe_desc: The natural order of things must be disturbed. At all costs.
texts.cincoshoes2020_desc: Watch out when wearing these in battle; they just want to dance away.
texts.captainshoes_desc: Prevents any unfortunate slip and dip.
texts.lunarboots_desc: Cirrus, cumulus, stratus... All within your purview.
texts.jackalopeshoes_desc: The Cult of the Everdusk seeks to plunge the world in darkness, where the only light would be the fires under their control.
texts.birdshoes_desc: May look out of place if worn without the Raptor Wings.
texts.goldshoes_desc: Featuring the patented Tenochtitlan Toeguard Technology.
texts.t12shoes_desc: The shoes worn by the Dawn Thief of legends. The story tells that they allowed him to walk up to the firmament, with even the gods unable to intervene.
