texts.westernshoes_desc: It's got spurs that jingle jangle jingle.
texts.thanksgivingshoes_desc: Artworks of simple make allow its creator's talent to truly shine.
texts.junimayshoes_desc: The soles have seen little to no use. Would you walk if you could fly?
texts.t13shoes_desc: Allows for completely silent footsteps regardless of terrain. No prey can possibly hope to escape.
texts.platinumshoes_desc: Dwarves got sick kicks when they want to.
texts.woodshield_desc: May or may not be a repurposed broken door.
texts.buckler_desc: Strong and dependable. What more do you need?
texts.oakshield_desc: Said to be made from the heart of the ancient oak trees.
texts.ironshield_desc: A well crafted iron shield can last you a hundred battles.
texts.grottoshield_desc: Such bling comes with a hefty weight. Also price. But mostly weight.
texts.argonshield_desc: Forged with a twin purpose: To protect the weak and battle evil.
texts.largebuckler_desc: Made from an elegant alloy of mythril and gold.  Suitable for a king!
texts.aegirshield_desc: Sound the horn in times of needs and reinforcements will surely come.
texts.natureshield_desc: "Fragrant protection" is not a key selling point you get to use often!
texts.towershield_desc: The iconic shield of the mythical dragon riders.
texts.fallshield_desc: Not actually made of real leaves. It would make for a poor shield.
texts.ancestortotem_desc: Let the ancestor warriors guide you through battle.
texts.zealouspavise_desc: Faith can be a tremendous shield... but the giant slab of Celesteel also helps.
texts.castleshield_desc: Forged by a fallen angel over volcanic heat.
texts.stpatrickshield_desc: A relic of ages past, blessed by three goddess of a distant land.
texts.goldshield_desc: Provides stellar protection against everything not electricity.
texts.prideshield_desc: If you are to lead the pack, might as well do it in style.
texts.dragonshield_desc: Wielded only by the leader of the dragon riders. Its very existence is thought to be a myth.
texts.beeshield_desc: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way this shield could fly. Indeed, it does not.
texts.snowshield_desc: A powerful Crystalice gem is needed to power this shield's cooling aura.
texts.t12shield_desc: A mysterious contraption found in the deepest, darkest reaches of the ocean. Makes for a nice shield, but seemingly could be much more than that.
texts.shoprshield_desc: Having a potion in front of the shield is decidedly suboptimal placement, but R&D insisted.
texts.goldshield2_desc: Buckle up for the price tag on this one.
texts.newyearshield_desc: Fallen angels have some sick gear if you can get your hands on it.
texts.africanshield_desc: Blessed with protective charms to ensure a warrior's safe return.
texts.t13shield_desc: Regenerates just about any damage in mere seconds, although its form may change significantly over time.
texts.mundrashield_desc: When she heard about a Boss monster from another dimension, Mundra toiled day and night to create this masterpiece.
texts.beachshield_desc: No man nor tide can whelm the wielder of Waverider.
texts.boarshield_desc: With this shield in tow, you may find yourself charging recklessly into battle without noticing.
texts.squirecloak_desc: A simple, cheap cape for adventurers with little money or children with big dreams.
texts.wanderercloak_desc: A simple status symbol for pencil pushers all over.
texts.druidcloak_desc: Fully organic, if that's your thing.
texts.empirecloak_desc: Not too useful, but certainly looks sharp. All the rage among Imperial nobles at the moment.
texts.batcloak_desc: Put this on and ponder the mysteries of man and other miserable little secrets.
texts.elvencloak_desc: A delicate elven design with complex golden filigree. Somehow augments the user's stealth.
texts.darkknightcloak_desc: Terror follows the footsteps of its malevolent owner.
texts.furcloak_desc: Originally worn by a famous Beastmaster Barbarian. There have been many imitations since.
texts.scalecloak_desc: Grants great authority over dragonkind, but beware those who have not earned it!
texts.bishopcloak_desc: Worn by high-ranking clergy. The crystal is quite fragile!
texts.starcloak_desc: When you gaze long into the abyss...
texts.goldcloak_desc: Heavy is the burden of the monarch. This cloak may be part of the reason.
texts.frogcloak_desc: Giant lily pads are grown in sacred groves, deep within secret confines of the marshes. Weaving them into clothes is an art thought to be long lost.
texts.t12cloak_desc: Draped in the darkest silks, the Herald made its presence known among weeping mortals.
texts.blossomcloak_desc: Billows elegantly with even a slight breeze.
texts.junimaycloak_desc: If you believe in them, they fly! They really do!
texts.t13cloak_desc: Nobody knows where the water comes from, but it just spills...everywhere.
texts.beachcloak_desc: At sea or shore, you can count on it for sure.
texts.fallcloak_desc: Sondra insists he knows the guy pictured on the cloak. Old high school buddy, he claims.
texts.doublering_desc: Gold and silver intertwined in a wealthy duality.
texts.fatring_desc: Don't be fooled by cheap garnet imitations.
texts.grottoring_desc: Don't be fooled by cheap peridot imitations.
texts.silverband_desc: Has seen a sharp decline in popularity among werewolves.
texts.valentinering_desc: Awakens its true power when given to a soulmate.
texts.noblering_desc: Just wearing it gives you a smug sense of superiority.
texts.cincoring2020_desc: Enhances the wearer's musical ability and temporarily breaks the curse of beat and tone deafness.
texts.hemmadonring_desc: There's... there's someone in there? Is this legal?
texts.knightsignet_desc: Bears the seal of King Reinhold himself.
texts.freedomring_desc: Not suitable as a wedding ring.
texts.lunarring_desc: It's good to have emergency pocket change handy!
texts.batrachitestone_desc: Its unique gemstone can only be found in the stomach of giant frogs.
texts.chosenring_desc: The mark of a special hero chosen by destiny. Also gives you the power to enter people's homes and steal their stuff.
texts.sulfuritecoil_desc: Equipped with state of the art scratch-and-sniff technology.
texts.batring_desc: While normally a reclusive bunch, wearing this ring should let you in all the cool vampire hangout spots.
texts.campingring_desc: It's certainly not coming loose, although it's a bit on the short side.
texts.feyring_desc: The symbol of a rare union between human and fey.
texts.springflower_desc: Don't lick the gemstone. Yes, you thought about it.
texts.schoolring2020_desc: Awarded very sparingly by Evelyn to her most exceptional students.
texts.borealis_desc: It is said each of these ring captures a sliver of the Northern Lights.
texts.templering_desc: The cold wind of the north is both a blessing and a curse.
texts.winterring_desc: Refuses to be worn alongside mittens, but seems to tolerate the Winter's Touch.
texts.bunnyring_desc: Makes you tap your feet frantically all the time.
texts.mysteriousring_desc: What stirs within the multiple facets of this ring?
texts.candyring_desc: Has no business being this powerful, but sweet-toothed fairies really packed this thing full of enchantments.
texts.newyearring_desc: So, about your resolutions from last year...
texts.t12ring_desc: Not a single imperfection can be found among the many pearls adorning this ring. Its value is beyond compare.
texts.unicornring_desc: Once a mere ring of ice, it is now blessed by a unicorn, granting it unimaginable power.
texts.africanring_desc: Originally forged by an ancient god of iron. Its bold design towers above other inferior jewelry.
texts.maplering_desc: A convenient pick-me-up that's easily carried. It doesn't freeze easy, so it's great for the outdoors!
texts.goldring2_desc: Used by Sia to stamp Reinhold's blank checks. Hence the grimace.
texts.t13ring_desc: The serpent whispers sweet nothings to your ears. Quite flirty, even.
texts.fallring_desc: Blooming lotus flowers are picked and magically weaved into these rings of jade. The result is a masterpiece that is both living and artificial.
texts.ironamulet_desc: The center pieces can be removed to insert a portrait.
texts.pendant_desc: Glows a weak, green light when it senses leylines nearby.
texts.chain_desc: Given by soldiers to their lovers as a promise of their safe return.
texts.sunpendant_desc: The sun is in your hand!
texts.grottoamulet_desc: Awakens hidden powers when worn during an eclipse. Solar or lunar? The manual doesn't say.
texts.noblechain_desc: Pair it up with the Noble Ring for maximum smugness.
texts.medal_desc: A prestigious decoration awarded to the brave among the brave.
texts.goldamulet_desc: Said to bring good fortune to its bearer... which they obviously don't need.
texts.holysymbol_desc: Worn by members of the clergy. Its appearance varies depending on the religion.
texts.oktoberamulet_desc: Is it a potion? or an amulet? Who really knows?
texts.cincoamulet_desc: There's a few beads in there that make a satisfying rattling sound when shaken.
texts.titaniumtorc_desc: Good enough for a Shop Titan.
texts.timelocket_desc: Automatically adjusts to time zones and time saving. Convenient!
texts.dreamamulet_desc: Requires some tuning to ensure it only catches the bad ones.
texts.magatama_desc: Guarantees luck and success in the life of warriors (and the occasional lawyer).
texts.dragonamulet_desc: Imbues its wearer with great power and a fierce lust for gold.
texts.archivistglasses_desc: Put on your serious glasses; it's time for some bookkeeping.
texts.phylactery_desc: You probably shouldn't handle that without holy water...
texts.rudoamulet_desc: Surprisingly vicious for an inanimate object, hence the bindings.
texts.spaceamulet_desc: All the inconveniences of a real pet with none of the benefits!
texts.alimyriad_desc: All is one, one is all.
texts.priestamulet_desc: As if someone is always watching over you...
texts.vipamulet_desc: With this token from Maya, you could even walk into Reinhold's very court!
texts.brisingamen_desc: These gems glitter furiously, like a raging inferno.
texts.peakamulet_desc: You are always safe when you are the eye of the storm.
texts.troblinamulet_desc: The Troublins of the Howling Woods meticulously gather acorns that fail to sprout, believing them to hold powerful magic.
texts.atlab_amulet_desc: A memento from Aang's beloved teacher, Gyatso.
texts.wiccanamulet_desc: This talisman has recently been charged with magical energy through pagan rituals.
texts.t12amulet_desc: Only once in her long life did Titania ever give something without expecting something in return.
texts.goldamulet2_desc: It's a bit showy. Just a lil' bit.
texts.arcadeamulet_desc: Play anything, anywhere. You'll need to use your imagination a little, though.
texts.cyclopsamulet_desc: The sand within catches the eye, inviting its owner to gaze for eons.
texts.junimayamulet_desc: A traditional wreath of fae design, influenced by Maylee's fascination with jewels.
texts.t13amulet_desc: Fairies run a tight schedule. Frolicking at 9, lazing about at 10... Can't be late!
texts.harpyamulet_desc: It is said wearing this will prevent Harpies from attacking you. Though they might just do it anyway, they can't resist shinies.
texts.platinumamulet_desc: Without a doubt the mark of a very wealthy dwarven guildmaster.
texts.baconeggs_desc: The quintessential breakfast classic. Start your day on the right note!
texts.baobun_desc: Also colloquially known as Bao Buns. There is no skimping on the filling.
texts.spacemeal_desc: Would absolutely be categorized as a Dessert item if anyone bothered looking at the ingredients.
texts.poutine_desc: Fries, gravy and cheese curds. If that doesn't sound like the best thing ever then you can get outta here.
texts.maplemeal_desc: The average Canayan breakfast. There's maple syrup in there too.
texts.burger_desc: The unmistakable fast food king. The "cheese" is 100% processed and completely unnatural, just how it should be!
texts.patechinois_desc: An eternal war rages in Kebak Canaya to this day, clashing over the addition of Ketchup to this meal. Modern science suggests that the Ketchup addition is an abomination.
texts.pizza_desc: Sometimes, simple is more than enough.
texts.arcademeal_desc: Eat your vegetables to grow big and strong. Possibly with a funky sound effect.
texts.ahipoke_desc: This raw fish dish is a specialty of Tutu Mano. Only the freshest of ingredients are worthy of this bowl!
texts.coconutcurry_desc: A family recipe of Mahi-Mahi fish curry. Tutu Mano likes it HOT though! Customers be warned!
texts.kebabs_desc: A vegetarian variant to cover your daily vegetable servings. You can eat the plate, too!
texts.ramen_desc: An eternal classic and crowd favorite. Watch the salt intake.
texts.t12meal_desc: Grilled chicken generously smothered in a sweet, eponymous Huli-Huli sauce.
texts.goldmeal_desc: Did you know that gold is technically edible?
texts.t13meal_desc: The ultimate combination of land & sea.
texts.firecrabmeal_desc: Did you remember to turn off the volcano stove?
texts.fallmeal_desc: This special festival recipe is roasted over a sun dragon's fire breath.
texts.cookies_desc: These aren't your average, cheap cookies. The chunks are BIG!
texts.shavedice_desc: Cool shopkeeper tip! Store it near some Aurora Springwater to keep it from melting in your inventory!
texts.taiyaki_desc: Each one has a mystery (but delicious!) filling inside.
texts.cheesecake_desc: It's hard to stop at one slice, but it's for your own good.
texts.valentinedessert_desc: It's a bit tacky, but it's a classic for a reason!
texts.macaron_desc: You can also say Macaroon if that's more your style.
texts.daifuku_desc: Every bite includes a sweet, strawberry surprise.
texts.spiralcake_desc: Deliciously spongy with an inviting, creamy spiral. Don't you wish it was more than a 3D model?
texts.pineapplecake_desc: It's not on a pizza, so it's fine, right?
texts.tuxedocake_desc: Your average cake after putting on its Sunday best.
texts.t12dessert_desc: Kaipo is more than happy to give it a fancy custom shape on demand.
texts.coconutcake_desc: It's no cocoincidence that this creamy cake can-nut be resisted.
texts.golddessert_desc: It's messy eating, but who can resist?
texts.newyeardessert_desc: No mere description could possibly give justice to this divine dessert.
texts.t13dessert_desc: Is it vegan if there's a shark-shaped melon?
texts.campingdessert_desc: It's a veritable smorgasbord of flavors and goodness.
texts.chipped_desc: An inert runestone with faint traces of power. The Priestess or the Wizard can craft it into an Enchantment.
texts.flawed_desc: An inert runestone brimming with potential. The Priestess or the Wizard can craft it into an Enchantment.
texts.chiseled_desc: A finely cut runestone quivering with energy. The Priestess or the Wizard can craft it into an Enchantment.
texts.perfect_desc: An expertly cut runestone perfectly attuned to magic. The Priestess or the Wizard can craft it into an Enchantment.
texts.lessermoon_desc: A chunk of slightly magical moonstone. An essential component for Fusion.
texts.flawedmoon_desc: A fragment of lunar meteorite, frozen in stone. An essential component for Fusion.
texts.greatermoon_desc: A lunar cycle, bound in physical form. An essential component for Fusion.
texts.perfectmoon_desc: Crystalized lunar magic brimming with power. An essential component for Fusion.
texts.ember_desc: Comfortably warm to the touch. Keep it in your pockets during harsh winter months.
texts.flaming_desc: The wizard handbook strongly recommends not storing it in your library, or in close proximity to any flammables.
texts.blaze_desc: The air turns to a haze around this white-hot rune.
texts.inferno_desc: The sheer heat emitted by this rune may very well turn lesser items to ashes.
texts.bubble_desc: Constantly dripping with pure, fresh water.
texts.tidal_desc: Smells like the sea. If held to the ear, it sounds like the sea, too.
texts.flood_desc: It just never stops pouring. Keep it outside!
texts.torrent_desc: The relentless, battering might of the ocean will see itself victorious in due time.
texts.breeze_desc: Constantly emits a cool breeze. A bunch of these can be used for makeshift air conditioning.
texts.gale_desc: Tends to summon up strong drafts of winds. Can be used to dry clothes in no time.
texts.tempest_desc: Accidentally breaking one of these can release a storm that lasts for weeks!
texts.hurricane_desc: Unmatched uprooting force rarely seen in this world. When you sow the wind...
texts.natural_desc: Locally grown with no artificial agents or preservatives.
texts.wild_desc: This stone longs for freedom! Don't keep it on a leash!
texts.primal_desc: Imbued with the unyielding strength of mountains.
texts.primeval_desc: Unchanging. Unfaltering. Life was, is, and will. Regardless of what happens.
texts.holy_desc: Monotonously recites a bunch of holy commandments whenever asked.
texts.sacred_desc: This rune sings a soft angelic chorus when held by a pure and pious individual.
texts.divine_desc: Pure and immaculate, spiritually and morally. It will however enforce the same from its owner.
texts.corrupted_desc: Cackles can be heard from this Element. What's so funny?
texts.unholy_desc: Easily sucks up all the life out of a room. But not literally.
texts.abyssal_desc: Utterly corrupted and beyond redemption. Even the noblest Paladin should stay well clear of this wretched creation.
texts.luxuriouselement_desc: A magical stone of great value. Of no use to Heroes, but certainly makes items look more expensive!
texts.opulentelement_desc: The very essence of wealth itself. Could this be the legendary Philosopher's Stone?
texts.freshspirit_desc: Food just tastes better when its fresh!
texts.turtle_desc: Just holding it makes you want to bonk your head into stuff.
texts.wolf_desc: Doesn't get along with the Ram Spirit. At all.
texts.ox_desc: Items enchanted with this spirit sometimes grow a mysterious enmity for the color red.
texts.eagle_desc: Some say it is the spirit of freedom itself.
texts.viper_desc: It has a bit of a mean streak.
texts.rabbitspirit_desc: If you chase two rabbits... you may be looking for a multicraft!
texts.luxuriousspirit_desc: The harbinger of the sun's death. Thankfully it'll be back by next morning.
texts.rhino_desc: No rhinos were harmed in the making of this spirit.
texts.owl_desc: How many licks does it take to get to the center of this rune?
texts.armadillo_desc: If you ignore your problems, they might just go away.
texts.lizard_desc: If left to sunbathe, will magically regenerate chips and nicks. Somehow.
texts.crab_desc: The unbreakable endurance of the wild stallion distilled into spirit form.
texts.hippo_desc: Whatever this spirit is enchanted on feels... quite a bit chunkier.
texts.walrus_desc: It's a hard one to budge.
texts.lion_desc: Everything the light touches is this spirit's kingdom.
texts.bear_desc: It's no wonder Rudo likes them!
texts.dinosaur_desc: Actually consists mostly of frog DNA. Dinosaurs are extinct, after all.
texts.dragon_desc: Haughty even in spirit form. It seems more than eager to show those bosses who's boss.
texts.tiger_desc: Has a particular affinity for cereals. They're great!
texts.opulentspirit_desc: The wind, the guide and road sweeper of the rain gods.
texts.phoenix_desc: This rune should not exist. It is a monument to man's arrogance.
texts.hydra_desc: Chop, chop, chop. The more you hack, the more heads grow...
texts.tarrasque_desc: When the tarrasque rises, nations fall.
texts.carbuncle_desc: Cute and harmless as it may look, this creature holds untold power.
texts.chimera_desc: An unholy amalgamation of lion, goat, dragon and snake. About as accommodating as you would expect!
texts.kraken_desc: It hungers for ships, which it cracks like mere walnuts between its many tentacles.
texts.santa_desc: A jolly spirit of merry winter times. Its true potential is unleashed when enchanted on Christmas items.
texts.elvenwood_desc: Its iconic shape is much easier to sculpt than it may seem.
texts.glowingmushrooms_desc: Can act as an eco-friendly torch in a pinch.
texts.arcanedust_desc: Grants the magical warding properties of silver upon whatever it is sprinkled on.
texts.webbedwings_desc: Large, supple wings that once belonged to a giant bat.
texts.preciousgem_desc: Arcane energies of unknown origins still linger within.
texts.livingroots_desc: The more humanoid it looks, the better the taste. Creepy, right?
texts.darkscale_desc: Rustwyrms need a balanced diet of metals to grow big and strong.
texts.icypearl_desc: Taken from the swamp's giant clams.
texts.whitesand_desc: Blindingly bright sand with no impurities whatsoever.
texts.sharpfang_desc: Considering its size, you really don't want to know where it came from.
texts.mooncrystal_desc: Its inner darkness seems to consume light itself.
texts.evileye_desc: Evil Eyes sometimes twitch as one, as if controlled by a single entity
texts.silkscarab_desc: An exotic material thought to be of divine origin by a lost civilization.
texts.starmetal_desc: A mythical metal from another planet.
texts.ancientmarble_desc: They don't make it like they used to!
texts.overgrownvine_desc: Arcane carbon dating suggests this vine is... over a thousand years old?!?
texts.timecrystal_desc: This rare crystal is said to hold power over time itself.
texts.sewingthread_desc: Exquisite golden thread said to represent life expectancy. Don't cut it too short!
texts.ghostflag_desc: The sigil of a house long gone. This flag has seen many things.
texts.deepcoral_desc: When taken out of the water, this substance becomes as hard as steel!
texts.sirenshard_desc: There is a faint song coming from this...And it is so hard to put down...
texts.goldshell_desc: How this conch ended up covered in 24k plating, nobody knows.
texts.icybreeze_desc: This magically charged northern wind is especially useful to temper molten metal.
texts.crabclaw_desc: Utterly unbreakable and sweltering on the outside, delicious on the inside.
texts.obsidian_desc: Wizards of great renown believe it could be possible to create a powerful, magical portal with this material. To where? They would rather not say.
texts.magmacore_desc: Defying all known laws of physics, this core never cools.
texts.voidcrystal_desc: Whatever it's made of is wholly incompatible with our reality.
texts.voideye_desc: It sees you - It is coming - It sees you - It is coming - It sees you - It is coming -
texts.voidcloth_desc: A sufficiently godly tailor could possibly shape a new world with this.
texts.platinumjewel_desc: Melting down this masterpiece requires a master of the craft to not ruin this precious metal. They are used to craft Platinum items.
texts.tabletjewel_desc: An incredibly scarce component used to craft Opulent Items. It can be sold on the market at a high price.
texts.tabletfragment_desc: A very rare component used to craft Luxurious items. It can also be sold on the market at a high price.
texts.puregold_desc: An awfully heavy bar made 99% out of gold. The King will greatly reward guilds that bring him some.
texts.mightsigil_desc: Raw strength condensed into a symbol of arcane power. Used to craft very powerful items.
texts.gracesigil_desc: Pure dexterity condensed into a symbol of arcane power. Used to craft very powerful items.
texts.sparksigil_desc: Unbound magical potential condensed into a symbol of arcane power. Used to craft very powerful items.
texts.mightsigil2_desc: True strength refined into crystalized arcane power. Used to craft very unimaginably powerful items.
texts.gracesigil2_desc: True dexterity refined into crystalized arcane power. Used to craft very unimaginably powerful items.
texts.sparksigil2_desc: True magical potential refined into crystalized arcane power. Used to craft very unimaginably powerful items.
texts.xpdrink1_desc: Give it to a character for an instant XP boost!
texts.xpdrink2_desc: Give it to a character for a major XP boost!
texts.xpdrink3_desc: Give it to a character for a huge XP boost!
texts.xpdrink4_desc: Increases a Hero's level by 1, regardless of XP needed!
texts.seedhp1_desc: Permanently increases the HP of a character.
texts.seedattack1_desc: Permanently increases the Attack of a character.
texts.seeddef1_desc: Permanently increases the Defense of a character.
texts.seedhp1_plus_desc: Permanently raises the maximum amount of Seeds of Vitality a hero can consume by 5.
texts.seedattack1_plus_desc: Permanently raises the maximum amount of Seeds of Power a hero can consume by 5.
texts.seeddef1_plus_desc: Permanently raises the maximum amount of Seeds of Resistance a hero can consume by 5.
texts.bp_upgrade_desc: Used to grant powerful upgrades to blueprints. They can be found in chests.
texts.bp_unlock_desc: Research Scrolls are used to unlock new blueprints. You can earn more by crafting lots of items or by opening chests.
texts.repairkit_desc: Repairs an item broken during a quest.
texts.atkbooster2_desc: Large Power bonus for one quest.
texts.atkbooster3_desc: Huge Power bonus for one quest.
texts.xpbooster1_desc: Boosts XP gained by 50% for the whole party!
texts.xpbooster2_desc: Doubles XP gained by the whole party!
texts.xpbooster3_desc: Triples XP gained by the whole party! Now that's grinding!
texts.compass1_desc: Speeds up quest and rest time by 25%.
texts.compass2_desc: Speeds up quest and rest time by 50%!
texts.compass3_desc: Nearly eliminates quest and rest time! Ludicrous speed!
texts.skillreroller1_desc: Can reroll the skill in a Hero's first skill slot.
texts.skillreroller2_desc: Can reroll the skill in a Hero's second skill slot or below.
texts.skillreroller3_desc: Can reroll the skill in a Hero's third skill slot or below.
texts.skillreroller4_desc: Can reroll the skill in any Hero's skill slot!
texts.titansoul_desc: Upgrades a Hero's class permanently, making them stronger and unlocking all skill slots.
texts.limitededition_desc: Special stamp that lets you surcharge a single item twice.
texts.discounttoken_desc: Special stamp that sells an item for free, but grants 10x more discount energy.
texts.antique_shard_desc: Rare currency obtained with the King's Favor. Can be used to purchase Antiques during the King's Caprice event and is kept after the event ends.
texts.dragonemblem_desc: A rare currency obtained during the Dragon Invasion event. Can be used to upgrade the Dragon's Hoard, upgrade furniture past level 15, or rush furniture upgrade times.
texts.cannonball_desc: Special booster only usable during the Dragon Invasion event. Stronger than any other booster!
texts.strefund_any_desc: This Token allows one free refund of any of the three Talent Trees.
texts.strefund_bartering_desc: This Token allows one free refund of the Bartering Talent Tree.
texts.strefund_questing_desc: This Token allows one free refund of the Questing Talent Tree.
texts.strefund_crafting_desc: This Token allows one free refund of the Crafting Talent Tree.
texts.chest_forest_desc: A sturdy chest found in the Howling Woods. It can be opened with a Wooden Key.
texts.chest_grotto_desc: A mysteriously cold chest found in the Aurora Caves. It can be opened with a Frozen Key.
texts.chest_swamp_desc: An unpleasant chest found in the Whispering Bog. It can be opened with a Slimy Key.
texts.chest_desert_desc: A smooth chest found in the Barren Wastes. It can be opened with a Limestone Key.
texts.chest_pyramid_desc: A regal chest found in the Sun God's Tomb. It can be opened with an Ancient Key.
texts.chest_ruins_desc: A time-weathered chest found in the Chronos Ruins. It can be opened with a Timeworn Key.
texts.chest_castle_desc: An ancient chest found in the Haunted Castle. It can be opened with a Forsaken Key.
texts.chest_temple_desc: A briny, soaked chest found in the Sunken Temple. It can be opened with a Sunken Key.
texts.chest_peak_desc: A dreadful chest found at the Bleakspire Peak. It can be opened with a Bleak Key.
texts.chest_volcano_desc: A red-hot chest found in the Cinderlake Volcano. It can be opened with a Molten Key.
texts.chest_rift_desc: An extradimensional chest found in the Void Dimension. It can be opened with a Void Key.
texts.chest_goldcity_desc: An extremely heavy chest found in the Lost City of Gold. It can be opened with a Luxurious Key.
texts.chest_goldcity2_desc: An extremely heavy chest found in the Lost City of Gold. It can be opened with an Opulent Key.
texts.chest_goldcity3_desc: A ridiculously heavy chest found in the Lost City of Gold. It can be opened with a Platinum Key.
texts.key_forest_desc: A magic key intricately carved from Elven Wood. Only it can open a Wooden Chest.
texts.key_grotto_desc: A magic key made of eternal ice. Only it can open a Frozen Chest.
texts.key_swamp_desc: A magic key coated in something... viscous. Only it can open a Slimy Chest.
texts.key_desert_desc: An unexpectedly heavy magic key made of pure limestone. Only it can open a Limestone Chest.
texts.key_pyramid_desc: A magic key that may or may not be cursed. Only it can open the Ancient Chest.
texts.key_ruins_desc: A magic key bathed in temporal magic. Only it can open the Timeworn Chest.
texts.key_castle_desc: A magic key shimmering with the glory of old. Only it can open the Forsaken Chest.
texts.key_temple_desc: A magic key exuding briny water. Only it can open the Sunken Chest
texts.key_peak_desc: A magic key seeping with dreariness. Only it can open the Bleak Chest
texts.key_volcano_desc: A magic key sweltering with heat. Only it can open the Molten Chest.
texts.key_rift_desc: A magic key that seems to exist between dimensions. Only it can open the Void Chest.
texts.key_goldcity_desc: A magic key made of pure gold. Only it can open the Luxurious Chest.
texts.key_goldcity2_desc: A magic key made of pure gold. Only it can open the Opulent Chest.
texts.key_goldcity3_desc: A magic key made of pure platinum. Only it can open the Platinum Chest.
texts.token_argon_desc: Fierce determination minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Argon.
texts.token_lilu_desc: Boundless curiosity minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Lilu.
texts.token_sia_desc: An air of mystery minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Sia.
texts.token_yami_desc: Cold vengeance minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Yami.
texts.token_rudo_desc: Ruthless savagery minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Rudo.
texts.token_polonia_desc: A lust for adventure minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Polonia.
texts.token_donovan_desc: Timeless knowledge minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Donovan.
texts.token_hemma_desc: Unbound power minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Hemma.
texts.token_ashley_desc: Unshakable will minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Ashley.
texts.token_bjorn_desc: An unbreakable bond minted into a coin. Collect them to empower Bjorn.
texts.token_atlab_aang_desc: The power of all four elements minted into a coin. Collect them to empower the Guest Champion Aang.
texts.token_atlab_sokka_desc: Sarcasm and ingenuity bound minted into a coin. Collect them to empower the Guest Champion Sokka.
texts.token_leather_desc: Raw Tamas minted into a coin. Collect them to empower the Guest Champion Tamas.
texts.token_king_desc: Unmitigated majesty minted into a coin. Collect them to empower the Guest Champion Reinhold.
texts.troblin_desc: Always out causing trouble. As one might expect.
texts.yeti_desc: Local expert at making snowmen. Its snow angels, however, are not so hot.
texts.toadwitch_desc: Don't be tricked into kissing it, nothing will happen. Is also a terrible cook.
texts.mushgoon_desc: A big bully. Will fight anything smaller than it, which to be frank isn't a lot of things.
texts.anubis_desc: You really, really ought to be on your best behavior around it. The judgment feather is quite light.
texts.cyclops_desc: An all-around cool dude, all things considered. Has trouble with depth perception.
texts.tyrantking_desc: Very insecure about its short stature. Dislikes magnets.
texts.mermaid_desc: Spends most of its days lounging around. Sunbaths take priority over anything else!
texts.harpy_desc: How it manages to even fly is a mystery. Loves shinies.
texts.firecrab_desc: An irreplaceable pal during cold winter months. Welcomed at forges all over the world.
texts.goldgolem_desc: Gleams like gold. Because it is, in fact, golden all over. Carefully maintains this beautiful sheen with constant maintenance.
texts.voidling_desc: When reared from a young age, this otherwordly monstrosity is quite cuddly!
texts.powderkeg_no_tattoo_desc: This is what happens when Roxanne gets her hands on a mace blueprint.
texts.christmascroll_no_tattoo_desc: Your name is on the nice list!
texts.fireworksscroll_no_tattoo_desc: It isn't exactly magical, but it sure feels like it!
texts.vipscroll_no_tattoo_desc: Fortune favors the bold... and the bearer of this gilded parchment.
texts.batscroll_no_tattoo_desc: What a horrible night to have a curse.
texts.freedomscroll_no_tattoo_desc: Even the most seasoned of Star Commanders need reference material every now and then.
texts.freedomboots_no_tattoo_desc: A path of stars is lain before you.
texts.freedomring_no_tattoo_desc: A secret sign among rogue Star Commanders, typically dishonorably discharged after a resounding failure.
texts.schoolring2020_no_tattoo_desc: Awarded very sparingly by Evelyn to her most exceptional students.
texts.newyearring_no_tattoo_desc: So, about your resolutions from last year...
texts.medal_no_tattoo_desc: The mark of authority of Star Commanders. It requires exceptional prowess on the battlefield.
texts.mechaheavyarmor_desc: Too heavy to easily move in, it features special exoskeleton technology to ease the burden on the wearer. As a prototype however, the battery life is extremely limited.
texts.mechahelm_desc: Features multiple sensors as well as night vision, but most operators choose to turn them off to save battery life.
texts.mechagauntlets_desc: Greatly enhances the wearer's grip strength, but has a tendency to glitch and crush mundane weaponry.
texts.mechaboots_desc: By design, it should allow the wearer to fly. In practice, they only allow for increased jumping power.
texts.selfcarepotion_desc: Even Heroes suffer from dry skin sometimes.
texts.selfcareshoes_desc: This pair won't break if you look at them funny. As a bonus, doesn't slip on wet floor!
texts.selfcarestaff_desc: Magically scratches that itch just right, metaphorical or not.
texts.platinumgauntlets_desc: The interlocking plates allow for a very precise range of motion for the fingers. A masterpiece, even among dwarven crafts.
texts.dinosword_desc: Ever wonder why dinosaurs went extinct?
texts.jestermediumarmor_desc: The Goddess gives her silliest outfit to her funniest Dancers.
texts.cornucopiadessert_desc: It very much never runs out. Unfortunately the horn itself is also delicious and most will succumb to its succulent temptation.
texts.championtitansoul_desc: Upgrades a Champion permanently, increasing the stats earned from future and current rank ups.
texts.greeksword_desc: An arrogant demigoddess once earned Zeus' ire. Somehow, she captured the smiting thunderbolt and had it forged into this legendary blade.
texts.greekshoes_desc: Though it allows swift movement for its wearer, only its original owner is capable of employing its world-traversing properties.
texts.greekmediumarmor_desc: The pelt of Chrysomallos, the golden ram of legends. It is said that wearing it grants absolute kingly authority.
texts.greekwand_desc: One of Hermes' treasures. Among other things, it symbolizes commerce, so its perfect for you!
texts.platinumring_desc: Two for the price of one! But the price of one is still very, very expensive.
texts.worker_croc_desc: Doc Croc is a jolly crocodile with a knack for strange blueprints.
texts.player_level_up_detail_skilltree_desc: You have unlocked the <color=#FFB72C>Talent Tree</color>! You can access it in the menu.
texts.player_level_up_detail_skillpoint_desc: You can now buy a new Talent Point with <sprite name="Gold"><color=#FFB72C> Gold</color>!
texts.skill_tree_node_locked_desc: Requires {0} Talent points in connected nodes.
texts.skill_tree_node_lock_locked_desc: No more than {0} talents of this category can be unlocked at the same time.
texts.skill_tree_reset_branch_description_top: You are about to refund the <color=#FFB72C>{0}</color> Talent Tree. The Talent Points refunded can be assigned for free.
texts.skill_tree_reset_branch_description_bot: Each Tree can be refunded once for free. Subsequent refunds will cost gems.
texts.skill_tree_reset_branch_free_reset_warni: There are no Talent Points assigned to this Tree.
texts.skill_tree_info_popup_top_description: Unlock Talents from your favorite Talent Tree and unlock powerful abilities related to Bartering, Questing and Crafting.
texts.skill_tree_info_popup_mid_description: One Talent Point can be purchased for gold every level, up to a total of 60! Talent Points can also be bought early with gems.
texts.skill_tree_info_popup_bot_description: You can refund all Talent Points assigned to a Talent Tree at the cost of gems. Those Talent Points can then be reassigned for free!
texts.skill_tree_main_menu_description: Acquire special Talents to specialize in your preferred playstyle!
texts.skill_node_maxedout: All Talent Points have been assigned! You may reset a Talent Tree to reassign them.
texts.skill_start_node_bartering_desc: Master the art of commerce and getting the most out of each customer!
texts.skill_node_maxEnergy_desc: Maximum Energy<sprite name=Energy> is increased by a flat amount.
texts.skill_node_sellEnergy_desc: Every sale grants additional Energy<sprite name=Energy>.
texts.skill_node_npcVisitorDoubleSale_desc: City Workers have a chance to bring twice as many items. Does not apply to Resource Workers!
texts.skill_node_bonusWarrior_desc: Increased likelihood for customers to be Fighters. (<sprite name=Soldier><sprite name=Barbarian><sprite name=Knight><sprite name=Ranger><sprite name=Samurai><sprite name=Berserker>)
texts.skill_node_bonusRogue_desc: Increased likelihood for customers to be Rogues. (<sprite name=Thief><sprite name=Monk><sprite name=Musketeer><sprite name=Wanderer><sprite name=Ninja><sprite name=Dancer>)
texts.skill_node_bonusMage_desc: Increased likelihood for customers to be Spellcasters. (<sprite name=Mage><sprite name=Cleric><sprite name=Druid><sprite name=Sorcerer><sprite name=Spellblade><sprite name=Geomancer>)
texts.skill_node_staminaRegen_desc: Energy<sprite name=Energy> passively refills while you're offline.
texts.skill_node_discountValue_desc: Discounted items sell at a higher value.
texts.skill_node_resourceWorkerQty_desc: Resource Worker visitors bring extra resources.
texts.skill_node_tradeSlotCapacity_desc: All Trade Slots can hold more items.
texts.skill_node_championRequestDemand_desc: Champions request fewer items in exchange for Champion Coins.
texts.skill_node_championRequestDemand03_desc: Champions only request a single item!
texts.skill_node_bountyExtraTrophy_desc: Completed bounties grant bonus Trophies<sprite name=Bounty>.
texts.skill_node_freeSurcharge_desc: Customers have a chance to automatically Surcharge themselves upon reaching the counter.
texts.skill_node_npcSellEnchanted_desc: Items sold by Worker Visitors are always enchanted.
texts.skill_node_kingSuggest_desc: Through extreme charisma, it is now possible to suggest a different item to King Reinhold (at an increased Energy<sprite name=Energy> cost).
texts.skill_node_enchantedSurchargeValue_desc: Enchantments on double-enchanted items are worth more Gold when Surcharged.
texts.skill_node_kingReturn_desc: After buying an item and leaving, King Reinhold has a chance to return immediately.
texts.skill_node_kingReturn01_desc: Chance for Reinhold to forget he already bought something:
texts.skill_start_node_crafting_desc: Master the art of crafting, fusion and its resources!
texts.skill_node_t1Capacity_desc: Increased maximum capacity for <sprite name=Iron><sprite name=Wood><sprite name=Leather><sprite name=Herbs>.
texts.skill_node_t1Regen_desc: Increased resource regeneration rate for <sprite name=Iron><sprite name=Wood><sprite name=Leather><sprite name=Herbs>.
texts.skill_node_betterRecycle_desc: More resources are salvaged when dismantling items. (10% of resources are salvaged by default)
texts.skill_node_t2Capacity_desc: Increased maximum capacity for <sprite name=Steel><sprite name=Ironwood><sprite name=Fabric><sprite name=Oils>.
texts.skill_node_noQuality_desc: Low Tier items have an increased chance of Multicraft, but will always craft at Common quality.
texts.skill_node_t2Regen_desc: Increased resource regeneration rate for <sprite name=Steel><sprite name=Ironwood><sprite name=Fabric><sprite name=Oils>.
texts.skill_node_resourceRefundChance_desc: Crafting an item has a chance to not consume any resources.
texts.skill_node_kingCapriceFavor_desc: Earn bonus Favor during the King's Caprice event.
texts.skill_node_componentRefundChance_desc: Crafting an item has a chance to not consume any components.
texts.skill_node_superiorFlawlessFusionCost_de: Fusions that create quality items require less components.
texts.skill_node_ignoreWorkerLevel_desc: Reduced minimum Worker level required to craft blueprints. You still need to hire them, though!
texts.skill_node_sigilFusion_desc: Fusions that result in Sigils and True Sigils create more of them.
texts.skill_node_t3Capacity_desc: Increased maximum capacity for <sprite name=Gems><sprite name=Mana>.
texts.skill_node_t3Regen_desc: Increased resource regeneration rate for <sprite name=Gems><sprite name=Mana>.
texts.skill_node_multicraft_desc: All items crafted have a chance to Multicraft.
texts.skill_node_fusionRush_desc: Unlocks the ability to rush Fusions with <sprite name=Energy>Energy!
texts.skill_node_essenceRegen_desc: Increased resource regeneration rate for <sprite name=Essence>.
texts.skill_node_craftSlot_desc: Gain an extra Craft Slot! Craft slots you don't yet own won't become more expensive, either!
texts.skill_node_legendChance_desc: Bonus chance to craft Epic and Legendary items!
texts.skill_start_node_questing_desc: Master the art of adventure and the wealth of loot gathered by Heroes!
texts.skill_node_bonusChestChance_desc: Chance to find a bonus Chest in quests that can drop them.
texts.skill_node_bonusComponent_desc: Find greater quantities of quest components in quests.
texts.skill_node_refundBooster_desc: When using a Booster during a quest, there's a chance for it to be refunded if the quest is successful.
texts.skill_node_fasterBossQuest_desc: Faster quest time for Boss quests.
texts.skill_node_heroHire_desc: Heroes are hired at a higher starting level.
texts.skill_node_fasterFlashQuest_desc: Faster quest time for Flash Quests.
texts.skill_node_instantQuest_desc: Any quest you start has a chance to be completed immediately.
texts.skill_node_betterOverflowValue_desc: Overflow quest rewards are sold at a higher value and grant some Merchant XP. The base value of Overflow sales is 25% of the item's value.
texts.skill_node_deadHeroesRest_desc: Increased rest speed for Heroes and Champions.
texts.skill_node_lcogComponents_desc: Lost City of Gold bosses always drop a bundle of Event components. Regular Lost City of Gold quests also drop a few!
texts.skill_node_lcogComponents01_desc: Golden Artifact, Opulent Jewel and Platinum Bangles drops enabled!
texts.skill_node_pureGoldBonus_desc: More Pure Gold is found during the Lost city of Gold event, allowing faster progress.
texts.skill_node_airshipBonus_desc: During the Dragon Invasion event, bonus Airship Power is earned from items and Heroes.
texts.skill_node_findNothingChance_desc: In basic quests, increases the odds of finding a bonus reward, such as an equipment bundle or runestones. (Default chance is 75%).
texts.skill_node_singularItemQuality_desc: Superior quality equipment found as rewards from quests are upgraded to Flawless. Also increases the tier of quality equipment found, and the chance of Epic and Legendary drops.
texts.skill_node_singularItemQuality01_desc: Quality items are at least Flawless.
texts.skill_node_doubleBundle_desc: Chance to DOUBLE the quantity of an equipment bundle found in quests.
texts.skill_node_doubleComponents_desc: Chance to DOUBLE component rewards found in quests. Affects unusual components like Moonstones and Runestones, but not Pure Gold.
texts.skill_node_extremeBonus_desc: Extreme difficulty quests have shorter quest times and faster rest times.
texts.skill_node_noStones_desc: Quests no longer reward Runestones and Moonstones, replacing them with other rewards such as equipment or keys. Does not apply to Flash Quests.
texts.skill_node_doubleKeyChance_desc: When you find a Key in a quest, there's a chance to find an extra copy.
texts.skill_node_bossRespawnChance_desc: When defeating a quest boss, grants a chance for that boss to be immediately available again.
texts.skill_node_questSlot_desc: Gain an extra Quest Slot! Quest slots you don't yet own won't become more expensive, either!
texts.skill_node_extraTitanSoul_desc: The Final Boss from the Tower of Titans has a chance to drop an extra Titan Soul.
texts.skill_node_poloniaExtraLoot_desc: Items stolen by Polonia have a chance to be one tier higher, even beyond her usual maximum.
texts.skilltree_points_unlock_warning_01_02_de:
These talents cancel each other out! You can only unlock one of these talents;
{0} or {2}
texts.skilltree_points_unlock_warning_01_03_de:
These talents cancel each other out! You can only unlock one of these talents;
{0}, {1} or {2}
texts.skilltree_points_unlock_warning_01_04_de:
These talents cancel each other out! You can only unlock one of these talents;
{0}, {1}, {2} or {3}
texts.skilltree_points_unlock_warning_02_03_de:
These talents cancel each other out! You can only unlock two of these talents;
{0}, {1} or {2}
texts.skilltree_points_unlock_warning_02_04_de:
These talents cancel each other out! You can only unlock two of these talents;
{0}, {1}, {2} or {3}
texts.skilltree_points_unlock_warning_03_04_de:
These talents cancel each other out! You can only unlock three of these talents;
{0}, {1}, {2} or {3}
texts.forest_name_desc: A common destination for novice adventurers wishing to prove their worth.
texts.forest_boss_story: Since Troublins are dumb and mean, it is only natural for their leader to be the meanest and dumbest.
texts.grotto_name_desc: The starry sky reflects beautifully upon the frozen walls of this cold cavern.
texts.grotto_boss_story: Whichever Yeti claims the biggest icicle becomes their king. It also doubles as an effective and eco-friendly weapon!
texts.swamp_name_desc: Damp. Dirty, Smells like rot. Perfect for a quest!
texts.swamp_boss_story: A once human witch turned batracian following a failed experiment. She's so mad about it, she curses trespassers with a similar fate.
texts.desert_name_desc: Monsters fiercely defend this vast territory of...  nothing at all.
texts.desert_boss_story: The Mushgoon, five times heavyweight champion of the Barren Wastes, accepts your challenge!
texts.pyramid_name_desc: An ancient monument erected in the name of an ancient god. Full of traps and hazards.
texts.pyramid_boss_story: Those who plunder the wrong tomb may earn the honor of meeting its greatest, least accommodating guardian.
texts.ruins_name_desc: The mysterious ruins of a great empire that vanished overnight. Experiments with time magic is the leading hypothesis behind its tragedy.
texts.ruins_boss_story: The Cyclops Lord trots and clops within the Chronos Ruins, seeking worthy adventurers to challenge.
texts.castle_name_desc: Ghostly occupants still manage and maintain this fallen castle, once renowned throughout the lands.
texts.castle_boss_story: Who dares challenge the Tyrant King's absolute authority?
texts.temple_name_desc: This is definitely a place of worship... but for what?
texts.temple_boss_story: The Queen watches over her nursery fiercely.
texts.goldcity_boss_story: Legends tell the tale of the Keybearer, a golden golem wandering the halls of the Lost City of Gold...
texts.peak_name_desc: Atop this rocky and sinister mountain, feathered demons hold dominion.
texts.peak_boss_story: The Matriarch commands the other Harpies into servitude, mostly through louder screeching.
texts.volcano_name_desc: Exploring the searing interior of an active volcano is reserved for only the most experienced (or foolish) adventurers.
texts.volcano_boss_story: Munching on the tastiest rock is the biggest and oldest among Crushtaceans. Not the kind of shrimp you want to butt heads with!
texts.rift_name_desc: This portal leads to a world unfathomable to the human mind. The fractured lands beyond are hostile to all life.
texts.rift_boss_story: Defying all logic, one lifeform stalks the fractured remains of this dimension. One thing's for sure... it's not friendly!
texts.titantower_floor_desc: The way is lit and the path is clear. You require only the strength to follow it.
texts.titantower_floor_desc_02: The tinkling of myriad coins can be heard above. Treasure, perhaps?
texts.titantower_floor_desc_03: Maniacal cackling can be heard from the room above...
texts.titantower_floor_desc_04: Swift footsteps and weapon blows echo through the door. The inhabitant is training rigorously!
texts.titantower_floor_desc_05: Trance-like chanting hums and permeates the air around this place...
texts.titantower_floor_desc_06: A tiny voice in your head implores you to turn back...
texts.titantower_floor_desc_07: There's a sign on the door. It reads "Out to lunch".
texts.titantower_floor_desc_08: You carefully check for traps... Nothing. Or so it seems.
texts.titantower_floor_desc_10: Echoes of a soft lullaby comes from the top of the stairs...
texts.titantower_floor_desc_11: Stairs, stairs and more stairs. Is there an end to this tower?
texts.titantower_floor_desc_12: The air is damp, but not unpleasant. What could it mean?
texts.titantower_floor_desc_13: The next door is covered in mysterious runes. Dare you enter?
texts.titantower_floor_desc_14: This door is locked with a very strong padlock. Nothing your Heroes can't handle, but not without making noise...
texts.titantower_floor_desc_15: This room is starting to smell like smoke. Better head upstairs!
texts.titantower_floor_desc_16: Shadows seem to linger just outside of your field of vision... Remain cautious.
texts.titantower_floor_desc_17: A rhythmic "thud" can be heard from above as you ascend to the next floor.
texts.titantower_floor_desc_18: Strangely human speech can be heard as you approach the door, though its meaning eludes you.
texts.titantower_floor_desc_19: This stairway looks exactly like the previous floor... down to the smallest nicks and scratches!
texts.titantower_floor_desc_20: This room appears oddly pristine. Smells pretty nice, too!
texts.titantower_floor_desc_21: A stiff breeze whistles all around you. No logical source to be seen...
texts.titantower_floor_desc_23: Shivers run down your spine. A powerful opponent must be nearby...
texts.canopener_desc: More likely to attack Fighters. Ignores some of their Defense, too.
texts.ratcatcher_desc: More likely to attack Rogues. Ignores some of their Evasion, too.
texts.magiceater_desc: More likely to attack Spellcasters. Takes less damage from them, too.
texts.stoneskinned_desc: Takes less damage from Fighters and Rogues.
texts.lightningswift_desc: First attack deals double damage and is more likely to be a Critical Hit.
texts.fortified_desc: Less likely to receive Critical Hits.
texts.noweakness_desc: Much less likely to receive Critical Hits.
texts.armored_desc: Takes less damage, especially from Critical Hits.
texts.heavyarmored_desc: Takes much less damage, especially from Critical Hits.
texts.eagleeyed_desc: Has an easier time hitting evasive targets.
texts.bloodthirsty_desc: Lands Critical Hits much more often.
texts.deadly_desc: Stronger and slightly more frequent Critical Hits.
texts.assassin_desc: Much stronger and slightly more frequent Critical Hits.
texts.slippery_desc: Has a chance to avoid attacks.
texts.elusive_desc: Has a good chance to avoid attacks.
texts.large_desc: More likely to use group attacks. They're stronger, too.
texts.absoluteunit_desc: Much more likely to use group attacks. They're much stronger, too.
texts.ambusher_desc: Attacks can't miss on the first 3 rounds.
texts.steamroller_desc: Deals progressively more damage every round.
texts.fq_research_desc: She may be the smartest among Harpies, but she still can't read! She won't miss those <c1>Research Scrolls</c1>!
texts.fq_training_desc: The Training Instructor is looking for sparring partners! Defeat him to earn lots of <c1>Hero XP</c1>!
texts.fq_gear_desc: This Merchant could be competition! Loot his caravan for <c1>various equipment</c1> to resell!
texts.fq_chest_desc: Troublebeard the Pirate is a renowned treasure hoarder, but he won't give them up easily! Harder difficulties drop more valuable <c1>Chests</c1>!
texts.fq_rune_desc: A rare Golem made entirely out of Runestones! Harder difficulties drop better <c1>Runestones</c1>!
texts.fq_moon_desc: A rare Golem made entirely out of Moonstones! Harder difficulties drop better <c1>Moonstones</c1>!
texts.fq_lcog_desc: A secret annex of the Lost City of Gold has opened up! Harder difficulties may drop <c1>Opulent Jewels</c1>!
texts.fq_enchant_desc: A grumpy Toad has been squatting in the Tower to craft <c1>Enchantments</c1>! Take some for yourself!
texts.fq_champion_desc: A fellow Champion Coin collector! Harder difficulties may drop rarer <c1>Champion Coins</c1>!
texts.fq_key_desc: A graverobber caught in the act! Shake him down for some Keys, with harder difficulties dropping better <c1>Keys!</c1>
texts.fq_repair_desc: This hardworking Troublin may be convinced to share some of his <c1>Repair Kits</c1>!
texts.fq_fancygear_desc: The Cyclops General has been hoarding <c1>exotic equipment</c1> all for himself! Redistribute the wealth!
texts.fq_sigil_desc: Challenge this elusive Ninja to steal some <c1>Sigils</c1>! Harder difficulties may drop <c1>True Sigils</c1>!
texts.fq_ascension_desc: <c1>Ascension Shards</c1> forged in the bowels of the earth! Gather them before the cave collapses!
texts.fq_cndragon_desc: Confront this spiteful river spirit for the chance to receive ancestral <c1>Blueprints</c1>!
texts.class_alchemist_desc: Masters of herbalism, occultism and reagents of all kinds.
texts.class_barbarian_desc: Savage combatants who throw caution to the wind.
texts.class_chieftain_desc: When the tribe calls for a leader, a Chieftain naturally rises among the brave.
texts.class_berserker_desc: Warriors reveling in carnage and capable of entering a trance of pure violence.
texts.class_jarl_desc: Even among the mightiest Berserkers, a name is whispered in fear: the Jarl.
texts.class_cleric_desc: Holy missionaries who protect the faithful with divine powers.
texts.class_bishop_desc: Zealots among zealots, Bishops embody the Goddess' will in the world of the mortals.
texts.class_dancer_desc: Agile tricksters that can read the flow of combat and gracefully dance to its beat.
texts.class_acrobat_desc: The acrobat's deadly performance never requires an encore.
texts.class_dragoon_desc: Fearless dragon slayers capable of incredible leaps.
texts.class_druid_desc: Embodiments of nature's bounty and wrath.
texts.class_archdruid_desc: Only seen in times of great needs, Arch Druids are the last line of defense of the natural world.
texts.class_jester_desc: Unlikely allies who wield sharp words and knives with equal grace.
texts.class_knight_desc: Noble warriors capable of holding the line, no matter the opposition.
texts.class_lord_desc: Generals, commanders and conquerors of countless battles.
texts.class_mage_desc: Wielders of unmatched magical power from the four elements.
texts.class_archmage_desc: Spellcasters obey the laws of magic to cast their spells. Archmage break and rewrite these rules to suit their needs.
texts.class_monk_desc: Ascetic warriors that seek perfection through honing the mind and body.
texts.class_ninja_desc: No job is below or beyond these shadow-stalking assassins.
texts.class_sensei_desc: Few have seen a Sensei in action. Fewer still have lived to tell the tale.
texts.class_paladin_desc: Holy warriors on a sacred quest to eradicate all evil.
texts.class_pirate_desc: Rowdy gun-wielders with a penchant for booze, shanty and booty.
texts.class_ranger_desc: Explorers of the wild and peerless hunters.
texts.class_warden_desc: Wardens are one with the untamed lands beyond the reach of civilization.
texts.class_redmage_desc: Jack of all trades capable of excelling in any discipline.
texts.class_spellknight_desc: Grizzled combatants and arcane scholars, there is no field in which Spellknights cannot excel.
texts.class_geomancer_desc: Wise scholars that command the latent power of the surrounding terrain.
texts.class_astramancer_desc: With magic of the land under their absolute command, some turn their gaze to the skies beyond the skies.
texts.class_soldier_desc: Professional warriors and unparalleled experts with all melee weapons.
texts.class_mercenary_desc: Veterans of countless wars boasting an unwavering loyalty... for the right price.
texts.class_sorcerer_desc: Spellcasters who gained fell powers through a dark contract.
texts.class_warlock_desc: Fell powers beyond understanding. Is the Warlock truly in control?
texts.class_swordmaster_desc: Wandering warriors capable of winning a battle with a single draw of the sword.
texts.class_daimyo_desc: When a lord among samurai goes to war, nations quake and petals fall.
texts.class_thief_desc: Slippery scoundrels best left in your field of view.
texts.class_wanderer_desc: Mysterious strangers that always have the right tool for the job.
texts.class_pathfinder_desc: Peerless explorers of the uncharted and forbidden.
texts.class_musketeer_desc: Daring outlaws and expert fencers. They also wield the terrifying power of firearms.
texts.class_conquistador_desc: For distant problems, gunpowder. For nearby problems, steel.
texts.class_witch_desc: Excommunicated arcanists with unscrupulous, yet inscrutable motives.
texts.class_darkknight_desc: Terrible beings born of dark powers. It is said they can devour the souls of their victims.
texts.class_deathknight_desc: It is unknown whether or not these fell warriors are actually living beings.
texts.class_velite_desc: Scout troops denied weapons, they have developed a deadly fighting style with shields.
texts.class_praetorian_desc: Elite velites tasked with the protection of the Emperor himself.
texts.class_chronomancer_desc: Powerful wizards who have gained powers of fate after studying the Chronos Ruins.
texts.class_timekeeper_desc: Time flows ever onward... unless the Fateweaver decides otherwise.
texts.hero_argon_bio_01: A young Knight-in-Training trying to prove himself. Loyal to the end.
texts.hero_argon_bio_02: A budding knight stripped of his title, seeking redemption.
texts.hero_argon_bio_03: A full-fledged Paladin, sworn to protect the weak.
texts.hero_sia_bio_01: A refined woman shrouded in mystery. Seems to know everything and everyone.
texts.hero_sia_bio_02: A refined woman shrouded in mystery. Is the kingdom's safety truly her priority?
texts.hero_sia_bio_03: A secret protector of the king. Will stop at nothing to ensure his safety.
texts.hero_lilu_bio_01: A young magic apprentice. Very talented despite her age.
texts.hero_lilu_bio_02: A talented magic user of infinite potential. With her master back at her side, there is nothing she can't do!
texts.hero_yami_bio_01: A taciturn assassin bent on revenge. No fun at parties.
texts.hero_yami_bio_02: Once an assassin of the Order, but no longer. Failure is not tolerated.
texts.hero_yami_bio_03: Any who would make an attempt on the King's life should think twice, for his Blade lurks in every shadow.
texts.hero_rudo_bio_01: A gruff, seasoned berserker. Doesn't beat around the bush, but might beat it up if he feels like it.
texts.hero_polonia_bio_01: A pirate-to-be lacking a ship to her name. Dreams of swashbuckling tales on the high seas.
texts.hero_polonia_bio_02: A scourge of the seas living up to the legendary legacy of Baross Del Monte.
texts.hero_donovan_bio_01: An accomplished alchemist from the Kern empire. A renowned master at all forms of transmutation and alchemy.
texts.hero_donovan_bio_02: An accomplished alchemist from the Kern empire. A renowned master at all forms of transmutation and alchemy.
texts.hero_hemma_bio_01: Shrouded in shadows and secret, Hemma commands dark powers few understand.
texts.hero_hemma_bio_02: A mysterious invader seems to reside within Hemma. Is this a mutually beneficial relationship?
texts.hero_hemma_bio_03: There are fates worse than death. To survive such an ordeal shows unimaginable resilience and determination.
texts.hero_ashley_bio_01: A wandering samurai from Azuma. Lost an arm, but she doesn't let that slow her down.
texts.hero_atlab_aang_bio_01: The last Airbender and also the Avatar, capable of mastering all four elements. Destined to save the world.
texts.hero_atlab_sokka_bio_01: Sharp-witted and loyal. Joined Aang on his quest to save the world
texts.hero_leather_bio_01: Truly legendary heroes come from humble beginnings.
texts.hero_king_bio_01: More of a lover than a fighter. Requires a heavy escort if exploring outside city boundaries.
texts.hero_bjorn_bio_01: An inseparable duo of forest rangers. Renowned experts at exploring uncharted dungeons.
texts.hero_skill_argonleader1_effect: +10% bonus Attack for the party. +10% bonus Defense for the party.
texts.hero_skill_argonleader2_desc: "For those who bear no shield, I shall serve in its stead."
texts.hero_skill_argonleader2_effect: +20% bonus Attack for the party. +20% bonus Defense for the party.
texts.hero_skill_argonleader3_desc: "My will is unwavering. Wherever evil lies, I shall go."
texts.hero_skill_argonleader3_effect: +30% bonus Attack for the party. +30% bonus Defense for the party.
texts.hero_skill_argonleader4_desc: "None may get past this shield while I still stand!"
texts.hero_skill_argonleader4_effect: +40% bonus Attack for the party. +40% bonus Defense for the party.
texts.hero_skill_sialeader1_desc: "Now what could this pretty little thing be?"
texts.hero_skill_sialeader1_effect: +25% more components found in quests. +10% bonus Attack for the party.
texts.hero_skill_sialeader2_desc: "It's all a matter of perspective darling."
texts.hero_skill_sialeader2_effect: +50% more components found in quests. +15% bonus Attack for the party.
texts.hero_skill_sialeader3_desc: "Throw away the trash, we keep only the best!"
texts.hero_skill_sialeader3_effect: +75% more components found in quests. +20% bonus Attack for the party.
texts.hero_skill_sialeader4_effect: +100% more components found in quests. +25% bonus Attack for the party.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader1_desc: "It stings for a bit, but it'll get better!"
texts.hero_skill_liluleader1_effect: Heals party by 3 HP each turn. +10% more HP. +10% faster resting time.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader1_effect_0: <sprite=24> Heals party by <color=#24E656FF>3 HP</color> each turn.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader1_effect_2: <sprite=11> <color=#24E656FF>+10%</color> faster resting time for the party.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader2_desc: "Spirits of the light, I beseech thee!"
texts.hero_skill_liluleader2_effect: Heals party by 5 HP each turn. +15% more HP. +20% faster resting time.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader2_effect_0: <sprite=24> Heals party by <color=#24E656FF>5 HP</color> each turn.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader2_effect_2: <sprite=11> <color=#24E656FF>+20%</color> faster resting time for the party.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader3_desc: "How do you feel? It's my own spell!"
texts.hero_skill_liluleader3_effect: Heals party by 10 HP each turn. +20% more HP. +35% faster resting time.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader3_effect_0: <sprite=24> Heals party by <color=#24E656FF>10 HP</color> each turn.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader3_effect_2: <sprite=11> <color=#24E656FF>+35%</color> faster resting time for the party.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader4_desc: "It's a bit unstable but... feel that power!"
texts.hero_skill_liluleader4_effect: Heals party by 20 HP each turn. +25% more HP. +50% faster resting time.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader4_effect_0: <sprite=24> Heals party by <color=#24E656FF>20 HP</color> each turn.
texts.hero_skill_liluleader4_effect_2: <sprite=11> <color=#24E656FF>+50%</color> faster resting time for the party.
texts.hero_skill_yamileader1_desc: "You, come with me. The rest, be your usual noisy selves."
texts.hero_skill_yamileader1_effect: +10% faster quest time. +5% Critical Hit Chance for the party. +5% Evasion for the party.
texts.hero_skill_yamileader1_effect_1: <sprite=19> <color=#24E656FF>+5%</color> Critical Hit Chance for the party.
texts.hero_skill_yamileader2_desc: "Focus on the task. Nothing else matters."

texts.skill_p_cleave_desc: You can also slash, chop or dice. No need to be finicky.
texts.skill_p_perforate_desc: Poking holes in things may reduce their life expectancy.
texts.skill_p_smite_desc: The Goddess can be a bit vindictive, at times.
texts.skill_p_onguard_desc: We stand on guard for thee.
texts.skill_p_magicdarts_desc: Always a hit for bar games.
texts.skill_p_parry_desc: Stunt performed by trained professional. Do not try at home.
texts.skill_p_arcaneblast_desc: Conjures a faceful of raw magical energy.
texts.skill_p_hex_desc: Casts the evil eye upon your foe, cursing them with terrible luck. Watch them trip over their own feet!
texts.skill_p_lifedrain_desc: Steals the very life essence from your enemies to bolster yours. Tastes fruity.
texts.skill_p_magearmor_desc: Is not an adequate substitute for sunscreen.
texts.skill_p_powerattack_desc: If hitting hard doesn't work, try hitting harder.
texts.skill_p_caltrops_desc: Make sure to wear thick boots...
texts.skill_p_flamebrand_desc: Cuts AND toasts bread at the same time!
texts.skill_p_thickskin_desc: One way of going through everyday life.
texts.skill_p_finesse_desc: Flashy knife twirling isn't much use in a fight, but it sends a message.
texts.skill_p_glancingblows_desc: Some could even call it plot armor.
texts.skill_p_dragonbreath_desc: Thankfully the dragons haven't copyrighted that move yet.
texts.skill_p_wallofforce_desc: Nigh-impenetrable and completely see-through, so don't leave them all over the place.
texts.skill_p_sunder_desc: Your party may not appreciate you smashing all the equipment (and loot) to pieces.
texts.skill_p_throwing_desc: Add a little range to your stabs.
texts.skill_p_shiningblade_desc: This blade of mine glows with an awesome power...!
texts.skill_p_disintegrate_desc: Turns just about anything to dust.
texts.skill_p_summondemon_desc: When it comes to wreaking havoc, summoned demons don't need much convincing.
texts.skill_p_batteringblows_desc: It's like beating on a drum, except the drum is screaming.
texts.skill_p_whirlwind_desc: Throw away any pretense of grace and just spin like mad!
texts.skill_p_assassinate_desc: Why make it flashy when only the results matter?
texts.skill_p_bladedance_desc: Become a raging storm of nicks and cuts.
texts.skill_p_cloakndagger_desc: The dashing rogue gets into all sorts of trouble, yet always somehow escapes unscathed.
texts.skill_p_megapunch_desc: The Grandmaster has ascended beyond mortal means of combat.
texts.skill_p_doublecast_desc: Two spells for the price of one? Count me in!
texts.skill_p_petrify_desc: If you're lucky, you might catch them doing funny poses.
texts.skill_p_manashield_desc: For the wizard who has more mana than friends.
texts.skill_s_megabreak_desc: Yet you can't escape the planned obsolescence.
texts.skill_s_hphpregen_desc: Stub a toe without shedding a single tear.
texts.skill_s_megahp_desc: Yeah, that's an axe embedded in my skull. What about it?
texts.skill_s_hpdef_desc: What's under all this armor? More armor.
texts.skill_s_evasion_desc: With moves like these, why wear armor?
texts.skill_s_megaevasion_desc: So fast, you might get a speeding ticket.
texts.skill_s_evasioncrit_desc: A timely distraction leaves many openings.
texts.skill_s_crit_desc: An uncanny knack for spotting out the glowing red spots.
texts.skill_s_megacrit_desc: At some point, landing a regular hit becomes a surprise.
texts.skill_s_critcritmult_desc: Leave it all to chance (and a stacked deck).
texts.skill_s_swordmaster_desc: The grace with which a Swordmaster wields a blade is a sight to behold.
texts.skill_s_axemaster_desc: Grace and finesse? No thanks. Give me the BIG damage.
texts.skill_s_daggermaster_desc: For those who want to get uncomfortably close and personal.
texts.skill_s_macemaster_desc: If you need some moles whacked, look no further.
texts.skill_s_spearmaster_desc: Reaching out to others... to stab them.
texts.skill_s_bowmaster_desc: Confers the ability to shoot apples out of trees.
texts.skill_s_staffmaster_desc: The uncanny ability to bond with the magical spirits present within staves.
texts.skill_s_crossbowmaster_desc: The crossbow is a simple weapon to use, but its masters are few.
texts.skill_s_gunmaster_desc: Strong support for rights, bears and arms.
texts.skill_s_wandmaster_desc: One who has understood that it is the wand that chooses its wizard.
texts.skill_s_shieldmaster_desc: Impervious is not putting it lightly.
texts.skill_s_warmaster_desc: Unmatched mastery with all implements of warfare.
texts.skill_s_arcanemaster_desc: You would not part an old man from his walking stick?

texts.skill_c_soldier_desc: A Soldier's military background allows them to develop their own style faster than others.
texts.skill_c_mercenary_desc: Mercenaries take orders to the letter, and will follow their general to the end of the earth.
