texts.skill_c_barbarian_desc: The Barbarian's fighting style, while brutally effective, is wild and loud, making it a difficult threat to ignore.
texts.skill_c_barbarian_effect: Tendency to attract enemy attacks. Extra tough.
texts.skill_c_chieftain_desc: To protect their tribe, Chieftains take on the frontline with absolute ferocity.
texts.skill_c_chieftain_effect_details_2: {0} Threat. {1} of total Threat is added as an attack multiplier.
texts.skill_c_knight_desc: Even Paladins envy the ease with which Knights wear and use armor.
texts.skill_c_lord_desc: To protect the weak, no sacrifice is too great.
texts.skill_c_lord_effect: Bonus Defense from Heavy Armor. Can protect weak allies from attacks.
texts.skill_c_lord_effect_details: Protect an ally from a Lethal attack once per battle.
texts.skill_c_ranger_desc: When living alone in the wilderness, one learns to do much with very little.
texts.skill_c_swordmaster_desc: Samurai know that the battle is over as soon as the blade is drawn.
texts.skill_c_swordmaster_effect: The Samurai's first attack is always a critical hit that ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_swordmaster1_effect: The Samurai's first attack is always a critical hit that ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_swordmaster2_effect: The Samurai's first attack is always a critical hit that ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_swordmaster3_effect: The Samurai's first attack is always a critical hit that ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_swordmaster4_effect: The Samurai's first attack is always a critical hit that ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_daimyo_desc: To deal in death is to expect it in turn. Daimyo are well aware.
texts.skill_c_daimyo_effect: Guaranteed evasion and critical hit on the first round. This attack ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_daimyo1_effect: Guaranteed evasion and critical hit on the first round. This attack ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_daimyo2_effect: Guaranteed evasion and critical hit on the first round. This attack ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_daimyo3_effect: Guaranteed evasion and critical hit on the first round. This attack ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_daimyo4_effect: Guaranteed evasion and critical hit on the first round. This attack ignores Elemental Barriers.
texts.skill_c_berserker_desc: For most warriors, a grave wound is crippling. For a Berserker, it merely marks the start of a good fight.
texts.skill_c_berserker_effect: Grows in power at low HP.
texts.skill_c_berserker_effect_details_2: Effect is doubled when below {0} HP and tripled when below {1} HP.
texts.skill_c_darkknight_desc: A terrible fate awaits anyone foolish enough to oppose a Dark Knight.
texts.skill_c_darkknight_effect: Instantly defeats weakened monsters and gain permanent bonuses.
texts.skill_c_darkknight1_effect: Instantly defeats weakened monsters and gain permanent bonuses.
texts.skill_c_darkknight_effect_details_1: Upon striking, defeat any enemy below {0}% HP.
texts.skill_c_darkknight_effect_details_2: Gain a random Seed bonus to stat when surviving a quest.
texts.skill_c_thief_desc: Daggers are like a natural extension of the Thief's hands.
texts.skill_c_trickster_desc: Tricksters tend to favor the prickly kind of tricks.
texts.skill_c_trickster_effect: Bonus Attack from Daggers. Supports Polonia.
texts.skill_c_trickster_effect_details_2: +{0} to Polonia's steal chance. +{1} max items stolen.
texts.skill_c_musketeer_desc: The Musketeer's quest for panache means they always aim for the riskiest of attacks.
texts.skill_c_conquistador_desc: Bullseye after bullseye is simply the norm.
texts.skill_c_conquistador_effect: Bonus Critical Damage for consecutive Critical Hits.
texts.skill_c_conquistador_effect_details_1_2: {0} Critical Hit Chance. {1} Critical Hit Damage
texts.skill_c_conquistador_effect_details_2: {0} more critical damage per consecutive critical hits. Stacks {1} times.
texts.skill_c_monk_desc: By aiming at invisible weak points of their opponent's physiology, the Monk can deliver devastating strikes.
texts.skill_c_mastermonk_desc: The Grandmaster holds exclusive mastery over a seldom used skill of extreme destructive power.
texts.skill_c_mastermonk_effect: Bonus from Rings. May learn a powerful, exclusive skill.
texts.skill_c_mastermonk_effect_details_2: May learn a very powerful exclusive skill.
texts.skill_c_wanderer_desc: Wanderers are constantly on the move, whether on the road or in battle.
texts.skill_c_pathfinder_desc: To be beyond compare is not beyond the Pathfinder's ambition.
texts.skill_c_ninja_desc: Ninjas stalk the shadows to deliver a swift, invisible demise upon their mark.
texts.skill_c_ninja_effect: Bonus to Evasion and Critical Hit Chance until damaged. Powerful Criticals
texts.skill_c_sensei_desc: The master among masters leaves enemies wondering if it ever existed in the first place.
texts.skill_c_sensei_effect: Bonus to Evasion and Critical Hit Chance until damaged. Bonuses return after a few rounds.
texts.skill_c_dancer_effect: Guarantees a Critical Hit after dodging an attack.
texts.skill_c_dancer_desc: Fly like a butterfly and sting like a bee.
texts.skill_c_dancer1_effect: Guarantees a Critical Hit after dodging an attack.
texts.skill_c_dancer2_effect: Guarantees a Critical Hit after dodging an attack.
texts.skill_c_dancer3_effect: Guarantees a Critical Hit after dodging an attack.
texts.skill_c_dancer4_effect: Guarantees a Critical Hit after dodging an attack.
texts.skill_c_velite_effect: Equipped Shield's DEF is added to ATK.
texts.skill_c_velite_desc: Overwhelming defense is offense in its own right.
texts.skill_c_velite1_effect: Equipped Shield's DEF is added to ATK.
texts.skill_c_mage_desc: Burn it. Blast it. Zap it. Mages rely on their offensive prowess to solve everyday problems.
texts.skill_c_archmage_desc: Rewrite reality with the flick of a finger.
texts.skill_c_cleric_desc: The Goddess loves all of her children equally, but clerics do get some preferential treatment.
texts.skill_c_cleric_effect: Survives a fatal blow once per quest.
texts.skill_c_bishop_desc: Backed by the Goddess herself, this one will not go down easy.
texts.skill_c_bishop_effect: Survives a fatal blow once per quest. Heals HP every round.
texts.skill_c_druid_desc: Druids are well-versed in natural and arcane lore. Magical herbs are no secret to them.
texts.skill_c_sorcerer_desc: Contracts with otherworldly entities have granted Sorcerers... gruesome powers.
texts.skill_c_sorcerer_effect: Has a chance to learn powerful, exclusive skills.
texts.skill_c_sorcerer1_effect: Has a chance to learn powerful, exclusive skills.
texts.skill_c_sorcerer2_effect: Has a chance to learn powerful, exclusive skills.
texts.skill_c_sorcerer3_effect: Has a chance to learn powerful, exclusive skills.
texts.skill_c_sorcerer4_effect: Has a chance to learn powerful, exclusive skills.
texts.skill_c_redmage_desc: Specialization is not part of a Spellblade's vocabulary.
texts.skill_c_redmage_effect: +{0} bonus stats from all equipment. Can use any element.
texts.skill_c_redmage_effect_details: Can use any element, but damages Elemental Barriers at 30% power.
texts.skill_c_spellknight_desc: Specialization is not part of a Spellknight's vocabulary.
texts.skill_c_spellknight_effect: +{0} extra bonus from equipment with innate elements.
texts.skill_c_spellknight1_effect: +{0} extra bonus from equipment with innate elements.
texts.skill_c_spellknight2_effect: +{0} extra bonus from equipment with innate elements.
texts.skill_c_spellknight3_effect: +{0} extra bonus from equipment with innate elements.
texts.skill_c_spellknight4_effect: +{0} extra bonus from equipment with innate elements.
texts.skill_c_spellknight_effect_details: Can use any element, but damages Elemental Barriers at 30% power.
texts.skill_c_geomancer_desc: The latent energy of land, sea and air bend to the Geomancer's will.
texts.elemental_attack: Attack per point in any Element
texts.skill_c_chronomancer_desc: Fate is inexorable... but what if one were powerful enough to twist it, ever so slightly?
texts.skill_c_chronomancer_effect: If the party is defeated, allows an immediate second attempt at the quest.
texts.skill_c_chronomancer1_effect: If the party is defeated, allows an immediate second attempt at the quest.
texts.skill_c_timekeeper_desc: Fate is inexorable... but what if one were powerful enough to twist it, ever so slightly?
texts.skill_c_timekeeper_effect: If the party is defeated, allows an immediate second attempt at the quest with a power bonus.
texts.skill_c_timekeeper1_effect: If the party is defeated, allows an immediate second attempt at the quest with a power bonus.
texts.skill_i_wolf_desc: Answer the call of the pack.
texts.skill_i_ox_desc: Plow through fields and enemies alike.
texts.skill_i_viper_desc: One strike is all it takes.
texts.skill_i_rabbitspirit_desc: And it's gone before you know it!
texts.skill_i_luxuriousspirit_desc: The twin brother of Quetzalcoatl. Ushers forth the sun's death every night.
texts.skill_i_freshspirit_desc: Nothing beats fresh out of the oven!
texts.skill_i_rhino_desc: Nonchalance attracts a violent kind of jealousy.
texts.skill_i_owl_desc: Don't you feel like staying up all night?
texts.skill_i_armadillo_desc: Roll into a ball to protect the important bits.
texts.skill_i_lizard_desc: Hey, if you lost it and you're still alive, it probably wasn't that important.
texts.skill_i_walrus_desc: It's a hard one to budge.
texts.skill_i_lion_desc: Everything the light touches is this spirit's kingdom.
texts.skill_i_tiger_desc: The might of a lone hunter.
texts.skill_i_dinosaur_desc: Actually consists mostly of frog DNA. Dinosaurs are extinct, after all.
texts.skill_i_bear_desc: It's no wonder Rudo likes them!
texts.skill_i_opulentspirit_desc: The twin brother of Xolotl. Heralds the sun's rebirth every morning.
texts.skill_i_dragon_desc: Haughty even in spirit form. It seems more than eager to show those bosses who's boss.
texts.skill_i_phoenix_desc: Rise from the ashes and battle once more.
texts.skill_i_hydra_desc: A whole lot of heads that don't get along!
texts.skill_i_tarrasque_desc: Rubble and ruins are all that remain.
texts.skill_i_carbuncle_desc: Here and there, to and fro without a care in the world.
texts.skill_i_chimera_desc: Three thinking heads, yet not an ounce of kindness to be shared among them.
texts.skill_i_kraken_desc: Really, what have all these ships done to you?
texts.skill_i_santa_desc: A jolly spirit of merry winter times. Its true potential is unleashed when enchanted on Christmas items.

texts.home_description_app: Design and build a thriving shop in this tycoon simulation adventure! Outfit your heroes and champions with epic gear, and send them on quests to defeat powerful bosses!
texts.home_app_description_01: Create and customize your own fantasy shop.
texts.home_app_description_02: Craft and master over 150 different items to solidfy yourself as an expert craftsman.
texts.home_app_description_03: Come together and form a guild with your friends and build a prosperous city.
texts.home_app_description_04: Trade with others from around the world.
texts.home_app_description_05: Recruit and customize your heroes, each with their own gear and skills.
texts.home_app_description_06: Battle awesome bosses in unique dungeons and earn yourself the rarest loot!
texts.home_description_slider: Shop Titans is a simulation RPG game that consists of building your own shop within a fantasy kingdom. In it, you can craft and sell armor, swords, potions and all kinds of gear and equipment to heroes to help them in their adventures. With the money from the sales you can expand and customize your shop to become a business mogul in the village. Heroes of all kinds can enter your store: warriors, wizards, dwarves... even ninjas! Help your heroes and champions in legendary battles against the most powerful bosses!

texts.worker_bard_desc: Yohan is a budding bard with a heart full of songs and dreams. Behind his clumsiness hides an exceptional artist with a love for the world.
texts.platinumelement_desc: Any other metal is simply lesser. The ancestors would never allow it.
texts.chest_elysium_desc: A heavenly chest found in Elysium. It can be opened with a Divine Key.
texts.chest_artifact01_desc: A mythical chest said to contain blueprints lost to time. It can be opened with a Minor Artifact Key.
texts.chest_artifact02_desc: A mythical chest said to contain blueprints lost to time. It can be opened with a Major Artifact Key.
texts.skill_i_behemoth_desc: The coming of perdition is heralded by a beast such that will blot out the sun.
texts.skill_i_bahamut_desc: Mundra's daddy deigns to lend you a mote of his power.
texts.skill_i_leviathan_desc: Sink ever deeper, king of the seas.
texts.skill_i_griffin_desc: Soar ever higher, king of the skies.
texts.skill_i_titan_desc: Only for the mightiest of Heroes. And even then, the recommended dose is only one!
texts.nav_route_store_desc: Purchase offers, consumables and more for your Shop Titans account directly from our Web Store.

texts.artifactamulet_desc: Saint Myrthee swore an oath of non-violence, barring her from wielding any weaponry. Few knew of her devastating left hook, however.
texts.elysiumamulet_desc: Aeons of tectonic might waiting to be released.
texts.t14amulet_desc: Fairies do not truly die, but there are some sacrifices that even the Queen cannot rescind from.
texts.magicamulet_desc: In a world of magic, it takes a lot of skill to wow actual spellcasters with mere sleight of hand!
texts.chronoamulet_desc: Continuously ticks with perfect precision. Somehow, even when time itself is stopped.
texts.medal_china_desc: The mark of authority of Star Commanders. It requires exceptional prowess on the battlefield.
texts.magicwand2_desc: The wand of wands, albeit ironically not magical at all. Has a strange affinity with bunnies.
texts.chronorobe_desc: There's really no excuse for being late.
texts.t14aura_desc: The wind must first be sown.
texts.aurastone_skill_t14aura_desc: Raging storms batter and blind foes of the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t14aura_effect: Grants +15% bonus Attack and Defense to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t14aura_effect_0: <sprite=4><sprite=5> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+15%</color> bonus Attack and Defense to the party.
texts.wonderlandaura_desc: Late, late, for a very important date?
texts.skill_x_wonderlandaura_desc: The white rabbit's haste decrease the duration of quest and resting time.
texts.aurastone_skill_wonderlandaura_desc: It seems you're always late everywhere! It should serve as a strong motivator to go faster!
texts.aurastone_skill_wonderlandaura_effect: Grants 3% faster quest time and resting time to the party.
texts.t13aura_desc: A veritable kaleidoscope of power will accompany you on your journey.
texts.skill_x_t13aura_desc: An enthralling kaleidoscope of colors increases the party's Evasion and Critical Hit Chance.
texts.aurastone_skill_t13aura_desc: An enthralling kaleidoscope of colors increases the party's Evasion and Critical Hit Chance.
texts.aurastone_skill_t13aura_effect: Grants +2% Critical Hit Chance and Evasion to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t13aura_effect_0: <sprite=6><sprite=19> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+2%</color> Critical Hit Chance and Evasion to the party.
texts.t12aura_desc: "Yolanda! What does the scouter say about his power level??"
texts.skill_x_t12aura_desc: An aura of pure power increases the party's Attack and Defense.
texts.aurastone_skill_t12aura_desc: An aura of pure power increases the party's Attack and Defense.
texts.aurastone_skill_t12aura_effect: Grants +10% bonus Attack and Defense to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t12aura_effect_0: <sprite=4><sprite=5> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+10%</color> bonus Attack and Defense to the party.
texts.t11aura_desc: We gave peace a chance... look how that turned out!
texts.skill_x_t11aura_desc: Overwhelming true love grants a significant HP bonus to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t11aura_desc: Overwhelming true love grants a significant HP bonus to the party.
texts.t10aura_desc: Were you expecting a fart joke?
texts.skill_x_t10aura_desc: Helpful winds grant a bonus to the party's Evasion.
texts.aurastone_skill_t10aura_desc: Helpful winds grant a bonus to the party's Evasion.
texts.skill_x_t9aura_desc: Crackling electricity grants bonus to the party's Attack
texts.aurastone_skill_t9aura_desc: Crackling electricity grants bonus to the party's Attack
texts.aurastone_skill_t9aura_effect: Grants +15% bonus Attack to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t9aura_effect_0: <sprite=4> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+15%</color> bonus Attack to the party.
texts.t8aura_desc: The manual recommends activating it AFTER your dramatic betrayal.
texts.skill_x_t8aura_desc: A miasma of evil grants bonus Critical Hit Damage to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t8aura_desc: A miasma of evil grants bonus Critical Hit Damage to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t8aura_effect: Grants +20% Critical Hit Damage to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t8aura_effect_0: <sprite=19> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+20%</color> Critical Hit Damage to the party.
texts.t7aura_desc: It takes great willpower to keep these roaring flames from running amok.
texts.skill_x_t7aura_desc: Roaring flames improve the party's Attack.
texts.aurastone_skill_t7aura_desc: Roaring flames improve the party's Attack.
texts.aurastone_skill_t7aura_effect: Grants +10% bonus Attack to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t7aura_effect_0: <sprite=4> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+10%</color> bonus Attack to the party.
texts.t6aura_desc: Walking over barren soil will leave it teeming with life in no time at all.
texts.skill_x_t6aura_desc: Nature's blessing grants increased HP to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t6aura_desc: Nature's blessing grants increased HP to the party.
texts.t5aura_desc: The ground quakes beneath its user's feet! You will not be welcome in most establishments.
texts.skill_x_t5aura_desc: The might of the earth grants increased Defense to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t5aura_desc: The might of the earth grants increased Defense to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t5aura_effect_0: <sprite=5> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+10%</color> bonus Defense to the party.
texts.t4aura_desc: Caution! Ground can be slippery when wet!
texts.skill_x_t4aura_desc: Pure water grants a small HP bonus to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t4aura_desc: Pure water grants a small HP bonus to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t4aura_effect: Grants 10 bonus HP to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t4aura_effect_0: <sprite=3> Grants <color=#24E656FF>+10 bonus HP</color> to the party.
texts.t3aura_desc: It's polite to turn it down when passing by someone at night.
texts.skill_x_t3aura_desc: Soothing light grants bonus HP regen to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t3aura_desc: Soothing light grants bonus HP regen to the party.
texts.aurastone_skill_t3aura_effect: Heals party by 1 HP each turn.
texts.aurastone_skill_t3aura_effect_0: <sprite=24> Heals party by <color=#24E656FF>1 HP</color> each turn.
texts.wonderlandmeal_desc: For one trying to kill time, the punishment is eternal tea time.
texts.elysiumaxe_desc: This axe just can't catch a break.
texts.t14axe_desc: An unfortunate slip-up while ordering a custom axe made for an original, yet effective design.
texts.egyptaxe_desc: Apep better get packing, Ra is just about done with his attitude.
texts.artifactaxe_desc: Smidgen Rapace, greedy as he was, could allegedly smell a gold piece from miles away. With his trusty pickaxe, he spent most of his remaining years digging and muttering about a so-called "Lost City of Gold".
texts.egyptcloak_desc: Though once relatively unknown, these colors became an instant sensation overnight when Nilea absolutely crushed a field hockey tournament.
texts.shoprbow_desc: The string is effectively impossible for the average archer, but it seems to become malleable for special individuals.
texts.t14bow_desc: So named after the gigantic ice arrows it fires. More than capable of unhorsing a giant, if they had horses to begin with.
texts.wonderlandbow_desc: A bow doubtlessly designed for a madwoman. You most certainly are mad, too, lest you wouldn't be wielding it.
texts.platinumbow_desc: An elven weapon found within dwarven ruins? What are the archeological implications of this?
texts.superbow_desc: Capable of firing all sorts of tricky arrows for any conceivable scenario.
texts.lunarbow_desc: The crest undulates as the wielder aims for a shot, as if it had a mind of its own.
texts.shoprroguehat_desc: There are no kings or countries at sea. The admiral is the supreme ruler of his ship!
texts.wonderlandrobe_desc: A fitting uniform for one with a head on their shoulders.
texts.superring_desc: A ring of great power, limited only by the force of will of its user.
texts.shoprvault_custom_text_desc: The Vault keeps count of all the gems you've earned as a player.
texts.t14robe_desc: Since they mostly wear rags and dirt, this is considerely highly ostentatious among druids.
texts.voidrobe_desc: If you put anything in the pockets, you're not getting it back.
texts.voidhelm_desc: Welcome to the hivemind! Your orders will be given shortly.
texts.voiddagger_desc: Void creatures vanish upon death, so the claws used in its construction are only very scarcely found.
texts.thiefcrossbow_desc: Can get you out of trouble in a jiffy. Can also be used to bring trouble to you!
texts.t14crossbow_desc: The wicked watches. Weaknesses wrought, agony wracking.
texts.bugcloak_desc: Lamp. Guiding beacon in the dark. Comforting warmth in a cold, merciless world. An evergiving glow. A generous spark. A lifegiver. Lamp.
texts.t14cloak_desc: Simply fluttered down from the skies one day. No one knows where it's from, or who it belongs to.
texts.bughelm_desc: Hey! Get off my tree! Chaaaaaaaarge!
texts.piratedagger_desc: Arrr, blasted barnacles be bluntin' me edge!
texts.t14dagger_desc: I dare say, young man, your head is looking mighty delicious.
texts.schoolring2020_china_desc: Awarded very sparingly by Evelyn to her most exceptional students.
texts.platinumdessert_desc: The plate accounts for roughly 98% of the value of this item.
texts.t14dessert_desc: Only the most wealthy of royalty could even hope to lay their eyes upon such a dessert, let alone taste it!
texts.purchase_sitems_dragonemblem5_desc: A bundle of Dragonmarks to upgrade furniture.
texts.purchase_sitems_dragonemblem6_desc: A bundle of Dragonmarks to upgrade furniture.
texts.purchase_sitems_limitededition_desc: A bundle of tokens to double up on a Surcharge.
texts.bpass_task_titantowerfloor_desc: Clear floors of the Tower of Titans
texts.titan_desc: Be careful who you call ugly at the Tower of Titans.
texts.requires_titan_no_stack: Does not stack with other Titan Spirits.
texts.griffin_desc: Part lion and part eagle, but completely awesome.
texts.leviathan_desc: Was mistaken for a mermaid a few centuries ago. Those were the days.
texts.bahamut_desc: You have 5 turns to start running.
texts.behemoth_desc: Hello, police? The apocalypse is here.
texts.goose_desc: A most despicable creature barely contained in spirit form. Even now, it bumps and hops around hoping to peck innocent pedestrians.
texts.rack_item_specification_cancel_popup_bod: Are you sure ? All unsaved changes will be reverted.
texts.rack_item_specification_window_descripti: Choose which item types you'd like to display on this rack.
texts.promocode_invalid_user_geo_location: This promo code is not available in your country.
texts.t14light_desc: Divinity is within arm's reach. Is it all it's been hyped up to be?
texts.divinespark_desc: Divinity is granted but... perhaps it can also be taken.
texts.t14water_desc: The sea be a cruel mistress.
texts.demigodpinion_desc: A mere feather from the Avatar contains more power than any mortal will behold in a lifetime.
texts.demigod_desc: Relatively impotent compared to its true form but puts on a noble air and bears with it.
texts.buggauntlets_desc: Herculean strength at the cost of some dexterity!
texts.supergauntlets_desc: Unfortunately the clever joke here was already stolen by the Luxurious Gauntlets.
texts.t14gauntlets_desc: No weapon is ever dropped against the wearer's wishes, nor are thrown weapons ever led astray.
texts.lunargauntlets_desc: Features the same fire breathing potential as the Dragon Skull. They are decidedly more like fancy pyrotechnics though.
texts.bugstaff_desc: Do you like shorts? They're comfy and easy to wear!
texts.t14gloves_desc: Lefties are not allowed to pick their nose. It's one of those old laws nobody's really sure why it exists.
texts.pirategloves_desc: I suppose with one and a half share, you end up with a glove and a half.
texts.magicgloves_desc: Beautifully adorned gloves perfectly suited for a scene act. Rogues prefer to use them to hide fingerprints though.
texts.vipscroll_china_desc: Fortune favors the bold... and the bearer of this gilded parchment.
texts.magicmagehat_desc: The sign of a poseur, without a doubt. And yet, pulling rabbits out of the hat without using magic... seems more magical than magic itself.
texts.artifactgun_desc: Meirika Wyrmbane was once interviewed about her dragon hunting prowesses. Her secret? "There is no such thing as too much gunpowder."
texts.platinumgun_desc: Lobs an explosive payload anywhere except here.
texts.artifactheavyarmor_desc: Aster the Reckless bore his reputation well. In the end though, it is the armor that is invincible, not its wearer.
texts.darkheavyarmor_desc: Terrible and beautiful, this armor is layered with curses so terrible it passively erodes the souls of nearby creatures.
texts.t14heavyarmor_desc: Wars have been fought over the honor of owning this legendary piece of armor.
texts.artifactboots_desc: Urist was not an eager lad. Wherever he went, he was late. When he did show up though, he did not go unnoticed!
texts.darkknightboots_desc: Widows and sorrows are just about everything that remains where these boots have walked.
texts.t14boots_desc: A hundred campaigns and yet completely free of blemishes.
texts.newyearboots_desc: Utterly stiff. Rather uncomfortable. Poor adherance. A small price to pay for indestructible boots!
texts.freedomboots_china_desc: A path of stars is lain before you.
texts.freedomring_china_desc: A secret sign among rogue Star Commanders, typically dishonorably discharged after a resounding failure.
texts.mundrahelm_desc: Wearers may develop an unusual craving for Gems, although keep in mind your biology won't agree.
texts.elysiumhelm_desc: To err is human. To avenge, divine.
texts.t14helm_desc: If the Cobalt Commander sets foot on the battlefield, victory is but a foregone conclusion.
texts.lunarhelm2_desc: There's a switch in there to activate the fire breathing. It's a pain to refuel it, though.
texts.fireworksscroll_china_desc: It isn't exactly magical, but it sure feels like it!
texts.t14herb_desc: No matter the season nor the century, the Bonsai thrives forevermore. Said to have been cared for by Gaia herself.
texts.newyearherb_desc: Crystalized dew gathered during the first light of the first morning. Since it's freezing in most places, it's pretty rare!
texts.powderkeg_china_desc: This is what happens when Roxanne gets her hands on a mace blueprint.
texts.newyearspear_desc: Blessed in the starlight of the first morning, this lance will strike true for the remainder of the year.
texts.christmascroll_china_desc: Your name is on the nice list!
texts.skyinstrument_desc: An unforgettable, divine music can be played in the hands of a one who has not sinned. For some reason, it and the Otherwordly Chime cancel each other out.
texts.t14instrument_desc: A resounding call that echoes across the cosmos. Whatever is out there will wish they were alone in the universe.
texts.keytar_desc: Anyone with the means to bust this one out at a party is guaranteed to take it to the next level.
texts.t13instrument_desc: This strange chime produces a rather mundane sound, but is said to be hauntingly beautiful to the undead.
texts.t12instrument_desc: Hot riffs and sparks are all but guaranteed. Pyrotechnics included!
texts.t11instrument_desc: Why are bards such sultry fellows? This lyre is the cause and the effect.
texts.t10instrument_desc: Life under the sea is better than anything we got up here.
texts.t9instrument_desc: If you need to wake up someone in a flash, look no further than this (technically) portable hunk of bronze!
texts.t7instrument_desc: The party classic with all the bells (but none of the whistles).
texts.t6instrument_desc: A seemingly mundane instrument. But if played by a lover bereft, its drone will move even hearts of ice.
texts.t5instrument_desc: Yohan's favorite. It's a classic for a reason!
texts.t4instrument_desc: Keep in handy in case Gondor requires aid.
texts.cyberroguehat_desc: Pollution is thankfully nowhere near an issue yet, but it doesn't hurt to be prepared.
texts.shoprmediumarmor_desc: The legend goes that one clever airship captain once assaulted the Tower of Titans from the air, skipping every floor. Ever since then, magical barriers have been mysteriously put in place.
texts.t14mediumarmor_desc: All good soothsayers die of natural causes.
texts.tamasmediumarmor_desc: Tamas would like it back by 8pm if possible.
texts.tamasscroll_desc: Roll back the leather wrapping only to reveal... more leather.
texts.summerbodshoes_desc: Are you familiar with the torture known as the Beep Test?
texts.t14shoes_desc: In no way does footwear improve or impair future sight, but fashion is still important.
texts.voidshoes_desc: In the infinite realm of the Void, these shoes will not lead you astray.
texts.t14mace_desc: Though Oni are a scrappy, rowdy bunch, those few among them who rise to the rank of Lord become devious opponents.
texts.cybermace_desc: The Modular Assembly Universal Law enforcer is an invaluable tool in breaking down doors, walls, and mostly anything standing in your way. Holographic enhancements void the warranty.
texts.cybermeal_desc: Stuffed so full it could burst out at any moment.
texts.gatormaidmagehat_desc: The alluring lantern is designed to distract small fries, but take care not to fall for it yourself!
texts.platinummagehat_desc: It does get pretty cold in the mountains.
texts.t14magehat_desc: The ponytail is part of the uniform. Wigs are much more convenient.
texts.summerbodmagehat_desc: Work your body 'till it burns! The burning means its working!
texts.summerbodpotion_desc: A special recipe with lots of Seeds of Vitality. It's time to bulk!
texts.yulemeal_desc: Just like Grandma used to make. Tutu Mano made sure of it.
texts.yulescroll_desc: A thick collection of old tales. Turns out a lot of them are pretty grim.
texts.suprememoon_desc: Refined lunar magic overflowing with power. An essential component for Fusion.
texts.t14potion_desc: To partake is to make the choice between ultimate good and ultimate evil. There is no going back.
texts.lunarpotion_desc: A potent cure-all created by and for dragons. Turns out, it works great on humans too!
texts.egyptpotion_desc: It's meant to hold human bits, so you really shouldn't drink this one.
texts.lunarspear_desc: It is said that one must consume the Elixir of the Wyrm before being judged worthy of wielding this lance.
texts.egyptring_desc: Said to provide divine protection to the living. Even if you die, it'll protect you in the afterlife too!
texts.elysiumring_desc: It's a home away from home.
texts.t14ring_desc: Simply activate it to shrink down and visit the realm within. Don't drop it while someone is in there though.
texts.newyearring_china_desc: So, about your resolutions from last year...
texts.gatormaidring_desc: Wear it alongside the Ruby and Emerald Rings for excellent elemental resistances.
texts.gatormaidstaff_desc: The pearl is unimaginably rare, but equally adept at channeling powerful water spells.
texts.elysiumroguehat_desc: The wind whispers of a journey...
texts.t14roguehat_desc: When one can peer into the tangle of fate, eyesight is more of a distraction.
texts.artifactroguehat_desc: Little is known of Savard, save for her exploits and her iconic headdress. She kept to herself and then simply vanished from history.
texts.jesterroguehat_desc: It looks utterly foolish, but who will have the last laugh?
texts.dialog_bard_chat: I get terrible stage fright every time. People say it gets better with time, but...
texts.dialog_bard_chat_02: Aurasongs are kind of like... music in solid form? I don't know anyone else who can make them...
texts.dialog_bard_chat_03: Magic is all about concentration. Musical instruments are the perfect tool for that... even it if looks silly.
texts.dialog_bard_chat_04: Drats... I double-booked Ukelele lessons again...
texts.dialog_bard_chat_05: Ismael's singing is... wow! Elves really are a cut above the rest!
texts.dialog_bard_chat_06: I often see Zolea hanging around when I'm playing this Chime. I wonder what's up with that?
texts.dialog_bard_chat_07: Instruments have souls, you know? There's nothing better than one you've made yourself.
texts.dialog_bard_chat_08: It takes great leadership to use Aurasongs properly. Most people just don't have what it takes.
texts.dialog_bard_chat_09: You don't mind if I call you Maestro, do you? It's a great honor for me.
texts.rustyroguehat_desc: The faded remains of an artifact Rogue Hat. It can be used to craft the Lone Wolf Cowl
texts.supreme_desc: A perfectly cut runestone overflowing with power. The Priestess or the Wizard can craft it into an Enchantment.
texts.darkshield_desc: Primal fear will grip all but the fiercest of warriors upon seeing the Cursed King's banner.
texts.elysiumshield_desc: Make sure to consult business hours before entering.
texts.t14shield_desc: You don't want to be on the attacker's side of this one.
texts.lunarshield_desc: A most coveted gemstone among dragonkind. Both unimaginably powerful and valuable, no dragon would dare attack its owner.
texts.pirateshield_desc: It's seen merrier days, but it can serve as a suitable shield.
texts.darksword_desc: Soulthirsty and sentient. It is believed that it controlled the Cursed King during his many mad wars.
texts.t14spear_desc: By this trident, the tide swells and marine life beckons!
texts.chronoscroll_desc: Chronomancy was way easier before they added all those transdimensional time zones.
texts.t14scroll_desc: Contains magic powerful enough to sprout abundant life in a desolate world. Extremely dangerous if used irresponsibly.
texts.1000bp_desc: A doomsday spell is contained within that is said to usher forth an era of darkness. Who would ever want this? You, apparently!
texts.freedomscroll_china_desc: Even the most seasoned of Star Commanders need reference material every now and then.
texts.batscroll_china_desc: What a horrible night to have a curse.
texts.artifactscroll_desc: Timotheus Grimar used to be quite the collector back in his youth!
texts.t14staff_desc: Though it is not known how a shard of Ebbstone could be chipped away, it can now be used to channel its immense power from anywhere in the world.
texts.platinumstaff_desc: Fit for a king. And not just any king, a dwarven king!
texts.yulestaff_desc: A sacred tree is grown for years to be carved into this staff.
texts.news_bpass_atlab2021_body: Collect Copper Coins to unlock exclusive new rewards!
texts.news_bpass_lny2022_body: Collect Mandarins to unlock exclusive new rewards!
texts.news_bpass_cinco2022_body: Collect Piñatas to unlock exclusive new rewards!
texts.news_bpass_halloween2022_body: Collect candies to unlock this spooky, exclusive content!
texts.news_bpass_lny2023_body: Collect Mandarins to unlock exclusive new rewards!
texts.news_bpass_space2023_body: Collect Stars to unlock exclusive new rewards!
texts.news_bpass_bjorn2023_body: Collect Arrowheads to unlock Bjorn and Bamham early!
texts.news_bpass_vampire2023_body: Collect Bloody Roses to hasten your vampiric transformation!
texts.news_bpass_christmas2023_body: Collect Candy Canes for the Christmas party!
texts.news_bpass_lny2024_body: Collect Dragon Scales for this Lunar New Year!
texts.news_bpass_blitz_v2_lilu_body: Collect Pollux Tokens to unlock this Champion <color=#FFDC00>permanently</color>!
texts.news_bpass_spring2024_body: Collect Spring Blossoms for the Full Bloom event! Celebrate the warm times and the sunshine!
texts.news_bpass_ironclad2024_body: Collect Rivets for the Ironclad event! Hard work always pays off!
texts.news_bpass_pirate2024_body: Collect Doubloons for the Pirate event! Let's get to lootin' mateys!
texts.news_bpass_blitz_v2_sia_body: Collect Tambourines to unlock this Champion <color=#FFDC00>permanently</color>!
texts.news_bpass_blitz_v2_yami_body: Collect Shurikens to unlock this Champion <color=#FFDC00>permanently</color>!
texts.dialog_bard_bounty_craft: I could use some help with this...
texts.dialog_bard_bounty_slay: T-there's a mean bully at one of my favorite spots...
texts.dialog_bard_bounty_quest: I wish to see a battle worthy of songs!
texts.dialog_bard_bounty_discount: Show us how it's done, Maestro!
texts.rustyboots_desc: The remaining chunks of an artifact Heavy Boots. It can be used to craft the Rock Stompers.
texts.advanced_research_node_xpbonus_desc: Increased Merchant XP from ALL Tier 14 items!
texts.advanced_research_info_popup_bot_desc: These upgrades do not use Talent Points, so go ahead and unlock them all!
texts.elysium_boss_story: Animated by remnant sparks of divinity, this statue is compelled to repel intruders in its domain.
texts.skill_nullified_champion_stat_bonuses: Nullify effects this Hero receives from Champions.
texts.webstore_reward_first_bonus_desc: Make your first Webstore purchase and receive this bonus.
texts.webstore_reward_first_bonus_desc_long: When you make your first purchase on our Webstore, you will receive a one-time bonus automatically in-game once your purchase has processed. This bonus can only be received once and is not a bonus applied per purchase item.
texts.artifactsword_desc: Muramonji's fighting style could never truly be replicated. Clumsy to be sure, but who else could split boulders with a sword?
texts.platinumsword_desc: Enough with platitudes! Have this platinum!
texts.t14sword_desc: Also known as the Betrayer. One who wields Durandal will find themselves alone in the world... yet with no need for allies.
texts.purchase_sitems_xsolla_polonia_desc: Rare coins used to recruit and empower Polonia.
texts.visit_polonia_wi_00_01: Ahoooooy! It be shanty time, matey!
texts.visit_polonia_wi_00_02: Let's bolster the courage o' them scallywags aboard me ship!
texts.t14wand_desc: The Widowmaker had several of these vile artifacts hidden away all over the world, waiting for her most devoted servants to uncover them.
texts.heavencrest_desc: Stealing one of those is probably a sin but who's counting?
